hanzi: 我觉得很困。

hanzi: 今后请准时。
pinyin: jīn hòu qǐng zhǔn shí。

hanzi: 他们不大愿意帮忙。
pinyin: tā men bú dà yuàn yì bāng máng。

pinyin: tā cóng xiǎo jiù xué huì le zhī bù.
english: She had been taught to weave as a child.

hanzi: 他发表了不少文章。
pinyin: tā fā biǎo le bù shǎo wén zhāng。
english: He has published quite a lot of articles.

hanzi: 这里没有可工作的空间.
pinyin: zhè lǐ méi yǒu kě gōng zuò de kōng jiān.
english: There's no room to work here.

hanzi: 这件衣服是最新设计。

hanzi: 她在果园里到处跑。
pinyin: tā zài guǒ yuán lǐ dào chù pǎo。

pinyin: yóu kè men kāi chē xiàng xī běi ér qù。

english: He wrote a composition or (he) read an essay.

hanzi: 展出的服装都过时了。

hanzi: 他的作文比我的好多了。

pinyin: zhù jiào xué xiào zhòng dì zhù lǐ jiào yuán
english: An assistant teacher in a school.

hanzi: 我穿蓝色衣服非常适合。
pinyin: wǒ chuān lán sè yī fu fēi cháng shì hé。
english: Blue is a very becoming color on me.

hanzi: 他个子小但身体很健康。
pinyin: tā gè zi xiǎo dàn shēn tǐ hěn jiàn kāng。
english: He was small and healthily built.

hanzi: 黑板在教室的前面。
pinyin: hēi bǎn zài jiào shì de qián mian。
english: The blackboard is in the front of the classroom.

hanzi: 他告诉我的消息是真实的。
pinyin: tā gào su wǒ de xiāo xi shì zhēn shí de。
english: The news he told me is truthful.

hanzi: 有要紧的事把他叫走了。
pinyin: yǒu yào jǐn de shì bǎ tā jiào zǒu le。
english: Something urgent has called him away.

hanzi: 亲切之人容易接近。
pinyin: qīn qiè zhī rén róng yì jiē jìn。
english: Such people as are friendly are easy to approach.

hanzi: 他不该做那事是有必要的。
pinyin: tā bù gāi zuò nà shì shì yǒu bì yào de。
english: It is important that he not do it.

hanzi: 只要我身体好一定来。
pinyin: zhǐ yào wǒ shēn tǐ hào yī dìng lái。
english: I will come provided that I am well enough.

hanzi: 奶奶简直不能相信这事。
pinyin: nǎi nai jiǎn zhí bù néng xiāng xìn zhè shì。
english: Grandma could hardly believe it.

hanzi: 她走进内室去换衣服。
pinyin: tā zǒu jìn nèi shì qù huàn yī fu。
english: She went into the inner room to change her dress.

hanzi: 他急急忙忙到办公室去了.
pinyin: tā jí jí máng máng dào bàn gōng shì qù le.
english: He hastened (away) to the office.

hanzi: 她是一个有责任心的教师。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè yǒu zé rèn xīn de jiào shī。
english: She is a conscientious teacher.

hanzi: 我们应该分清是非。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi fēn qīng shì fēi。
english: We should make a distinction between right and wrong.

hanzi: 她从热水瓶倒出热水。
pinyin: tā zòng rè shuǐ píng dào chū rè shuǐ。
english: She poured hot water from the thermos.

hanzi: 她努力要实现她的理想。
pinyin: tā nǔ lì yào shí xiàn tā de lǐ xiǎng。
english: She tries up to live up to her ideals.

hanzi: 我希望我们和和气气地分手。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng wǒ men huò hé qi qì de fēn shǒu。
english: I hope we can part as friends.

hanzi: 我们一星期三节化学课。
pinyin: wǒ men yī xīng qī sān jié huà xué kè。
english: We have three periods of chemistry a week.

hanzi: 杂技要用很长时间学习.
pinyin: zá jì yào yòng hěn zhǎng shí jiān xué xí.
english: Acrobatics takes a long time to learn.

hanzi: 他坐在风口上，着凉了。
pinyin: tā zuò zài fēng kǒu shàng， zháo liáng le。
english: He sat in a draught and catch a cold.

hanzi: 晨会在学校礼堂举行.
pinyin: chén kuài zài xué xiào lǐ táng jǔ xíng.
english: Morning assembly is held in the school hall.

hanzi: 他每次来信都向你问候.
pinyin: tā měi cì lái xìn dōu xiàng nǐ wèn hòu.
english: He always asks after you in his letters.

hanzi: 学生们很快就动员起来了。
pinyin: xué sheng men hěn kuài jiù dòng yuán qǐ lai le。
english: The student mobilize quickly.

hanzi: 大多数学生通过了考试。
pinyin: dà duō shù xué sheng tōng guò le kǎo shì。
english: Most students passed the examination.

hanzi: 我好久没有见到查理了。
pinyin: wǒ hǎo jiǔ méi yǒu xiàn dào zhā lǐ le。
english: I haven't seen Charlie for a dog's age.

hanzi: 她的热心感动了所有的人。
pinyin: tā de rè xīn gǎn dòng le suǒ yǒu de rén。
english: Her eagerness moved all the people.

hanzi: 他在我的指导下做这件事.
pinyin: tā zài wǒ de zhǐ dǎo xià zuò zhè jiàn shì.
english: He did the work under my direction.

hanzi: 我希望一早就动身离开。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng yī zǎo jiù dòng shēn lí kāi。
english: I hope to get away early in the morning.

hanzi: 她的热心感动了所有的人。
pinyin: tā de rè xīn gǎn dòng le suǒ yǒu de rén。
english: Her eagerness moved all the people.

hanzi: 我们白天工作晚上休息。
pinyin: wǒ men bái tiān gōng zuò wǎn shang xiū xi。
english: We work in the day and rest at night.

hanzi: 孩子们飞跑过去迎接妈妈.
pinyin: hái zi men fēi pǎo guò qu yíng jiē mā ma.
english: The children flew to meet their mother.

hanzi: 他用一把刀子将苹果切开。
pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ dāo zi jiàng píng guǒ qiè kāi。
english: He cleaved an apple with a knife.

hanzi: 首先, 我们没得到批准。
pinyin: shǒu xiān,  wǒ men mò dé dào pī zhǔn。
english: To start with, we haven't got the approval.

hanzi: 我能够熟练操作计算机。
pinyin: wǒ néng gòu shú liàn cāo zuò jì suàn jī。
english: I am skilled in operating a computer.

hanzi: 老板现在不想见她。
pinyin: lǎo bǎn xiàn zài bù xiǎng xiàn tā。
english: She's rather unpopular with the boss at the moment.

hanzi: 记住, 火车半夜离开。
pinyin: jì zhu,  huǒ chē bàn yè lí kāi。
english: Please bear in mind that the train leaves at midnight.

hanzi: 你不是支持我就是反对我。
pinyin: nǐ bú shì zhī chí wǒ jiù shì fǎn duì wǒ。
english: You are either with me or against me.

hanzi: 她不应该把我的信公开。
pinyin: tā bù yīng gāi bǎ wǒ de xìn gōng kāi。
english: She should not give publicity to my letter.

hanzi: 家庭是社会最小的单位。
pinyin: jiā tíng shì shè huì zuì xiǎo de dān wèi。
english: The family is the smallest social unit.

hanzi: 他已经收到了一大批信件。
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng shōu dào le yī dà pī xìn jiàn。
english: He has received a swarm of letters.

hanzi: 一接到通知,我们就出发了。
pinyin: yī jiē dào tōng zhī, wǒ men jiù chū fā le。
english: We had to set out on short notice.

hanzi: 这一事故正在调查之中。
pinyin: zhè yī shì gù zhèng zài diào chá zhī zhōng。
english: The accident is under investigation.

hanzi: 这事可能发生在任何人身上。
pinyin: zhè shì kě néng fā shēng zài rèn hé rén shēn shàng。
english: It can happen to anyone.

hanzi: 我们决定开办一家合作社。
pinyin: wǒ men jué dìng kāi bàn yī jiā hé zuò shè。
english: We decided to set up a cooperative.

hanzi: 他将他的名字写在清单上。
pinyin: tā jiàng tā de míng zi xiě zài qīng dān shàng。
english: He wrote down his name on the list.

hanzi: 你送花来, 想得真周到.
pinyin: nǐ sòng huā lái,  xiǎng de zhēn zhōu dào.
english: It was very thoughtful of you to send flowers.

hanzi: 那间办公室又明亮又通风.
pinyin: nà jiàn bàn gōng shì yòu míng liàng yòu tōng fēng.
english: The office was light and airy.

hanzi: 蛋黄是鸡蛋中的黄色部分.
pinyin: dàn huáng shì jī dàn zhòng dì huáng sè bù fen.
english: The yolk is the yellow part in an egg.

hanzi: 他能准确流利地说英语。
pinyin: tā néng zhǔn què liú lì de shuō Yīng yǔ。
english: He can speak English fluently and accurately.

hanzi: 还是我直接跟他打交道为好
pinyin: hái shì wǒ zhí jiē gēn tā dǎ jiāo dào wèi hào
english: I prefer to deal with him direct.

hanzi: 老百姓反对这种想法.
pinyin: lǎo bǎi xìng fǎn duì zhè zhǒng xiǎng fǎ.
english: The man in the street is opposed to this idea.

hanzi: 便条简短的便条或备忘字条
pinyin: biàn tiáo jiǎn duǎn de biàn tiáo huò bèi wàng zì tiáo
english: A brief note or memorandum.

hanzi: 这是目前最时兴的做法了。
pinyin: zhè shì mù qián zuì shí xīng de zuò fǎ le。
english: It's the in-thing to do at the moment.

hanzi: 他们决定开办一家合作社。
pinyin: tā men jué dìng kāi bàn yī jiā hé zuò shè。
english: They decided to set up a cooperative.

hanzi: 你最好听听我要说些什么。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo tìng tìng wǒ yào shuō xiē shén me。
english: You had better hear what I'll say.

hanzi: 对我们来说那是有利的结果。
pinyin: duì wǒ men lái shuō nà shì yǒu lì de jié guǒ。
english: It's a beneficial result to us.

hanzi: 我们不能在白天看到星星。
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng zài bái tiān kàn dào xīng xing。
english: We can't see stars in the daytime.

hanzi: 她在大街开了一家书店.
pinyin: tā zài dà jiē kāi le yī jiā shū diàn.
english: She set up shop as a bookseller in the High Street.

hanzi: 她除了他以外没有好朋友。
pinyin: tā chú le tā yǐ wài méi yǒu hào péng you。
english: She has no close friends other than him.

hanzi: 他对生活有种成熟的看法。
pinyin: tā duì shēng huó yǒu zhòng chéng shú de kàn fǎ。
english: He has a mellow attitude to life.

hanzi: 这张照片是人眼的特写。
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhào piàn shì rén yǎn de tè xiě。
english: This picture is a closeness of the human eye.

hanzi: 这里有很大的活动空间。
pinyin: zhè lǐ yǒu hěn dà de huó dòng kōng jiān。
english: There is plenty of space here to move about.

hanzi: 那条广告口号是双关语.
pinyin: nà tiáo guǎng gào kǒu hào shì shuāng guān yù.
english: The advertising slogan was a play on words.

hanzi: 好看的录像带总是被借走。
pinyin: hǎo kàn de lù xiàng dài zǒng shì bèi jiè zǒu。
english: The good video is always rented out.

hanzi: 那就是我昨天见到的那个人。
pinyin: nà jiù shì wǒ zuó tiān xiàn dào de nèi gè rén。
english: That is the man I saw yesterday.

hanzi: 这一交易需经政府批准.
pinyin: zhè yī jiāo yì xū jīng zhèng fǔ pī zhǔn.
english: The deal needs the government's seal of approval.

hanzi: 有时这个病人疼得哭起来。
pinyin: yǒu shí zhè gè bìng rén téng de kū qǐ lai。
english: Sometimes the patient cried for the pain.

hanzi: 我从报纸上得知这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ zòng bào zhǐ shàng dé zhī zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I learned this news from the newspaper.

hanzi: 近来各方面都有所改进。
pinyin: jìn lái gè fāng miàn dōu yǒu suǒ gǎi jìn。
english: There's been an overall improvement recently.

hanzi: 我昨天在理发店里理了发。
pinyin: wǒ zuó tiān zài lǐ fà diàn lǐ lǐ le fà。
english: I had my hair cut at the barber's yesterday.

hanzi: 你用不着让自己这么不安的。
pinyin: nǐ yòng bù zhuó ràng zì jǐ zhè me bù ān de。
english: There's no need to upset yourself.

hanzi: 这个男孩有交友的能力。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái yǒu jiāo yǒu de néng lì。
english: This boy has a faculty of making friends easily.

hanzi: 近来各方面都有所改进。
pinyin: jìn lái gè fāng miàn dōu yǒu suǒ gǎi jìn。
english: There's been an overall improvement recently.

hanzi: 这里一连好几天都是雨天。
pinyin: zhè lǐ yī lián hǎo jǐ tiān dōu shì yǔ tiān。
english: There are a succession of rainy days here.

hanzi: 你和我的友谊对我意义重大.
pinyin: nǐ huò wǒ de yǒu yì duì wǒ yì yì zhòng dà.
english: Your friendship means a great deal to me.

hanzi: 一个人一定要对自己有信心。
pinyin: yī gè rén yī dìng yào duì zì jǐ yǒu xìn xīn。
english: One has to be confident in himself.

hanzi: 整个工作只需要半个小时。
pinyin: zhěng gè gōng zuò zhǐ xū yào bàn gè xiǎo shí。
english: The whole job only takes half an hour.

hanzi: 不要忘记在支票上写上日期.
pinyin: bù yào wàng jì zài zhī piào shàng xiě shàng rì qī.
english: Don't forget to date your cheque.

hanzi: 这两个事件相互有联系。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè shì jiàn xiāng hù yǒu lián xì。
english: These two events were related to each other.

hanzi: 她已全面掌握了这一学科。
pinyin: tā yǐ quán miàn zhǎng wò le zhè yī xué kē。
english: She has a comprehensive grasp of the subject.

hanzi: 大米是我们生活的基本食物。
pinyin: dà mǐ shì wǒ men shēng huó de jī běn shí wù。
english: Rice is our essential foodstuff in life.

hanzi: 我认为她是个很能干的经理.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā shì gè hěn néng gàn de jīng lǐ.
english: I summed her up as a competent manager.

hanzi: 这不过是许多例子中的一个。
pinyin: zhè bù guò shì xǔ duō lì zi zhòng dì yī gè。
english: This is only one instance out of many.

hanzi: 她干的工作比别人要好些。
pinyin: tā gàn de gōng zuò bì bié rén yào hǎo xiē。
english: Her work is a cut above that of the others.

hanzi: 吃饭的时候我坐在他的对面。
pinyin: chī fàn de shí hou wǒ zuò zài tā de duì miàn。
english: I sat opposite to him during the meal.

hanzi: 他说他会来的，果然来了。
pinyin: tā shuō tā kuài lái de， guǒ rán lái le。
english: He said he would come, and sure enough he did.

hanzi: 他想到她已死去就很难过。
pinyin: tā xiǎng dào tā yǐ sǐ qù jiù hěn nán guò。
english: He was saddened at the memory of her death.

hanzi: 我们事先就知道有这个问题.
pinyin: wǒ men shì xiān jiù zhī dào yǒu zhè gè wèn tí.
english: We were aware of the problem beforehand.

hanzi: 我们要为新娘的健康干杯。
pinyin: wǒ men yào wèi xīn niáng de jiàn kāng gān bēi。
english: We must drink to the health of the bride.

hanzi: 有必要马上派他到那里去。
pinyin: yǒu bì yào mǎ shàng pài tā dào nà li qù。
english: It is necessary that he be sent there at once.

hanzi: 我们应该学习祖先的成就。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi xué xí zǔ xiān de chéng jiù。
english: We should study our ancestral achievements.

hanzi: 有些科学家用动物做试验。
pinyin: yǒu xiē kē xué jiā yòng dòng wù zuò shì yàn。
english: Some scientists experiment on animals.

hanzi: 我们可以利用风力发电.
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ lì yòng fēng lì fā diàn.
english: We can harness the power of the wind to make electricity.

hanzi: 在你的右边能看到那个邮局.
pinyin: zài nǐ de yòu biān néng kàn dào nèi gè yóu jú.
english: You'll see the post office on your right.

hanzi: 我们应该对下一代负责。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi duì xià yī dài fù zé。
english: We should be responsible for the generation as yet unborn.

hanzi: 他们要去动物园或打排球。
pinyin: tā men yào qù dòng wù yuán huò dǎ pái qiú。
english: They will go to the zoo or play volleyball.

hanzi: 我打开房门，然后走进屋里。
pinyin: wǒ dǎ kāi fáng mén， rán hòu zǒu jìn wū lǐ。
english: I unlocked the door and went into the room.

hanzi: 不论你在哪里，我都会想念你。
pinyin: bù lùn nǐ zài nǎ li， wǒ dū huì xiǎng niàn nǐ。
english: Wherever you are, I will miss you.

hanzi: 这两种政体正好相反。
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng zhèng tǐ zhèng hǎo xiāng fǎn。
english: The two systems of government are polar opposites.

hanzi: 一个舒适的家可以是一个乐园。
pinyin: yī gè shū shì de jiā kě yǐ shì yī gè lè yuán。
english: A comfortable house may be an Eden.

hanzi: 我们都去飞机场为她送行了.
pinyin: wǒ men dōu qù fēi jī chǎng wèi tā sòng xíng le.
english: We all went to the airport to see her off.

hanzi: 这些道路上车辆行人很多。
pinyin: zhè xie dào lù shàng chē liàng xíng rén hěn duō。
english: There was a lot of traffic on the roads.

hanzi: 这座公路桥现在开放通行。
pinyin: zhè zuò gōng lù qiáo xiàn zài kāi fàng tōng xíng。
english: The road bridge is now open to traffic.

hanzi: 这里最常刮的风是西南风.
pinyin: zhè lǐ zuì cháng guā de fēng shì xī nán fēng.
english: The prevailing wind here is from the south-west.

hanzi: 早饭后，我就准备去上班。
pinyin: zǎo fàn hòu， wǒ jiù zhǔn bèi qù shàng bān。
english: After breakfast, I'll get ready to go to work.

hanzi: 我们迟早会查明事实真相。
pinyin: wǒ men chí zǎo kuài chá míng shì shí zhēn xiàng。
english: We shall find out the truth early or late.

hanzi: 有许多来自那个国家的难民。
pinyin: yǒu xǔ duō lái zì nèi gè guó jiā de nàn mín。
english: There are many refugees from that country.

hanzi: 他给我看一张合家欢的照片。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ kàn yī zhāng hé jiā huān de zhào piàn。
english: He showed me a photo of a family group.

hanzi: 一点点对你不会有什么坏处。
pinyin: yī diǎn diǎn duì nǐ bù huì yǒu shén me huài chu。
english: A little of it will not do you any harm.

hanzi: 她用的时间正好不到四分钟。
pinyin: tā yòng de shí jiān zhèng hǎo bù dào sì fēn zhōng。
english: Her time was just under four minutes.

hanzi: 他的家在这个城市的东北部。
pinyin: tā de jiā zài zhè gè chéng shì de dōng běi bù。
english: His house is in the northeast of this city.

hanzi: 图书馆每周五对读者开放。
pinyin: tú shū guǎn měi zhōu wǔ duì dú zhě kāi fàng。
english: The library is open to readers on every Friday.

hanzi: 天气很暖和，我就把大衣脱了。
pinyin: tiān qì hěn nuǎn huó， wǒ jiù bǎ dà yī tuō le。
english: I took off my overcoat since it was warm.

hanzi: 图书馆每周五对读者开放。
pinyin: tú shū guǎn měi zhōu wǔ duì dú zhě kāi fàng。
english: The library is open to readers on every Friday.

hanzi: 我父亲要我送顾客到门口。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn yào wǒ sòng gù kè dào mén kǒu。
english: My father asked me to see the customer to the door.

hanzi: 大学的任务是教学和科研。
pinyin: dà xué de rèn wu shì jiào xué huò kē yán。
english: The mission of a university is teaching and research.

hanzi: 我们把一切事情都交给他处理。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ yī qiè shì qing dōu jiāo gěi tā chǔ lǐ。
english: We placed everything at his disposal.

hanzi: 把画挂在窗户对面的墙上.
pinyin: bǎ huà guà zài chuāng hu duì miàn de qiáng shàng.
english: Hang the picture on the wall opposite the window.

hanzi: 我们开会的时间已经确定了.
pinyin: wǒ men kāi huì de shí jiān yǐ jīng què dìng le.
english: The time for our meeting has been fixed already.

hanzi: 老实讲，我不同意你的计划。
pinyin: lǎo shí jiǎng， wǒ bù tóng yì nǐ de jì huà。
english: To tell the truth, I don't agree to your plan.

hanzi: 如果有机会，你应当到那里去。
pinyin: rú guǒ yǒu jī kuài， nǐ yīng dāng dào nà li qù。
english: You should go there if occasion arises.

hanzi: 那一页的数字中有几个差错。
pinyin: nà yī yè de shù zì zhòng yǒu jǐ ge chā cuò。
english: There are several faults in the page of figures.

hanzi: 在照相前，他调整了快门。
pinyin: zài zhào xiàng qián， tā tiáo zhěng le kuài mén。
english: He adjusted the shutter before taking a photo.

hanzi: 我们可以相信他会准时到来。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ xiāng xìn tā kuài zhǔn shí dào lái。
english: We can depend on his arriving here on time.

hanzi: 他的名字在名单上排第十六名。
pinyin: tā de míng zi zài míng dān shàng pǎi dì shí liù míng。
english: His name is the sixteenth on the list.

hanzi: 比赛因天气不好只得取消。
pinyin: bǐ sài yīn tiān qì bù hǎo zhǐ dé qǔ xiāo。
english: The match had to be cancelled because of bad weather.

hanzi: 我的小女儿像天使一样可爱。
pinyin: wǒ de xiǎo nu:3 ér xiàng tiān shǐ yí yàng kě ài。
english: My little daughter is as lovely as an angel.

hanzi: 她常常一边看电视一边织毛衣。
pinyin: tā cháng cháng yī biān kàn diàn shì yī biān zhī máo yī。
english: She often knits while watching TV.

hanzi: 他手上握着刀向这里跑来。
pinyin: tā shǒu shàng wò zhuó dāo xiàng zhè lǐ pǎo lái。
english: He came running here with one hand holding a knife.

hanzi: 小女孩立志要做一名科学家。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái lì zhì yào zuò yī míng kē xué jiā。
english: The young girl aspired to be a scientist.

hanzi: 这家新开的商店里挤满了顾客。
pinyin: zhè jiā xīn kāi de shāng diàn lǐ jǐ mǎn le gù kè。
english: The new store is crowded with customers.

hanzi: 她个子高, 能看到墙的那一边.
pinyin: tā gè zi gāo,  néng kàn dào qiáng de nà yī biān.
english: She can see over the wall because of her height.

hanzi: 你会很快习惯这里的气候的。
pinyin: nǐ kuài hěn kuài xí guàn zhè lǐ de qì hòu de。
english: You will soon get accustomed to the climate here.

hanzi: 这时她注意到书记走了进来。
pinyin: zhè shí tā zhù yì dào shū ji zǒu le jìn lái。
english: At this moment she noticed the secretary coming in.

hanzi: 已成立工作组调查该问题.
pinyin: yǐ chéng lì gōng zuò zǔ diào chá gāi wèn tí.
english: A working party has been set up to look into the problem.

hanzi: 她向一个中国教员学习英语。
pinyin: tā xiàng yī gè Zhōng guó jiào yuán xué xí Yīng yǔ。
english: She learned English from a Chinese teacher.

hanzi: 别忘了一到就给我们打个电报.
pinyin: biè wàng le yī dào jiù jǐ wǒ men dǎ gè diàn bào.
english: Don't forget to cable us as soon as you arrive.

hanzi: 以下是人生而平等的真理。
pinyin: yǐ xià shì rén shēng ér píng děng de zhēn lǐ。
english: What follows is the truth that men are created equal.

hanzi: 学生中许多人来自其他国家。
pinyin: xué sheng zhòng xǔ duō rén lái zì qí tā guó jiā。
english: Many of the students came from other countries.

hanzi: 他是一个有重要社会地位的人。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè yǒu zhòng yào shè huì dì wèi de rén。
english: He is a person of important social status.

hanzi: 她的马车是院子里最漂亮的。
pinyin: tā de mǎ chē shì yuàn zi lǐ zuì piào liang de。
english: Her carriage was the most beautiful one in the yard.

hanzi: 他的文章在省报上发表了。
pinyin: tā de wén zhāng zài xǐng bào shàng fā biǎo le。
english: His articles are published on the provincial newspaper.

hanzi: 当然，我们从小学就是朋友了。
pinyin: dāng rán， wǒ men cóng xiǎo xué jiù shì péng you le。
english: Sure. We are friends since primary school.

hanzi: 他就是我们刚才谈论的那个人。
pinyin: tā jiù shì wǒ men gāng cái tán lùn de nèi gè rén。
english: That is the man about whom we were speaking.

hanzi: 不论你去不去，请打电话给我。
pinyin: bù lùn nǐ qù bù qù， qǐng dǎ diàn huà jǐ wǒ。
english: Whether you will go (or not), please call me up.

hanzi: 老师在黑板上写出新单词。
pinyin: lǎo shī zài hēi bǎn shàng xiě chū xīn dān cí。
english: The teacher wrote down the new words on the blackboard.

hanzi: 原来她姑姑就是我表姐.
pinyin: yuán lái tā gū gu jiù shì wǒ biǎo jiě.
english: It turns out that her aunt and my cousin are one and the same (person).

hanzi: 他们现在过着比较舒适的生活。
pinyin: tā men xiàn zài guò zhuó bǐ jiào shū shì de shēng huó。
english: They are now living in relative comfort.

hanzi: 一到干活儿的时候, 他就不见了.
pinyin: yī dào gàn huó r de shí hou,  tā jiù bù jiàn le.
english: He's always missing when there's work to be done.

hanzi: 这学期他的写作有了很大进步。
pinyin: zhè xué qī tā de xiě zuò yǒu le hěn dà jìn bù。
english: His writing has improved greatly in this semester.

hanzi: 今天早晨我的汽车发动不起来了。
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo chén wǒ de qì chē fā dòng bù qǐ lai le。
english: I couldn't make my car start this morning.

hanzi: 那小男孩在父母身边感到安心。
pinyin: nà xiǎo nán hái zài fù mǔ shēn biān gǎn dào ān xīn。
english: The little boy felt secure near his parents.

hanzi: 这个花瓶的年代比那个的早.
pinyin: zhè gè huā píng de nián dài bì nèi gè de zǎo.
english: This vase is of an earlier date (ie is older) than that one.

hanzi: 讲话时他经常参考笔记。
pinyin: jiǎng huà shí tā jīng cháng cān kǎo bǐ jì。
english: He frequently referred to the notes during the course of the talk.

hanzi: 我近几个月身体不好没上班.
pinyin: wǒ jìn jǐ ge yuè shēn tǐ bù hǎo mò shàng bān.
english: I've been too sick/ill to go to work for the last few months.

hanzi: 我从来没有想过会再次见到你。
pinyin: wǒ cóng lái méi yǒu xiǎng guò kuài zài cì xiàn dào nǐ。
english: I never dreamed that I should see you again.

hanzi: 他法语还不错, 但应该再好些.
pinyin: tā fǎ yǔ huán bù cuò,  dàn yīng gāi zài hǎo xiē.
english: His knowledge of French is fair, but ought to be better.

hanzi: 电影院不远, 你可以走到那去。
pinyin: diàn yǐng yuàn bù yuǎn,  nǐ kě yǐ zǒu dào nà qù。
english: The cinema is not far, you can get there on foot.

hanzi: 我认得她，但想不起她的名字了。
pinyin: wǒ rèn de tā， dàn xiǎng bù qǐ tā de míng zi le。
english: I know her face but I can't call her name to mind.

hanzi: 我对座次表作了小小的调整。
pinyin: wǒ duì zuò cì biǎo zuò le xiǎo xiǎo de tiáo zhěng。
english: I've made a few minor adjustments to the seating plan.

hanzi: 太阳很低时, 物体的影子就很长.
pinyin: tài yáng hěn dī shí,  wù tǐ de yǐng zi jiù hěn zhǎng.
english: Shadows are longer when the sun is low in the sky.

hanzi: 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。
pinyin: zhè yī pái pǎi de fáng wū wài biǎo dōu shì yí yàng de。
english: The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.

hanzi: 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。
pinyin: zhè yī pái pǎi de fáng wū wài biǎo dōu shì yí yàng de。
english: The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.

hanzi: 不论下不下雨，比赛照常举行。
pinyin: bù lùn xià bù xià yǔ， bǐ sài zhào cháng jǔ xíng。
english: Rain or shine, the game will be held as scheduled.

hanzi: 这医院有内科病房和外科病房.
pinyin: zhè yī yuàn yǒu nèi kē bìng fáng huò wài kē bìng fáng.
english: The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward.

hanzi: 你能把那一点指出来，我感到很高兴。
pinyin: nǐ néng bǎ nà yī diǎn zhǐ chū lái， wǒ gǎn dào hěn gāo xìng。
english: I'm glad you raised that point.

hanzi: 她花了整整一个下午整理邮票。
pinyin: tā huā le zhěng zhěng yī gè xià wǔ zhěng lǐ yóu piào。
english: She spent a whole afternoon sorting out her stamps.

hanzi: 公共汽车停下来让一些旅客下车。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē tíng xia lai ràng yī xiē lu:3 kè xià chē。
english: The bus stopped to put down some passengers.

hanzi: 他在几年前脱离了那个非法团体。
pinyin: tā zài jǐ nián qián tuō lí le nèi gè fēi fǎ tuán tǐ。
english: He broke away from that lawless group years ago.

hanzi: 到半夜时分他已喝了近两瓶酒。
pinyin: dào bàn yè shí fèn tā yǐ hè le jìn liǎng píng jiǔ。
english: By midnight he had put back nearly two bottles of wine.

hanzi: 在两点到三点之间向经理报到。
pinyin: zài liǎng diǎn dào sān diǎn zhī jiān xiàng jīng lǐ bào dào。
english: Report yourself to the manager between2 and3.

hanzi: 出门前你应该把房间收拾整齐。
pinyin: chū mén qián nǐ yīng gāi bǎ fáng jiān shōu shi zhěng qí。
english: You should straighten up your room before going out.

hanzi: 我希望你不要看不起这种工作。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng nǐ bù yào kàn bù qǐ zhè zhǒng gōng zuò。
english: I wish you wouldn't look down on this kind of work.

hanzi: 这没什么要紧，不要为它烦心了。
pinyin: zhè mò shén me yào jǐn， bù yào wèi tā fán xīn le。
english: It's not important; don't bother your head about it.

hanzi: 在集市上，我闻到了东方的气息。
pinyin: zài jí shì shàng， wǒ wén dào le dōng fāng de qì xī。
english: In the market, I breathed the smells of the Orient.

hanzi: 如果有机会，我将去看那部电影。
pinyin: rú guǒ yǒu jī kuài， wǒ jiàng qù kàn nà bù diàn yǐng。
english: I will go to see the film if I get the opportunity.

hanzi: 我在谈话中当然会十分小心的。
pinyin: wǒ zài tán huà zhòng dāng rán kuài shí fēn xiǎo xīn de。
english: I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation.

hanzi: 昨天下雨了, 结果比赛被取消。
pinyin: zuó tiān xià yǔ le,  jié guǒ bǐ sài bèi qǔ xiāo。
english: It rained yesterday and in consequence the match was canceled.

hanzi: 太阳下山后天气很快就会冷下来。
pinyin: tài yáng xià shān hòu tiān qì hěn kuài jiù kuài lěng xia lai。
english: It gets cold quickly when the sun goes down.

hanzi: 我们都被他的爱国精神深深感动了。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu bèi tā de ài guó jīng shén shēn shēn gǎn dòng le。
english: We are all deeply moved by his patriotism.

hanzi: 在这块不毛之地上什么也不能生长。
pinyin: zài zhè kuài bù máo zhī dì shang shén me yě bù néng shēng zhǎng。
english: Nothing can grow in this barren land.

hanzi: 把面包切成小片，然后给我两片。
pinyin: bǎ miàn bāo qiè chéng xiǎo piàn， rán hòu jǐ wǒ liǎng piàn。
english: Cut the bread into small rounds and give me two.

hanzi: 因为天气热，她穿了一件凉快的衣服。
pinyin: yīn wèi tiān qì rè， tā chuān le yī jiàn liáng kuai de yī fu。
english: As it was a hot day she wore a cool dress.

hanzi: 现代音乐最初是在意大利发展起来的。
pinyin: xiàn dài yīn yuè zuì chū shì zài yì dà lì fā zhǎn qǐ lai de。
english: Modern music was first developed in Italy.

hanzi: 我们必须找一个地方放这张新照片。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū zhǎo yī gè dì fang fàng zhè zhāng xīn zhào piàn。
english: We must find a place for this new picture.

hanzi: 我们必须找一个地方放这张新照片。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū zhǎo yī gè dì fang fàng zhè zhāng xīn zhào piàn。
english: We must find a place for this new picture.

hanzi: 你这本词典看来有点儿太旧了.
pinyin: nǐ zhè běn cí diǎn kàn lai yǒu diǎn er tài jiù le.
english: Your copy of the dictionary is looking a bit the worse for wear.

hanzi: 他对我指的是什么没有一点儿概念。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ zhǐ de shì shén me méi yǒu yī diǎnr gài niàn。
english: He didn't have a slightest notion of what I meant.

hanzi: 你永远应该以搞好你的工作为目的。
pinyin: nǐ yǒng yuǎn yīng gāi yǐ gǎo hào nǐ de gōng zuò wèi mù dì。
english: You should always aim at doing your job well.

hanzi: 那张照片上的突出物是我们的大楼。
pinyin: nà zhāng zhào piàn shàng de tū chū wù shì wǒ men de dà lóu。
english: The projection on the picture is our building.

hanzi: 他们不得不为了那条消息作出声明。
pinyin: tā men bù dé bù wèi le nà tiáo xiāo xi zuò chū shēng míng。
english: They have to make a protestation of that news.

hanzi: 他没有一次到书店而不买一些书。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu yī cì dào shū diàn ér bù mǎi yī xiē shū。
english: He never went to the bookstore without buying some books.

hanzi: 我们今后一星期没有见面的机会了。
pinyin: wǒ men jīn hòu yī xīng qī méi yǒu jiàn miàn de jī huì le。
english: We have no chance to meet each other a week hence.

hanzi: 如果你拿着地图指路，我就来开车。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ ná zhuó dì tú zhǐ lù， wǒ jiù lái kāi chē。
english: I'll drive the car if you hold the map and navigate.

hanzi: 我对他很生气，因为他让我等了好久。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā hěn shēng qì， yīn wèi tā ràng wǒ děng le hǎo jiǔ。
english: I was angry with him for keeping me waiting.

hanzi: 他带这个人走过街道到火车站。
pinyin: tā dài zhè gè rén zǒu guò jiē dào dào huǒ chē zhàn。
english: He guided the man through the streets to the railway station.

hanzi: 她处理政治问题的方法很科学。
pinyin: tā chǔ lǐ zhèng zhì wèn tí de fāng fǎ hěn kē xué。
english: She has a very scientific method of dealing with political problems.

hanzi: 这个问题你在适当的时候问问她吧。
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí nǐ zài shì dàng de shí hou wèn wèn tā ba。
english: Ask her about it when a suitable moment offer itself.

hanzi: 有人已经把他的名字从名单上划去了。
pinyin: yǒu rén yǐ jīng bǎ tā de míng zi zòng míng dān shàng huà qù le。
english: Somebody has scratched his name off the list.

hanzi: 这本书可能有用，只是相当贵。
pinyin: zhè běn shū kě néng yǒu yòng， zhǐ shì xiāng dāng guì。
english: The book is likely to be useful, only it's rather expensive.

hanzi: 我已经通过了日语的中级水平考试。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng tōng guò le rì yǔ de zhōng jí shuǐ píng kǎo shì。
english: I've passed the intermediate level exam of Japanese.

hanzi: 对我们来说，很难决定走哪一条路。
pinyin: duì wǒ men lái shuō， hěn nàn jué dìng zǒu něi yī tiáo lù。
english: It was difficult for us to decide which road to take.

hanzi: 有人向部长提出了工业计划问题。
pinyin: yǒu rén xiàng bù zhǎng tí chū le gōng yè jì huà wèn tí。
english: The minister was queried about his plans for the industry.

hanzi: 我们大学的校园里新建了一座体育馆。
pinyin: wǒ men dà xué de xiào yuán lǐ Xīn jiàn le yī zuò tǐ yù guǎn。
english: A new gymnasium has been built on our campus.

hanzi: 他的研究成果和你的研究成果有关联。
pinyin: tā de yán jiū chéng guǒ huò nǐ de yán jiū chéng guǒ yǒu guān lián。
english: His research results correlate with yours.

hanzi: 他是大学教师联合会的一名成员。
pinyin: tā shì dà xué jiào shī lián hé kuài de yī míng chéng yuán。
english: He is a member of the Association of University Teachers.

hanzi: 推广这种新方法不是件容易的工作。
pinyin: tuī guǎng zhè zhǒng xīn fāng fǎ bú shì jiàn róng yì de gōng zuò。
english: Popularizing this new method is not an easy job.

hanzi: 当他平静下来时，我开始告诉他实情。
pinyin: dàng tā píng jìng xia lai shí， wǒ kāi shǐ gào su tā shí qíng。
english: When he quieted down, I began to tell him the truth.

hanzi: 他在生人面前总是不知要说什么。
pinyin: tā zài shēng rén miàn qián zǒng shì bù zhī yào shuō shén me。
english: He is always at a loss what to say in front of strangers.

hanzi: 世界上任何困难他们都可以克服。
pinyin: shì jiè shàng rèn hé kùn nan tā men dōu kě yǐ kè fú。
english: There will be no difficulty in the world that they cannot overcome.

hanzi: 想要懂得今天，就必须研究昨天。
pinyin: xiǎng yào dǒng de jīn tiān， jiù bì xū yán jiū zuó tiān。
english: If you want to understand today, you have to search yesterday.

hanzi: 我已经在这家旅馆里住了两个星期了。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zài zhè jiā lu:3 guǎn lǐ zhù le liǎng gè xīng qī le。
english: I have been resident in this hotel for two weeks.

hanzi: 我已经好久没有读到过这样好的书了。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng hǎo jiǔ méi yǒu dú dào guò zhè yàng hǎo de shū le。
english: I've not read such a good book for many a long day.

hanzi: 她坐在那里努力集中思想准备发言.
pinyin: tā zuò zài nà li nǔ lì jí zhōng sī xiǎng zhǔn bèi fā yán.
english: She sat trying to gather her thoughts before making her speech.

hanzi: 那所房子是出卖的，房子里有暖气设备。
pinyin: nà suǒ fáng zi shì chū mài de， fáng zi lǐ yǒu nuǎn qì shè bèi。
english: That house is for sale. It has central heating.

hanzi: 他总是把女朋友的相片放在身边。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì bǎ nu:3 péng you de xiàng piàn fàng zài shēn biān。
english: He always kept the picture of his girlfriend's close at hand.

hanzi: 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。
pinyin: tā bù dé bù dī xià tou cái néng chuān guò dī ǎi de mén kǒu。
english: She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway.

hanzi: 讲一口流利的英语需要多年的刻苦操练。
pinyin: jiǎng yī kǒu liú lì de Yīng yǔ xū yào duō nián de kè kǔ cāo liàn。
english: It took years of hard work to speak good English.

hanzi: 你没有认识到她这一成就的重大意义。
pinyin: nǐ méi yǒu rèn shi dào tā zhè yī chéng jiù de zhòng dà yì yì。
english: You haven't realized the magnitude of her achievement.

hanzi: 今天要是星期三，前天就是星期一。
pinyin: jīn tiān yào shì xīng qī sān， qián tiān jiù shì xīng qī yī。
english: If today is Wednesday, the day before yesterday is Monday.

hanzi: 如果你不老实话，我定会对你不客气。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù lǎo shí huà， wǒ dìng kuài duì nǐ bù kè qì。
english: If you don't behave I'll come down on you with heavy hand.

hanzi: 我们每年举行一次大学校友联欢会。
pinyin: wǒ men měi nián jǔ xíng yī cì dà xué xiào yǒu lián huān huì。
english: We hold an annual reunion of former students of the college.

hanzi: 如今人们公认这是个错误.
pinyin: rú jīn rén men gōng rèn zhè shì gè cuò wù.
english: It is now generally admitted to have been (ie Most people agree and accept that it was) a mistake.

hanzi: 爸爸刚出门, 那男孩就跑向电影院。
pinyin: bà ba gāng chū mén,  nà nán hái jiù pǎo xiàng diàn yǐng yuàn。
english: As soon as his father went out, the boy ran to the cinema.

hanzi: 小男孩喜欢在书页空白边上做笔记。
pinyin: xiǎo nán hái xǐ huan zài shū yè kòng bái biān shàng zuò bǐ jì。
english: The little boy likes to make notes in the margin of books.

hanzi: 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。
pinyin: tā bù dé bù dī xià tou cái néng chuān guò dī ǎi de mén kǒu。
english: She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway.

hanzi: 讲一口流利的英语需要多年的刻苦操练。
pinyin: jiǎng yī kǒu liú lì de Yīng yǔ xū yào duō nián de kè kǔ cāo liàn。
english: It took years of hard work to speak good English.

hanzi: 这是我有过的教育意义最大的一次经历。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ yǒu guò de jiào yù yì yì zuì dà de yī cì jīng lì。
english: It was the most educational experience I had ever had.

hanzi: 前天我见过他，但后来再没见过他。
pinyin: qián tiān wǒ xiàn guò tā， dàn hòu lái zài mò xiàn guò tā。
english: I see him the day before yesterday, but have not see him since.

hanzi: 我经常收到读过我的书的读者的来信。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng shōu dào dú guò wǒ de shū de dú zhě de lái xìn。
english: I regularly get letters from people who have read my books.

hanzi: 没什么事可做，我还是上床睡觉好了。
pinyin: mò shén me shì kě zuò， wǒ hái shì shàng chuáng shuì jiào hào le。
english: There is nothing to do, so I may as well go to bed.

hanzi: 我们是在试验的基础上得出这个结论的。
pinyin: wǒ men shì zài shì yàn de jī chǔ shàng dé chū zhè gè jié lùn de。
english: We drew this conclusion on the basis of experiments.

hanzi: 为了确定他在家，我事先打电话给他。
pinyin: wèi le què dìng tā zài jiā， wǒ shì xiān dǎ diàn huà jǐ tā。
english: To make sure that he was at home, I called him up in advance.

hanzi: 她的第一部小说一问世，便使她一举成名。
pinyin: tā de dì yī bù xiǎo shuō yī wèn shì， pián shǐ tā yī jǔ chéng míng。
english: She won her overnight fame by her first novel.

hanzi: 我把那封信挂号寄出了，因为里面有钱。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ nà fēng xìn guà hào jì chū le， yīn wèi lǐ miàn yǒu qián。
english: I registered the letter because it contain some money.

hanzi: 老师问了我一些和我的论文有关的问题。
pinyin: lǎo shī wèn le wǒ yī xiē huò wǒ de lùn wén yǒu guān de wèn tí。
english: The teacher asked me some questions relative to my paper.

hanzi: 现在很多小孩都可以说是少年老成了。
pinyin: xiàn zài hěn duō xiǎo hái dōu kě yǐ shuō shì shào nián lǎo chéng le。
english: Now many children can be called young but experienced.

hanzi: 正因为他操一口流利的英语，她更爱他。
pinyin: zhèng yīn wèi tā cāo yī kǒu liú lì de Yīng yǔ， tā gèng ài tā。
english: She likes him all the better for his fluent spoken English.

hanzi: 我在街上遇到她时，她假装不认得我。
pinyin: wǒ zài jiē shàng yù dào tā shí， tā jiǎ zhuāng bù rèn de wǒ。
english: She pretended she didn't know me when I passed her in the street.

hanzi: 他虽然没有通过考试，但他做了很大的努力。
pinyin: tā suī rán méi yǒu tōng guò kǎo shì， dàn tā zuò le hěn dà de nǔ lì。
english: He didn't pass the exam, but it was a good attempt.

hanzi: 现在是差一刻四点--我四点一刻见你.
pinyin: xiàn zài shì cī yī kè sì diǎn-- wǒ sì diǎn yī kè xiàn nǐ.
english: It's (a) quarter to (US of) four now I'll meet you at quarter past (US after).

hanzi: 再伟大的学者也没有办法解答这个难题吧。
pinyin: zài wěi dà de xué zhě yě méi yǒu bàn fǎ jiě dá zhè gè nán tí ba。
english: The greatest scholar cannot solve this difficult problem.

hanzi: 就英语作文而言，练习是最好的方法。
pinyin: jiù Yīng yǔ zuò wén ér yán， liàn xí shì zuì hǎo de fāng fǎ。
english: So far as English composition is concerned, practice is the best way.

hanzi: 你已经成年了, 这些问题要自己解决。
pinyin: nǐ yǐ jīng chéng nián le,  zhè xie wèn tí yào zì jǐ jiě jué。
english: Since you are already of age now, you should solve the problems by yourself.

hanzi: 电影一开演我就知道不会喜欢这部电影.
pinyin: diàn yǐng yī kāi yǎn wǒ jiù zhī dào bù huì xǐ huan zhè bù diàn yǐng.
english: I knew early on (in the film) that I wasn't going to enjoy it.

hanzi: 简给他写了封长信，然而他一直没有回信。
pinyin: jiǎn jǐ tā xiě le fēng zhǎng xìn， rán ér tā yī zhí méi yǒu huí xìn。
english: Jane wrote him a long letter, but he never wrote back.

hanzi: 我首先是一个教师, 其次才是一个作家。
pinyin: wǒ shǒu xiān shì yī gè jiào shī,  qí cì cái shì yī gè zuò jiā。
english: I am a teacher in the first place and a writer in the next place.

hanzi: 宴会结束时，我们谢了主人后便回家去了。
pinyin: yàn huì jié shù shí， wǒ men xiè le zhǔ rén hòu pián huí jiā qù le。
english: At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went away.

hanzi: 这个地方脏极了，我不相信有人能住在这。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang zàng jí le， wǒ bù xiāng xìn yǒu rén néng zhù zài zhè。
english: This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here.

hanzi: 我们必须安排一个合适的时间和地点开会。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū ān pái yī gè hé shì de shí jiān huò dì diǎn kāi huì。
english: We must arrange a convenient time and place for the meeting.

hanzi: 那不是个好办法，首先没人会帮我们的忙。
pinyin: nà bú shì gè hào bàn fǎ， shǒu xiān mò rén kuài bāng wǒ men de máng。
english: It is not a good idea. For one thing, nobody will help us.

hanzi: 这五年来，出生人数有很大的增长。
pinyin: zhè wǔ nián lái， chū shēng rén shù yǒu hěn dà de zēng zhǎng。
english: There has been a great leap in the number of births in these past five years.

hanzi: 我说几句好听的, 也许能说服他去做这工作.
pinyin: wǒ shuō jǐ jù hǎo tīng de,  yě xǔ néng shuō fú tā qù zuò zhè gōng zuò.
english: With a little flattery I might persuade him to do the job.

hanzi: 不，他们车间的机床没有我们车间的多。
pinyin: bù， tā men chē jiān de jī chuáng méi yǒu wǒ men chē jiān de duō。
english: No, there is not so many machine tools in their workshop as in ours.

hanzi: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
pinyin: wǒ shì jīn tiān zǎo chén zòng bào zhǐ shàng zhī dào zhè tiáo xiāo xi de。
english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

hanzi: 我的朋友都是男生，他们一点也不关心读书。
pinyin: wǒ de péng you dōu shì nán shēng， tā men yī diǎn yě bù guān xīn dú shū。
english: My friends were all boys who cared nothing about studying.

hanzi: 他很乐观, 认为自己一定很快就能找到工作.
pinyin: tā hěn lè guān,  rèn wéi zì jǐ yī dìng hěn kuài jiù néng zhǎo dào gōng zuò.
english: He's such an optimist that he's sure he'll soon find a job.

hanzi: 她好像够亲切的, 可是我不应该信以为真.
pinyin: tā hǎo xiàng gòu qīn qiè de,  kě shì wǒ bù yīng gāi xìn yǐ wéi zhēn.
english: She seems friendly enough but I shouldn't take her at (her) face value.

hanzi: 不要看不起他的努力。他已经取得了很大的进步。
pinyin: bù yào kàn bù qǐ tā de nǔ lì。 tā yǐ jīng qǔ dé le hěn dà de jìn bù。
english: Don't sniff at his effort. He's made great progress.

hanzi: 希望今后两国人民之间有更多的交往。
pinyin: xī wàng jīn hòu liǎng guó rén mín zhī jiān yǒu gèng duō de jiāo wǎng。
english: We hope from now on there will be more exchanges between our two peoples.

hanzi: 这一章我看到一半才意识到我根本没看懂。
pinyin: zhè yī zhāng wǒ kàn dào yī bàn cái yì shí dào wǒ gēn běn mò kàn dǒng。
english: Half-way through the chapter I realized I hadn't taken anything in.

hanzi: 自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ men zài xué xiào rèn shi zhī hòu， wǒ men jiù yī zhí shì hào péng you。
english: We've been friends ever since we met at school.

hanzi: 我们相信你在星期五之前可以完成这篇论文。
pinyin: wǒ men xiāng xìn nǐ zài xīng qī wǔ zhī qián kě yǐ wán chéng zhè piān lùn wén。
english: We are depending on you to finish the paper by Friday.

hanzi: 你应该查字典找出这个单词的正确读音。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi zhā zì diǎn zhǎo chū zhè gè dān cí de zhèng què dú yīn。
english: You should look up the right pronunciation of this word in the dictionary.

hanzi: 自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ men zài xué xiào rèn shi zhī hòu， wǒ men jiù yī zhí shì hào péng you。
english: We've been friends ever since we met at school.

hanzi: 老是有各种各样的天气，不论我们喜欢不喜欢。
pinyin: lǎo shi yǒu gè zhǒng gè yàng de tiān qì， bù lùn wǒ men xǐ huan bù xǐ huan。
english: There's always weather, weather, whether we like it or not.

hanzi: 对不起，我来晚了。刚才我在开会，不能脱身。
pinyin: duì bù qǐ， wǒ lái wǎn le。 gāng cái wǒ zài kāi huì， bù néng tuō shēn。
english: I'm sorry I'm late; I was at a meeting and couldn't get away.

hanzi: 人家告诉我她很可爱，可是她根本不是那样。
pinyin: rén jiā gào su wǒ tā hěn kě ài， kě shì tā gēn běn bú shì nà yàng。
english: People had told me she was very pleasant but she's nothing of the kind.

hanzi: 我差点儿把对整个这件事的看法向他讲了。
pinyin: wǒ cī diǎn er bǎ duì zhěng gè zhè jiàn shì de kàn fǎ xiàng tā jiǎng le。
english: I came near to telling him just what I thought of the whole business.

hanzi: 我不是说她真在外层空间--这只是打个比方.
pinyin: wǒ bú shì shuō tā zhēn zài wài céng kōng jiān-- zhè zhǐ shì dǎ gè bǐ fang.
english: I didn't really mean she was in outer space it's just a figure of speech.

hanzi: 她是那些老是把困难往最坏处想的女人之一。
pinyin: tā shì nà xiē lǎo shi bǎ kùn nan wàng zuì huài chu xiǎng de nu:3 rén zhī yī。
english: She is one of those women who always make the worst of their troubles.

hanzi: 请他出去吃午饭, 那样他心情就会好些.
pinyin: qǐng tā chū qù jí wǔ fàn,  nà yàng tā xīn qíng jiù kuài hǎo xiē.
english: Offer to take him out for lunch, then (ie as a result of this) he'll feel in a better mood.

hanzi: 必须明确指出，部长的言论有两点是错误的。
pinyin: bì xū míng què zhǐ chū， bù zhǎng de yán lùn yǒu liǎng diǎn shì cuò wù de。
english: Just for the record, the minister's statement is wrong on two points.

hanzi: 他姐姐过去一直指导他，给他出主意，是他的朋友。
pinyin: tā jiě jie guò qu yī zhí zhǐ dǎo tā， jǐ tā chū zhǔ yi， shì tā de péng you。
english: His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.

hanzi: 成年地做一种单调工作, 能把活人也做成机器人.
pinyin: chéng nián de zuò yī zhòng dān diào gōng zuò,  néng bǎ huó rén yě zuò chéng jī qì rén.
english: Years of doing the same dull job can turn you into a machine.

hanzi: 我吃完晚饭常感到困, 一到晚上就又精神了.
pinyin: wǒ chī wán wǎn fàn cháng gǎn dào kùn,  yī dào wǎn shang jiù yòu jīng shén le.
english: I often feel sleepy after supper and then I get my second wind later in the evening.

hanzi: 在我们整个旅行中，我们没有看到一个大人打孩子。
pinyin: zài wǒ men zhěng gè lu:3 xíng zhòng， wǒ men méi yǒu kàn dào yī gè dà ren dǎ hái zi。
english: In all our travelling, we never saw an adult strike a child.

hanzi: 我们今天晚上节目中最精彩的是中国杂技表演.
pinyin: wǒ men jīn tiān wǎn shang jié mù zhòng zuì jīng cǎi de shì Zhōng guó zá jì biǎo yǎn.
english: The star turn in our show tonight will be a group of Chinese acrobats.

hanzi: 走道人可以在上面行走的地方，如人行道或散步场所
pinyin: zǒu dào rén kě yǐ zài shàng mian xíng zǒu de dì fang， rú rén xìng dào huò sàn bù chǎng suǒ
english: A place, such as a sidewalk or promenade, on which one may walk.

hanzi: 自从我上次离开这里以来，这小城已变得认不出来了。
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ shàng cì lí kāi zhè lǐ yǐ lái， zhè xiǎo chéng yǐ biàn de rèn bù chū lai le。
english: The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last here.

hanzi: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zhī dào rú hé shēng huó de rén men,  cái kuài kāi shǐ rèn shi zì jǐ huò rén shēng。
english: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

hanzi: 自从我上次离开这里以来，这小城已经变得认不出来了。
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ shàng cì lí kāi zhè lǐ yǐ lái， zhè xiǎo chéng yǐ jīng biàn de rèn bù chū lai le。
english: The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last there.

hanzi: 就像其他老人一样，我祖父也老喜欢讲他当年的故事。
pinyin: jiù xiàng qí tā lǎo rén yí yàng， wǒ zǔ fù yě lǎo xǐ huan jiǎng tā dāng nián de gù shì。
english: As is often the case with old people, my grandfather is fond of talking about good old days.

hanzi: 如果你到今晚把手头上的工作做完，你明天就可以休息。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ dào jīn wǎn bǎ shǒu tou shàng de gōng zuò zuò wán， nǐ míng tiān jiù kě yǐ xiū xi。
english: Provided/Providing (that) you clear your desk by this evening, you can have tomorrow off.

hanzi: 太糟糕了。
pinyin: tài zāo gāo le。
english: That's too bad.

hanzi: 让我猜一猜。
pinyin: ràng wǒ cāi yī cāi。
english: Let me guess.

hanzi: 疼痛减轻了.
pinyin: téng tòng jiǎn qīng le.
english: The pain eased.

hanzi: 那可太妙了.
pinyin: nà kě tài miào le.
english: It was quite wonderful.

hanzi: 我害怕蛇。
pinyin: wǒ hài pà shé。
english: I have a fear of snakes.

hanzi: 我喜欢滑冰。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan huá bīng。
english: I like skating.

hanzi: 我讨厌打针。
pinyin: wǒ tǎo yàn dǎ zhēn。
english: I hate injection.

hanzi: 伙食费另加。
pinyin: huǒ shí fèi lìng jiā。
english: Meals are extra.

hanzi: 他胃不舒服。
pinyin: tā wèi bù shū fu。
english: He has an upset stomach.

hanzi: 别冲我嚷嚷。
pinyin: biè chòng wǒ rǎng rǎng。
english: Don't shout at me.

hanzi: 她高声呼救.
pinyin: tā gāo shēng hū jiù.
english: She called aloud for help.

hanzi: 军队在移动.
pinyin: jūn duì zài yí dòng.
english: The army is on the move.

hanzi: 这狗长虫子。
pinyin: zhè gǒu zhǎng chóng zi。
english: The dog has worms.

hanzi: 我觉得难受极了.
pinyin: wǒ jué de nán shòu jí le.
english: I feel awful.

hanzi: 他跑下楼梯。
pinyin: tā pǎo xià lóu tī。
english: He ran down the stairs.

hanzi: 我讨厌西餐。
pinyin: wǒ tǎo yàn xī cān。
english: I dislike western food.

hanzi: 你拐错弯了。
pinyin: nǐ guǎi cuò wān le。
english: You take the wrong turning.

hanzi: 他歪戴著帽子.
pinyin: tā wāi dài著 mào zi.
english: He's got his hat on askew.

hanzi: 他满头大汗.
pinyin: tā mǎn tou dà hàn.
english: Sweat was pouring down his face.

hanzi: 他们挥手告别.
pinyin: tā men huī shǒu gào bié.
english: They waved farewell.

hanzi: 她愁得要命。
pinyin: tā chóu de yào mìng。
english: She was frantic with worry.

hanzi: 那与我无关。
pinyin: nà yù wǒ wú guān。
english: I have nothing to do with it.

hanzi: 他完全清醒了。
pinyin: tā wán quán qīng xǐng le。
english: He was wide awake.

hanzi: 一个长途电话
pinyin: yī gè cháng tú diàn huà
english: A long-distance call.

hanzi: 他即将动身。
pinyin: tā jí jiāng dòng shēn。

hanzi: 我下周有几个约会.
pinyin: wǒ xià zhōu yǒu jǐ ge yuē huì.
english: I have several engagements for next week.

hanzi: 他的行为缺乏一致性。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi quē fá yī zhì xìng。
english: His action lacks consistency.

hanzi: 他们的生活就是一首诗。
pinyin: tā men de shēng huó jiù shì yī shǒu shī。
english: Their lives are a poem.

hanzi: 今天我请客。我来付。
pinyin: jīn tiān wǒ qǐng kè。 wǒ lái fù。
english: It's my treat today. I'll pay.

hanzi: 乐队在给乐器调音。
pinyin: yuè duì zài jǐ yuè qì tiáo yīn。
english: The orchestra tuned their instruments.

hanzi: 她把海报贴在墙上了.
pinyin: tā bǎ hǎi bào tiē zài qiáng shàng le.
english: She pasted posters onto the wall.

hanzi: 我们的水果充足有余.
pinyin: wǒ men de shuǐ guǒ chōng zú yǒu yú.
english: We have enough fruit and to spare.

hanzi: 猫把我的围巾撕烂了。
pinyin: māo bǎ wǒ de wéi jīn sī làn le。
english: The cat has torn my scarf to ribbons.

hanzi: 他是个自命不凡的官员。
pinyin: tā shì gè zì mìng bù fán de guān yuán。
english: He is a pompous official.

hanzi: 他写的文章尖锐深刻。
pinyin: tā xiě de wén zhāng jiān ruì shēn kè。
english: He writes with penetration.

hanzi: 录音机的插头没插上.
pinyin: lù yīn jī de chā tóu mò chā shàng.
english: The recorder wasn't plugged in.

hanzi: 见面时，他拥抱了她。
pinyin: jiàn miàn shí， tā yōng bào le tā。
english: He enfolded her when they met.

hanzi: 他摇了摇头表示反对。
pinyin: tā yáo le yáo tou biǎo shì fǎn duì。
english: He shook his head in disapproval.

hanzi: 他们热烈欢迎女王.
pinyin: tā men rè liè huān yíng nu:3 wáng.
english: They extended the Queen a warm welcome.

hanzi: 他们把种子撒在地里。
pinyin: tā men bǎ zhǒng zi sǎ zài de lǐ。
english: They strewed seeds over the earth.

hanzi: 我正在等待他们的答复。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài děng dài tā men de dá fù。
english: I am awaiting their reply.

hanzi: 我的话不是针对你的。
pinyin: wǒ de huà bú shì zhēn duì nǐ de。
english: My remarks were not aimed at you.

hanzi: 她喜欢香肠和土豆泥。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan xiāng cháng huò tǔ dòu nì。
english: She loves sausage and mash.

hanzi: 他仍是健康的典范。
pinyin: tā réng shì jiàn kāng de diǎn fàn。
english: He is still a fine specimen of health.

hanzi: 他保存了很多剪报。
pinyin: tā bǎo cún le hěn duō jiǎn bào。
english: He saved many cuttings from newspaper.

hanzi: 问题的关键就在那里.
pinyin: wèn tí de guān jiàn jiù zài nà li.
english: Therein lies the crux of the matter.

hanzi: 保险丝盒子在厨房里。
pinyin: bǎo xiǎn sī hé zi zài chú fáng lǐ。
english: The fuse-box is in the kitchen.

hanzi: 我想帮忙你捆扎东西。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng bāng máng nǐ kǔn zhá dōng xi。
english: I would like to help you pack.

hanzi: 我已来不及做准备了.
pinyin: wǒ yǐ lái bù jí zuò zhǔn bèi le.
english: I had no time in which to prepare.

hanzi: 雨后气温下降了。
pinyin: yǔ hòu qì wēn xià jiàng le。
english: There was a descent of temperature after rain.

hanzi: 眼泪顺着她的脸流下。
pinyin: yǎn lèi shùn zhuó tā de liǎn liú xià。
english: Down her face ran the tears.

hanzi: 落日把天空染成金色。
pinyin: luò rì bǎ tiān kōng rǎn chéng jīn sè。
english: The setting sun gilds the sky.

hanzi: 他用低沉的语调说话。
pinyin: tā yòng dī chén de yǔ diào shuō huà。
english: He spoke in sepulchral tones.

hanzi: 他身体在逐步好起来。
pinyin: tā shēn tǐ zài zhú bù hào qǐ lai。
english: He is getting better by degrees.

hanzi: 部队昨晚严阵以待。
pinyin: bù duì zuó wǎn yán zhèn yǐ dài。
english: The troops were embattled last night.

hanzi: 他被选为会议主席。
pinyin: tā bèi xuǎn wèi huì yì zhǔ xí。
english: He was elected chairman of the meeting.

hanzi: 这些商品大量供应。
pinyin: zhè xie shāng pǐn dà liàng gōng yìng。
english: These goods are freely available.

hanzi: 他没受处分就过去了。
pinyin: tā mò shòu chǔ fēn jiù guò qu le。
english: He was let off without punishment.

hanzi: 他绝望地放弃了斗争.
pinyin: tā jué wàng de fàng qì le dòu zhēng.
english: He gave up the struggle in despair.

hanzi: 节省能源十分重要.
pinyin: jié shěng néng yuán shí fēn zhòng yào.
english: It is important to conserve energy.

hanzi: 但愿有草地与小羊。
pinyin: dàn yuàn yǒu cǎo dì yù xiǎo yáng。
english: I wish there were meadows and lambs.

hanzi: 人们请求政治避难。
pinyin: rén men qǐng qiú zhèng zhì bì nàn。
english: The people ask for political asylum.

hanzi: 她冲到门口躲藏起来.
pinyin: tā chòng dào mén kǒu duǒ cáng qǐ lai.
english: She darted into the doorway to hide.

hanzi: 有个气球从空中飘过.
pinyin: yǒu gè qì qiú zòng kōng zhōng piāo guò.
english: A balloon floated across the sky.

hanzi: 职员们在专心工作。
pinyin: zhí yuán men zài zhuān xīn gōng zuò。
english: The clerks are at work attentively.

hanzi: 他专门研究东方史。
pinyin: tā zhuān mén yán jiū dōng fāng shǐ。
english: He specializes in oriental history.

hanzi: 价格仍然在急剧上涨。
pinyin: jià gé réng rán zài jí jù shàng zhǎng。
english: Prices are still spiralling.

hanzi: 价格仍然在急剧上涨。
pinyin: jià gé réng rán zài jí jù shàng zhǎng。
english: Prices are still spiralling.

hanzi: 鱼离开水就不能呼吸。
pinyin: yú lí kāi shuǐ jiù bù néng hū xī。
english: Fish cannot breathe out of water.

hanzi: 我们主要的出口货是大米.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǔ yào de chū kǒu huò shì dà mǐ.
english: Our main export is rice.

hanzi: 他是个很难对付的人。
pinyin: tā shì gè hěn nàn duì fu de rén。
english: He was a difficult man to deal with.

hanzi: 他在地上树起了一根杆子.
pinyin: tā zài dì shang shù qǐ le yī gēn gǎn zi.
english: He set a post in the ground.

hanzi: 我们散步穿过树林。
pinyin: wǒ men sàn bù chuān guò shù lín。
english: We went for a ramble through the woods.

hanzi: 不要动不动就挑毛病.
pinyin: bù yào dòng bù dòng jiù tiǎo máo bìng.
english: Don't be so ready to find fault.

hanzi: 她送给我们一台洗衣机.
pinyin: tā sòng jǐ wǒ men yī tái xǐ yì jī.
english: She gave us a washing-machine.

hanzi: 我们把奶油涂到面包上。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ nǎi yóu tú dào miàn bāo shàng。
english: We spread butter on bread.

hanzi: 肥皂从我手上滑落了。
pinyin: féi zào zòng wǒ shǒu shàng huá luò le。
english: The soap slipped out of my hand.

hanzi: 这件衣服我穿腰部太瘦.
pinyin: zhè jiàn yī fu wǒ chuān yāo bù tài shòu.
english: The waist is too tight for me.

hanzi: 你不能自己去登山。
pinyin: nǐ bù néng zì jǐ qù dēng shān。
english: You can't go mountain climbing by yourself.

hanzi: 河的那边是私人的土地。
pinyin: hé de nà bian shì sī rén de tǔ dì。
english: Over the river is private land.

hanzi: 我没心情和你聊天。
pinyin: wǒ mò xīn qíng huò nǐ liáo tiān。
english: I am in no mood for chatting with you.

hanzi: 他把毛巾系在脖子上。
pinyin: tā bǎ máo jīn xì zài bó zi shàng。
english: He knotted a towel about his neck.

hanzi: 请把这个消息转告她。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè gè xiāo xi zhuǎn gào tā。
english: Please pass on the news to her.

hanzi: 我的心情慢慢轻松起来.
pinyin: wǒ de xīn qíng màn màn qīng sōng qǐ lai.
english: My mood gradually lightened.

hanzi: 我的计划逐渐成熟。
pinyin: wǒ de jì huà zhú jiàn chéng shú。
english: My plan has gradually come to maturity.

hanzi: 他在面条里放了些醋。
pinyin: tā zài miàn tiáo lǐ fàng le xiē cù。
english: He put some vinegar in the noodles.

hanzi: 首先，画一条水平线。
pinyin: shǒu xiān， huà yī tiáo shuǐ píng xiàn。
english: First, draw a horizontal line.

hanzi: 他观察事物很正确.
pinyin: tā guān chá shì wù hěn zhèng què.
english: He sees things in their right perspective.

hanzi: 他从事于医学的研究。
pinyin: tā cóng shì yú yī xué de yán jiū。
english: He was engaged in medical research.

hanzi: 我们认为他值得信任。
pinyin: wǒ men rèn wéi tā zhí de xìn rèn。
english: We esteem him to be worthy of trust.

hanzi: 别对你兄弟这么刻薄。
pinyin: biè duì nǐ xiōng dì zhè me kē bó。
english: Don't be so unkind to your brother.

hanzi: 女人经常受男人压迫.
pinyin: nu:3 rén jīng cháng shòu nán rén yā pò.
english: Women are often oppressed by men.

hanzi: 我曾认为这可能是真的。
pinyin: wǒ zēng rèn wéi zhè kě néng shì zhēn de。
english: I thought it might be true.

hanzi: 桌面是一块石板。
pinyin: zhuō miàn shì yī kuài shí bǎn。
english: The top of the table was formed by a stone slab.

hanzi: 他斜靠在沙发的背上。
pinyin: tā xié kào zài shā fā de bèi shàng。
english: He leant on the back of the sofa.

hanzi: 我特此宣布，她当选了。
pinyin: wǒ tè cǐ xuān bù， tā dāng xuǎn le。
english: I hereby declare her elected.

hanzi: 她对新环境不习惯。
pinyin: tā duì xīn huán jìng bù xí guàn。
english: She is not used to the new environment.

hanzi: 这笔生意是无利可图的。
pinyin: zhè bǐ shēng yi shì wú lì kě tú de。
english: This business is unprofitable.

hanzi: 他被感动得流下了眼泪。
pinyin: tā bèi gǎn dòng de liú xià le yǎn lèi。
english: He was softened into tears.

hanzi: 他吃惊地睁大了眼睛。
pinyin: tā chī jīng de zhēng dà le yǎn jīng。
english: He opened his eyes wide in surprise.

hanzi: 我的办公室通风良好。
pinyin: wǒ de bàn gōng shì tōng fēng liáng hǎo。
english: My office is well ventilated.

hanzi: 她对著镜子转了一圈.
pinyin: tā duì著 jìng zi zhuàn le yī quān.
english: She did a twirl in front of the mirror.

hanzi: 这题目使我很感兴趣.
pinyin: zhè tí mù shǐ wǒ hěn gǎn xìng qu.
english: This subject is very close to my heart.

hanzi: 专心工作, 不要说话.
pinyin: zhuān xīn gōng zuò,  bù yào shuō huà.
english: Attend to your work and stop talking.

hanzi: 她对她的孩子们很严格。
pinyin: tā duì tā de hái zi men hěn yán gé。
english: She is strict with her children.

hanzi: 把食品装罐加以保存。
pinyin: bǎ shí pǐn zhuāng guàn jiā yǐ bǎo cún。
english: Food is tinned to preserve it.

hanzi: 想催她快点是没用的.
pinyin: xiǎng cuī tā kuài diǎn shì méi yòng de.
english: It's no use trying to make her hurry.

hanzi: 共产党员是无神论者。
pinyin: gòng chǎn dǎng yuán shì wú shén lùn zhě。
english: The communist is atheist.

hanzi: 他勇敢地忍受着困苦。
pinyin: tā yǒng gǎn de rěn shòu zhuó kùn kǔ。
english: He bore his tribulations bravely.

hanzi: 情况始终都在变化。
pinyin: qíng kuàng shǐ zhōng dōu zài biàn huà。
english: Conditions are changing all the time.

hanzi: 你的合同已经被终止。
pinyin: nǐ de hé tong yǐ jīng bèi zhōng zhǐ。
english: Your contract has been terminated.

hanzi: 我们考虑是否要告诉她。
pinyin: wǒ men kǎo lu:4 shì fǒu yào gào su tā。
english: We pondered whether to tell her.

hanzi: 为翻越山脉的不断努力
pinyin: wèi fān yuè shān mài de bù duàn nǔ lì
english: A long pull across the mountains.

hanzi: 房子和教堂是建筑物。
pinyin: fáng zi huò jiào táng shì jiàn zhù wù。
english: Houses and churches are buildings.

hanzi: 他把两手插入衣袋里。
pinyin: tā bǎ liǎng shǒu chā rù yì dài lǐ。
english: He thrust his hands into his pockets.

hanzi: 这仅仅是个大概数字。
pinyin: zhè jǐn jǐn shì gè dà gài shù zì。
english: This is just an approximate figure.

hanzi: 这阵风来自西北方。
pinyin: zhè zhèn fēng lái zì xī běi fāng。
english: The wind is in the northwestern direction.

hanzi: 我想要朴素而文静的。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yào pǔ sù ér wén jìng de。
english: I'd like something plain and quiet.

hanzi: 警察问我是否有枪。
pinyin: jǐng chá wèn wǒ shì fǒu yǒu qiāng。
english: The police asked me if I possessed a gun.

hanzi: 他把书放回到书架上。
pinyin: tā bǎ shū fàng huí dào shū jià shàng。
english: He replaced the book in the shelf.

hanzi: 这个玻璃盘子很容易碎。
pinyin: zhè gè bō li pán zi hěn róng yì suì。
english: This glass plate is very fragile.

hanzi: 他的答案不能令人满意。
pinyin: tā de dá àn bù néng lìng rén mǎn yì。
english: His answer is unsatisfactory.

hanzi: 他落入敌人设的圈套。
pinyin: tā luò rù dí rén shè de juān tào。
english: He fell into a snare laid by his enemy.

hanzi: 解铃还需系铃人。
pinyin: xiè líng huán xū xì líng rén。
english: It's better for the doer to undo what he has done.

hanzi: 香蕉通常按重量卖.
pinyin: xiāng jiāo tōng cháng àn zhòng liàng mài.
english: Bananas are usually sold by weight.

hanzi: 导弹在护卫之下转移.
pinyin: dǎo dàn zài hù wèi zhī xià zhuǎn yí.
english: The missiles were moved under convoy.

hanzi: 我将亲自过问此事.
pinyin: wǒ jiàng qīn zì guò wèn cǐ shì.
english: I shall give the matter my personal attention.

hanzi: 公司供给我一辆汽车.
pinyin: gōng sī gōng gěi wǒ yī liàng qì chē.
english: The firm have provided me with a car.

hanzi: 他已建立起自己的公司。
pinyin: tā yǐ jiàn lì qǐ zì jǐ de gōng sī。
english: He has established his own firm.

hanzi: 新闻界的力量非常大。
pinyin: xīn wén jiè de lì liang fēi cháng dà。
english: The power of the press is very great.

hanzi: 请说出你的姓名和地址。
pinyin: qǐng shuō chū nǐ de xìng míng huò dì zhǐ。
english: State your name and address.

hanzi: 水正从管子里喷出来。
pinyin: shuǐ zhèng zòng guǎn zi lǐ pèn chū lái。
english: Water is spouting out of the pipe.

hanzi: 我们的地位可以改善。
pinyin: wǒ men de dì wèi kě yǐ gǎi shàn。
english: Our position is capable of improvement.

hanzi: 他是施舍的适当对象。
pinyin: tā shì shī shè de shì dàng duì xiàng。
english: He is a proper object of charity.

hanzi: 那是我想象不到的。
pinyin: nà shì wǒ xiǎng xiàng bù dào de。
english: That's beyond the reach of my imagination.

hanzi: 我认真地按指示办事.
pinyin: wǒ rèn zhēn de àn zhǐ shì bàn shì.
english: I followed the instructions religiously.

hanzi: 他们把箭射向敌人。
pinyin: tā men bǎ jiàn shè xiàng dí rén。
english: They discharged their arrows at the enemy.

hanzi: 她写的字从左往右斜.
pinyin: tā xiě de zì zòng zuǒ wàng yòu xié.
english: Her handwriting slants from left to right.

hanzi: 欢呼声在逐渐消失。
pinyin: huān hū shēng zài zhú jiàn xiāo shī。
english: The sound of the cheering faded away.

hanzi: 激动使我的心跳加快。
pinyin: jī dòng shǐ wǒ de xīn tiào jiā kuài。
english: The excitement quickened my pulse.

hanzi: 他的解释充满矛盾。
pinyin: tā de jiě shì chōng mǎn máo dùn。
english: His explanation is full of contradictions.

hanzi: 我们把小麦磨成面粉。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ xiǎo mài mò chéng miàn fěn。
english: We grind up the wheat to make flour.

hanzi: 水正从管子里喷出来。
pinyin: shuǐ zhèng zòng guǎn zi lǐ pèn chū lái。
english: Water is spouting out of the pipe.

hanzi: 排水系统已经老化了。
pinyin: pái shuǐ xì tǒng yǐ jīng lǎo huà le。
english: The drainage system has been aged.

hanzi: 这些苹果生了很多虫子.
pinyin: zhè xie píng guǒ shēng le hěn duō chóng zi.
english: The apples are full of worms.

hanzi: 他的工作是做国内贸易。
pinyin: tā de gōng zuò shì zuò guó nèi mào yì。
english: He worked in internal trade.

hanzi: 请递给我一张纸巾。
pinyin: qǐng dì jǐ wǒ yī zhāng zhǐ jīn。
english: Please pass me a piece of paper handkerchief.

hanzi: 事实证明了这些说法。
pinyin: shì shí zhèng míng le zhè xie shuō fa。
english: The truth verified the allegations.

hanzi: 她是个优秀的管理人员.
pinyin: tā shì gè yōu xiù de guǎn lǐ rén yuán.
english: She's an excellent administrator.

hanzi: 他的中国功夫是无敌的。
pinyin: tā de Zhōng guó gōng fu shì wú dí de。
english: His Chinese kung fu is peerless.

hanzi: 温度有细微的变化。
pinyin: wēn dù yǒu xì wēi de biàn huà。
english: There is an imperceptible change in temperature.

hanzi: 别着急，安心养病。
pinyin: biè zháo jí， ān xīn yǎng bìng。
english: Just take care of yourself and don't worry.

hanzi: 我实在讨厌让我等着。
pinyin: wǒ shí zài tǎo yàn ràng wǒ děng zhuó。
english: I really hate being kept waiting.

hanzi: 土太干了，不能种东西。
pinyin: tǔ tài gàn le， bù néng zhòng dōng xi。
english: The soil is too dry for planting.

hanzi: 他的想法和我的不一致。
pinyin: tā de xiǎng fǎ huò wǒ de bù yī zhì。

hanzi: 别担心，我会支持你的。

hanzi: 该报告毫无真实性。
pinyin: gāi bào gào háo wú zhēn shí xìng。

english: A critical comment or judgment.

english: Hurry up or else you'll be late.

hanzi: 她争取获得奖学金.
pinyin: tā zhēng qǔ huò dé jiǎng xué jīn.
english: She's aiming at (ie trying to win) a scholarship.

hanzi: 他以勇气赢得大家的尊敬。
pinyin: tā yǐ yǒng qì yíng dé dà jiā de zūn jìng。
english: He won honor for his courage.

hanzi: 这帮人正被警方追捕。
pinyin: zhè bāng rén zhèng bèi jǐng fāng zhuī bǔ。
english: The gang is being hunted by the police.

hanzi: 瞧我们的庄稼长得多快。
pinyin: qiáo wǒ men de zhuāng jia zhǎng de duō kuài。
english: Look how our plants have shot up.

hanzi: 他们在教堂接受了洗礼。
pinyin: tā men zài jiào táng jiē shòu le xǐ lǐ。
english: They received baptism at the church.

hanzi: 由于下雨，取消了比赛。
pinyin: yóu yú xià yǔ， qǔ xiāo le bǐ sài。
english: Owing to the rain, the match was cancelled.

hanzi: 他们把饼干倒在盘子里。
pinyin: tā men bǎ bǐng gān dào zài pán zi lǐ。
english: They emptied the biscuits onto the plate.

hanzi: 我们之间的观点不一致。
pinyin: wǒ men zhī jiān de guān diǎn bù yī zhì。
english: The views between us are discordant.

hanzi: 在转弯处超车十分危险.
pinyin: zài zhuǎn wān chù chāo jū shí fēn wēi xiǎn.
english: It's dangerous to overtake on a bend.

hanzi: 铜的导电性比铁强。
pinyin: tóng de dǎo diàn xìng bì tiě qiáng。
english: Copper conducts electricity better than iron does.

hanzi: 他是追随者，不是领导者。
pinyin: tā shì zhuī suí zhě， bú shì lǐng dào zhě。
english: He's a follower, not a leader.

hanzi: 昨夜隔壁有些异常.
pinyin: zuó yè gé bì yǒu xiē yì cháng.
english: There were some strange goings-on next door last night.

hanzi: 她希望争取到总统职位。
pinyin: tā xī wàng zhēng qǔ dào zǒng tǒng zhí wèi。
english: She hopes to win the presidency.

hanzi: 我对那种事物不感兴趣.
pinyin: wǒ duì nà zhòng shì wù bù gǎn xìng qu.
english: Things of that nature do not interest me.

hanzi: 我得修修表，它不走了。
pinyin: wǒ de xiū xiū biǎo， tā bù zǒu le。
english: I'll have my watch repaired; it doesn't work.

hanzi: 咱们迟到了, 我必须催你一下.
pinyin: zán men chí dào le,  wǒ bì xū cuī nǐ yī xià.
english: We're late; I must hurry you.

hanzi: 他提前到达会面地点。
pinyin: tā tí qián dào dá huì miàn dì diǎn。
english: He arrived at the meeting place beforehand.

hanzi: 我们必须采取坚定的态度。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū cǎi qǔ jiān dìng de tài du。
english: We must maintain a firm attitude.

hanzi: 这种食品应低温保存。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng shí pǐn yìng dī wēn bǎo cún。
english: The food should be kept at low temperature.

hanzi: 他不喜欢自己的宽大的鼻孔。
pinyin: tā bù xǐ huan zì jǐ de kuān dà de bí kǒng。
english: He dislikes his wide nostrils.

hanzi: 那个女人说话非常尖刻。
pinyin: nèi gè nu:3 rén shuō huà fēi cháng jiān kè。
english: That woman has a very sharp tongue.

hanzi: 我征求这位老师的意见。
pinyin: wǒ zhēng qiú zhè wèi lǎo shī de yì jiàn。
english: I asked the teacher for her advice.

hanzi: 手术后他恢复了健康。
pinyin: shǒu shù hòu tā huī fù le jiàn kāng。
english: He regained his health after the operation.

hanzi: 她紧紧拥抱著她的母亲。
pinyin: tā jǐn jǐn yōng bào著 tā de mǔ qīn。
english: She gave her mother an affectionate hug.

hanzi: 他故意把那个老人撞倒。
pinyin: tā gù yì bǎ nèi gè lǎo rén zhuàng dào。
english: He knocked the old man down on purpose.

hanzi: 这消息来自可靠的来源。
pinyin: zhè xiāo xi lái zì kě kào de lái yuán。
english: The news comes from a reliable source.

hanzi: 她穿着一条细棉布的裙子。
pinyin: tā chuān zhuó yī tiáo xì mián bù de qún zi。
english: She wears a skirt of cambric.

hanzi: 五星红旗迎风飘扬。
pinyin: wǔ xīng hóng qí yíng fēng piāo yáng。
english: The five-star red flag is fluttering in the wind.

hanzi: 我把你划到湖对岸去吧.
pinyin: wǒ bǎ nǐ huà dào hú duì àn qù ba.
english: Let me row you over to the other side of the lake.

hanzi: 不是所有的金属都容易加工
pinyin: bú shì suǒ yǒu de jīn shǔ dōu róng yì jiā gōng
english: Not all metals work easily.

hanzi: 在古代人们穿着束腰外衣。
pinyin: zài gǔ dài rén men chuān zhuó shù yāo wài yī。
english: Ancient people wore tunics.

hanzi: 大雨迫使我们呆在户内。
pinyin: dà yǔ pò shǐ wǒ men dāi zài hù nèi。
english: The heavy rain compelled us to stay indoors.

hanzi: 要是我知道他的地址就好了。
pinyin: yào shì wǒ zhī dào tā de dì zhǐ jiù hào le。
english: I wish I knew his address.

hanzi: 我们参加了春季展览会。
pinyin: wǒ men cān jiā le chūn jì zhǎn lǎn huì。
english: We participated in the spring fair.

hanzi: 我必须买一节新的干电池了。
pinyin: wǒ bì xū mǎi yī jié xīn de gàn diàn chí le。
english: I have to buy a new dry cell.

hanzi: 他托我照看一天孩子。
pinyin: tā tuō wǒ zhào kàn yī tiān hái zi。
english: He's entrusted his children to my care for a day.

hanzi: 抗议者被警察拖走了。
pinyin: kàng yì zhě bèi jǐng chá tuō zǒu le。
english: The protesters were dragged away by the police.

hanzi: 他努力控制住自己的脾气。
pinyin: tā nǔ lì kòng zhì zhù zì jǐ de pí qì。
english: He struggled to control his temper.

hanzi: 她有处变不惊的本事.
pinyin: tā yǒu chù biàn bù jīng de běn shì.
english: She has the ability to keep calm in an emergency.

hanzi: 可以来信或传真预订。
pinyin: kě yǐ lái xìn huò chuán zhēn yù dìng。
english: Reservations can be made by letter or fax.

hanzi: 海浪轻轻地拍打着海岸。
pinyin: hǎi làng qīng qīng de pāi da zhuó hǎi àn。
english: The waves gently lap against the shore.

hanzi: 床单的中间部分磨薄了。
pinyin: chuáng dān de zhōng jiān bù fen mò bò le。
english: The sheets have worn thin in the middle.

hanzi: 道路被一块大石头堵住了。
pinyin: dào lù bèi yī kuài dà shí tou dǔ zhù le。
english: The road was blocked by a huge rock.

hanzi: 她固执得就是不道歉。
pinyin: tā gù zhí de jiù shì bù dào qiàn。
english: Sheer obstinacy prevented her from apologizing.

hanzi: 醉酒愉快的沉醉，如酒精
pinyin: zuì jiǔ yú kuài de chén zuì， rú jiǔ jīng
english: Pleasant intoxication, as from alcohol.

hanzi: 他展开报纸开始阅读。
pinyin: tā zhǎn kāi bào zhǐ kāi shǐ yuè dú。
english: He unfurled the newspaper and began to read.

hanzi: 改革正处于关键阶段。
pinyin: gǎi gé zhèng chǔ yú guān jiàn jiē duàn。
english: The reform is at its critical stage now.

hanzi: 在院子里我看见两只猫。
pinyin: zài yuàn zi lǐ wǒ kàn jiàn liǎng zhǐ māo。
english: I saw a couple of cats in the yard.

hanzi: 没带雨衣那就避一下雨.
pinyin: mò dài yǔ yī nà jiù bì yī xià yǔ.
english: Do keep out of the rain if you haven't a coat.

hanzi: 他父亲提醒他不要马虎。
pinyin: tā fù qīn tí xǐng tā bù yào mǎ hu。
english: His father reminds him not to be careless.

hanzi: 我们非常后悔做此决定。
pinyin: wǒ men fēi cháng hòu huǐ zuò cǐ jué dìng。
english: Bitterly did we repent our decision.

hanzi: 我和她商量过我的报告。
pinyin: wǒ huò tā shāng liàng guò wǒ de bào gào。
english: I consulted with her about my report.

hanzi: 他从容不迫地走进室内。
pinyin: tā cōng róng bù pò de zǒu jìn shì nèi。
english: He entered the room with deliberate steps.

hanzi: 我会尽一切可能帮助你。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jìn yī qiè kě néng bāng zhù nǐ。
english: I'll do everything possible to help you.

hanzi: 在第二个转弯处向左转。
pinyin: zài dì èr gè zhuǎn wān chù xiàng zuǒ zhuàn。
english: Take the second turning on the left.

hanzi: 这战场的情景触目惊心.
pinyin: zhè zhàn chǎng de qíng jǐng chù mù jīng xīn.
english: The battlefield was a fearsome sight.

hanzi: 我的手指叫针给扎了一下.
pinyin: wǒ de shǒu zhǐ jiào zhēn jǐ zhá le yī xià.
english: I gave my finger a prick with a needle.

hanzi: 他从地毯上把表捡起来。
pinyin: tā zòng dì tǎn shàng bǎ biǎo jiǎn qǐ lai。
english: He picked the watch up from the carpet.

hanzi: 石块朝四面八方乱飞。
pinyin: shí kuài cháo sì miàn bā fāng luàn fēi。
english: Stones were flying about in every direction.

hanzi: 他不提他曾经和她见面。
pinyin: tā bù tí tā céng jīng huò tā jiàn miàn。
english: He made no mention of having met her.

hanzi: 每个人都应该遵守法律。
pinyin: měi gè rén dōu yīng gāi zūn shǒu fǎ lu:4。
english: Everyone should comply with the law.

hanzi: 我需要把美金换成法郎.
pinyin: wǒ xū yào bǎ měi jīn huàn chéng fǎ láng.
english: I need to change my dollars into francs.

hanzi: 不要把烟灰掉在地毯上。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ yān huī diào zài dì tǎn shàng。
english: Don't drop cigarette ash on the carpet.

hanzi: 我们在音乐方面爱好相似.
pinyin: wǒ men zài yīn yuè fāng miàn ài hào xiāng sì.
english: We have similar tastes in music.

hanzi: 请让我们向你表示祝贺.
pinyin: qǐng ràng wǒ men xiàng nǐ biǎo shì zhù hè.
english: May we proffer you our congratulations?

hanzi: 那个跳舞的人备受称赞。
pinyin: nèi gè tiào wǔ de rén bèi shòu chēng zàn。
english: The dancer was showered with praise.

hanzi: 这活儿需要细心, 催不得.
pinyin: zhè huór xū yào xì xīn,  cuī bù dé.
english: This work needs care; it mustn't be hurried.

hanzi: 她一晚上都在批试卷.
pinyin: tā yī wǎn shang dōu zài pī shì juàn.
english: She spent the evening marking examination papers.

hanzi: 她死去的消息迅速传开。
pinyin: tā sǐ qù de xiāo xi xùn sù zhuàn kāi。
english: The news of her death circulated quickly.

hanzi: 政治问题容易引起争论。
pinyin: zhèng zhì wèn tí róng yì yǐn qǐ zhēng lùn。
english: Politics can be an explosive subject.

hanzi: 他们把饼干倒在盘子里。
pinyin: tā men bǎ bǐng gān dào zài pán zi lǐ。
english: They emptied the biscuits onto the plate.

hanzi: 这些规定仅适用于儿童。
pinyin: zhè xie guī dìng jǐn shì yòng yú ér tóng。
english: This regulation refers only to children.

hanzi: 我心里充满了青春的欢乐。
pinyin: wǒ xīn lǐ chōng mǎn le qīng chūn de huān lè。
english: I'm full of the joys of spring.

hanzi: 他专心致志地制订计划。
pinyin: tā zhuān xīn zhì zhì de zhì dìng jì huà。
english: He was involved in working out a plan.

hanzi: 人只能做力所能及的事。
pinyin: rén zhǐ néng zuò lì suǒ néng jí de shì。
english: A man can do no more than he can.

hanzi: 人民受军政府的压迫.
pinyin: rén mín shòu jūn zhèng fǔ de yā pò.
english: The people are oppressed by the military goverment.

hanzi: 他获准可以不去听讲。
pinyin: tā huò zhǔn kě yǐ bù qù tīng jiǎng。
english: He was excused from attendance at the lecture.

hanzi: 土豆可先煮至半熟再烤.
pinyin: tǔ dòu kě xiān zhǔ zhì bàn shú zài kǎo.
english: Potatoes can be parboiled before roasting.

hanzi: 单位面积上的发光强度。
pinyin: dān wèi miàn ji shàng de fā guāng qiáng dù。
english: The luminous intensity on unit area.

hanzi: 他只是在玩弄她的感情。
pinyin: tā zhǐ shì zài wán nòng tā de gǎn qíng。
english: He's just trifling with her affections.

hanzi: 与其给折扣，不如减价。
pinyin: yǔ qí jǐ zhé kòu， bù rú jiǎn jià。
english: Better reduce the price than allow a discount.

hanzi: 他按照自己的信念行事。
pinyin: tā àn zhào zì jǐ de xìn niàn xìng shì。
english: He acted in accordance with his beliefs.

hanzi: 他按照通常的方式讲话.
pinyin: tā àn zhào tōng cháng de fāng shì jiǎng huà.
english: His speech followed the usual pattern.

hanzi: 她不耐烦地挥手让他们走开.
pinyin: tā bù nài fán de huī shǒu ràng tā men zǒu kāi.
english: She waved them away impatiently.

hanzi: 购置武器的开支很大。
pinyin: gòu zhì wǔ qì de kāi zhī hěn dà。
english: The expenditure of money on weapons is very large.

hanzi: 她掀起毯子上床去了.
pinyin: tā xiān qǐ tǎn zi shàng chuáng qù le.
english: She turned down the blankets and climbed into bed.

hanzi: 她往瓶子里插了些小花。
pinyin: tā wàng píng zi lǐ chā le xiē xiǎo huā。
english: She arranged some flowerets in the vase.

hanzi: 我在商业广播电台工作.
pinyin: wǒ zài shāng yè guǎng bō diàn tái gōng zuò.
english: I work for a commercial radio station.

hanzi: 他登上王位时才八岁。
pinyin: tā dēng shàng wáng wèi shí cái bā suì。
english: He was only eight when he ascended the throne.

hanzi: 鞋子擦破了她脚上的皮肤。
pinyin: xié zi cā pò le tā jué shàng de pí fū。
english: Her shoes chafed the skin on her feet.

hanzi: 纪念碑的正面是石料做的.
pinyin: jì niàn bēi de zhèng miàn shì shí liào zuò de.
english: The monument was fronted with stone.

hanzi: 这件衣服是人造纤维的。
pinyin: zhè jiàn yī fu shì rén zào xiān wéi de。
english: This dress is made of artificial fibers.

hanzi: 她冲他说一些刻薄的挖苦话.
pinyin: tā chòng tā shuō yī xiē kē bó de wā kǔ huà.
english: She makes mean little digs at him.

hanzi: 她的裙子上有个细长的开口。
pinyin: tā de qún zi shàng yǒu gè xì cháng de kāi kǒu。
english: Her skirt has a long slit.

hanzi: 他起草了一份讲话的概要。
pinyin: tā qǐ cǎo le yī fèn jiǎng huà de gài yào。
english: He drew up a brief for his speech.

hanzi: 这仅仅是调查的开始。
pinyin: zhè jǐn jǐn shì diào chá de kāi shǐ。
english: It's only the initiative of the investigation.

hanzi: 这样说不是在针对你的。
pinyin: zhè yàng shuō bú shì zài zhēn duì nǐ de。
english: In saying this I am not aiming at you.

hanzi: 她乘船在海上长途旅行。
pinyin: tā chéng chuán zài hǎi shàng cháng tú lu:3 xíng。
english: She went on a long sea voyage.

hanzi: 请集中考虑以下问题.
pinyin: qǐng jí zhōng kǎo lu:4 yǐ xià wèn tí.
english: Please focus your minds on the following problem.

hanzi: 他正在节食以减轻体重。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài jié shí yǐ jiǎn qīng tǐ zhòng。
english: He is on a diet to reduce some weight.

hanzi: 他的口袋全被糖粘住了。
pinyin: tā de kǒu dài quán bèi táng zhān zhù le。
english: His pocket was all gummed up with candy.

hanzi: 我碰巧想到同样的事。
pinyin: wǒ pèng qiǎo xiǎng dào tóng yàng de shì。
english: I chanced to be thinking of the same thing.

hanzi: 大多数手写体都向右斜。
pinyin: dà duō shù shǒu xiě tǐ dōu xiàng yòu xié。
english: Most handwriting slants to the right.

hanzi: 吸烟对你的健康没有好处。
pinyin: xī yān duì nǐ de jiàn kāng méi yǒu hǎo chu。
english: Smoking is not good for your health.

hanzi: 现在该对付我的家庭作业了.
pinyin: xiàn zài gāi duì fu wǒ de jiā tíng zuò yè le.
english: It's time to tackle my homework.

hanzi: 各工种配备特定的工具。
pinyin: gè gōng zhòng pèi bèi tè dìng de gōng jù。
english: There is a specific tool for each job.

hanzi: 他虚弱得连手都抬不起来。
pinyin: tā xū ruò de lián shǒu dōu tái bù qǐ lai。
english: He was too weak even to lift his hand.

hanzi: 她想方设法惹我发脾气。
pinyin: tā xiǎng fāng shè fǎ rě wǒ fà pí qì。
english: She tried to needle me into losing my temper.

hanzi: 你只要出示你的护照即可。
pinyin: nǐ zhǐ yào chū shì nǐ de hù zhào jí kě。
english: You have only to show your passport.

hanzi: 他掏出一叠用旧了的纸币。
pinyin: tā tāo chū yī dié yòng jiù le de zhǐ bì。
english: He pulled out a pile of used bank note.

hanzi: 探险人员消失在密林里了.
pinyin: tàn xiǎn rén yuán xiāo shī zài mì lín lǐ le.
english: The jungle swallowed up the explorers.

hanzi: 这项工程提前完工。
pinyin: zhè xiàng gōng chéng tí qián wán gōng。
english: The project was completed ahead of the schedule.

hanzi: 她的死无疑和政治有关。
pinyin: tā de sǐ wú yí Hé zhèng zhì yǒu guān。
english: No doubt her death is related to politics.

hanzi: 看著课文, 听我给你朗读.
pinyin: kàn著 kè wén,  tìng wǒ jǐ nǐ lǎng dú.
english: Follow the text while I read it out to you.

hanzi: 据说我们的祖先是猴子。
pinyin: jù shuō wǒ men de zǔ xiān shì hóu zi。
english: It is said that our progenitors are monkeys.

hanzi: 我是一名广播电台的听众。
pinyin: wǒ shì yī míng guǎng bō diàn tái de tīng zhòng。
english: I am a broadcasting auditor.

hanzi: 这音乐的确使我非常激动.
pinyin: zhè yīn yuè dí què shǐ wǒ fēi cháng jī dòng.
english: The music really stirred my blood.

hanzi: 道路被一块大石头堵住了。
pinyin: dào lù bèi yī kuài dà shí tou dǔ zhù le。
english: The road was blocked by a huge rock.

hanzi: 很多东西是由竹子做出的。

pinyin: tā tài pàng le， yǐ zhì yú wān bù xià yāo。

hanzi: 她把两手插在上衣口袋里。
pinyin: tā bǎ liǎng shǒu chā zài shàng yī kǒu dài lǐ。
english: She plunged her hands into her coat pockets.

hanzi: 我们与警方配合进行工作.
pinyin: wǒ men yù jǐng fāng pèi hé jìn xíng gōng zuò.
english: We are working in conjunction with the police.

hanzi: 他当了五年的足球队长.
pinyin: tā dàng le wǔ nián de zú qiú duì zhǎng.
english: He was (the) captain of the football team for five years.

hanzi: 工人们正去除银中的杂质。
pinyin: gōng rén men zhèng qù chú yín zhòng dì zá zhì。
english: Workers are removing impurities from silver.

hanzi: 他们为促进世界和平而努力.
pinyin: tā men wèi cù jìn shì jiè hé píng ér nǔ lì.
english: They worked for the promotion of world peace.

hanzi: 我不喜欢我那单调乏味的工作。
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan wǒ nà dān diào fá wèi de gōng zuò。
english: I do not like my monotonous work.

hanzi: 采取任何你认为最好的措施。
pinyin: cǎi qǔ rèn hé nǐ rèn wéi zuì hǎo de cuò shī。
english: Take whatsoever measures you consider best.

hanzi: 关于此事对他已免于处分。
pinyin: guān yú cǐ shì duì tā yǐ miǎn yú chǔ fēn。
english: He is exempt from punishment about this thing.

hanzi: 她意外地发现了他的真实身份。
pinyin: tā yì wài de fā xiàn le tā de zhēn shí shēn fèn。
english: She stumbled on his true identity.

hanzi: 我姑姑有时候还真有点讨人厌.
pinyin: wǒ gū gu yǒu shí hou huán zhēn yǒu diǎn tǎo rén yàn.
english: My aunt can be a bit of a terror.

hanzi: 我迫不及待地想听到这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ pò bù jí dài de xiǎng tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I can hardly wait to hear the news.

hanzi: 临睡前请拔下电视机的插头.
pinyin: lín shuì qián qǐng bá xià diàn shì jī de chā tóu.
english: Please unplug the TV before you go to bed.

hanzi: 警方正在忙着捕捉逃犯。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài máng zhuó bǔ zhuō táo fàn。
english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

hanzi: 太阳是能量的最基本来源。
pinyin: tài yáng shì néng liàng de zuì jī běn lái yuán。
english: The sun is the ultimate source of energy.

hanzi: 他们的新房子真像梦一般美好。
pinyin: tā men de xīn fáng zi zhēn xiàng mèng yì bān měi hǎo。
english: Their new house is a real dream.

hanzi: 我们将按月分期付款买房。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng àn yuè fēn qī fù kuǎn mǎi fáng。
english: We will pay for houses by monthly installments.

hanzi: 气象学者画了一张天气图。
pinyin: qì xiàng xué zhě huà le yī zhāng tiān qì tú。
english: The Meteorologist drew a picture of weather.

hanzi: 在夏天一个温暖的夜晚...
pinyin: zài xià tiān yī gè wēn nuǎn de yè wǎn...
english: One warm summer evening.../On a warm summer evening...

hanzi: 警方正在忙着捕捉逃犯。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài máng zhuó bǔ zhuō táo fàn。
english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

hanzi: 要求和她定个约会也没有用。
pinyin: yāo qiú huò tā dìng gè yuē huì yě méi yǒu yòng。
english: It is no good asking her for a date.

hanzi: 真羡慕麦克，他的车子真漂亮。
pinyin: zhēn xiàn mù mài kè， tā de jū zi zhēn piào liang。
english: I envy Mike, whose car is fancy.

hanzi: 医院进口了一些外科器械。
pinyin: yī yuàn jìn kǒu le yī xiē wài kē qì xiè。
english: The hospital imported some surgical instruments.

hanzi: 我认为这样的集会毫无价值。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhè yàng de jí huì háo wú jià zhí。
english: I feel that such gatherings are worthless.

hanzi: 那项发明是集体努力的成果。
pinyin: nà xiàng fā míng shì jí tǐ nǔ lì de chéng guǒ。
english: The invention was a collective effort.

hanzi: 虽然他严格，却富有同情心。
pinyin: suī rán tā yán gé， què fù yǒu tóng qíng xīn。
english: Stern as he is, he is full of sympathy.

hanzi: 这所房子处于一个很好的位置。
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi chǔ yú yī gè hěn hǎo de wèi zhi。
english: The house has a very good position.

hanzi: 压路机是用来修筑道路的。
pinyin: yà lù jī shì yòng lái xiū zhù dào lù de。
english: A road roller is used in making and repairing roads.

hanzi: 他下定决心争取成功。
pinyin: tā xià dìng jué xīn zhēng qǔ chéng gōng。
english: He was utterly ruthless in his determination to succeed.

hanzi: 我与他合伙做出口生意。
pinyin: wǒ yù tā hé huǒ zuò chū kǒu shēng yi。
english: I enter into partnership with him to do export business.

hanzi: 他留着劲在比赛结束时用。
pinyin: tā liú zhuó jìng zài bǐ sài jié shù shí yòng。
english: He saved his strength for the end of the race.

pinyin: méi yǒu rén gǎn bǎ shì xiàn lí kāi dì miàn。
english: Nobody dared lift their eyes from the ground.

hanzi: 运动对于各年龄段都很有利。
pinyin: yùn dòng duì yú gè nián líng duàn dōu hěn yǒu lì。
english: Exercise is profitable in all ages.

hanzi: 牙被拔掉时，他疼得大叫。
pinyin: yá bèi bá diào shí， tā téng de dà jiào。
english: He bellowed with pain when the tooth was pulled out.

hanzi: 这儿的气候和台北非常相似。
pinyin: zhèr de qì hòu huò Tái běi fēi cháng xiāng sì。
english: The climate here is like that of Taipei.

hanzi: 那一切意味看大量艰苦工作。
pinyin: nà yī qiè yì wèi kàn dà liàng jiān kù gōng zuò。
english: It all amounts to a lot of hard work.

hanzi: 她委托邻居照顾她的孩子。
pinyin: tā wěi tuō lín jū zhào gu tā de hái zi。
english: She resigned her children to the care of a neighbor.

hanzi: 如今，银行业面临许多竞争。
pinyin: rú jīn， yín háng yè miàn lín xǔ duō jìng zhēng。
english: Banking faces much competition nowadays.

hanzi: 我们应该发扬革命传统。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi fā yáng gé mìng chuán tǒng。
english: We shall carry forward the revolutionary tradition.

hanzi: 这名士兵胸部受了重伤。
pinyin: zhè míng shì bīng xiōng bù shòu le zhòng shāng。
english: The soldier received a serious wound on the chest.

hanzi: 她参加初级饭店经理课程。
pinyin: tā cān jiā chū jí fàn diàn jīng lǐ kè chéng。
english: She attend a course for junior hotel manager.

hanzi: 你对那段距离的判断十分精确.
pinyin: nǐ duì nà duàn jù lí de pàn duàn shí fēn jīng què.
english: You judged the distance to a nicety.

hanzi: 我们应该发扬革命传统。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi fā yáng gé mìng chuán tǒng。
english: We shall carry forward the revolutionary tradition.

hanzi: 他一字不差地复述了您说的话。
pinyin: tā yī zì bù cī de fù shù le nín shuō de huà。
english: He repeated what you said word for word.

hanzi: 冷天出门时要披上披肩。
pinyin: lěng tiān chū mén shí yào pī shàng pī jiān。
english: You should put a robe on if you go out in a cold day.

pinyin: wú lùn fā shēng shén me shì dōu yào bǎo chí lěng jìng。
english: Keep calm, whatever happens.

pinyin: wǒ zhǐ zài tè shū chǎng hé chuān gāo gēn xié。
english: I only wear high heels on special occasions.

pinyin: zhè zhǒng lǐ lùn yù yǐ zhī shì shí bù fú。
english: This theory is at variance with the known facts.

hanzi: 两块田之间有一条树木带。
pinyin: liǎng kuài tián zhī jiān yǒu yī tiáo shù mù dài。
english: A belt of trees grew between the two fields.

pinyin: tā de zhuàn jì jiù shì yī bù kē yán jì shí.
english: His biography is a saga of scientific research.

hanzi: 我决定不再追查那事.
pinyin: wǒ jué dìng bù zài zhuī chá nà shì.
english: I have decided not to pursue (ie investigate) the matter any further.

hanzi: 预料今天下午有零星阵雨。
pinyin: yù liào jīn tiān xià wǔ yǒu líng xīng zhèn yǔ。
english: Scattered showers are expected this afternoon.

pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan fēng jǐng huà， bù xǐ huan jìng wù huà。
english: I prefer landscape to still life.

pinyin: zhǐ yǒu rén lèi cái jù yǒu shuō huà de néng lì。
english: Only human beings are capable of speech.

pinyin: tā shēng bìng yǐ lái wèi kǒu jiù bú dà hào。

english: He is a favourite with his uncle/a favourite of his uncle's/his uncle's favourite.

pinyin: wǒ men guó jiā yǒu chōng zú de shí wù gōng yìng。
english: Our country has a bountiful supply of food.

pinyin: tā men chōng fèn lì yòng lu:3 guǎn de shè bèi.
english: They took full advantage of the hotel's facilities.

pinyin: wèi shēng dāng jú zhèng diào chá zhè jiàn shì.
english: The health authorities are investigating the matter.

pinyin: tìng xiāng tóng de gù shì shì lìng rén yàn fán de。
english: It is boring to listen to the same story.

pinyin: dà duō shù guó jiā shǐ yòng shí jìn zhì huò bì。
english: Most countries have a decimal currency.

hanzi: 该领事馆已升格为大使馆.
pinyin: gāi lǐng shì guǎn yǐ shēng gé wèi dà shǐ guǎn.
english: The consulate was upgraded to embassy status.

pinyin: tā zài shì yī cì， jìng rán hái shì shī bài。
english: He tried a second time only to fail again.

pinyin: wǒ men yīng dāng cǎi qǔ cuò shī zhì zhǐ zhàn zhēng。
english: We should take steps to prevent war.

pinyin: zhè shǒu shī biǎo xiàn chū qiáng liè de jī qíng。
english: The poem showed great intensity of feeling.

pinyin: zhuā jǐn shéng zi,  fǒu zé nǐ kuài diē xia lai de。
english: Get hold of the rope or you will fall.

pinyin: tā yuǎn yuǎn de lí kāi gù xiàng zài wài de shēng huó。
english: She lives a long way from home.

hanzi: 他们使用紫外线灯杀死害虫。
pinyin: tā men shǐ yòng zǐ wài xiàn dēng shā sǐ hài chóng。
english: They use ultraviolet lamp to kill pests.

pinyin: wǒ tòng hèn pù zhāng làng fèi de xíng zhèng jī guān。
english: I hate the prodigal administration.

pinyin: tā yòng wú xiàn diàn bào bǎ xiāo xi gào su wǒ。
english: He sent me the news by wireless telegraph.

hanzi: 首都在这个国家的最南端。
pinyin: shǒu dū zài zhè gè guó jiā de zuì nán duān。
english: The capital is in the extreme south of the country.

pinyin: mì fēng cài mì shí cháng shǐ huā shòu fěn.
english: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.
