pinyin: zhǔ yào zhòng diǎn fàng zài fǎ lu:4 huò zhì xù shàng。
english: Lay heavy stress on law and order.

hanzi: 他是大学足球代表队的球员。
pinyin: tā shì dà xué zú qiú dài biǎo duì de qiú yuán。
english: He is a member of the varsity football team.

hanzi: 骄傲自大是他的一个缺点.
pinyin: jiāo ào zì dà shì tā de yī gè quē diǎn.
english: Arrogance is one of his less attractive characteristics.

hanzi: 黄油从冰箱中取出会变软.
pinyin: huáng yóu zòng bīng xiāng zhòng qǔ chū huì biàn ruǎn.
english: The butter will soften out of the fridge.

pinyin: yào chéng fēi jī bì xū tí qián dìng wèi zi。
english: To ride in an aeroplane you have to book in advance.

pinyin: nà liǎng gè qíng rén zhǐ shì tōu tōu de huì miàn。
english: The two lovers had met only by stealth.

hanzi: 我党在南方有一大批拥护者.
pinyin: wǒ dǎng zài nán fāng yǒu yī dà pī yōng hù zhě.
english: Our party has a large following in the south.

hanzi: 有一次他大胆提出了自己的看法。
pinyin: yǒu yī cì tā dà dǎn tí chū le zì jǐ de kàn fǎ。
english: Once he made bold to air his views.

hanzi: 我当时正把机密文件切碎。
pinyin: wǒ dāng shí zhèng bǎ jī mì wén jiàn qiè suì。
english: I was shredding top-secret documents at that time.

hanzi: 她指导实习护士练习注射.
pinyin: tā zhǐ dǎo shí xí hù shi liàn xí zhù shè.
english: She instructed the trainee nurses in giving injections.

hanzi: 我们必须提高产量满足需求。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū tí gāo chǎn liàng mǎn zú xū qiú。
english: We must increase our output to meet demand.

hanzi: 今年物价没显出多大变化。
pinyin: jīn nián wù jià mò xiǎn chū duō dà biàn huà。
english: Prices have not shown much variation this year.

hanzi: 他的健康状况时好时坏。
pinyin: tā de jiàn kāng zhuàng kuàng shí hào shí huài。
english: There are fluctuations in the state of his health.

hanzi: 我不完全理解他离开的理由。
pinyin: wǒ bù wán quán lǐ jiě tā lí kāi de lǐ yóu。
english: I don't fully understand his reasons for leaving.

hanzi: 她的秘书处理她的一切约会。
pinyin: tā de mì shū chǔ lǐ tā de yī qiè yuē huì。
english: Her secretary took care of all her appointments.

hanzi: 在美国存在长期失业问题。
pinyin: zài Měi guó cún zài cháng qī shī yè wèn tí。
english: There is a chronic unemployment problem in America.

hanzi: 我们在花园里种了许多蔬菜。
pinyin: wǒ men zài huā yuán lǐ zhòng le xǔ duō shū cài。
english: We've grown many vegetables in our garden.

hanzi: 他把箱子放在行李寄存处。
pinyin: tā bǎ xiāng zǐ fàng zài xíng li jì cún chù。
english: He deposited the case in the left luggage office.

hanzi: 她在针织品部买了很多袜子。
pinyin: tā zài zhēn zhī pǐn bù mǎi le hěn duō wà zi。
english: She bought many socks in the hosiery department.

hanzi: 海外贸易成为主要的项目。
pinyin: hǎi wài mào yì chéng wéi zhǔ yào de xiàng mù。
english: The overseas trade has become the main project.

hanzi: 小船稳稳地顺著运河突突地航行.
pinyin: xiǎo chuán wěn wěn de shùn著 yùn hé tū tū de háng xíng.
english: The boat chugged along the canal.

hanzi: 他叫秘书把文件复制一份。
pinyin: tā jiào mì shū bǎ wén jiàn fù zhì yī fèn。
english: He asked his secretary to make a copy of the document.

hanzi: 我们必须促进与邻国的贸易.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū cù jìn yù lín guó de mào yì.
english: We must promote commerce with neighbouring countries.

hanzi: 我们的公司实行共同责任制.
pinyin: wǒ men de gōng sī shí xíng gòng tóng zé rèn zhì.
english: Our business is a joint/shared responsibility.

hanzi: 我被这个惊人的想法吸引住了。
pinyin: wǒ bèi zhè gè jīng rén de xiǎng fǎ xī yǐn zhù le。
english: I was attracted by the striking idea.

hanzi: 今天早上我太太对我发脾气。
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo shang wǒ tài tai duì wǒ fà pí qì。
english: My wife was disagreeable to me this morning.

hanzi: 我奶奶对外国人抱有偏见。
pinyin: wǒ nǎi nai duì wài guó rén bào yǒu piān jiàn。
english: My grandmother has a complex against foreigners.

hanzi: 只有少数人在这个岛上居住。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu shǎo shù rén zài zhè gè dǎo shàng jū zhù。
english: Only a few people inhabited the island.

hanzi: 资方和工会的谈判失败了。
pinyin: zī fāng huò gōng huì de tán pàn shī bài le。
english: Talks between management and unions have collapsed.

hanzi: 市议会批准了这项建筑计划。
pinyin: shì yì huì pī zhǔn le zhè xiàng jiàn zhù jì huà。
english: The city council approved the building plan.

hanzi: 我们需要有人来修理录音机。
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào yǒu rén lái xiū lǐ lù yīn jī。
english: We needed someone to fix the tape recorder.

hanzi: 你的发音毛病是可以纠正的。
pinyin: nǐ de fā yīn máo bìng shì kě yǐ jiū zhèng de。
english: Your faults of pronunciation can be remedied.

hanzi: 你的发音毛病是可以纠正的。
pinyin: nǐ de fā yīn máo bìng shì kě yǐ jiū zhèng de。
english: Your faults of pronunciation can be remedied.

hanzi: 我最讨厌的是得参加这些会议.
pinyin: wǒ zuì tǎo yàn de shì de cān jiā zhè xie huì yì.
english: I loathe having to go to these conferences.

hanzi: 我证明他已经收到了你的钱。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng míng tā yǐ jīng shōu dào le nǐ de qián。
english: I certify that he has received your money.

hanzi: 他们使用紫外线灯杀死害虫。
pinyin: tā men shǐ yòng zǐ wài xiàn dēng shā sǐ hài chóng。
english: They use ultraviolet lamp to kill pests.

hanzi: 他把东西装进箱子里就动身了。
pinyin: tā bǎ dōng xi zhuāng jìn xiāng zǐ lǐ jiù dòng shēn le。
english: He packed up his things and left.

hanzi: 公司想把总部设在北方.
pinyin: gōng sī xiǎng bǎ zǒng bù shè zài běi fāng.
english: The company wants to situate its headquarters in the north.

hanzi: 这一事故把汽车损坏得很厉害.
pinyin: zhè yī shì gù bǎ qì chē sǔn huài de hěn lì hai.
english: The accident did a lot of damage to the car.

hanzi: 我们关闭发动机开始滑行.
pinyin: wǒ men guān bì fā dòng jī kāi shǐ huá xíng.
english: We switched off the motor and started to drift (along).

hanzi: 不幸的小伙子啊, 他刚刚死了妻子.
pinyin: bù xìng de xiǎo huǒ zi a,  tā gāng gang sǐ le qī zi.
english: Poor chap, his wife has just died.

hanzi: 老是唱反调的人批判地不同意的人
pinyin: lǎo shi chàng fǎn tiáo de rén pī pàn de bù tóng yì de rén
english: One who critically disagrees.

hanzi: 艺术家巧妙地捕捉住她的笑容.
pinyin: yì shù jiā qiǎo miào de bǔ zhuō zhù tā de xiào róng.
english: The artist has caught her smile perfectly.

hanzi: 他非常疲劳, 很快就睡着了。
pinyin: tā fēi cháng pí láo,  hěn kuài jiù shuì zhāo le。
english: He was so tired that he fell asleep quickly.

hanzi: 我们可以把动物分成很多种类。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ bǎ dòng wù fèn chéng hěn duō zhǒng lèi。
english: We can group animals into many types.

hanzi: 图书馆的书是按科目分类的。
pinyin: tú shū guǎn de shū shì àn kē mù fēn lèi de。
english: The books in the library are classified by subject.

hanzi: 编词典是一种极其吃力的苦差。
pinyin: biān cí diǎn shì yī zhòng jí qí chī lì de kǔ cī。
english: Compiling a dictionary is an awful sweat.

hanzi: 蜜蜂采蜜时常使花受粉.
pinyin: mì fēng cài mì shí cháng shǐ huā shòu fěn.
english: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.

hanzi: 她喜欢议论邻居们的是非长短。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan yì lùn lín jū men de shì fēi cháng duǎn。
english: She loves to gossip to her neighbors.

hanzi: 这一误会引发了激烈的争论.
pinyin: zhè yī wù huì yǐn fā le jī liè de zhēng lùn.
english: Bitter arguments ensued from this misunderstanding.

hanzi: 风景优美，非文字所能形容。
pinyin: fēng jǐng yōu měi， fēi wén zì suǒ néng xíng róng。
english: The scenery is too beautiful for words.

hanzi: 他在马路对面向我招手致意。
pinyin: tā zài mǎ lù duì miàn xiàng wǒ zhāo shǒu zhì yì。
english: He beckoned to me from across the street.

hanzi: 我不好意思告诉她我不及格。
pinyin: wǒ bù hǎo yì si gào su tā wǒ bù jí gé。
english: I was too ashamed to tell her that I had failed.

hanzi: 政府的政策开始发挥作用了.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ de zhèng cè kāi shǐ fā huī zuò yòng le.
english: The government's policies are beginning to tell.

hanzi: 他尽管有病，还是可以上课。
pinyin: tā jǐn guǎn yǒu bìng， hái shì kě yǐ shàng kè。
english: He is not so sick but he can attend a class.

hanzi: 他的儿子是骑兵团的一名战士。
pinyin: tā de ér zi shì qí bīng tuán de yī míng zhàn shì。
english: His son is a soldier in a cavalry regiment.

hanzi: 我觉得我没有受到公正的对待。
pinyin: wǒ jué de wǒ méi yǒu shòu dào gōng zhèng de duì dài。
english: I felt I hadn't been treated fairly.

hanzi: 这所小学附属于一所大学。
pinyin: zhè suǒ xiǎo xué fù shǔ yú yī suǒ dà xué。
english: This elementary school is affiliated to a university.

hanzi: 我建议你打听一下这项工作。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì nǐ dǎ ting yī xià zhè xiàng gōng zuò。
english: I recommend that you inquire about the job.

hanzi: 真抱歉给你添了这么多麻烦。
pinyin: zhēn bào qiàn jǐ nǐ tiān le zhè me duō má fan。
english: I am so sorry to give you not a little trouble.

hanzi: 观点十分明确, 无须解释.
pinyin: guān diǎn shí fēn míng què,  wú xū jiě shì.
english: The proposition is so clear that it needs no explanation.

hanzi: 他的建议遭到某种程度的反对。
pinyin: tā de jiàn yì zāo dào mǒu zhǒng chéng dù de fǎn duì。
english: His suggestion met with some hostility.

hanzi: 他毕业于一所工艺美术学校。
pinyin: tā bì yè yú yī suǒ gōng yì měi shù xué xiào。
english: He graduated from a school of crafts and arts.

hanzi: 通过这条很滑的路并不容易。
pinyin: tōng guò zhè tiáo hěn huá de lù bìng bù róng yì。
english: Negotiation of the slippery road was not easy.

hanzi: 我不完全理解他离开的理由。
pinyin: wǒ bù wán quán lǐ jiě tā lí kāi de lǐ yóu。
english: I don't fully understand his reasons for leaving.

hanzi: 由于他的参与，我们赢了比赛。
pinyin: yóu yú tā de cān yù， wǒ men yíng le bǐ sài。
english: We win the game because of his participation.

hanzi: 盆子和锅在厨房里碰击作响。
pinyin: pén zi huò guō zài chú fáng lǐ pèng jī zuò xiǎng。
english: Pots and pans were clattering in the kitchen.

hanzi: 这种做法不符合我们的政策.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng zuò fǎ bù fú hé wǒ men de zhèng cè.
english: Such an act would not be in accord with our policy.

hanzi: 他毕业于一所工艺美术学校。
pinyin: tā bì yè yú yī suǒ gōng yì měi shù xué xiào。
english: He graduated from a school of crafts and arts.

hanzi: 那个胖子经常大吃甜食。
pinyin: nèi gè pàng zi jīng cháng dà chī tián sì。
english: The fat man gorged himself constantly with enormous desserts.

hanzi: 血液中有红和白两种血球。
pinyin: xuè yè zhòng yǒu hóng huò bái liǎng zhòng xuè qiú。
english: There are red and white corpuscles in blood.

hanzi: 你能解答那个问题真是聪明。
pinyin: nǐ néng jiě dá nèi gè wèn tí zhēn shì cōng míng。
english: It was clever of you to solve the problem.

hanzi: 她的书法有了明显的进步。
pinyin: tā de shū fǎ yǒu le míng xiǎn de jìn bù。
english: There's been a noticeable improvement in her handwriting.

hanzi: 看到动物受痛苦是很难受的。
pinyin: kàn dào dòng wù shòu tòng kǔ shì hěn nán shòu de。
english: A suffering animal is a distressing sight.

hanzi: 我们全靠自己完成了这项工作。
pinyin: wǒ men quán kào zì jǐ wán chéng le zhè xiàng gōng zuò。
english: We finished the job all by ourselves.

hanzi: 他大学时的专业是国际贸易。
pinyin: tā dà xué shí de zhuān yè shì guó jì mào yì。
english: He majored in international commerce in college.

hanzi: 我一文不名，因此不能付钱给你。
pinyin: wǒ yī wén bù míng， yīn cǐ bù néng fù qián jǐ nǐ。
english: I haven't a bean, so I can't pay you.

hanzi: 房间里发出一片兴奋的嚷嚷声。
pinyin: fáng jiān lǐ fā chū yī piàn xīng fèn de rǎng rǎng shēng。
english: The room buzzed with excitement.

hanzi: 别把镜头弄脏了, 我刚刚擦过.
pinyin: biè bǎ jìng tóu nòng zāng le,  wǒ gāng gang cā guò.
english: Don't smear the lens; I've just polished it.

hanzi: 剧场的地板斜度太大了一点。
pinyin: jù chǎng de dì bǎn xié dù tài dà le yī diǎn。
english: The rake of the theater floor is a bit too steep.

hanzi: 降低失业率应是头等大事。
pinyin: jiàng dī shī yè lu:4 yìng shì tóu děng dà shì。
english: The reduction of unemployment should be paramount.

hanzi: 没有任何事能扰乱他平静的心绪.
pinyin: méi yǒu rèn hé shì néng rǎo luàn tā píng jìng de xīn xù.
english: Nothing disturbs his equanimity.

hanzi: 敌人以强大的军队围困城市。
pinyin: dí rén yǐ qiáng dà de jūn duì wéi kùn chéng shì。
english: The enemy beset the city with a strong army.

hanzi: 当地人选举了六名立法委员。
pinyin: dāng dì rén xuǎn jǔ le liù míng lì fǎ wěi yuán。
english: Six legislators were elected by local people.

hanzi: 把这句子的各个成分加以分析.
pinyin: bǎ zhè jù zi de gè ge chéng fèn jiā yǐ fēn xī.
english: Analyse the sentence into its constituent parts.

hanzi: 这些年他的性格已大大成熟。
pinyin: zhè xie nián tā de xìng gé yǐ dà dà chéng shú。
english: His character has greatly matured in the years.

hanzi: 我不会把我的钱投资到他的公司。
pinyin: wǒ bù huì bǎ wǒ de qián tóu zī dào tā de gōng sī。
english: I won't invest my money in his company.

hanzi: 你的拒绝让我感到十分为难。
pinyin: nǐ de jù jué ràng wǒ gǎn dào shí fēn wéi nán。
english: Your refusal puts me in an awkward predicament.

hanzi: 该领导人受到了首相的接见.
pinyin: gāi lǐng dǎo rén shòu dào le shǒu xiàng de jiē jiàn.
english: The chief was received by the Prime Minister.

hanzi: 明亮的灯光刺痛了我的眼睛。
pinyin: míng liàng de dēng guāng cì tòng le wǒ de yǎn jīng。
english: The light hurt my eyes with its brightness.

hanzi: 这些票的有效期只有一个月。
pinyin: zhè xie piào de yǒu xiào qī zhǐ yǒu yī gè yuè。
english: These tickets are available for one month only.

hanzi: 士兵已训练得绝对服从命令.
pinyin: shì bīng yǐ xùn liàn de jué duì fú cóng mìng lìng.
english: Soldiers are trained to obey without question.

hanzi: 自从他是小孩时，他就喜欢狗。
pinyin: zì cóng tā shì xiǎo hái shí， tā jiù xǐ huan gǒu。
english: He has liked dogs since he was a child.

hanzi: 我跑过的最长的距离是十英里.
pinyin: wǒ pǎo guò de zuì cháng de jù lí shì shí yīng lǐ.
english: The farthest distance I've run is ten miles.

hanzi: 那次宴会很轻松, 随随便便.
pinyin: nà cì yàn huì hěn qīng sōng,  suí suí biàn pián.
english: The dinner was a relaxed, unceremonious occasion.

hanzi: 我们必须遵守这个国家的法规。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū zūn shǒu zhè gè guó jiā de fǎ guī。
english: We must obey the statutes in this country.

hanzi: 人举不起这样的重量.
pinyin: rén jǔ bù qǐ zhè yàng de zhòng liàng.
english: It is not humanly possible (ie A human is not able) to lift the weight.

hanzi: 我累了就无法集中精力工作。
pinyin: wǒ lèi le jiù wú fǎ jí zhōng jīng lì gōng zuò。
english: I can't concentrate on my work when I'm tired.

hanzi: 士兵们背起行装，继续前进。
pinyin: shì bīng men bèi qǐ xìng zhuāng， jì xù qián jìn。
english: The soldiers shouldered their kit and moved on.

hanzi: 我一看见冒烟，就发出了警报。
pinyin: wǒ yī kàn jiàn mào yān， jiù fā chū le jǐng bào。
english: I gave the alarm as soon as I saw the smoke.

hanzi: 这完全是你力所能及的工作。
pinyin: zhè wán quán shì nǐ lì suǒ néng jí de gōng zuò。
english: This is a task well within your ability.

hanzi: 他指出地球是围绕太阳转的.
pinyin: tā zhǐ chū dì qiú shì wéi rǎo tài yáng zhuàn de.
english: He taught that the earth revolves around the sun.

hanzi: 通电时线圈就会有磁性。
pinyin: tōng diàn shí xiàn quān jiù kuài yǒu cí xìng。
english: The loop becomes magnetic when the current is switched on.

hanzi: 马感觉到了危险，于是停了下来。
pinyin: mǎ gǎn jué dào le wēi xiǎn， yú shì tíng le xia lai。
english: The horse sensed danger and stopped.

hanzi: 现在激光可以用来做手术。
pinyin: xiàn zài jī guāng kě yǐ yòng lái zuò shǒu shù。
english: Lasers can be used to perform operations nowadays.

hanzi: 有人通知他到司令部去报到。
pinyin: yǒu rén tōng zhī tā dào sī lìng bù qù bào dào。
english: He was told to report himself to headquarters.

hanzi: 他们拣拾木柴以补充煤的不足.
pinyin: tā men jiǎn shí mù chái yǐ bǔ chōng méi de bù zú.
english: They eked out their coal by collecting firewood.

hanzi: 他要在春节期间拜访叔叔。
pinyin: tā yào zài chūn jié qī jiān bài fǎng shū shu。
english: He is to visit his uncle during the Spring Festival.

hanzi: 就她的年龄来说, 她是够活跃的.
pinyin: jiù tā de nián líng lái shuō,  tā shì gòu huó yuè de.
english: She's very active, considering her age.

hanzi: 这本书描述了一个演员的一生。
pinyin: zhè běn shū miáo shù le yī gè yǎn yuán de yī shēng。
english: The book portrays the life of an actor.

hanzi: 班长把试卷分发给同学们。
pinyin: bān zhǎng bǎ shì juàn fēn fā jǐ tóng xué men。
english: The monitor handed the papers out to the classmates.

hanzi: 我得承认, 我不喜欢现代音乐。
pinyin: wǒ de chéng rèn,  wǒ bù xǐ huan xiàn dài yīn yuè。
english: I have to admit to a dislike for modern music.

hanzi: 班长把试卷分发给同学们。
pinyin: bān zhǎng bǎ shì juàn fēn fā jǐ tóng xué men。
english: The monitor handed the papers out to the classmates.

hanzi: 我们必须避免无谓的重复劳动.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū bì miǎn wú wèi de chóng fù láo dòng.
english: We must avoid wasteful duplication of effort.

hanzi: 注意你的举止, 别闹出笑话来。
pinyin: zhù yì nǐ de jǔ zhǐ,  biè nào chū xiào huà lái。
english: Behave yourself; don't make a fool of yourself.

hanzi: 我经常在树林里呼吸新鲜空气。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng zài shù lín lǐ hū xī xīn xiān kōng qì。
english: I always imbibe fresh air in the woods.

hanzi: 钓鱼的人渡水到河中央去了.
pinyin: diào yú de rén dù shuǐ dào hé zhōng yāng qù le.
english: The angler waded (out) into the middle of the river.

hanzi: 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛.
pinyin: yī shēng jǐ tā zhù shè yǐ jiǎn qīng téng tòng.
english: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.

hanzi: 他非但不用功，反而到处鬼混。
pinyin: tā fēi dàn bù yòng gōng， fǎn ér dào chù guǐ hùn。
english: Far from working hard, he played around.

hanzi: 以上各点均包括在建议中.
pinyin: yǐ shàng gè diǎn jūn bāo kuò zài jiàn yì zhòng.
english: The foregoing have all been included in the proposals.

hanzi: 由于各种原因，我不愿见他。
pinyin: yóu yú gè zhǒng yuán yīn， wǒ bù yuàn xiàn tā。
english: For various reasons I'd prefer not to meet him.

hanzi: 冰太薄，承受不住你们的重量。
pinyin: bīng tài bò， chéng shòu bú zhù nǐ men de zhòng liàng。
english: The ice is too thin to bear your weight.

hanzi: 这个小女孩不太善于做加法。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái bù tài shàn yú zuò jiā fǎ。
english: The little girl is not very clever at addition.

hanzi: 请把我的信件转到我的新地址。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ wǒ de xìn jiàn zhuàn dào wǒ de xīn dì zhǐ。
english: Please forward my mail to my new address.

hanzi: 这些学生很尊敬他们的老师。
pinyin: zhè xie xué sheng hěn zūn jìng tā men de lǎo shī。
english: These students have reverence for their teacher.

hanzi: 你和我属于不同的政治阵营。
pinyin: nǐ huò wǒ shǔ yú bù tóng de zhèng zhì zhèn yíng。
english: You and I belong to different political camps.

hanzi: 她不肯帮忙，事情就更难办了。
pinyin: tā bù kěn bāng máng， shì qing jiù gèng nàn bàn le。
english: Her refusal to help complicates matters.

hanzi: 他的花白的头发显示出了他的年龄。
pinyin: tā de huā bái de tóu fa xiǎn shì chū le tā de nián líng。
english: His hoary hair showed his age.

hanzi: 谁都无法形容这景色的美丽。
pinyin: shéi dōu wú fǎ xíng róng zhè jǐng sè de měi lì。
english: There is no describing the beauty of the scene.

hanzi: 他己被悄悄地免掉主任的职务。
pinyin: tā jǐ bèi qiāo qiāo de miǎn diào zhǔ rèn de zhí wù。
english: He has been quietly booted out as chief.

hanzi: 他的儿子是骑兵团的一名战士。
pinyin: tā de ér zi shì qí bīng tuán de yī míng zhàn shì。
english: His son is a soldier in a cavalry regiment.

hanzi: 她把一张白纸插入打字机里。
pinyin: tā bǎ yī zhāng bái zhǐ chā rù dǎ zì jī lǐ。
english: She inserted a new sheet of paper into the typewriter.

hanzi: 那个项目的改造已经完成。
pinyin: nèi gè xiàng mù de gǎi zào yǐ jīng wán chéng。
english: The transformation of that project has been finished.

hanzi: 这位教授目前正在写一本书。
pinyin: zhè wèi jiào shòu mù qián zhèng zài xiě yī běn shū。
english: The professor is presently writing a book.

hanzi: 法官劝告他改变生活方式。
pinyin: fǎ guān quàn gào tā gǎi biàn shēng huó fāng shì。
english: The judge advised him to amend his way of living.

hanzi: 他非但不用功，反而到处鬼混。
pinyin: tā fēi dàn bù yòng gōng， fǎn ér dào chù guǐ hùn。
english: Far from working hard, he played around.

hanzi: 别把秘密告诉他，他的嘴不严。
pinyin: biè bǎ mì mì gào su tā， tā de zuǐ bù yán。
english: Never tell him a secret; he's got a loose tongue.

hanzi: 打开窗户，让新鲜的空气进来。
pinyin: dǎ kāi chuāng hu， ràng xīn xiān de kōng qì jìn lái。
english: Open the window and let in some fresh air.

hanzi: 他们表示有签订合同的意愿。
pinyin: tā men biǎo shì yǒu qiān dìng hé tong de yì yuàn。
english: They showed a disposition to sign the contract.

hanzi: 他顺便提到他有一辆新汽车。
pinyin: tā shùn biàn tí dào tā yǒu yī liàng xīn qì chē。
english: He mentioned in passing that he had a new car.

hanzi: 那小女孩把鼻子贴在窗户上。
pinyin: nà xiǎo nu:3 hái bǎ bí zi tiē zài chuāng hu shàng。
english: The child pressed her nose against the window.

hanzi: 据说他已经成为一名党员了。
pinyin: jù shuō tā yǐ jīng chéng wéi yī míng dǎng yuán le。
english: It is said that he has became a Party member.

hanzi: 这个国家原料大部分靠进口.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā yuán liào dà bù fen kào jìn kǒu.
english: The country has to import most of its raw materials.

hanzi: 一个人的衣著可反映出其个性.

hanzi: 我把打碎的盘子藏在餐桌后面了。

hanzi: 我经常在树林里呼吸新鲜空气。
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng zài shù lín lǐ hū xī xīn xiān kōng qì。
english: I always imbibe fresh air in the woods.

english: I hid the broken plate behind the table.

hanzi: 我把打碎的盘子藏在餐桌后面了。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ dǎ suì de pán zi zàng zài cān zhuō hòu mian le。
english: I hid the broken plate behind the table.

pinyin: háng kōng xué fēi jī háng xíng de lǐ lùn yù shí jiàn
english: The theory and practice of aircraft navigation.

pinyin: tā bèi pài chū guó zhí xíng yí xiàng jiān jù rèn wu.

hanzi: 我可以闻到雨后鲜花的清香。

pinyin: tā yǐ zì wǒ xī shēng jīng shén jiù le wǒ men de xìng mìng.

pinyin: luò yè sōng zhǎng zhuó qiú guǒ huò zhēn xíng de yè zi。

english: The fresh air in the morning made him feel glad.

pinyin: tā de xuè tòu guò chèn shān rǎn wū le shàng yī.

english: This book contains all the information you need.

hanzi: 他应该亲自来领奖才对.

english: A notable or distinctive feature or characteristic.

pinyin: tā de zhǐ kòng zāo dào yī zhèn fèn nù de fǎn duì shēng。

hanzi: 草原向四周伸展, 一望无际.
pinyin: cǎo yuán xiàng sì zhōu shēn zhǎn,  yī wàng wú jì.
english: The prairies stretch on all sides as far as the eye can see.

hanzi: 从上周起，我在工作中落后了。

hanzi: 这座城市位于加拿大的西北部。

hanzi: 他对事业的热情激励著他的追随者.
pinyin: tā duì shì yè de rè qíng jī lì著 tā de zhuī suí zhě.
english: His ardour for the cause inspired his followers.

hanzi: 我们很难观察月亮的另一边。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn nàn guān chá yuè liàng de lìng yī biān。
english: The far side of the moon is difficult for us to observe.

hanzi: 你作判断时要尽量做到不存偏见.
pinyin: nǐ zuò pàn duàn shí yào jìn liàng zuò dào bù cún piān jiàn.
english: Try not to be prejudiced in your judgements.

hanzi: 恢复谈判的任何做法都值得欢迎。
pinyin: huī fù tán pàn de rèn hé zuò fǎ dōu zhí de huān yíng。
english: Any renewal of negotiations will be welcomed.

hanzi: 这本书简单易懂，适合儿童。
pinyin: zhè běn shū jiǎn dān yì dǒng， shì hé ér tóng。
english: The simplicity of the book makes it suitable for children.

hanzi: 我们正在为达到共同的目标而努力.
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng zài wèi dá dào gòng tóng de mù biāo ér nǔ lì.
english: We're working towards common objectives.

hanzi: 我希望星期五之前天气会好转。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng xīng qī wǔ zhī qián tiān qì kuài hǎo zhuǎn。
english: I hope the weather will improve before Friday.

hanzi: 她已调到附属建筑的办事处去了.
pinyin: tā yǐ tiáo dào fù shǔ jiàn zhù de bàn shì chù qù le.
english: She's been shunted off to an office in the annexe.

hanzi: 这些腐烂的香蕉发出难闻的气味.
pinyin: zhè xie fǔ làn de xiāng jiāo fā chū nàn wén de qì wèi.
english: These rotting bananas are giving off a bad smell.

hanzi: 他是不太可靠, 但我仍很喜欢他.
pinyin: tā shì bù tài kě kào,  dàn wǒ réng hěn xǐ huan tā.
english: He's not very reliable, but I like him just the same.

hanzi: 我们每年给三个研究生的奖学金.
pinyin: wǒ men měi nián jǐ sān gè yán jiū shēng de jiǎng xué jīn.
english: We give three research fellowships a year.

hanzi: 母亲死后，我收到许多安慰信。
pinyin: mǔ qīn sǐ hòu， wǒ shōu dào xǔ duō ān wèi xìn。
english: I got many letters of consolation when my mother died.

hanzi: 我碰巧身边有官方的统计数字。
pinyin: wǒ pèng qiǎo shēn biān yǒu guān fāng de tǒng jì shù zì。
english: I happen to have the official statistics with me.

hanzi: 下一段行程我们就要进山区了.
pinyin: xià yī duàn xíng chéng wǒ men jiù yào jìn shān qū le.
english: The next lap of our trip takes us into the mountains.

hanzi: 这只狗开始生病并且很快就死了。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ gǒu kāi shǐ shēng bìng bìng qiě hěn kuài jiù sǐ le。
english: The dog began to sicken and soon died.

hanzi: 他出生于一个历史悠久的演员世家。
pinyin: tā chū shēng yú yī gè lì shǐ yōu jiǔ de yǎn yuán shì jiā。
english: He comes from a long line of actors.

hanzi: 我对会议的结果感到极其满意.
pinyin: wǒ duì huì yì de jié guǒ gǎn dào jí qí mǎn yì.
english: I was most gratified at/by/with the outcome of the meeting.

hanzi: 要把前景中的人物画得合比例.
pinyin: yào bǎ qián jǐng zhòng dì rén wù huà de hé bǐ lì.
english: Try to draw the figures in the foreground in proportion.

hanzi: 为致富而牺牲原则是不值得的.
pinyin: wèi zhì fù ér xī shēng yuán zé shì bù zhí de de.
english: Getting rich isn't worth the sacrifice of your principles.

hanzi: 穿着这双笨重的鞋走路真难受。
pinyin: chuān zhuó zhè shuāng bèn zhòng de xié zǒu lù zhēn nán shòu。
english: It's not easy walking in these clumsy shoes.

hanzi: 我们等待着消息，越来越着急。
pinyin: wǒ men děng dài zhuó xiāo xi， yuè lái yuè zháo jí。
english: We waited for news with a growing sense of anxiety.

hanzi: 她鼓励她表达个人深处的感情。
pinyin: tā gǔ lì tā biǎo dá gè rén shēn chù de gǎn qíng。
english: She encourages her to express her innermost feelings.

hanzi: 请给我们公司寄一份详细的简历。
pinyin: qǐng jǐ wǒ men gōng sī jì yī fèn xiáng xì de jiǎn lì。
english: Please send a detailed resume to our company.

hanzi: 汽车以惊人的速度向桥冲过去。
pinyin: qì chē yǐ jīng rén de sù dù xiàng qiáo chòng guò qu。
english: The car rushed at the bridge at astonishing speed.

hanzi: 她邀请我吃饭以表示她的感激。
pinyin: tā yāo qǐng wǒ chī fàn yǐ biǎo shì tā de gǎn jī。
english: She showed me her gratitude by inviting me to dinner.

hanzi: 他可以招摇撞骗闯过任何难关。
pinyin: tā kě yǐ zhāo yáo zhuàng piàn chuǎng guò rèn hé nán guān。
english: He could bluff his way through any difficulty.

hanzi: 他说阿拉伯语和英语都一样自如.
pinyin: tā shuō ē lā bó yù huò Yīng yǔ dōu yí yàng zì rú.
english: He speaks Arabic and English with equal ease.

hanzi: 我得要求你陪我去一趟警察分局.
pinyin: wǒ de yāo qiú nǐ péi wǒ qù yī tàng jǐng chá fēn jú.
english: I must ask you to accompany me to the police station.

hanzi: 村民一致反对修建旁道.
pinyin: cūn mín yī zhì fǎn duì xiū jiàn páng dào.
english: The villagers are unanimous in their opposition to the building of a bypass.

hanzi: 士兵们为争夺每一寸土地而斗争。
pinyin: shì bīng men wèi zhēng duó měi yī cùn tǔ dì ér dòu zhēng。
english: The soldiers contested every inch of ground.

hanzi: 服从命令在军队中是很重要的。
pinyin: fú cóng mìng lìng zài jūn duì zhòng shì hěn zhòng yào de。
english: Obedience to order is very important in an army.

hanzi: 凡是漂亮的男子, 她见一个追一个.
pinyin: fán shì piào liang de nán zǐ,  tā xiàn yī gè zhuī yī gè.
english: She runs after every good-looking man she meets.

hanzi: 一提到他的名字，他立即站了起来。
pinyin: yī tí dào tā de míng zi， tā lì jí zhàn le qǐ lai。
english: At the mention of his name, he instantly stood up.

hanzi: 这家广播电台不播送任何广告。
pinyin: zhè jiā guǎng bō diàn tái bù bō sòng rèn hé guǎng gào。
english: This radio station does not carry any advertising.

hanzi: 你时时拜望亲戚很周到啊。
pinyin: nǐ shí shí bài wàng qīn qi hěn zhōu dào a。
english: It is considerate of you to call on your relatives from time to time.

hanzi: 我恐怕没有抓住你的论据的思路。
pinyin: wǒ kǒng pà méi yǒu zhuā zhù nǐ de lùn jù de sī lù。
english: I'm afraid I've lost the thread of your argument.

hanzi: 我女儿是一个想象力活跃的孩子。
pinyin: wǒ nu:3 ér shì yī gè xiǎng xiàng lì huó yuè de hái zi。
english: My daughter is a child with vivid imagination.

hanzi: 这些手套是为严寒地区制造的。
pinyin: zhè xie shǒu tào shì wèi yán hán dì qū zhì zào de。
english: The gloves were designed for extremely cold climates.

hanzi: 我们的老师对标点符号非常重视.
pinyin: wǒ men de lǎo shī duì biāo diǎn fú hào fēi cháng zhòng shì.
english: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.

hanzi: 这场讨论演变成了激烈的争吵.
pinyin: zhè chǎng tǎo lùn yǎn biàn chéng le jī liè de zhēng chǎo.
english: The discussion deteriorated into a bitter quarrel.

hanzi: 我把一棵花种到了新买的花盆里。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ yī kē huā zhòng dào le xīn mǎi de huā pén lǐ。
english: I potted up a flower in the newly bought flowerpot.

hanzi: 他只是因为受人激将才参加竞赛.
pinyin: tā zhǐ shì yīn wèi shòu rén jī jiàng cái cān jiā jìng sài.
english: He only entered the competition for a dare.

hanzi: 该系列讲座可自然分作三部分。
pinyin: gāi xì liè jiǎng zuò kě zì rán fèn zuò sān bù fen。
english: The lecture series falls naturally into three parts.

hanzi: 我们的眼睛慢慢地适应了黑暗的环境.
pinyin: wǒ men de yǎn jīng màn màn de shì yìng le hēi àn de huán jìng.
english: Our eyes slowly adapted to the dark.

hanzi: 那个专门小组被选中参加讨论。
pinyin: nèi gè zhuān mén xiǎo zǔ bèi xuǎn zhòng cān jiā tǎo lùn。
english: The panel was chosen to take part in discussion.

hanzi: 他冷静客观地看著她遭受的痛苦.
pinyin: tā lěng jìng kè guān de kàn著 tā zāo shòu de tòng kǔ.
english: He watched her suffering with clinical detachment.

hanzi: 他专心读报, 连门铃也没听见。
pinyin: tā zhuān xīn dú bào,  lián mén líng yě mò tīng jiàn。
english: He was too absorbed in the newspaper to hear the bell.

hanzi: 她是英国人, 但也有一些德国亲戚.
pinyin: tā shì Yīng guó rén,  dàn yě yǒu yī xiē Dé guó qīn qi.
english: She is British but also has German connections.

hanzi: 他们结为夫妇共同生活了很多年.
pinyin: tā men jié wèi fū fù gòng tóng shēng huó le hěn duō nián.
english: They lived together as husband and wife for years.

hanzi: 不是父亲而是母亲出席此一仪式。
pinyin: bú shì fù qīn ér shì mǔ qīn chū xí cǐ yī yí shì。
english: Not father but mother was present at the ceremony.

hanzi: 这个水壶上的开关按下时卡不住了。
pinyin: zhè gè shuǐ hú shàng de kāi guān àn xià shí qiǎ bú zhù le。
english: The switch on the kettle won't stay down.

hanzi: 警察朝人群上方射出一排子弹。
pinyin: jǐng chá cháo rén qún shàng fāng shè chū yī pái zǐ dàn。
english: Police fired a volley over the heads of the crowd.

hanzi: 无铅汽油的应用现正逐步推广.
pinyin: wú qiān qì yóu de yìng yòng xiàn zhèng zhú bù tuī guǎng.
english: The use of lead-free petrol is now being phased in.

hanzi: 这次争吵是两家不和引起的。
pinyin: zhè cì zhēng chǎo shì liǎng jiā bù hé yǐn qǐ de。
english: The quarrel originated in rivalry between the two families.

hanzi: 他为了养家不得不去拼命工作。
pinyin: tā wèi le yǎng jiā bù dé bù qù pīn mìng gōng zuò。
english: He had to work hard for the maintenance of his family.

hanzi: 邻居从早到晚开着收音机。
pinyin: lín jū zòng zǎo dào wǎn kāi zhuó shōu yīn jī。
english: The people next door play their radio from morning till night.

hanzi: 她很热心, 为我打电话叫了计程车.
pinyin: tā hěn rè xīn,  wèi wǒ dǎ diàn huà jiào le jì chéng jū.
english: She was so kind as to phone for a taxi for me.

hanzi: 他们以唱歌来减轻等候的厌烦.
pinyin: tā men yǐ chàng gē lái jiǎn qīng děng hòu de yàn fán.
english: They alleviated the boredom of waiting by singing songs.

hanzi: 请注意这两个词之间的区别。
pinyin: qǐng zhù yì zhè liǎng gè cí zhī jiān de qū bié。
english: Please pay attention to the difference between the two words.

hanzi: 头上受了一击后，他昏过去了一会儿。
pinyin: tou shàng shòu le yī jī hòu， tā hūn guò qu le yī huìr。
english: The blow on the head dazed him for a moment.

hanzi: 我始终认为帮助别人是重要的。
pinyin: wǒ shǐ zhōng rèn wéi bāng zhù bié rén shì zhòng yào de。
english: I always make a point of giving a hand to others.

hanzi: 我相信他是个我们应当尊敬的人。
pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn tā shì gè wǒ men yīng dāng zūn jìng de rén。
english: He is a man whom I believe we should respect.

hanzi: 这件事完全超出了他的生活范围了.
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì wán quán chāo chū le tā de shēng huó fàn wéi le.
english: It took him completely out of his sphere.

hanzi: 这个城市的人口在持续下降。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì de rén kǒu zài chí xù xià jiàng。
english: There has been a steady decrease in population in this city.

hanzi: 这两间大教室已经分配给我们了.
pinyin: zhè liǎng jiàn dà jiào shì yǐ jīng fēn pèi jǐ wǒ men le.
english: The two large classrooms have been assigned to us.

hanzi: 增加工作不一定需要增添人员。
pinyin: zēng jiā gōng zuò bù yī dìng xū yào zēng tiān rén yuán。
english: More work does not necessarily call for more men.

hanzi: 这家广播电台不播送任何广告。
pinyin: zhè jiā guǎng bō diàn tái bù bō sòng rèn hé guǎng gào。
english: This radio station does not carry any advertising.

hanzi: 他新买的房子是美国初期的建筑。
pinyin: tā xīn mǎi de fáng zi shì Měi guó chū qī de jiàn zhù。
english: The new house he bought was colonial architecture.

hanzi: 这个图书馆星期一至星期六都开放。
pinyin: zhè gè tú shū guǎn xīng qī yī zhì xīng qī liù dōu kāi fàng。
english: The library is open on weekdays only.

hanzi: 我不得不承认他的论据有力.
pinyin: wǒ bù dé bù chéng rèn tā de lùn jù yǒu lì.
english: I was compelled to (ie I had to) acknowledge the force of his argument.

hanzi: 这样的经验才是生活的内在本质。
pinyin: zhè yàng de jīng yàn cái shì shēng huó de nèi zài běn zhì。
english: Such experiences are the very staff of life.

hanzi: 可能对外国口味而言过于朴素了些。
pinyin: kě néng duì wài guó kǒu wèi ér yán guò yú pǔ sù le xiē。
english: May be a little austere for foreign taste.

hanzi: 他的演讲风格是模仿首相的.
pinyin: tā de yǎn jiǎng fēng gé shì mó fǎng shǒu xiàng de.
english: His style of public speaking is imitative of the prime minister.

hanzi: 他的热情给公司注入了新的生命。
pinyin: tā de rè qíng jǐ gōng sī zhù rù le xīn de shēng mìng。
english: His enthusiasm breathed new life into the company.

hanzi: 他们决定明天去田野里打野兔。
pinyin: tā men jué dìng míng tiān qù tián yě lǐ dǎ yě tù。
english: They decide to go potting at rabbits in the field tomorrow.

hanzi: 我必须告诉你，他的耐心是有限的。
pinyin: wǒ bì xū gào su nǐ， tā de nài xīn shì yǒu xiàn de。
english: I must tell you that his patience has its limit.

hanzi: 老师让那个学生用这个字造句。
pinyin: lǎo shī ràng nèi gè xué sheng yòng zhè gè zì zào jù。
english: The pupil was told to make a sentence with this word.

hanzi: 经数月钻探, 在沿海找到了石油.
pinyin: jīng shù yuè zuān tàn,  zài yán hǎi zhǎo dào le shí yóu.
english: After months of drilling, oil was found off the coast.

hanzi: 这幅画上你画的猪鼻子太长了。
pinyin: zhè fú huà shàng nǐ huà de zhū bí zi tài cháng le。
english: The snout of the pig you drew on the picture is too long.

hanzi: 左边的人物有损于画面的效果。
pinyin: zuǒ biān de rén wù yǒu sǔn yú huà miàn de xiào guǒ。
english: The figure on the left spoils the unity of the painting.

hanzi: 他喜欢读伟人传记来提高自己。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan dú wěi rén zhuàn jì lái tí gāo zì jǐ。
english: He likes to read biographies of great men to promote himself.

hanzi: 修理教堂结构的花费非常大。
pinyin: xiū lǐ jiào táng jié gòu de huā fèi fēi cháng dà。
english: The cost of repairing the fabric of the church was very high.

hanzi: 控制工资是政府政策的关键.
pinyin: kòng zhì gōng zī shì zhèng fǔ zhèng cè de guān jiàn.
english: Controlling wages is the linchpin of the Government'spolicies.

hanzi: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收。
pinyin: yǒu xiē shí wù bì lìng yī xiē shí wù róng yì xī shōu。
english: Some foods are assimilated more easily than others.

hanzi: 有些品种的狗尾巴只有退化的部分.
pinyin: yǒu xiē pǐn zhǒng de gǒu wěi ba zhǐ yǒu tuì huà de bù fen.
english: Some breeds of dog have only rudimentary tails.

hanzi: 我父亲决不会同意我们的婚姻的。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn jué bù huì tóng yì wǒ men de hūn yīn de。
english: My father will never give his consent to our marriage.

hanzi: 我正在学习德语，但还说不好。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài xué xí dé yǔ， dàn hái shuō bù hǎo。
english: I'm learning German, but I still can't speak it properly.

hanzi: 国会制定法律，总统执行法律。
pinyin: guó huì zhì dìng fǎ lu:4， zǒng tǒng zhí xíng fǎ lu:4。
english: Congress makes the laws; the President executes them.

hanzi: 我们的改革取得了势不可挡的进展。
pinyin: wǒ men de gǎi gé qǔ dé le shì bù kě dàng de jìn zhǎn。
english: Our reform made an inexorable march of progress.

hanzi: 这方案表面上看来似乎很实际。
pinyin: zhè fāng àn biǎo miàn shàng kàn lai sì hu hěn shí jì。
english: The scheme seems on the surface to be quite practical.

hanzi: 他在职业介绍所登记要当秘书。
pinyin: tā zài zhí yè jiè shào suǒ dēng jì yào dàng mì shū。
english: He enrolled with an employment agency for a secretary.

hanzi: 修理教堂结构的花费非常大。
pinyin: xiū lǐ jiào táng jié gòu de huā fèi fēi cháng dà。
english: The cost of repairing the fabric of the church was very high.

hanzi: 他躺在铺上，身上盖了一大堆毯子。
pinyin: tā tǎng zài pù shàng， shēn shàng gě le yī dà duī tǎn zi。
english: He lay in his bunk under a mound of blankets.

hanzi: 有些上了年纪的人非常喜爱京剧。
pinyin: yǒu xiē shàng le nián jì de rén fēi cháng xǐ ài jīng jù。
english: Some elder people enjoy Beijing opera immensely.

hanzi: 他摇摇头，因为他的想法与此不同。
pinyin: tā yáo yáo tou， yīn wèi tā de xiǎng fǎ yù cǐ bù tóng。
english: He shook his head, for he thought differently.

hanzi: 我给他这一机会，他立刻抓住不放。
pinyin: wǒ jǐ tā zhè yī jī huì， tā lì kè zhuā zhù bù fàng。
english: When I gave him the chance, he grabbed it at once.

hanzi: 有很多日常生活用品是塑料制的.
pinyin: yǒu hěn duō rì cháng shēng huó yòng pǐn shì sù liào zhì de.
english: Many items in daily use are made out of plastic.

hanzi: 我大部分时间都用在观光游览上了.
pinyin: wǒ dà bù fen shí jiān dōu yòng zài guān guāng yóu lǎn shàng le.
english: I spent most of my time (in) sightseeing.

hanzi: 我讨厌的一切都在他身上体现出来了。
pinyin: wǒ tǎo yàn de yī qiè dōu zài tā shēn shàng tǐ xiàn chū lai le。
english: He epitomizes everything I dislike.

hanzi: 每个人都必须遵守这条政府法令。
pinyin: měi gè rén dōu bì xū zūn shǒu zhè tiáo zhèng fǔ fǎ lìng。
english: Everyone should obey the government ordinance.

hanzi: 他们用冲床在金属板上打孔。
pinyin: tā men yòng chòng chuáng zài jīn shǔ bǎn shàng dǎ kǒng。
english: They cut holes on the sheet of metal with a punch press.

hanzi: 铃响以前任何人均不得离开教室。
pinyin: líng xiǎng yǐ qián rèn hé rén jūn bù dé lí kāi jiào shì。
english: No one may leave the classroom until the bell go.

hanzi: 移民到这个国家有严格的限制。
pinyin: yí mín dào zhè gè guó jiā yǒu yán gé de xiàn zhì。
english: There are strict controls on immigration into this country.

hanzi: 该演员与观众建立了密切的关系.
pinyin: gāi yǎn yuán yù guān zhòng jiàn lì le mì qiè de guān xi.
english: The actor developed a close rapport with his audience.

hanzi: 这位老人退休前是警察局长。
pinyin: zhè wèi lǎo rén tuì xiū qián shì jǐng chá jú zhǎng。
english: The old man was a police commissioner before his retirement.

hanzi: 本班男生的平均年龄是十五岁。
pinyin: běn bān nán shēng de píng jūn nián líng shì shí wǔ suì。
english: The average age of the boys in this class is fifteen.

hanzi: 这两块木头已用金属丝捆在一起了。
pinyin: zhè liǎng kuài mù tou yǐ yòng jīn shǔ sī kǔn zài yī qǐ le。
english: The two pieces of wood were wired together.

hanzi: 掌握无限空间的概念是很难的。
pinyin: zhǎng wò wú xiàn kōng jiān de gài niàn shì hěn nàn de。
english: It is difficult to grasp the concept of infinite space.

hanzi: 群众情绪转眼就能发生变化.
pinyin: qún zhòng qíng xù zhuǎn yǎn jiù néng fā shēng biàn huà.
english: The mood of the crowd can change in the twinkling of an eye.

hanzi: 敌人在一场决定性的战斗中被击败.
pinyin: dí rén zài yī chǎng jué dìng xìng de zhàn dòu zhòng bèi jī bài.
english: The enemy was defeated in a decisive battle.

hanzi: 她说她再也不愿进入那所房子了。
pinyin: tā shuō tā zài yě bù yuàn jìn rù nà suǒ fáng zi le。
english: She said she would never set foot in that house again.

hanzi: 他连忙接受了我提供的东西或办法等。
pinyin: tā lián máng jiē shòu le wǒ tí gōng de dōng xi huò bàn fǎ děng。
english: He snapped at the offer I made him.

hanzi: 她探身去取放在餐桌对面的黄油。
pinyin: tā tàn shēn qù qǔ fàng zài cān zhuō duì miàn de huáng yóu。
english: She stretched across the table for the butter.

hanzi: 他们断言这个女孩子读了不少书。
pinyin: tā men duàn yán zhè gè nu:3 hái zi dú le bù shǎo shū。
english: They affirmed that the girl did quite a bit of reading.

hanzi: 舞台灯光产生月夜景色的效果.
pinyin: wǔ tái dēng guāng chǎn shēng yuè yè jǐng shǎi de xiào guǒ.
english: The stage lighting gives the effect of a moonlit scene.

hanzi: 前途光明的表示名望或成功的希望的
pinyin: qián tú guāng míng de biǎo shì míng wàng huò chéng gōng de xī wàng de
english: Showing promise of fame or success.

hanzi: 他对他的新制度提出过分的要求。
pinyin: tā duì tā de xīn zhì dù tí chū guò fèn de yāo qiú。
english: He makes the most extravagant claims for his new system.

hanzi: 那件大衣看来是绝对旧得穿不出去了.
pinyin: nà jiàn dà yī kàn lai shì jué duì jiù de chuān bù chū qù le.
english: That overcoat is looking decidedly past it.

hanzi: 她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
pinyin: tā bǎo chí zhuó zhǎng jù lí yóu yǒng de shì jiè jì lù。
english: She holds the world record for long distance swimming.

hanzi: 她随和的个性使她能与任何人相处。
pinyin: tā suí he de gè xìng shǐ tā néng yù rèn hé rén xiāng chǔ。
english: Her facile nature adapted itself to any company.

hanzi: 我说不好他的生意是否全部合法。
pinyin: wǒ shuō bù hǎo tā de shēng yi shì fǒu quán bù hé fǎ。
english: I'm not sure that his business is strictly legitimate.

hanzi: 这些生物生活在太平洋的海底。
pinyin: zhè xie shēng wù shēng huó zài tài píng yáng de hǎi dǐ。
english: These creatures live in the depth of the Pacific Ocean.

hanzi: 最后他终于成功地解决了这个问题。
pinyin: zuì hòu tā zhōng yú chéng gōng de jiě jué le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: At last he successfully solved the problem.

hanzi: 这种药使用过量会损害肝脏.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yào shǐ yòng guò liàng kuài sǔn hài gān zàng.
english: Excessive dosage of this drug can result in injury to the liver.

hanzi: 没多久，哈里就跟在我们背后跑来了。
pinyin: mò duō jiǔ， hǎ lǐ jiù gēn zài wǒ men bèi hòu pǎo lái le。
english: Before long Harry came running behind us.

hanzi: 这家饭店除星期一外, 每天都营业.
pinyin: zhè jiā fàn diàn chú xīng qī yī wài,  měi tiān dōu yíng yè.
english: The restaurant is open every day except Monday.

hanzi: 我们已经尽了一切可能来赶上他们。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng jìn le yī qiè kě néng lái gǎn shàng tā men。
english: We have done all we could to catch up with them.

hanzi: 近来差不多样样东西都涨价。
pinyin: jìn lái cī bù duō yàng yàng dōng xi dōu zhàng jià。
english: In recent times the price of just about everything has gone up.

hanzi: 不怎么想去，我并不大喜欢看电影。
pinyin: bù zěn me xiǎng qù， wǒ bìng bù dà xǐ huān kàn diàn yǐng。
english: Not really. I am not very fond of the cinema.

hanzi: 他爸爸坚持他们应该搬到乡下。
pinyin: tā bà ba jiān chí tā men yīng gāi bān dào xiāng xià。
english: His father insisted that they (should) move to the country.

hanzi: 他在街上向我亲切地挥手致意.
pinyin: tā zài jiē shàng xiàng wǒ qīn qiè de huī shǒu zhì yì.
english: He greeted me in the street with a friendly wave of the hand.

hanzi: 那些出席者中有首相及其丈夫.
pinyin: nà xiē chū xí zhě zhòng yǒu shǒu xiàng jí qí zhàng fu.
english: Among those present were the Prime Minister and her husband.

hanzi: 哎呀，我把毛活儿落在公共汽车上了。
pinyin: āi yā， wǒ bǎ máo huór luò zài gōng gòng qì chē shàng le。
english: Oh dear, I've left my knitting on the bus!

hanzi: 她给学会作了一次有关哲学的讲话.
pinyin: tā jǐ xué huì zuò le yī cì yǒu guān zhé xué de jiǎng huà.
english: She delivered a talk on philosophy to the society.

hanzi: 明年将要修建一条超级高速公路。
pinyin: míng nián jiāng yào xiū jiàn yī tiáo chāo jí gāo sù gōng lù。
english: A superhighway will be constructed next year.

hanzi: 她以自己的名义支持这一崇高的事业。
pinyin: tā yǐ zì jǐ de míng yì zhī chí zhè yī chóng gāo de shì yè。
english: She has lent her name to the lofty cause.

hanzi: 我拿起了那把刀，把它扔到了窗外。
pinyin: wǒ ná qǐ le nà bǎ dāo， bǎ tā rēng dào le chuāng wài。
english: I picked up the knife and threw it out of the window.

hanzi: 有前面那个人挡著, 我看不见球赛.
pinyin: yǒu qián mian nèi gè rén dàng著,  wǒ kàn bù jiàn qiú sài.
english: The man in front was obstructing my view of the pitch.

hanzi: 那位老太太从一段楼梯上摔了下来。
pinyin: nà wèi lǎo tài tai zòng yī duàn lóu tī shàng shuāi le xia lai。
english: The old woman fell down a flight of stairs.

hanzi: 不论你到哪里，语言几乎是相同的。
pinyin: bù lùn nǐ dào nǎ li， yǔ yán jī hū shì xiāng tóng de。
english: The language is almost the same wherever one goes.

hanzi: 我们鼓励他坚持自己对此事的看法。
pinyin: wǒ men gǔ lì tā jiān chí zì jǐ duì cǐ shì de kàn fǎ。
english: We encouraged him to assert his view of the matter.

hanzi: 那只鸟飞了过去, 翅膀发出呼呼的声音.
pinyin: nà zhǐ niǎo fēi le guò qu,  chì bǎng fā chū hū hū de shēng yīn.
english: The bird flew past, its wings whirring.

hanzi: 有一点是肯定的, 你再也不能行走了.
pinyin: yǒu yī diǎn shì kěn dìng de,  nǐ zài yě bù néng xíng zǒu le.
english: This much is certain, you will never walk again.

hanzi: 她在这一切不幸中表现得很坚强。
pinyin: tā zài zhè yī qiè bù xìng zhòng biǎo xiàn de hěn jiān qiáng。
english: She bore up well against all these misfortunes.

hanzi: 医术，医业，医学有关医学的技术和专业
pinyin: yī zhú， yī yè， yī xué yǒu guān yī xué de jì shù huò zhuān yè
english: The art or profession of medicine.

hanzi: 他认为，美国应保持超然态度。
pinyin: tā rèn wéi， Měi guó yìng bǎo chí chāo rán tài du。
english: The United States should, he argues, attempt to remain aloof.

hanzi: 我毫无保留地认为他说的是实话。
pinyin: wǒ háo wú bǎo liú de rèn wéi tā shuō de shì shí huà。
english: I accepted without reservation what he had said as true.

hanzi: 你如果不停止吃糖，你就不要吃饭。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ bù tíng zhǐ jí táng， nǐ jiù bù yào chī fàn。
english: Stop eating sweets, or you won't get any dinner.

hanzi: 政府不允许报道那起严重事故。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ bù yǔn xǔ bào dào nà qǐ yán zhòng shì gù。
english: The government didn't allow reporting the terrible accident.

hanzi: 那强盗以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。
pinyin: nà qiáng dào yǐ dāo cì chuān le nà lu:3 kè de xiōng bù。
english: The robber thrust his sword through the traveler's bosom.

hanzi: 被压迫的人民，在政变之后获得自由。
pinyin: bèi yā pò de rén mín， zài zhèng biàn zhī hòu huò dé zì yóu。
english: The oppressed were free after the coup.

hanzi: 把发生的事情尽可能仔细地回忆一下.
pinyin: bǎ fā shēng de shì qing jìn kě néng zǐ xì de huí yì yī xià.
english: Try to recall (to mind) exactly what happened.

hanzi: 她戴上墨镜以防强光的照射。
pinyin: tā dài shàng mò jìng yǐ fáng qiáng guāng de zhào shè。
english: She put on dark glasses as a protection against the strong light.

hanzi: 那位政治家曾是著名的社会改革家。
pinyin: nà wèi zhèng zhì jiā zēng shì著 míng de shè huì gǎi gé jiā。
english: The politician was a famous social reformer.

hanzi: 要不是报纸，我们都赶不上时代了。
pinyin: yào bu shì bào zhǐ， wǒ men dōu gǎn bù shàng shí dài le。
english: Without newspaper, we would get behind the times.

hanzi: 我毫无保留地认为他说的是实话。
pinyin: wǒ háo wú bǎo liú de rèn wéi tā shuō de shì shí huà。
english: I accepted without reservation what he had said as true.

hanzi: 为独立而斗争的势头日益增长。
pinyin: wèi dú lì ér dòu zhēng de shì tóu rì yì zēng zhǎng。
english: The struggle for independence is gaining momentum every day.

hanzi: 我连移动双脚的力气都几乎没有了。
pinyin: wǒ lián yí dòng shuāng jué de lì qi dōu jī hū méi yǒu le。
english: I have hardly enough strength left to move my feet.

hanzi: 我们的目标是进一步加强贸易关系。
pinyin: wǒ men de mù biāo shì jìn yí bù jiā qiáng mào yì guān xi。
english: Our object is to further cement trade relations.

hanzi: 别拿她的话当真--她不过是逗弄人.
pinyin: biè ná tā de huà dàng zhēn-- tā bù guò shì dòu nòng rén.
english: Don't take what she said seriously she was only teasing.

hanzi: 这条新的公路一直延伸到我们村庄。
pinyin: zhè tiáo xīn de gōng lù yī zhí yán shēn dào wǒ men cūn zhuāng。
english: The new road reaches as far as our village.

hanzi: 他举了具体的例子才把论点讲透彻。
pinyin: tā jǔ le jù tǐ de lì zi cái bǎ lùn diǎn jiǎng tòu chè。
english: He drove home his point by citing specific examples.

hanzi: 咱们定好下次会议的时间和地点吧.
pinyin: zán men dìng hào xià cì huì yì de shí jiān huò dì diǎn ba.
english: Let's arrange a time and place for our next meeting.

hanzi: 这两所学校一向有密切联系.
pinyin: zhè liǎng suǒ xué xiào yí xiàng yǒu mì qiè lián xì.
english: There has always been a close association between these two schools.

hanzi: 这个报道与我们昨天听到的有矛盾。
pinyin: zhè gè bào dào yù wǒ men zuó tiān tīng dào de yǒu máo dùn。
english: The report contradicts what we heard yesterday.

hanzi: 我们不得不把汽车拖到最近的修车厂。
pinyin: wǒ men bù dé bù bǎ qì chē tuō dào zuì jìn de xiū jū chǎng。
english: We have to tow that car to the nearest garage.

hanzi: 他总的健康状况相当令人满意。
pinyin: tā zǒng de jiàn kāng zhuàng kuàng xiāng dāng lìng rén mǎn yì。
english: His general state of health is fairly satisfactory.

hanzi: 这个地方使人回忆起许多生动的往事。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang shǐ rén huí yì qǐ xǔ duō shēng dòng de wǎng shì。
english: This place conjures up vivid memories.

hanzi: 他总的健康状况相当令人满意。
pinyin: tā zǒng de jiàn kāng zhuàng kuàng xiāng dāng lìng rén mǎn yì。
english: His general state of health is fairly satisfactory.

hanzi: 详细的资料可从我们的总部得到。
pinyin: xiáng xì de zī liào kě zòng wǒ men de zǒng bù dé dào。
english: Further information can be obtained from our head office.

hanzi: 这房间就其高度的比例而言是很宽的.
pinyin: zhè fáng jiān jiù qí gāo dù de bǐ lì ér yán shì hěn kuān de.
english: The room is wide in proportion to its height.

hanzi: 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。
pinyin: běn shì jì wǒ men yǐ jīng jīng lì le liǎng cì shì jiè dà zhàn。
english: We have had two world wars in this century.

hanzi: 五岁以下的儿童乘火车通常免费。
pinyin: wǔ suì yǐ xià de ér tóng chéng huǒ chē tōng cháng miǎn fèi。
english: Children under five usually travel free on trains.

hanzi: 拥有世界冠军是我们每个公民的骄傲。
pinyin: yōng yǒu shì jiè guàn jūn shì wǒ men měi gè gōng mín de jiāo ào。
english: It's a civic pride to have a champion.

hanzi: 在中世纪, 哲学与神学是不分的.
pinyin: zài zhòng shì jì,  zhé xué yù shén xué shì bù fēn de.
english: In the Middle Ages, philosophy and theology were inextricable.

hanzi: 他刚刚四十岁时，头发就变得灰白了。
pinyin: tā gāng gang sì shí suì shí， tóu fa jiù biàn de huī bái le。
english: His hair became gray when he was only forty.

hanzi: 人们常说女人比男人更富于感情。
pinyin: rén men cháng shuō nu:3 rén bì nán rén gèng fù yú gǎn qíng。
english: Women are often said to be more emotional than men.

hanzi: 我们不知道这些鸟如何找到它们的路。
pinyin: wǒ men bù zhī dào zhè xie niǎo rú hé zhǎo dào tā men de lù。
english: We have no idea how the birds find their way.

hanzi: 他们的研究项目实用价值很有限。
pinyin: tā men de yán jiū xiàng mù shí yòng jià zhí hěn yǒu xiàn。
english: Their research project has limited practical utility.

hanzi: 两国总理的会谈将于下月举行。
pinyin: liǎng guó zǒng lǐ de huì tán jiàng yú xià yuè jǔ xíng。
english: The talks between the two premiers will be held next month.

hanzi: 他总提心吊胆的，担心被人发现。
pinyin: tā zǒng tí xīn diào dǎn de， dān xīn bèi rén fā xiàn。
english: The fear of being discovered was his constant companion.

hanzi: 她和他们打招呼时亲切地直呼其名.
pinyin: tā huò tā men dǎ zhāo hu shí qīn qiè de zhí hū qí míng.
english: She greeted them by their first names in a familiar way.

hanzi: 街上挂起了旗子，庆祝皇室婚礼。
pinyin: jiē shàng guà qǐ le qí zi， qìng zhù huáng shì hūn lǐ。
english: The streets were flagged to celebrate the royal wedding.

hanzi: 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。
pinyin: běn shì jì wǒ men yǐ jīng jīng lì le liǎng cì shì jiè dà zhàn。
english: We have had two world wars in this century.

hanzi: 印度向许多国家出口茶叶和棉花.
pinyin: Yìn dù xiàng xǔ duō guó jiā chū kǒu chá yè huò mián hua.
english: India exports tea and cotton to many different countries.

hanzi: 他那热情的样子并没把我们欺骗多久.
pinyin: tā nà rè qíng de yàng zi bìng mò bǎ wǒ men qī piàn duō jiǔ.
english: His friendly manner did not deceive us for long.

hanzi: 人们常说女人比男人更富于感情。
pinyin: rén men cháng shuō nu:3 rén bì nán rén gèng fù yú gǎn qíng。
english: Women are often said to be more emotional than men.

hanzi: 我通过职业介绍所找到了这份工作。
pinyin: wǒ tōng guò zhí yè jiè shào suǒ zhǎo dào le zhè fèn gōng zuò。
english: I got this job through an employment agency.

hanzi: 他老是把钱借给她，心肠也太软了。
pinyin: tā lǎo shi bǎ qián jiè jǐ tā， xīn cháng yě tài ruǎn le。
english: He's always lending her money; he's too soft-hearted.

hanzi: 他们看见了灯塔发出一闪一灭的光。
pinyin: tā men kàn jiàn le dēng tǎ fā chū yī shǎn yī miè de guāng。
english: They saw the intermittent flashes from a lighthouse.

hanzi: 他们的研究项目实用价值很有限。
pinyin: tā men de yán jiū xiàng mù shí yòng jià zhí hěn yǒu xiàn。
english: Their research project has limited practical utility.

hanzi: 他们扬言要一下子取消整个项目.
pinyin: tā men yáng yán yào yí xià zi qǔ xiāo zhěng gè xiàng mù.
english: They threatened to cancel the whole project at a stroke.

hanzi: 她最喜爱的运动是滑雪, 其次是冰球.
pinyin: tā zuì xǐ ài de yùn dòng shì huá xuě,  qí cì shì bīng qiú.
english: Next to skiing her favourite sport was ice-hockey.

hanzi: 这个超市附近有一个地下停车场。
pinyin: zhè gè chāo shì fù jìn yǒu yī gè dì xià tíng chē chǎng。
english: There is an underground car park near the supermarket.

hanzi: 随着太阳的落下，夜晚悄悄地来到。
pinyin: suí zhe tài yáng de luò xià， yè wǎn qiāo qiāo de lái dào。
english: With the setting of the sun, night comes silently.

hanzi: 那强盗以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。
pinyin: nà qiáng dào yǐ dāo cì chuān le nà lu:3 kè de xiōng bù。
english: The robber thrust his sword through the traveler's bosom.

hanzi: 工人们已经表明反对这些方案.
pinyin: gōng rén men yǐ jīng biǎo míng fǎn duì zhè xie fāng àn.
english: Workers have already demonstrated their opposition to the plans.

hanzi: 他的勇敢应作为我们大家学习的榜样.
pinyin: tā de yǒng gǎn yìng zuò wéi wǒ men dà jiā xué xí de bǎng yàng.
english: His bravery should be an example to all of us.

hanzi: 海关官员根本没检查我们的行李。
pinyin: hǎi guān guān yuán gēn běn mò jiǎn chá wǒ men de xíng li。
english: The Customs officer didn't bother to check our luggage.

hanzi: 我们的副经理是公司的实际负责人。
pinyin: wǒ men de fù jīng lǐ shì gōng sī de shí jì fù zé rén。
english: Our deputy manager is the virtual head of the business.

hanzi: 我每天至少要把厨房地板擦洗一次。
pinyin: wǒ měi tiān zhì shǎo yào bǎ chú fáng dì bǎn cā xǐ yī cì。
english: I have to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.

hanzi: 我们的目标是进一步加强贸易关系。
pinyin: wǒ men de mù biāo shì jìn yí bù jiā qiáng mào yì guān xi。
english: Our object is to further cement trade relations.

hanzi: 我修改一下计划以便和你的计划相适应.
pinyin: wǒ xiū gǎi yī xià jì huà yǐ biàn huò nǐ de jì huà xiàng shì yìng.
english: I will accommodate my plans to yours.

hanzi: 他们在郊区从一家钢铁厂前面经过。
pinyin: tā men zài jiāo qū zòng yī jiā gāng tiě chǎng qián mian jīng guò。
english: On the outskirts they passed a steel mill.

hanzi: 这个司机是个不遵守速度限制的人。
pinyin: zhè gè sī jī shì gè bù zūn shǒu sù dù xiàn zhì de rén。
english: The driver is a poor observer of speed restrictions.

hanzi: 我所有的业余时间都用在诗歌阅读上。
pinyin: wǒ suǒ yǒu de yè yú shí jiān dōu yòng zài shī gē yuè dú shàng。
english: I spent all my spare time reading poetry.

hanzi: 首席书记官某些法院中的最高书记官
pinyin: shǒu xí shū ji guān mǒu xiē fǎ yuàn zhòng dì zuì gāo shū ji guān
english: The principal clerk in certain courts of law.

hanzi: 我们爬到山顶时, 看到了优美的景色.
pinyin: wǒ men pá dào shān dǐng shí,  kàn dào le yōu měi de jǐng sè.
english: When we finally topped the hill we had a fine view.

hanzi: 这本书未经作者许可就给翻译了。
pinyin: zhè běn shū wèi jīng zuó zhě xǔ kě jiù jǐ fān yì le。
english: The book was translated without the sanction of the author.

hanzi: 这就是兴趣与技能是有区别的。
pinyin: zhè jiù shì xìng qu yù jì néng shì yǒu qū bié de。
english: The point is there is a difference between an interest and a skill.

hanzi: 从他的口音判断，他一定是南方人。
pinyin: zòng tā de kǒu yīn pàn duàn， tā yī dìng shì nán fāng rén。
english: Judging by his accent, he must be from the South.

hanzi: 他到了渡口，却发现渡船在对岸。
pinyin: tā dào le dù kǒu， què fā xiàn dù chuán zài duì àn。
english: He went down to the ferry but found the boat on the other side.

hanzi: 没料到，他对这件事的反应是这样的。
pinyin: mò liào dào， tā duì zhè jiàn shì de fǎn yìng shì zhè yàng de。
english: His reaction on this matter is unexpected.

hanzi: 他吩咐他到外面跑跑去寻找新的顾客。
pinyin: tā fēn fù tā dào wài mian pǎo pǎo qù xún zhǎo xīn de gù kè。
english: He tells him to go out and find new customer.

hanzi: 联合国大会是一种世界性的集会。
pinyin: lián hé guó dà huì shì yī zhòng shì jiè xìng de jí huì。
english: The United Nations assembly is a cosmopolitan gathering.

hanzi: 我假期在宾馆里干活儿，当服务员。
pinyin: wǒ jià qī zài bīn guǎn lǐ gàn huó r， dàng fú wù yuán。
english: I got holiday jobs in guesthouses, waiting on tables.

hanzi: 只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu yī gè rén néng zuò zhè xiàng gōng zuò， nà jiù shì nǐ。
english: Only one person can do the job, namely you.

hanzi: 或许这些营养品对你的健康有帮助。
pinyin: huò xǔ zhè xie yíng yǎng pǐn duì nǐ de jiàn kāng yǒu bāng zhù。
english: Maybe these nutrients are helpful to your health.

hanzi: 这家旅馆为旅客提供订票服务。
pinyin: zhè jiā lu:3 guǎn wèi lu:3 kè tí gōng dìng piào fú wù。
english: The hotel provides a reservation of tickets for its residents.

hanzi: 他在结婚之前曾向四个姑娘求过婚。
pinyin: tā zài jié hūn zhī qián zēng xiàng sì gè gū niang qiú guò hūn。
english: He wooed four girls before finally marrying one.

hanzi: 在我看来，我们会再次考试不及格的。
pinyin: zài wǒ kàn lai， wǒ men kuài zài cì kǎo shì bù jí gé de。
english: It seems to me that we'll again fail in the exam.

hanzi: 市民们进行突击，试图冲破包围。
pinyin: shì mín men jìn xíng tū jī， shì tú chōng pò bāo wéi。
english: The citizens sallied out in an attempt to break the siege.

hanzi: 我设法自立而不求助于我的父母。
pinyin: wǒ shè fǎ zì lì ér bù qiú zhù yú wǒ de fù mǔ。
english: I tried to stand on my own two feet rather than turned to my parents.

hanzi: 我跟太太争论有关家庭费用的问题。
pinyin: wǒ gēn tài tai zhēng lùn yǒu guān jiā tíng fèi yòng de wèn tí。
english: I disputed with my wife on household expenses.

hanzi: 咱们不要在现阶段著手处理具体问题。
pinyin: zán men bù yào zài xiàn jiē duàn著 shǒu chǔ lǐ jù tǐ wèn tí。
english: Let's not enter into details at this stage.

hanzi: 让我们继续讨论议程上的下一个项目。
pinyin: ràng wǒ men jì xù tǎo lùn yì chéng shàng de xià yī gè xiàng mù。
english: Let us go on to the next item on the agenda.

hanzi: 这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的。
pinyin: zhè xie yǒng gǎn de shì bīng kuài bǎo wèi wǒ men de guó jiā de。
english: These gallant soldiers will protect our country.

hanzi: 党向工会大会致以亲切的问候。
pinyin: dǎng xiàng gōng huì dà huì zhì yǐ qīn qiè de wèn hòu。
english: The party sent its fraternal greetings to the trade union meeting.

hanzi: 共同的利益把这两人联系到一起。
pinyin: gòng tóng de lì yì bǎ zhè liǎng rén lián xì dào yī qǐ。
english: me in strength but Common interest brings these two together.

hanzi: 你不应该硬是反对各种进步形式.
pinyin: nǐ bù yīng gāi yìng shì fǎn duì gè zhǒng jìn bù xíng shì.
english: You shouldn't set your face against all forms of progress.

hanzi: 我不能再忍受他那傲慢无礼的行为了。
pinyin: wǒ bù néng zài rěn shòu tā nà ào màn wú lǐ de xíng wéi le。
english: I could not endure the insolence of his behaviour.

hanzi: 大家认为最好暂时放弃这个想法。
pinyin: dà jiā rèn wéi zuì hǎo zàn shí fàng qì zhè gè xiǎng fǎ。
english: It was thought best to drop the idea for the time being.

hanzi: 他的妻子知道在他生气时怎么对付他。
pinyin: tā de qī zi zhī dào zài tā shēng qì shí zěn me duì fu tā。
english: His wife knows how to manage him when he is angry.

hanzi: 最近有关离婚的电视剧太多了。
pinyin: zuì jìn yǒu guān lí hūn de diàn shì jù tài duō le。
english: There has been a surfeit of plays about divorce on the TV recently.

hanzi: 遭遇海难的水手已经被直升机救起。
pinyin: zāo yù hǎi nàn de shuǐ shǒu yǐ jīng bèi zhí shēng jī jiù qǐ。
english: The shipwrecked sailors were rescued by helicopter.

hanzi: 附近没有酒店, 至少据我所知没有.
pinyin: fù jìn méi yǒu jiǔ diàn,  zhì shǎo jù wǒ suǒ zhī méi yǒu.
english: There's no pub round here, leastways not that I know of.

hanzi: 你不能回避在这一事件中的责任。
pinyin: nǐ bù néng huí bì zài zhè yī shì jiàn zhòng dì zé rèn。
english: You can't retreat from the responsibility in this affair.

hanzi: 他病得非常厉害，不大可能恢复健康了。
pinyin: tā bìng de fēi cháng lì hai， bú dà kě néng huī fù jiàn kāng le。
english: He is very ill and unlikely to recover.

hanzi: 直到太阳从东方升起，我们才出发。
pinyin: zhí dào tài yáng zòng dōng fāng shēng qǐ， wǒ men cái chū fā。
english: We did not start until the sun rose in the east.

hanzi: 选举之后，该党的党员所剩无几了。
pinyin: xuǎn jǔ zhī hòu， gāi dǎng de dǎng yuán suǒ shèng wú jǐ le。
english: After the election the party was reduced to a rump.

hanzi: 参赛者中包括三名世界记录保持者。
pinyin: shēn sài zhě zhòng bāo kuò sān míng shì jiè jì lù bǎo chí zhě。
english: The field includes three world record holders.

hanzi: 建筑费用涨到高达新台币两千万。
pinyin: jiàn zhù fèi yòng zhàng dào gāo dá xīn Tái bì liǎng qiān wàn。
english: Building costs ran up to as much as NT$ 20 million.

hanzi: 这种新飞机正在接受安全性能检验。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn fēi jī zhèng zài jiē shòu ān quán xìng néng jiǎn yàn。
english: The new aircraft is undergoing safety tests.

hanzi: 错过这么好的一次机会他有点后悔。
pinyin: cuò guò zhè me hǎo de yī cì jī huì tā yǒu diǎn hòu huǐ。
english: He repented in a measure of missing such a good chance.

hanzi: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收.
pinyin: yǒu xiē shí wù bì lìng yī xiē shí wù róng yì xī shōu.
english: Some foods assimilate/ are assimilated more easily than others.

hanzi: 他好容易找到一家餐馆去填饱肚子。
pinyin: tā hào róng yì zhǎo dào yī jiā cān guǎn qù tián bǎo dù zi。
english: He hunted up a restaurant to appease his hunger.

hanzi: 我们对医生这样对待我们感到不满。
pinyin: wǒ men duì yī shēng zhè yàng duì dài wǒ men gǎn dào bù mǎn。
english: We are unhappy about the way the doctor treated us.

hanzi: 他似乎没有意识到形势的严重性。
pinyin: tā sì hu méi yǒu yì shí dào xíng shì de yán zhòng xìng。
english: He doesn't seem to understand the gravity of the situation.

hanzi: 他所受的教育使他能胜任那个职位。
pinyin: tā suǒ shòu de jiào yù shǐ tā néng shèng rèn nèi gè zhí wèi。
english: The education he has received fits him for the post.

hanzi: 既然你坚持，我就只好修改信用证。
pinyin: jì rán nǐ jiān chí， wǒ jiù zhǐ hǎo xiū gǎi xìn yòng zhèng。
english: Since you insist, I must amend the letter of credit.

hanzi: 他的父亲规定他要用英文写日记。
pinyin: tā de fù qīn guī dìng tā yào yòng Yīng wén xiě rì jì。
english: His father ordered that he (should) keep a diary in English.

hanzi: 我女儿喜欢给我讲她那些奇怪的梦。
pinyin: wǒ nu:3 ér xǐ huan jǐ wǒ jiǎng tā nà xiē qí guài de mèng。
english: My daughter likes to describe her fantastic dreams to me.

hanzi: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.
pinyin: tā de huó po yù xìng gāo cài liè de qíng xù bǎ tā mí zhù le.
english: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.

hanzi: 除掉金星以外其他的星星全都消失了。
pinyin: chú diào jīn xīng yǐ wài qí tā de xīng xing quán dōu xiāo shī le。
english: All but the morning star have disappeared.

hanzi: 根据表面现象看问题有时是不可取的。
pinyin: gēn jù biǎo miàn xiàn xiàng kàn wèn tí yǒu shí shì bù kě qǔ de。
english: It's not always wise to go by appearances.

hanzi: 他的脚在一块碎玻璃上划了一个大口子。
pinyin: tā de jué zài yī kuài suì bō li shàng huà le yī gè dà kǒu zi。
english: He gashed his foot on a piece of broken glass.

hanzi: 我再也不想到这个糟糕的地方来了.
pinyin: wǒ zài yě bù xiǎng dào zhè gè zāo gāo de dì fang lái le.
english: I have no intention of coming to this terrible place again!

hanzi: 我负担不起带花园的大房子的维护费.
pinyin: wǒ fù dān bù qǐ dài huā yuán de dà fáng zi de wéi hù fèi.
english: I can't afford the upkeep of a large house and garden.

hanzi: 根据表面现象看问题有时是不可取的。
pinyin: gēn jù biǎo miàn xiàn xiàng kàn wèn tí yǒu shí shì bù kě qǔ de。
english: It's not always wise to go by appearances.

hanzi: 这一切误会都是他在无意中造成的.
pinyin: zhè yī qiè wù huì dōu shì tā zài wú yì zhòng zào chéng de.
english: He was the unknowing cause of all the misunderstanding.

hanzi: 马克曾在密西西比河上当过领航员。
pinyin: mǎ kè zēng zài mì xī xī bì hé shàng dàng guò lǐng háng yuán。
english: Mark used to be a pilot on the Mississippi River.

hanzi: 寒冷的冬天，我们不得不穿毛织品。
pinyin: hán lěng de dōng tiān， wǒ men bù dé bù chuān máo zhī pǐn。
english: We have to wear woolen clothes in the cold winter.

hanzi: 俱乐部的成员限定在三十岁以下。
pinyin: jù yuè bù de chéng yuán xiàn dìng zài sān shí suì yǐ xià。
english: Membership in this club is restricted to man under 30.

hanzi: 这次争论没有引起公众丝毫的兴趣。
pinyin: zhè cì zhēng lùn méi yǒu yǐn qǐ gōng zhòng sī háo de xìng qu。
english: The debate aroused not a speck of public interest.

hanzi: 电视塔明显地是我国最大的建筑。
pinyin: diàn shì tǎ míng xiǎn de shì wǒ guó zuì dà de jiàn zhù。
english: The TV tower is by far the largest construction of our country.

hanzi: 这种小麦可以在寒冷的春天生长。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xiǎo mài kě yǐ zài hán lěng de chūn tiān shēng zhǎng。
english: This strain of wheat can grow during a cold spring.

hanzi: 只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu yī gè rén néng zuò zhè xiàng gōng zuò， nà jiù shì nǐ。
english: Only one person can do the job, namely you.

hanzi: 政府对工会表现得越来越不耐烦。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì gōng huì biǎo xiàn de yuè lái yuè bù nài fán。
english: The governments showed growing impatience at the unions.

hanzi: 我想征求一下你对这个计划的建议。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng zhēng qiú yī xià nǐ duì zhè gè jì huà de jiàn yì。
english: I should like to ask for your advice about the plan?

hanzi: 高速公路多已取代了普通公路.
pinyin: gāo sù gōng lù duō yǐ qǔ dài le pǔ tōng gōng lù.
english: Motorways have largely superseded ordinary roads for long-distance travel.

hanzi: 孩子们表演完后，大人们鼓掌。
pinyin: hái zi men biǎo yǎn wán hòu， dà ren men gǔ zhǎng。
english: The grown-ups applauded after the children had finished their performance.

hanzi: 我相信礼貌对大家是很重要的。
pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn lǐ mào duì dà jiā shì hěn zhòng yào de。
english: It is my belief that good manners are very important to everybody.

hanzi: 我答应一定完好无损地还你的自行车。
pinyin: wǒ dā ying yī dìng wán hǎo wú sǔn de huán nǐ de zì xíng chē。
english: I promise to return your bicycle on good condition.

hanzi: 毕业前，我们会接受一些职业训练。
pinyin: bì yè qián， wǒ men kuài jiē shòu yī xiē zhí yè xùn liàn。
english: We will have some vocational training before graduation.

hanzi: 人们误以为选修语言课程较轻松“
pinyin: rén men wù yǐ wéi xuǎn xiū yǔ yán kè chéng jiào qīng sōng“
english: Language courses are wrongly thought to be soft options.

hanzi: 对我来说，拥有一辆汽车的花费太大。
pinyin: duì wǒ lái shuō， yōng yǒu yī liàng qì chē de huā fèi tài dà。
english: It's too much of an expense for me to own a car.

hanzi: 不要责骂这孩子, 他过了那一阵就会好的.
pinyin: bù yào zé mà zhè hái zi,  tā guò le nà yī zhèn jiù kuài hǎo de.
english: Don't scold the boy; he'll come round in time.

hanzi: 他以为她爱上他，但只是梦想而已。
pinyin: tā yǐ wéi tā ài shàng tā， dàn zhǐ shì mèng xiǎng ér yǐ。
english: He thinks she is in love with him, but it's only a dream.

hanzi: 那孩子翻著跟头从体育馆这头翻到那头.
pinyin: nà hái zi fān著 gēn tou zòng tǐ yù guǎn zhè tou fān dào nà tou.
english: The child somersaulted across the gymnasium.

hanzi: 我们发现可折叠的桌子使用非常方便。
pinyin: wǒ men fā xiàn kě zhé dié de zhuō zi shǐ yòng fēi cháng fāng biàn。
english: We find our folding table a great convenience.

hanzi: 共同的利益把这两人联系到一起。
pinyin: gòng tóng de lì yì bǎ zhè liǎng rén lián xì dào yī qǐ。
english: me in strength but Common interest brings these two together.

hanzi: 共同的利益把这两人联系到一起。
pinyin: gòng tóng de lì yì bǎ zhè liǎng rén lián xì dào yī qǐ。
english: me in strength but Common interest brings these two together.

hanzi: 公司答应给工人增加工资.
pinyin: gōng sī dā ying jǐ gōng rén zēng jiā gōng zī.
english: The firm promised a wage increase to the workers/promised the workers a wage increase.

hanzi: 影片中的声音必须与动作配合一致.
pinyin: yǐng piàn zhòng dì shēng yīn bì xū yù dòng zuò pèi hé yī zhì.
english: The sound on a film must synchronize with the action.

hanzi: 几乎所有的成员都同意这项提议。
pinyin: jī hū suǒ yǒu de chéng yuán dōu tóng yì zhè xiàng tí yì。
english: Virtually all the members were in agreement with the proposal.

hanzi: 这些东西的区别只是大小不同而实质一样.
pinyin: zhè xie dōng xi de qū bié zhǐ shì dà xiǎo bù tóng ér shí zhì yí yàng.
english: They differ in size but not in kind.

hanzi: 能和你在一起对我是件极为安慰的事。
pinyin: néng huò nǐ zài yī qǐ duì wǒ shì jiàn jí wéi ān wèi de shì。
english: Your company has been a great consolation to me.

hanzi: 他们在经济危机时遭受了巨大的损失。
pinyin: tā men zài jīng jì wēi jī shí zāo shòu le jù dà de sǔn shī。
english: They suffered huge losses in the financial crisis.

hanzi: 在我看来，你跟他都没有达到标准。
pinyin: zài wǒ kàn lai， nǐ gēn tā dōu méi yǒu dá dào biāo zhǔn。
english: In my opinion, neither you nor he has met the standard.

hanzi: 在中国，山区农民在梯田上种水稻。
pinyin: zài Zhōng guó， shān qū nóng mín zài tī tián shàng zhòng shuǐ dào。
english: In China hill farmers grow rice on terraces.

hanzi: 我们的炮火控制了通往市区的各条道路。
pinyin: wǒ men de pào huǒ kòng zhì le tōng wàng shì qū de gè tiáo dào lù。
english: Our guns covered every approach to the town.

hanzi: 现实中, 事情总是出乎意料地发生。
pinyin: xiàn shí zhòng,  shì qing zǒng shì chū hū yì liào de fā shēng。
english: In reality, things always happen out of expectation.

hanzi: 这个学期我们都有一门古代史课程。
pinyin: zhè gè xué qī wǒ men dōu yǒu yī mén gǔ dài shǐ kè chéng。
english: We will all have a course in ancient history this term.

hanzi: 他们在经济危机时遭受了巨大的损失。
pinyin: tā men zài jīng jì wēi jī shí zāo shòu le jù dà de sǔn shī。
english: They suffered huge losses in the financial crisis.

hanzi: 环保部门要求我们使用无烟煤。
pinyin: huán bǎo bù mén yāo qiú wǒ men shǐ yòng wú yān méi。
english: We are required by environment protecting department to use anthracite.

hanzi: 他重复了几遍直到记住为止.
pinyin: tā chóng fù le jǐ biàn zhí dào jì zhu wéi zhǐ.
english: He repeated it several times over (ie again and again) until he could remember it.

hanzi: 主管人，尤指大学校长或学院院长
pinyin: zhǔ guǎn rén， yóu zhǐ dà xué xiào zhǎng huò xué yuàn yuàn zhǎng
english: A president, especially of a college or university.

hanzi: 由上面所说的，我们可以做一个结论。
pinyin: yóu shàng mian suǒ shuō de， wǒ men kě yǐ zuò yī gè jié lùn。
english: From what is said above, we can draw a conclusion.

hanzi: 既然你坚持，我就只好修改信用证。
pinyin: jì rán nǐ jiān chí， wǒ jiù zhǐ hǎo xiū gǎi xìn yòng zhèng。
english: Since you insist, I must amend the letter of credit.

hanzi: 我叫她去刷牙, 她就跟我顶起嘴来.
pinyin: wǒ jiào tā qù shuā yá,  tā jiù gēn wǒ dǐng qǐ zuǐ lái.
english: I asked her to go and brush her teeth and she just sassed me back.

hanzi: 你在夜晚可以看到星星，白天却看不到。
pinyin: nǐ zài yè wǎn kě yǐ kàn dào xīng xing， bái tiān què kàn bù dào。
english: You can see stars by night, but not by day.

hanzi: 展现在我们面前的是一片广阔的土地。
pinyin: zhǎn xiàn zài wǒ men miàn qián de shì yī piàn guǎng kuò de tǔ dì。
english: A wide stretch of land spread in front of us.

hanzi: 那个地方在地图上以十字形记号标出。
pinyin: nèi gè dì fang zài dì tú shàng yǐ shí zì xíng jì hao biāo chū。
english: The place is marked on the map with a crossing.

hanzi: 你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题。
pinyin: nǐ de jīng cǎi bào gào yǐn chū le jǐ ge zhòng yào wèn tí。
english: Your interesting report raises several important queries.

hanzi: 一直朝著这个方向走就看见指示牌了.
pinyin: yī zhí cháo著 zhè gè fāng xiàng zǒu jiù kàn jiàn zhǐ shì pái le.
english: Continue in this direction until you see a sign.

hanzi: 我们全都是为了他才放弃这个计划的。
pinyin: wǒ men quán dōu shì wèi le tā cái fàng qì zhè gè jì huà de。
english: It was all because of him that we gave up the plan.

hanzi: 既然你坚持，我就只好修改信用证。
pinyin: jì rán nǐ jiān chí， wǒ jiù zhǐ hǎo xiū gǎi xìn yòng zhèng。
english: Since you insist, I must amend the letter of credit.

hanzi: 人民群众普遍反对突然实行的变革。
pinyin: rén mín qún zhòng pǔ biàn fǎn duì tū rán shí xíng de biàn gé。
english: The populace at large are opposed to sudden change.

hanzi: 跟他们讨论终止合同是没有用的。
pinyin: gēn tā men tǎo lùn zhōng zhǐ hé tong shì méi yǒu yòng de。
english: It's no use to discuss the termination of contract with them.

hanzi: 新政府的成立带来了一个繁荣的时期.
pinyin: xīn zhèng fǔ de chéng lì dài lái le yī gè fán róng de shí qī.
english: The new government ushered in a period of prosperity.

hanzi: 他背上的重负似乎要把他压倒在地。
pinyin: tā bèi shàng de zhòng fù sì hu yào bǎ tā yā dǎo zài de。
english: The burden on his back seemed to be crushing him to the earth.

hanzi: 这部小说引起了千万读者的想象。
pinyin: zhè bù xiǎo shuō yǐn qǐ le qiān wàn dú zhě de xiǎng xiàng。
english: The novel captured the imagination of thousands of readers.

hanzi: 你不应该让士兵们冒不必要的危险。
pinyin: nǐ bù yīng gāi ràng shì bīng men mào bú bì yào de wēi xiǎn。
english: You shouldn't expose the soldiers to unnecessary risks.

hanzi: 人们应经常洗澡以保证个人卫生。
pinyin: rén men yìng jīng cháng xǐ zǎo yǐ bǎo zhèng gè rén wèi shēng。
english: People should wash regularly to ensure personal hygiene.

hanzi: 有些食物的吸收比另一些更容易。
pinyin: yǒu xiē shí wù de xī shōu bì lìng yī xiē gèng róng yì。
english: The assimilation of some foods is more easily than that of others.

hanzi: 吸烟有害健康，这是大家公认的。
pinyin: xī yān yǒu hài jiàn kāng， zhè shì dà jiā gōng rèn de。
english: It is generally accepted that smoking is harmful to our health.

hanzi: 这家商店因公平交易而获好名声。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn yīn gōng píng jiāo yì ér huò hào míng shēng。
english: This store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.

hanzi: 游击队在那个省开辟了一条新战线。
pinyin: yóu jī duì zài nèi gè xǐng kāi pì le yī tiáo xīn zhàn xiàn。
english: The guerrillas opened up a new front in that province.

hanzi: 她那些所谓的朋友对她的影响很坏.
pinyin: tā nà xiē suǒ wèi de péng you duì tā de yǐng xiǎng hěn huài.
english: Those so-called friends of hers are a bad influence on her.

hanzi: 见面礼节礼节性拥抱，如问候或敬礼
pinyin: jiàn miàn lǐ jié lǐ jié xìng yōng bào， rú wèn hòu huò jìng lǐ
english: A ceremonial embrace, as of greeting or salutation.

hanzi: 人们认为海洋曾经是生命的发源地。
pinyin: rén men rèn wéi hǎi yáng céng jīng shì shēng mìng de fà yuán de。
english: The sea is thought to have been the cradle of life.

hanzi: 我还没来得及给他盖好被子，他就睡着了。
pinyin: wǒ huán mò lái de jí jǐ tā gě hào bèi zi， tā jiù shuì zhāo le。
english: He was asleep before I tucked him in.

hanzi: 人们认为海洋曾经是生命的发源地。
pinyin: rén men rèn wéi hǎi yáng céng jīng shì shēng mìng de fà yuán de。
english: The sea is thought to have been the cradle of life.

hanzi: 他正在看一篇关于道路状况的报告。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài kàn yī piān guān yú dào lù zhuàng kuàng de bào gào。
english: He is reading a report of the state of the roads.

hanzi: 许多学生缺席，特别是连班长也没来。
pinyin: xǔ duō xué sheng quē xí， tè bié shì lián bān zhǎng yě mò lái。
english: Many students were absent, notably the monitor.

hanzi: 我答应一定完好无损地还你的自行车。
pinyin: wǒ dā ying yī dìng wán hǎo wú sǔn de huán nǐ de zì xíng chē。
english: I promise to return your bicycle on good condition.

hanzi: 有一个省脱离了旧政府而另组新政府。
pinyin: yǒu yī gè xǐng tuō lí le jiù zhèng fǔ ér lìng zǔ xīn zhèng fǔ。
english: A province has broken away to form a new state.

hanzi: 学习植物学使我对大自然了解了许多。
pinyin: xué xí zhí wù xué shǐ wǒ duì dà zì rán liǎo jiě le xǔ duō。
english: In learning botany, I understand much about nature.

hanzi: 部落的知识和风俗口耳相传保存下来.
pinyin: bù luò de zhī shi hé fēng sú kǒu ěr xiāng chuán bǎo cún xia lai.
english: Tribal lore and custom have been passed down orally.

hanzi: 他对你给他的东西没流露出一丝兴趣。
pinyin: tā duì nǐ jǐ tā de dōng xi mò liú lù chū yī sī xìng qu。
english: He showed no glimmer of interest in what you had offered.

hanzi: 劳资双方仍在商谈制订和解方案.
pinyin: láo zī shuāng fāng réng zài shāng tán zhì dìng hé jiě fāng àn.
english: Managers and workers are still working out a peace formula.

hanzi: 我们公司是这个地区最大的用电户。
pinyin: wǒ men gōng sī shì zhè gè dì qū zuì dà de yòng diàn hù。
english: Our company is the biggest user of electricity in this area.

hanzi: 劳资双方之间存在大量矛盾.
pinyin: láo zī shuāng fāng zhī jiān cún zài dà liàng máo dùn.
english: There is a great deal of friction between the management and the work force.

hanzi: 对他来说，生活似乎已失去了一切乐趣。
pinyin: duì tā lái shuō， shēng huó sì hu yǐ shī qù le yī qiè lè qù。
english: Life seems to have lost most of its savor for him.

hanzi: 担任主席的人有责任安排会议。
pinyin: dān rèn zhǔ xí de rén yǒu zé rèn ān pái huì yì。
english: The holder of the office of chairman is responsible for arranging meetings.

hanzi: 他们决定将下一次会议的日期提前。
pinyin: tā men jué dìng jiàng xià yī cì huì yì de rì qī tí qián。
english: They decided to bring forward the date of the next meeting.

hanzi: 一谈到暑假，我们大家都变兴奋了。
pinyin: yī tán dào shǔ jià， wǒ men dà jiā dōu biàn xīng fèn le。
english: When it came to the summer vacation, we all became excited.

hanzi: 院子里已经是一团糟，更不用说房子了
pinyin: yuàn zi lǐ yǐ jīng shì yī tuán zāo， gèng bù yòng shuō fáng zi le
english: The yard is a mess, to say nothing of the house.

hanzi: 不要一下子全吃光留下一些以后再吃。
pinyin: bù yào yí xià zi quán jí guāng liú xià yī xiē yǐ hòu zài jí。
english: Don't eat them all at once; save some for later.

hanzi: 我承认他身上有种强有力的优点。
pinyin: wǒ chéng rèn tā shēn shàng yǒu zhòng qiáng yǒu lì de yōu diǎn。
english: I grant a sledge-hammering sort of merit in him.(Dickens)

hanzi: 这本书表明他是一个有创造力的作家。
pinyin: zhè běn shū biǎo míng tā shì yī gè yǒu chuàng zào lì de zuò jiā。
english: This book shows that he is an ingenious author.

hanzi: 我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi shǐ yòng wú yān méi yǐ fáng zhǐ kōng qì wū rǎn。
english: We should use anthracite to avoid air pollution.

hanzi: 我们应充分利用丰富的人力资源。
pinyin: wǒ men yìng chōng fèn lì yòng fēng fù de rén lì zī yuán。
english: We shall take full advantage of our rich source of human beings.

hanzi: 我在一家非常富有创新精神的公司工作。
pinyin: wǒ zài yī jiā fēi cháng fù yǒu chuàng xīn jīng shén de gōng sī gōng zuò。
english: I worked in a very innovative company.

hanzi: 吵闹的年青人都已从影院被逐出去了。
pinyin: chǎo nào de nián qīng rén dōu yǐ zòng yǐng yuàn bèi zhú chū qù le。
english: The noisy youths were ejected from the cinema.

hanzi: 我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外。
pinyin: wǒ men fù zhì le jì suàn jī cí pán yǐ fáng yì wài。
english: We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.

hanzi: 本身行为不正, 则不宜批评别人.
pinyin: běn shēn xíng wéi bù zhèng,  zé bù yí pī píng bié rén.
english: You can ill afford to criticize others when you behave so badly yourself.

hanzi: 我们希望能够和平过渡到新的制度。
pinyin: wǒ men xī wàng néng gòu hé píng guò dù dào xīn de zhì dù。
english: We hope there will be a peaceful transition to the new system.

hanzi: 他上学时有时到羽毛球俱乐部去。
pinyin: tā shàng xué shí yǒu shí dào yǔ máo qiú jù yuè bù qù。
english: He went to the badminton club at times during his school days.

hanzi: 这位著名的经济学家给我们做了一次演讲。
pinyin: zhè wèi著 míng de jīng jì xué jiā jǐ wǒ men zuò le yī cì yǎn jiǎng。
english: The famous economist gave us a speech.

hanzi: 这本书表明他是一个有创造力的作家。
pinyin: zhè běn shū biǎo míng tā shì yī gè yǒu chuàng zào lì de zuò jiā。
english: This book shows that he is an ingenious author.

hanzi: 教授将要做关于地理特征的讲座。
pinyin: jiào shòu jiāng yào zuò guān yú dì lǐ tè zhēng de jiǎng zuò。
english: The professor will give a lecture of geographical features.

hanzi: 我会陪在你身边，就象我答应你的那样。
pinyin: wǒ kuài péi zài nǐ shēn biān， jiù xiàng wǒ dā ying nǐ de nà yàng。
english: I will be at your side, as I promised you.

hanzi: 改革教育制度将是一个艰难的过程.
pinyin: gǎi gé jiào yù zhì dù jiàng shì yī gè jiān nán de guò chéng.
english: Reforming the education system will be a difficult process.

hanzi: 民间音乐是一代一代地流传下来的。
pinyin: mín jiān yīn yuè shì yī dài yī dài de liú chuán xia lai de。
english: Folk music has been passed down from one generation to another.

hanzi: 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。
pinyin: wèi le wǒ men lǐ jiě， lǎo shī liè jǔ le hěn duō shì lì。
english: The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding.

hanzi: 你的鼓励使我对我的未来更加有信心。
pinyin: nǐ de gǔ lì shǐ wǒ duì wǒ de wèi lái gèng jiā yǒu xìn xīn。
english: Your encouragement made me more confident of my future.

hanzi: 目前的危机比以前发生过的都严重。
pinyin: mù qián de wēi jī bì yǐ qián fā shēng guò de dōu yán zhòng。
english: The present crisis is more than any that have gone before.

hanzi: 中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。
pinyin: Zhōng guó shì yī gè yǒu zhe yōu jiǔ lì shǐ de dōng fāng guó jiā。
english: China is an oriental country with a long history.

hanzi: 她在演讲时一直都在玩弄手帕。
pinyin: tā zài yǎn jiǎng shí yī zhí dōu zài wán nòng shǒu pà。
english: She was playing with her handkerchief all the while during the speech.

hanzi: 他回过身来, 帮助那位扭了脚的朋友。
pinyin: tā huí guò shēn lái,  bāng zhù nà wèi niǔ le jué de péng you。
english: He came back to help his friend who had sprained an ankle.

hanzi: 查一下火车时刻表中下一趟车的时间.
pinyin: zhā yī xià huǒ chē shí kè biǎo zhòng xià yī tàng jū de shí jiān.
english: Look up the time of the next train in the timetable.

hanzi: 只知道一点点，不如完全不晓得。
pinyin: zhǐ zhī dào yī diǎn diǎn， bù rú wán quán bù xiǎo de。
english: You might as well not know a thing at all as know it only a little.

hanzi: 你的鼓励使我对我的未来更加有信心。
pinyin: nǐ de gǔ lì shǐ wǒ duì wǒ de wèi lái gèng jiā yǒu xìn xīn。
english: Your encouragement made me more confident of my future.

hanzi: 这家新图书馆上星期正式落成起用。
pinyin: zhè jiā xīn tú shū guǎn shàng xīng qī zhèng shì luò chéng qǐ yòng。
english: This new library was officially opened last week.

hanzi: 现行的教育制度和现实并不一致。
pinyin: xiàn xíng de jiào yù zhì dù huò xiàn shí bìng bù yī zhì。
english: The current education system is not in concert with the reality.

hanzi: 他历史考试不及格，其他科目都通过了。
pinyin: tā lì shǐ kǎo shì bù jí gé， qí tā kē mù dōu tōng guò le。
english: He got a fail in history and passes in other subjects.

hanzi: 老师照管着一群孩子上公共汽车。
pinyin: lǎo shī zhào guǎn zhuó yī qún hái zi shàng gōng gòng qì chē。
english: The teacher was shepherding the group of children into the bus.

hanzi: 那位记者被控有违反职业道德的行为。
pinyin: nà wèi jì zhě bèi kòng yǒu wéi fǎn zhí yè dào dé de xíng wéi。
english: The reporter was accused of unprofessional conduct.

hanzi: 你的鼓励使我对我的未来更加有信心。
pinyin: nǐ de gǔ lì shǐ wǒ duì wǒ de wèi lái gèng jiā yǒu xìn xīn。
english: Your encouragement made me more confident of my future.

hanzi: 他们对办理的每项业务收取一定的费用。
pinyin: tā men duì bàn lǐ de měi xiàng yè wù shōu qǔ yī dìng de fèi yòng。
english: They charge a fixed rate for each transaction.

hanzi: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行。
pinyin: yǒu guān huán jìng de huì yì jiàng zài xià zhōu yī jǔ xíng。
english: The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday.

hanzi: 终于在一六八七年他发表了他的新理论。
pinyin: zhōng yú zài yī liù bā qī nián tā fā biǎo le tā de xīn lǐ lùn。
english: Only in 1687 did he at last publish his new theory.

hanzi: 他们因偏见而对计划的优点视而不见
pinyin: tā men yīn piān jiàn ér duì jì huà de yōu diǎn shì ér bù jiàn
english: Prejudice that blinded them to the merits of the proposal.

english: She resembles her sister in appearance but not in character.

pinyin: zhè xie shū cài zhòng dì yíng yǎng bù fen quán dōu jǐ zhǔ diào le。

english: Dealings or communications between persons or groups.

hanzi: 现实生活并不象人们想象的那样美好。

hanzi: 她大力鼓吹节约是解决危机的关键。
pinyin: tā dà lì gǔ chuī jié yuē shì jiě jué wēi jī de guān jiàn。
english: She preached economy as the best means of solving the crisis.

hanzi: 这根绳子不够结实，所以我们用金属线。
pinyin: zhè gēn shéng zi bù gòu jiē shi， suǒ yǐ wǒ men yòng jīn shǔ xiàn。

pinyin: zhè xie shū cài zhòng dì yíng yǎng bù fen quán dōu jǐ zhǔ diào le。

english: In respect of financial standing, this firm is reliable.

hanzi: 他的家乡只是地图上一个不起眼的小城。
pinyin: tā de jiā xiāng zhǐ shì dì tú shàng yī gè bù qǐ yǎn de xiǎo chéng。
english: His hometown is an insignificant city on the map.

hanzi: 每月都从运河中打捞出几辆旧汽车来.
pinyin: měi yuè dōu zòng yùn hé zhòng dǎ lāo chū jǐ liàng jiù qì chē lái.
english: Several old cars are fished out (of the canal) every month.

hanzi: 拥有汽车的人数一直在逐渐上升。
pinyin: yōng yǒu qì chē de rén shù yī zhí zài zhú jiàn shàng shēng。
english: There has been a gradual increase in the number of people owning cars.

hanzi: 他试著用叉子把罐头里的肉使劲叉出来。
pinyin: tā shì著 yòng chā zi bǎ guàn tou lǐ de ròu shǐ jìn chǎ chū lai。
english: He tried to hoick the meat out of the tin with a fork.

hanzi: 我以为他要请客，但结果是各付各的。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ wéi tā yào qǐng kè， dàn jié guǒ shì gè fù gè de。
english: I think he was treating, but it turned out to be a Dutch treat.

hanzi: 装配过程的这一部分现在是全自动的.
pinyin: zhuāng pèi guò chéng de zhè yī bù fen xiàn zài shì quán zì dòng de.
english: This part of the assembly process is now fully automated.

hanzi: 大多数中国人认为他将从此不受欢迎。
pinyin: dà duō shù Zhōng guó rén rèn wéi tā jiàng cóng cǐ bù shòu huān yíng。
english: Most Chinese think he will be therefrom unwelcome.

hanzi: 你们克服了这么大的困难, 值得表扬。
pinyin: nǐ men kè fú le zhè me dà de kùn nan,  zhí de biǎo yáng。
english: It is greatly to your credit that you have overcome such difficulties.

hanzi: 我们为了双方的利益签订这项合同。
pinyin: wǒ men wèi le shuāng fāng de lì yì qiān dìng zhè xiàng hé tong。
english: We entered into this contract in the interests of both parties.

hanzi: 邻居张奶奶生病时，她去帮忙照料。
pinyin: lín jū zhāng nǎi nai shēng bìng shí， tā qù bāng máng zhào liào。
english: She helped out when her neighbour Grandma Zhang became ill.

hanzi: 他在布置新房子中表现出富有技巧。
pinyin: tā zài bù zhì xīn fáng zi zhòng biǎo xiàn chū fù yǒu jì qiǎo。
english: He display a great deal of artifice in decorate his new house.

hanzi: 在等待开演的时候，演员们十分紧张
pinyin: zài děng dài kāi yǎn de shí hou， yǎn yuán men shí fēn jǐn zhāng
english: The performers were edgy as they waited for the show to begin.

hanzi: 我们须在我们日常公务中建立一些制度.
pinyin: wǒ men xū zài wǒ men rì cháng gōng wù zhòng jiàn lì yī xiē zhì dù.
