english: We must introduce some system into our office routine.

hanzi: 他把他的一生都献给了当代艺术研究。
pinyin: tā bǎ tā de yī shēng dōu xiàn jǐ le dāng dài yì shù yán jiū。
english: He had devoted his whole life to the study of contemporary art.

hanzi: 我们现在正经历规模空前的失业现象。
pinyin: wǒ men xiàn zài zhèng jing lì guī mó kōng qián de shī yè xiàn xiàng。
english: We are seeing unemployment on an unprecedented scale.

hanzi: 新任命的将军立即向敌人发起攻击.
pinyin: xīn rèn mìng de jiāng jūn lì jí xiàng dí rén fā qǐ gōng jī.
english: The new general immediately launched an offensive against the enemy.

hanzi: 我插进了几则笑话，把我的讲话拉长了。
pinyin: wǒ chā jìn le jǐ zé xiào huà， bǎ wǒ de jiǎng huà lā zhǎng le。
english: I made my speech longer by padding it with a few jokes.

hanzi: 使我感到极其好笑的是他的假胡子掉下来了.
pinyin: shǐ wǒ gǎn dào jí qí hǎo xiào de shì tā de jià hú zi diào xia lai le.
english: To my great amusement his false beard fell off.

hanzi: 这是件艰巨的工作, 但她是能胜任的.
pinyin: zhè shì jiàn jiān jù de gōng zuò,  dàn tā shì néng shèng rèn de.
english: It's a difficult job but she's the person to carry it through.

hanzi: 仍有许多人的生活条件是很艰苦的。
pinyin: réng yǒu xǔ duō rén de shēng huó tiáo jiàn shì hěn jiān kù de。
english: There are still many people whose living conditions are miserable.

hanzi: 在会议之前，我们讨论了这个问题。
pinyin: zài huì yì zhī qián， wǒ men tǎo lùn le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: Previous to the conference we had discussed the matter among ourselves.

hanzi: 只要我们紧密团结就能克服困难。
pinyin: zhǐ yào wǒ men jǐn mì tuán jié jiù néng kè fú kùn nan。
english: We can surely overcome these difficulties as long as we are closely united.

hanzi: 整个计划开始具有更切合实际的性质。
pinyin: zhěng gè jì huà kāi shǐ jù yǒu gèng qiè hé shí jì de xìng zhì。
english: The whole scheme began to take on a more practical aspect.

hanzi: 许多危害健康的情况都与吸烟有关。
pinyin: xǔ duō wēi hài jiàn kāng de qíng kuàng dōu yù xī yān yǒu guān。
english: There are many serious health hazards associated with smoking.

hanzi: 一个人应该为世界和平事业尽最大努力。
pinyin: yī gè rén yīng gāi wèi shì jiè hé píng shì yè jìn zuì dà nǔ lì。
english: One should do his best for the cause of world peace.

hanzi: 他用绳子打个圈，套在这头小公牛的角上。
pinyin: tā yòng shéng zi dǎ gè quān， tào zài zhè tou xiǎo gōng niú de jué shàng。
english: He looped the rope around the steer's horns.

hanzi: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。
pinyin: zài zhè yī cè yàn zhòng nǐ yù zhuān jiā jiào liàng yī xià jì qiǎo ba。
english: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.

hanzi: 一如既往，我们将继续每星期四开会。
pinyin: yī rú jì wàng， wǒ men jiàng jì xù měi xīng qī sì kāi huì。
english: We will continue to hold meetings on Thursdays, as heretofore.

hanzi: 由于无法控制的情况，讲座取消了。
pinyin: yóu yú wú fǎ kòng zhì de qíng kuàng， jiǎng zuò qǔ xiāo le。
english: Due to circumstances beyond our control the lecture was cancelled.

hanzi: 该报告建议安全标准应该改进。
pinyin: gāi bào gào jiàn yì ān quán biāo zhǔn yīng gāi gǎi jìn。
english: The report advances the suggestion that safety standards should be improved.

hanzi: 很少植物或动物能在沙漠中很好地生长。
pinyin: hěn shǎo zhí wù huò dòng wù néng zài shā mò zhòng hěn hǎo de shēng zhǎng。
english: Few plants or animals thrive in the desert.

hanzi: 这位冠军为了下一场比赛正在进行训练。
pinyin: zhè wèi guàn jūn wèi le xià yī chǎng bǐ sài zhèng zài jìn xíng xùn liàn。
english: The champion is in training for his next fight.

hanzi: 只有时间才能使人淡忘那些不快的记忆。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu shí jiān cái néng shǐ rén dàn wàng nà xiē bù kuài de jì yì。
english: Time alone will efface those unpleasant memories.

hanzi: 要想赶上其他同学, 我得特别努力才行。
pinyin: yào xiǎng gǎn shàng qí tā tóng xué,  wǒ de tè bié nǔ lì cái xìng。
english: I have to work hard to catch up with the other students.

hanzi: 你最好不要碰这些衣服，好避免传染病。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo bù yào pèng zhè xie yī fu， hào bì miǎn chuán rǎn bìng。
english: You'd better not touch these coats to avoid contagion.

hanzi: 女王在一所古老的大教堂里举行登基仪式。
pinyin: nu:3 wáng zài yī suǒ gǔ lǎo de dà jiào táng lǐ jǔ xíng dēng jī yí shì。
english: The queen was enthroned in an ancient abbey.

hanzi: 我愿意接受此品种，因为价格合理。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn yì jiē shòu cǐ pǐn zhǒng， yīn wèi jià gé hé lǐ。
english: I'd like to accept this item, seeing (that) the price is reasonable.

hanzi: 你应很好利用宝贵的每一分钟去学习。
pinyin: nǐ yìng hěn hǎo lì yòng bǎo guì de měi yī fēn zhōng qù xué xí。
english: You should make good use of every precious minute to study.

hanzi: 全营以连为单位在军营广场上列队.
pinyin: quán yíng yǐ lián wèi dān wèi zài jūn yíng guǎng chǎng shàng liè duì.
english: The battalion formed up by companies on the barrack square.

hanzi: 我觉得这是个合理的建议，但他不同意。
pinyin: wǒ jué de zhè shì gè hé lǐ de jiàn yì， dàn tā bù tóng yì。
english: I thought it was a reasonable proposal, but he didn't agree.

hanzi: 那老太太想开录像机, 但是越搞越糊涂.
pinyin: nà lǎo tài tai xiǎng kāi lù xiàng jī,  dàn shì yuè gǎo yuè hú tu.
english: The old lady gets in(to) a muddle trying to work the video.

hanzi: 让我坐下歇一会儿，我刚得到一些坏消息。
pinyin: ràng wǒ zuò xia xiē yī huìr， wǒ gāng dé dào yī xiē huài xiāo xi。
english: May I sit down a minute? I've just had some bad news.

hanzi: 一只碗，一双筷子就是他的全部家产。
pinyin: yī zhǐ wǎn， yī shuāng kuài zi jiù shì tā de quán bù jiā chǎn。
english: A bowl and a pair of chopsticks are all the property he has.

hanzi: 那老太太想开录像机, 但是越搞越糊涂.
pinyin: nà lǎo tài tai xiǎng kāi lù xiàng jī,  dàn shì yuè gǎo yuè hú tu.
english: The old lady gets in(to) a muddle trying to work the video.

hanzi: 我国任何时候都没有现在这样繁荣。
pinyin: wǒ guó rèn hé shí hou dōu méi yǒu xiàn zài zhè yàng fán róng。
english: At no time has the country been more prosperous than at present.

hanzi: 她那灵巧的手指把羊毛纺织成了细线。
pinyin: tā nà líng qiǎo de shǒu zhǐ bǎ yáng máo fǎng zhī chéng le xì xiàn。
english: Her skillful fingers spun the wool out to a fine thread.

hanzi: 从这个角度来看, 画中的女子面带微笑.
pinyin: zòng zhè gè jiǎo dù lái kàn,  huà zhòng dì nu:3 zǐ miàn dài wēi xiào.
english: Seen from this angle the woman in the picture is smiling.

hanzi: 她负责采购电视系列片所用的道具.
pinyin: tā fù zé cǎi gòu diàn shì xì liè piān suǒ yòng de dào jù.
english: She was responsible for buying the properties for the television series.

hanzi: 那个工厂需要大量钢铁以维持生产。
pinyin: nèi gè gōng chǎng xū yào dà liàng gāng tiě yǐ wéi chí shēng chǎn。
english: The factory is in great demand of steel to keep up production.

hanzi: 好看的身材或面貌上让人愉快的，端庄的
pinyin: hǎo kàn de shēn cái huò miàn mào shàng ràng rén yú kuài de， duān zhuāng de
english: Pleasing and dignified in form or appearance.

hanzi: 她极力主张拼写正确是十分重要的.
pinyin: tā jí lì zhǔ zhāng pīn xiě zhèng què shì shí fēn zhòng yào de.
english: She has very pronounced views on the importance of correct spelling.

hanzi: 有个学生真冒失, 竟然和教授争论起来.
pinyin: yǒu gè xué sheng zhēn mào shī,  jìng rán huò jiào shòu zhēng lùn qǐ lai.
english: One student made so bold as to argue with the professor.

hanzi: 留著点儿劲儿，你一会儿还得干重活儿呢。
pinyin: liú著 diǎn er jìng er， nǐ yī huìr huán de gàn zhòng huór ne。
english: Save your strength for the hard work you'll have to do later.

hanzi: 开始做饭前，我还得去买些厨房用具。
pinyin: kāi shǐ zuò fàn qián， wǒ huán de qù mǎi xiē chú fáng yòng jù。
english: I have to buy some kitchen utensils before starting cooking.

hanzi: 只要把它完成了，你怎么做我并不计较。
pinyin: zhǐ yào bǎ tā wán chéng le， nǐ zěn me zuò wǒ bìng bù jì jiào。
english: I'm not particular how you do it as long as it gets done.

hanzi: 我那辆可靠的旧车会把我们安全地送回家的。
pinyin: wǒ nà liàng kě kào de jiù jū kuài bǎ wǒ men ān quán de sòng huí jiā de。
english: My trusty old car will get us home safely.

hanzi: 我们的队扔硬币赢了， 因此由我们队先开球。
pinyin: wǒ men de duì rēng yìng bì yíng le，  yīn cǐ yóu wǒ men duì xiān kāi qiú。
english: Our team won the toss so we play first.

hanzi: 在海上航行了三天，我们终于看见了大陆。
pinyin: zài hǎi shàng háng xíng le sān tiān， wǒ men zhōng yú kàn jiàn le dà lù。
english: After three days at sea we sighted the land.

hanzi: 我们不必争论已经决定的事--只好听他的.
pinyin: wǒ men bù bì zhēng lùn yǐ jīng jué dìng de shì-- zhǐ hǎo tìng tā de.
english: Let's not argue the toss we have to accept his choice.

hanzi: 他们恋爱那时国家正进行著战争.
pinyin: tā men liàn ài nà shí guó jiā zhèng jìn xíng著 zhàn zhēng.
english: Their love affair was played out against the background of a country at war.

hanzi: 手术成功了，病人现在已脱离危险。
pinyin: shǒu shù chéng gōng le， bìng rén xiàn zài yǐ tuō lí wēi xiǎn。
english: The operation is a success and now the patient is out of danger.

hanzi: 加入的液体太多，混合液的浓度就不够。
pinyin: jiā rù de yè tǐ tài duō， hùn hé yè de nóng dù jiù bù gòu。
english: If you add too much liquid the mixture will not be thick enough.

hanzi: 他对语言的热爱促使他从事翻译工作.
pinyin: tā duì yǔ yán de rè ài cù shǐ tā cóng shì fān yì gōng zuò.
english: His love of languages inclined him towards a career as a translator.

hanzi: 她很独立，所以拒绝一切金钱上的资助。
pinyin: tā hěn dú lì， suǒ yǐ jù jué yī qiè jīn qián shàng de zī zhù。
english: She is so independent that she refused all pecuniary aid.

hanzi: 你不能以疲劳为理由就这样对待职工.
pinyin: nǐ bù néng yǐ pí láo wèi lǐ yóu jiù zhè yàng duì dài zhí gōng.
english: Tiredness cannot possibly justify your treating staff this way.

hanzi: 这个地区传统的早饭包括火腿和鸡蛋。
pinyin: zhè gè dì qū chuán tǒng de zǎo fàn bāo kuò huǒ tuǐ huò jī dàn。
english: The traditional breakfast in this area includes bacon and eggs.

hanzi: 警察让我描述一下这事是怎样发生的。
pinyin: jǐng chá ràng wǒ miáo shù yī xià zhè shì shì zěn yàng fā shēng de。
english: The police asked me to describe exactly how it happened.

hanzi: 不要把馒头放在桌子上，它会干硬的。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ mán tou fàng zài zhuō zi shàng， tā kuài gàn yìng de。
english: Don't leave that steamed bread on the table, it will dry out.

hanzi: 你得去上班了, 要不然就要失去这份工作了.
pinyin: nǐ de qù shàng bān le,  yào bu rán jiù yào shī qù zhè fèn gōng zuò le.
english: You must go to work or ,else you'll lose your job.

hanzi: 这位冠军为了下一场比赛正在进行训练。
pinyin: zhè wèi guàn jūn wèi le xià yī chǎng bǐ sài zhèng zài jìn xíng xùn liàn。
english: The champion is in training for his next fight.

hanzi: 我们都同意他对政治形势的深刻分析。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu tóng yì tā duì zhèng zhì xíng shì de shēn kè fēn xī。
english: We agreed with his acute analysis of the political situation.

hanzi: 一定要先看清小号字体印刷部分再签字.
pinyin: yī dìng yào xiān kàn qīng xiǎo hào zì tǐ yìn shuà bù fen zài qiān zì.
english: Make sure you read all the small print before signing.

hanzi: 植物从泥土中吸收矿物质和其他养料。
pinyin: zhí wù zòng ní tǔ zhòng xī shōu kuàng wù zhì huò qí tā yǎng liào。
english: Plants absorb minerals and other nutrients from the soil.

hanzi: 我想北极地区的人要比这里的少得多。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng běi jí dì qū de rén yào bì zhè lǐ de shào de duō。
english: I guess there are much less people in the Arctic regions than here.

hanzi: 我们都同意他对政治形势的深刻分析。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu tóng yì tā duì zhèng zhì xíng shì de shēn kè fēn xī。
english: We agreed with his acute analysis of the political situation.

hanzi: 政府已答应采取措施来帮助失业者。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ dā ying cǎi qǔ cuò shī lái bāng zhù shī yè zhě。
english: The government has promised to take measures to help the unemployed.

hanzi: 我们根据有效法律保护投资者的利益。
pinyin: wǒ men gēn jù yǒu xiào fǎ lu:4 bǎo hù tóu zī zhě de lì yì。
english: We protect the interests of investors by the legislation in effect.

hanzi: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。
pinyin: zài zhè yī cè yàn zhòng nǐ yù zhuān jiā jiào liàng yī xià jì qiǎo ba。
english: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.

hanzi: 抬起这只沉重的箱子要花费相当大的力气。
pinyin: tái qǐ zhè zhǐ chén zhòng de xiāng zǐ yào huā fèi xiāng dāng dà de lì qi。
english: It's quite an effort to lift this heavy box.

hanzi: 政府已答应采取措施来帮助失业者。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ dā ying cǎi qǔ cuò shī lái bāng zhù shī yè zhě。
english: The government has promised to take measures to help the unemployed.

hanzi: 在这种时候应大力反对如此浪费金钱。
pinyin: zài zhè zhǒng shí hou yìng dà lì fǎn duì rú cǐ làng fèi jīn qián。
english: Such waste of money should be deprecated at a time like this.

hanzi: 生命可以被比作一次不知目的地的旅行。
pinyin: shēng mìng kě yǐ bèi bì zuò yī cì bù zhī mù dì dì de lu:3 xíng。
english: Life can be likened to a journey with an unknown destination.

hanzi: 他用自来水龙头流出的凉水把手洗干净。
pinyin: tā yòng zì lái shuǐ lóng tóu liú chū de liáng shuǐ bǎ shǒu xǐ gān jìng。
english: He cleaned his hands in the cold water from the tap.

hanzi: 发明了印刷术后文化教育才得以普及。
pinyin: fā míng le yìn shuà zhú hòu wén huà jiào yù cái dé yǐ pǔ jí。
english: Mass literacy was only possible after the invention of printing.

hanzi: 几个孩子跟不上父母的步子，落在后面。
pinyin: jǐ ge hái zi gēn bù shàng fù mǔ de bù zi， luò zài hòu miàn。
english: A few young children are straggling along behind their parents.

hanzi: 你来之前先通知我，真是考虑得很周到。
pinyin: nǐ lái zhī qián xiān tōng zhī wǒ， zhēn shì kǎo lu:4 de hěn zhōu dào。
english: It was thoughtful of you to warn me of your arrival.

hanzi: 供传阅的，流通的宣扬或发送给大批人的
pinyin: gòng zhuàn yuè de， liú tōng de xuān yáng huò fā sòng jǐ dà pī rén de
english: Addressed or distributed to a large number of persons.

hanzi: 孩子们在游泳池里互相把对方按入水中。
pinyin: hái zi men zài yóu yǒng chí lǐ hù xiāng bǎ duì fāng àn rù shuǐ zhòng。
english: The children ducked each other in the swimming pool.

hanzi: 在考虑这一问题时，你应当抓住实质。
pinyin: zài kǎo lu:4 zhè yī wèn tí shí， nǐ yīng dāng zhuā zhù shí zhì。
english: In considering this problem, you should grasp its essentials.

hanzi: 战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng dài lái de bì rán jié guǒ jiù shì shēng chǎn lì xià jiàng。
english: The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.

hanzi: 我希望他不要将烟灰往地毯上乱弹。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng tā bù yào jiàng yān huī wàng dì tǎn shàng luàn tán。
english: I wish he would refrain from scattering his ash all over the carpet.

hanzi: 村子的礼堂专作举行庆典和会议之用.
pinyin: cūn zi de lǐ táng zhuān zuò jǔ xíng qìng diǎn huò huì yì zhī yòng.
english: The village hall is given over to civic functions and meetings.

hanzi: 最后，我终于成功地让我的车子慢慢移动。
pinyin: zuì hòu， wǒ zhōng yú chéng gōng de ràng wǒ de jū zi màn màn yí dòng。
english: At last I succeeded in getting my car moving slowly.

hanzi: 这棵树向那边倒下就会把那所房子压坏。
pinyin: zhè kē shù xiàng nà bian dào xià jiù kuài bǎ nà suǒ fáng zi yà huài。
english: If the tree fall that way, it will destroy the house.

hanzi: 她意识到在所采用的方法中可能出错.
pinyin: tā yì shí dào zài suǒ cǎi yòng de fāng fǎ zhòng kě néng chū cuò.
english: She recognized the potential for error in the method being used.

hanzi: 本阅览室的参考书不得私自带出。
pinyin: běn yuè lǎn shì de cān kǎo shū bù dé sī zì dài chū。
english: No reference books are to be taken out of the reading room without permission.

hanzi: 那个跳舞女郎在生人面前没一点紧张。
pinyin: nèi gè tiào wǔ nu:3 láng zài shēng rén miàn qián mò yī diǎn jǐn zhāng。
english: The dance girl is quite at home in front of strangers.

hanzi: 按学生人数, 我们应该建三个餐厅。
pinyin: àn xué sheng rén shù,  wǒ men yīng gāi jiàn sān gè cān tīng。
english: In proportion to the number of students we should build 3 dining rooms.

hanzi: 他每次外出都会顺道去那家书店待一会儿。
pinyin: tā měi cì wài chū dū huì shùn dào qù nà jiā shū diàn dài yī huìr。
english: He never goes out but he drops in at that bookstore.

hanzi: 亲爱的，把脸转过去，这场面不适合你看。
pinyin: qīn ài de， bǎ liǎn zhuàn guò qu， zhè chǎng miàn bù shì hé nǐ kàn。
english: Look away dear, the sight is not fit for your eyes.

hanzi: 全体居民都动员起来，防止森林火灾。
pinyin: quán tǐ jū mín dōu dòng yuán qǐ lai， fáng zhǐ sēn lín huǒ zāi。
english: The entire population was mobilized to watch for forest fires.

hanzi: 敌人的防线很坚强, 但仍为我军突破。
pinyin: dí rén de fáng xiàn hěn jiān qiáng,  dàn réng wèi wǒ jūn tū pò。
english: The enemy's defenses were strong but our soldiers broke through.

hanzi: 老师要求学生们复述他们刚读的故事。
pinyin: lǎo shī yāo qiú xué sheng men fù shù tā men gāng dú de gù shì。
english: The teacher asked the students to retell the story they just read.

hanzi: 你收集到的大部分情报没有实用价值。
pinyin: nǐ shōu jí dào de dà bù fen qíng bào méi yǒu shí yòng jià zhí。
english: Much of the information you have gleaned is of no practical use.

hanzi: 据目前情况看，我们不能按时完成任务了。
pinyin: jù mù qián qíng kuàng kàn， wǒ men bù néng àn shí wán chéng rèn wu le。
english: As things stand, we won't finish the job on time.

hanzi: 他演讲完又补充说了一些最新数字。
pinyin: tā yǎn jiǎng wán yòu bǔ chōng shuō le yī xiē zuì xīn shù zì。
english: He added a brief postscript to his speech, giving the latest figures.

hanzi: 我要去购物，因为我需要买些日用品。
pinyin: wǒ yào qù gòu wù， yīn wèi wǒ xū yào mǎi xiē rì yòng pǐn。
english: I'm going shopping because I need to buy some daily necessities.

hanzi: 他演讲完又补充说了一些最新数字。
pinyin: tā yǎn jiǎng wán yòu bǔ chōng shuō le yī xiē zuì xīn shù zì。
english: He added a brief postscript to his speech, giving the latest figures.

hanzi: 我认为能被邀请参加晚宴是很大的荣幸。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi néng bèi yāo qǐng cān jiā wǎn yàn shì hěn dà de róng xìng。
english: I consider it a great honor to be invited to dinner.

hanzi: 亲爱的，过街到那个商店去买些酱油。
pinyin: qīn ài de， guò jiē dào nèi gè shāng diàn qù mǎi xiē jiàng yóu。
english: My darling, come over the street to that shop to buy some soy.

hanzi: 他对于保健食品有他自己的一套奇怪的看法。
pinyin: tā duì yú bǎo jiàn shí pǐn yǒu tā zì jǐ de yī tào qí guài de kàn fǎ。
english: He has a bee in his bonnet about health foods.

hanzi: 轻型飞机飞行时起落架不一定缩回.
pinyin: qīng xíng fēi jī fēi xíng shí qǐ luò jià bù yī dìng suō huí.
english: The undercarriage on light aircraft does not always retract in flight.

hanzi: 一个国际性的会议下月将在北京举行。
pinyin: yī gè guó jì xìng de huì yì xià yuè jiàng zài Běi jīng jǔ xíng。
english: An international conference will be held in Beijing next month.

hanzi: 他下决心每天要读一小时有益读物。
pinyin: tā xià jué xīn měi tiān yào dú yī xiǎo shí yǒu yì dú wù。
english: He made a resolution to read something profitable for one hour every day.

hanzi: 我不知道这首歌的歌词, 但我可以哼给你听.
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào zhè shǒu gē de gē cí,  dàn wǒ kě yǐ hng jǐ nǐ tìng.
english: I don't know the words of the song but I can hum it to you.

hanzi: 我认为我们对这一问题已差不多是言无不尽了.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi wǒ men duì zhè yī wèn tí yǐ cī bù duō shì yán wú bù jìn le.
english: I think we've just about exhausted that subject.

hanzi: 他的死对我们的工作来说是令人悲痛的损失。
pinyin: tā de sǐ duì wǒ men de gōng zuò lái shuō shì lìng rén bēi tòng de sǔn shī。
english: His death is a lamentable loss of our work.

hanzi: 他不会放弃任何机会以获得一份好工作。
pinyin: tā bù huì fàng qì rèn hé jī huì yǐ huò dé yī fèn hào gōng zuò。
english: He will in no wise give up any chances to get a better job.

hanzi: 既然她病得厉害, 我们要马上去请医生。
pinyin: jì rán tā bìng de lì hai,  wǒ men yào mǎ shàng qù qǐng yī shēng。
english: Since she is seriously ill, we have to send for a doctor at once.

hanzi: 在这种时候应大力反对如此浪费金钱。
pinyin: zài zhè zhǒng shí hou yìng dà lì fǎn duì rú cǐ làng fèi jīn qián。
english: Such waste of money should be deprecated at a time like this.

hanzi: 我发现有人用过我的牙刷，我很不高兴。
pinyin: wǒ fā xiàn yǒu rén yòng guò wǒ de yá shuā， wǒ hěn bù gāo xìng。
english: I am aggrieved to find that someone has used my toothbrush.

hanzi: 自从他去年夏天离去, 我们就失去了联系。
pinyin: zì cóng tā qù nián xià tiān lí qù,  wǒ men jiù shī qù le lián xì。
english: We have lost contact with him since he left last summer.

hanzi: 他不喜欢对他自己的所作所为作出解释。
pinyin: tā bù xǐ huan duì tā zì jǐ de suǒ zuò suǒ wèi zuò chū jiě shì。
english: He didn't relish the prospect of having to explain his behavior.

hanzi: 我们将怎样贯彻这个计划仍需要讨论。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng zěn yàng guàn chè zhè gè jì huà réng xū yào tǎo lùn。
english: How we shall carry out this plan still needs to be discussed.

hanzi: 他选择了德国，而我个人倒更喜欢西班牙。
pinyin: tā xuǎn zé le Dé guó， ér wǒ gè rén dào gèng xǐ huan xī bān yá。
english: He chose Germany, but personally I'd prefer to go to Spain.

hanzi: 在我国, 一般人家里没有集中供热设备.
pinyin: zài wǒ guó,  yī bān rén jiā lǐ méi yǒu jí zhōng gòng rè shè bèi.
english: People don't have central heating in their houses in my country.

hanzi: 越来越多的大学生主修企业管理学。
pinyin: yuè lái yuè duō de dà xué sheng zhǔ xiū qǐ yè guǎn lǐ xué。
english: More and more students are majoring in the science of business management.

hanzi: 她紧张地咽了一下，似乎那问题把她难住了。
pinyin: tā jǐn zhāng de yè le yī xià， sì hu nà wèn tí bǎ tā nàn zhù le。
english: She gulped nervously, as if the question bothered her.

hanzi: 许多妇女把她们的全部精力投入到职业中。
pinyin: xǔ duō fù nu:3 bǎ tā men de quán bù jīng lì tóu rù dào zhí yè zhòng。
english: Many women throw all of their energies into a career.

hanzi: 她离开小岛而在法国的大都市中成名。
pinyin: tā lí kāi xiǎo dǎo ér zài fǎ guó de dà dū shì zhòng chéng míng。
english: She left the small island and became famous in metropolitan France.

hanzi: 之后我们进一步巩固和扩大了我们的军队。
pinyin: zhī hòu wǒ men jìn yí bù gǒng gù huò kuò dà le wǒ men de jūn duì。
english: After that we further consolidated and expanded our army.

hanzi: 当地画家将要在这个风景点举办展览。
pinyin: dāng dì huà jiā jiāng yào zài zhè gè fēng jǐng diǎn jǔ bàn zhǎn lǎn。
english: The local artists will hold an exhibition on the landmark.

hanzi: 这个案件中的动机与效果很难联系起来。
pinyin: zhè gè àn jiàn zhòng dì dòng jī yù xiào guǒ hěn nàn lián xì qǐ lai。
english: It is difficult to relate cause and effect in this case.

hanzi: 我们的教授要求他就这个课题写篇论文。
pinyin: wǒ men de jiào shòu yāo qiú tā jiù zhè gè kè tí xiě piān lùn wén。
english: Our professor asked him to write a treatise on the subject.

hanzi: 这个暖气系统有自动化的温度调节系统。
pinyin: zhè gè nuǎn qì xì tǒng yǒu zì dòng huà de wēn dù tiáo jié xì tǒng。
english: This heating system has an automatic temperature control.

hanzi: 我们听他们讲述撒哈拉沙漠的生活经历。
pinyin: wǒ men tìng tā men jiǎng shù sǎ hǎ lā shā mò de shēng huó jīng lì。
english: We listened to their tales about life in the Sahara Desert.

hanzi: 尽管早上起来头疼，我还是照常上班。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn zǎo shang qǐ lai tóu téng， wǒ hái shì zhào cháng shàng bān。
english: Although I got up with a headache, I went to work as usual.

hanzi: 天黑了，我看不见这块石头上的碑文。
pinyin: tiān hēi le， wǒ kàn bù jiàn zhè kuài shí tou shàng de bēi wén。
english: I can't read the inscription on this stone because it's getting dark.

hanzi: 你当众纠正我的错误, 弄得我很难为情.
pinyin: nǐ dāng zhòng jiū zhèng wǒ de cuò wù,  nòng de wǒ hěn nàn wèi qíng.
english: You made me look so small, correcting me in front of everybody.

hanzi: 我这是信口开河，随便谈谈脑子里想的东西。
pinyin: wǒ zhè shì xìn kǒu kāi hé， suí biàn tán tán nǎo zi lǐ xiǎng de dōng xi。
english: I'm talking offhand, simply speaking my mind.

hanzi: 在他到达车间之前，机器已经开动了。
pinyin: zài tā dào dá chē jiān zhī qián， jī qì yǐ jīng kāi dòng le。
english: Before he gets to the workshop, the machine has been put in motion.

hanzi: 这些式样均可改动以适应个人不同的爱好.
pinyin: zhè xie shì yàng jūn kě gǎi dòng yǐ shì yìng gè rén bù tóng de ài hào.
english: These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.

hanzi: 他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。
pinyin: tā yù shì gé jué yī gè yuè， lì tú bǎ gōng kè gǎn shàng qù。
english: He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.

hanzi: 商店趁一时缺货而提高价格从中获利。
pinyin: shāng diàn chèn yī shí quē huò ér tí gāo jià gé cóng zhōng huò lì。
english: The shop is cashed in on temporary shortage by raising price.

hanzi: 他以自己的名字命名的冷冻食品成了名牌。
pinyin: tā yǐ zì jǐ de míng zi mìng míng de lěng dòng shí pǐn chéng le míng pái。
english: He gave his name to a well-known brand of frozen food.

hanzi: 要准时来，否则你会给人一个坏的印象。
pinyin: yào zhǔn shí lái， fǒu zé nǐ kuài jǐ rén yī gè huài de yìn xiàng。
english: Be there on time, otherwise you'll create a bad impression.

hanzi: 我那时正沿著大街向北去, 走著走著....
pinyin: wǒ nà shí zhèng yàn著 dà jiē xiàng běi qù,  zǒu著 zǒu著....
english: I was proceeding along the High Street in a northerly direction when...

hanzi: 这段时间的失业人数又达到了创纪录水平。
pinyin: zhè duàn shí jiān de shī yè rén shù yòu dá dào le chuàng jì lù shuǐ píng。
english: In this period, unemployment reaches record levels.

hanzi: 政府不应浪费资金去扶持那些无望的企业.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ bù yìng làng fèi zī jīn qù fú chí nà xiē wú wàng de qǐ yè.
english: The government should not waste money supporting lame ducks.

hanzi: 他对他的母亲的敬爱给了我深刻的印象。
pinyin: tā duì tā de mǔ qīn de jìng ài jǐ le wǒ shēn kè de yìn xiàng。
english: He pressed me profound in his respecting and loving to his mother.

hanzi: 在编写这本书的过程中，她起了显著的作用。
pinyin: zài biān xiě zhè běn shū de guò chéng zhòng， tā qǐ le xiǎn著 de zuò yòng。
english: She play a notable role in compile the book.

hanzi: 他对他的母亲的敬爱给了我深刻的印象。
pinyin: tā duì tā de mǔ qīn de jìng ài jǐ le wǒ shēn kè de yìn xiàng。
english: He pressed me profound in his respecting and loving to his mother.

hanzi: 任何人碰到那根电线都会遭到严重的电击。
pinyin: rèn hé rén pèng dào nà gēn diàn xiàn dū huì zāo dào yán zhòng de diàn jī。
english: Anyone touching that wire could get badly shocked.

hanzi: 他们针对我们的建议提出了一项相反的建议.
pinyin: tā men zhēn duì wǒ men de jiàn yì tí chū le yí xiàng xiāng fǎn de jiàn yì.
english: They countered our proposal with one of their own.

hanzi: 局长坐在桌子一端她惯常坐的位置上。
pinyin: jú zhǎng zuò zài zhuō zi yī duān tā guàn cháng zuò de wèi zhi shàng。
english: The director took her accustomed place at the end of the table.

hanzi: 紫禁城是世界上最伟大的建筑之一。
pinyin: zǐ jìn chéng shì shì jiè shàng zuì wěi dà de jiàn zhù zhī yī。
english: The Forbidden City is one of the world's greatest works of architecture.

hanzi: 相声这种艺术形式让老百姓喜闻乐见。
pinyin: xiàng shēng zhè zhǒng yì shù xíng shì ràng lǎo bǎi xìng xǐ wén yuè xiàn。
english: Cross talks are an art form people love to see and hear.

hanzi: 这场革命把国家引上了通往民主的道路。
pinyin: zhè chǎng gé mìng bǎ guó jiā yǐn shàng le tōng wàng mín zhǔ de dào lù。
english: The revolution set the country on the road to democracy.

hanzi: 动物园里的动物不是生活在自然环境中。
pinyin: dòng wù yuán lǐ de dòng wù bú shì shēng huó zài zì rán huán jìng zhòng。
english: Animals in zoos are not in their natural surroundings.

hanzi: 咱们打个比方吧, 有个某某先生来旅馆登记.
pinyin: zán men dǎ gè bǐ fang ba,  yǒu gè mǒu mǒu xiān sheng lái lu:3 guǎn dēng jì.
english: Let's suppose a Mr So-and-so registers at the hotel.

hanzi: 老师的办公室里堆满了大批不同的论文。
pinyin: lǎo shī de bàn gōng shì lǐ duī mǎn le dà pī bù tóng de lùn wén。
english: There is a heterogeneous mass of papers in the teacher's office.

hanzi: 这场革命把国家引上了通往民主的道路。
pinyin: zhè chǎng gé mìng bǎ guó jiā yǐn shàng le tōng wàng mín zhǔ de dào lù。
english: The revolution set the country on the road to democracy.

hanzi: 她即使在最糟糕的时候也总是非常乐观.
pinyin: tā jí shǐ zài zuì zāo gāo de shí hou yě zǒng shì fēi cháng lè guān.
english: She was always optimistic, even when things were at their worst.

hanzi: 他老爱说大话，就仿佛他是一位要人似的。
pinyin: tā lǎo ài shuō dà huà， jiù fǎng fú tā shì yī wèi yào rén sì de。
english: He likes to talk big as though he was an important person.

hanzi: 你在这样弱的光线下看书会损伤视力的。
pinyin: nǐ zài zhè yàng ruò de guāng xiàn xià kàn shū kuài sǔn shāng shì lì de。
english: You will strain your eyes by reading in such poor light.

hanzi: 那位勇敢的人冒著生命危险试图救那孩子。
pinyin: nà wèi yǒng gǎn de rén mào著 shēng mìng wēi xiǎn shì tú jiù nà hái zi。
english: The brave man risk his life in trying to save the child.

hanzi: 政府已经采取了措施以确保物价稳定。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ jīng cǎi qǔ le cuò shī yǐ què bǎo wù jià wěn dìng。
english: The government has taken a measure to maintain the stability of prices.

hanzi: 我不计较价钱，只要车很好用就行了。
pinyin: wǒ bù jì jiào jià qian， zhǐ yào jū hěn hǎo yòng jiù xìng le。
english: I don't care about the price, so long as the car is in good condition.

hanzi: 这个小女孩太可爱了，我把她叫做小精灵。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái tài kě ài le， wǒ bǎ tā jiào zuò xiǎo jīng líng。
english: The little girl is so lovely that I call her a sprite.

hanzi: 这个小女孩太可爱了，我把她叫做小精灵。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái tài kě ài le， wǒ bǎ tā jiào zuò xiǎo jīng líng。
english: The little girl is so lovely that I call her a sprite.

hanzi: 我们未来的计划必须与当前的实际相结合。
pinyin: wǒ men wèi lái de jì huà bì xū yù dāng qián de shí jì xiàng jié hé。
english: Our future plans have to mesh with the present practices.

hanzi: 这些价值对于我们的生活方式是至关重要的。
pinyin: zhè xie jià zhí duì yú wǒ men de shēng huó fāng shì shì zhì guān zhòng yào de。
english: Such values are central to our way of life.

hanzi: 我们未来的计划必须与当前的实际相结合。
pinyin: wǒ men wèi lái de jì huà bì xū yù dāng qián de shí jì xiàng jié hé。
english: Our future plans have to mesh with the present practices.

hanzi: 金钱正在被更直接地用来取代某种东西。
pinyin: jīn qián zhèng zài bèi gèng zhí jiē de yòng lái qǔ dài mǒu zhǒng dōng xi。
english: Money is being used in place of something more direct.

hanzi: 我将继续工作直到我得到相反的命令。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng jì xù gōng zuò zhí dào wǒ dé dào xiāng fǎn de mìng lìng。
english: I will go on with my work unless I get the order to the contrary.

hanzi: 要洗的衣物须称过重量再放入洗衣机中.
pinyin: yào xǐ de yì wù xū chèng guò zhòng liàng zài fàng rù xǐ yì jī zhòng.
english: The load must be weighed before it is put in the washing-machine.

hanzi: 这些情况不利于公司的进一步发展。
pinyin: zhè xie qíng kuàng bù lì yú gōng sī de jìn yí bù fā zhǎn。
english: The circumstances were not propitious for further expansion of the company.

hanzi: 我这次就原谅你,你可不许再犯错误。
pinyin: wǒ zhè cì jiù yuán liàng nǐ, nǐ kě bù xǔ zài fàn cuò wù。
english: I'll forgive you this time, but you shall by no means make the mistake again.

hanzi: 这次他欺骗了我, 但总有一天我会报复他的。
pinyin: zhè cì tā qī piàn le wǒ,  dàn zǒng yǒu yī tiān wǒ kuài bào fù tā de。
english: He tricked me this time but I'll get back at him one day.

hanzi: 这座教堂是中世纪建筑风格的典型实例。
pinyin: zhè zuò jiào táng shì zhòng shì jì jiàn zhù fēng gé de diǎn xíng shí lì。
english: This church is a classic example of medieval architecture.

hanzi: 老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性。
pinyin: lǎo shī zòng yī kāi shǐ jiù qiáng diào fān yì zhǔn què xìng。
english: The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.

hanzi: 我建议你不要和那个不诚实的商人合作。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì nǐ bù yào huò nèi gè bù chéng shí de shāng rén hé zuò。
english: I advise you not to cooperate with that deceitful businessman.

hanzi: 老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性。
pinyin: lǎo shī zòng yī kāi shǐ jiù qiáng diào fān yì zhǔn què xìng。
english: The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.

hanzi: 他们自信地等待我自己发现事实真相。
pinyin: tā men zì xìn de děng dài wǒ zì jǐ fā xiàn shì shí zhēn xiàng。
english: They were waiting with assurance for me to discover the truth for myself.

hanzi: 教会应当就基本道德问题多做出些榜样.
pinyin: jiào huì yīng dāng jiù jī běn dào dé wèn tí duō zuò chū xiē bǎng yàng.
english: The Church should give more of a lead on basic moral issues.

hanzi: 据预报说今天的空气湿度是百分之六十。
pinyin: jù yù bào shuō jīn tiān de kōng qì shī dù shì bǎi fēn zhī liù shí。
english: It's said by forecast that the humidity in the air today is 60%.

hanzi: 我们可以根据你的特殊需要设计保险单。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ gēn jù nǐ de tè shū xū yào shè jì bǎo xiǎn shàn。
english: We can tailor the insurance policy according to your special needs.

hanzi: 我们班的学生比他们班的那些更不积极。
pinyin: wǒ men bān de xué sheng bì tā men bān de nà xiē gèng bù jī jí。
english: The student of our class is not positively than those of their class.

hanzi: 简伸长脖子张望，在人群中找她的母亲。
pinyin: jiǎn shēn cháng bó zi zhāng wàng， zài rén qún zhòng zhǎo tā de mǔ qīn。
english: Jane craned her neck to look for her mother in the crowd.

hanzi: 这段时间的失业人数又达到了创纪录水平。
pinyin: zhè duàn shí jiān de shī yè rén shù yòu dá dào le chuàng jì lù shuǐ píng。
english: In this period, unemployment reaches record levels.

hanzi: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合.
pinyin: huǒ jǐng jǐng bào xiǎng shí quán tǐ rén yuán yìng dào lóu wài jí hé.
english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.

hanzi: 她显然丝毫也不顾及别人以及别人的感情.
pinyin: tā xiǎn ran sī háo yě bù gù jí bié rén yǐ jí bié rén de gǎn qíng.
english: She shows a total disregard for other people and their feelings.

hanzi: 总统有六名警卫员时时刻刻在左右保卫.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng yǒu liù míng jǐng wèi yuán shí shí kè kè zài zuǒ yòu bǎo wèi.
english: The President always has six bodyguards in close attendance.

hanzi: 我可以向你保证，你儿子在这里会很快乐的。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ xiàng nǐ bǎo zhèng， nǐ ér zi zài zhè lǐ kuài hěn kuài yuè de。
english: I can assure you that your son will be happy here.

hanzi: 服用药片很容易, 只须放在口中咽下即可.
pinyin: fú yòng yào piàn hěn róng yì,  zhǐ xū fàng zài kǒu zhòng yè xià jí kě.
english: Taking pills is easy; just put them in your mouth and swallow.

hanzi: 我们为这一项目付出了大量的时间和精力.
pinyin: wǒ men wèi zhè yí xiàng mù fù chū le dà liàng de shí jiān huò jīng lì.
english: We've put a great deal of time and effort into this project.

hanzi: 完成这个工程花费了他们十亿多美元。
pinyin: wán chéng zhè gè gōng chéng huā fèi le tā men shí yì duō měi yuán。
english: It took them more than one billion dollars to complete the project.

hanzi: 我认为我们对这一问题已差不多是言无不尽了.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi wǒ men duì zhè yī wèn tí yǐ cī bù duō shì yán wú bù jìn le.
english: I think we've just about exhausted that subject.

hanzi: 合同中有一条款禁止承租人转租房屋。
pinyin: hé tong zhòng yǒu yī tiáo kuǎn jìn zhǐ chéng zū rén zhuàn zū fáng wū。
english: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet.

hanzi: 我最诚恳地请求你重新考虑一下你的立场.
pinyin: wǒ zuì chéng kěn de qǐng qiú nǐ chóng xīn kǎo lu:4 yī xià nǐ de lì chǎng.
english: I conjure you most earnestly to reconsider your position.

hanzi: 她放弃职业结婚以后有一种失落感。
pinyin: tā fàng qì zhí yè jié hūn yǐ hòu yǒu yī zhòng shī luò gǎn。
english: She experienced a loss of identity after giving up her career to get married.

hanzi: 爱你的敌人吧，因为他们让你知道自己的缺点。
pinyin: ài nǐ de dí rén ba， yīn wèi tā men ràng nǐ zhī dào zì jǐ de quē diǎn。
english: Love your enemies, for they tell you your faults.

hanzi: 运动和身体的关系，如同思考和头脑的关系。
pinyin: yùn dòng huò shēn tǐ de guān xi， rú tóng sī kǎo huò tóu nǎo de guān xi。
english: Exercise is to the body what thinking is to the brain.

hanzi: 我们的电动汽车是一项令人鼓舞的新发明.
pinyin: wǒ men de diàn dòng qì chē shì yí xiàng lìng rén gǔ wǔ de xīn fā míng.
english: Our electrically-powered car is an exciting new development.

hanzi: 他不仅以才能出名，而且是出名的好心。
pinyin: tā bù jǐn yǐ cái néng chū míng， ér qiě shì chū míng de hǎo xīn。
english: He is famous not only for his talent but (also) for his kindness.

hanzi: 庄园周围有一堵高墙, 使他们不受外界打扰.
pinyin: zhuāng yuán zhōu wéi yǒu yī dǔ gāo qiáng,  shǐ tā men bù shòu wài jiè dǎ rǎo.
english: A high wall round the estate protected their privacy.

hanzi: 汽车展览会上展出了今年所有的新型号。
pinyin: qì chē zhǎn lǎn huì shàng zhǎn chū le jīn nián suǒ yǒu de xīn xíng hào。
english: All this year's new models are displayed at the motor show.

hanzi: 电视观众来信表示对当前节目不满.
pinyin: diàn shì guān zhòng lái xìn biǎo shì duì dāng qián jié mù bù mǎn.
english: Letters from viewers express their dissatisfaction with current programmes.

hanzi: 一般而论这家新闻社的工作是让人感激的。
pinyin: yì bān ér lùn zhè jiā xīn wén shè de gōng zuò shì ràng rén gǎn jī de。
english: By and large the work of the news agency is appreciative.

hanzi: 她的歌声优美，此外，她的舞也跳得不错。
pinyin: tā de gē shēng yōu měi， cǐ wài， tā de wǔ yě tiào de bù cuò。
english: She sings beautifully; what is (far) better/more, she dances well.

hanzi: 政府已经采取了措施以确保物价稳定。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ jīng cǎi qǔ le cuò shī yǐ què bǎo wù jià wěn dìng。
english: The government has taken a measure to maintain the stability of prices.

hanzi: 我躺下来与其说是要睡觉，倒不如说是要思考。
pinyin: wǒ tǎng xia lai yǔ qí shuō shì yào shuì jiào， dào bù rú shuō shì yào sī kǎo。
english: I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.

hanzi: 那件紧身套头毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子.
pinyin: nà jiàn jǐn shēn tào tou máo yī fǎn gèng tū chū le tā nà féi pán de dù zi.
english: The tight jumper only accentuated his fat stomach.

hanzi: 诗人表达了他对所爱的女子火一般的激情。
pinyin: shī rén biǎo dá le tā duì suǒ ài de nu:3 zǐ huǒ yì bān de jī qíng。
english: The poet expressed his burning passion for the woman he loved.

hanzi: 试验没有成功，尽管如此，还是值得做的。
pinyin: shì yàn méi yǒu chéng gōng， jǐn guǎn rú cǐ， hái shì zhí de zuò de。
english: The experiment failed. It was, nevertheless, worth making.

hanzi: 为发展业务, 我们决定开一家分公司。
pinyin: wèi fā zhǎn yè wù,  wǒ men jué dìng kāi yī jiā fèn gōng sī。
english: With a view to develop our business, we decided to establish a branch office.

hanzi: 这个国家的经济在很大程度上依靠其旅游业。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā de jīng jì zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng yī kào qí lu:3 yóu yè。
english: The country depends heavily on its tourist trade.

hanzi: 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响。
pinyin: xīn zhì dù yǐ duì shēng chǎn lì zào chéng le zāi nàn xìng de yǐng xiǎng。
english: The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity.

hanzi: 没表示否定, 其含义可能理解为是肯定的.
pinyin: mò biǎo shì fǒu dìng,  qí hán yì kě néng lǐ jiě wèi shì kěn dìng de.
english: Failure to say `No' may, by implication, be taken to mean `Yes'.

hanzi: 他们自信地等待我自己发现事实真相。
pinyin: tā men zì xìn de děng dài wǒ zì jǐ fā xiàn shì shí zhēn xiàng。
english: They were waiting with assurance for me to discover the truth for myself.

hanzi: 在运输系统中，铁路的重要性逐渐下降。
pinyin: zài yùn shū xì tǒng zhòng， tiě lù de zhòng yào xìng zhú jiàn xià jiàng。
english: The role of the railways declined in the transport system.

hanzi: 在运输系统中，铁路的重要性逐渐下降。
pinyin: zài yùn shū xì tǒng zhòng， tiě lù de zhòng yào xìng zhú jiàn xià jiàng。
english: The role of the railways declined in the transport system.

hanzi: 每个星期五下班后，他去看望年迈的父母。
pinyin: měi gè xīng qī wǔ xià bān hòu， tā qù kàn wàng nián mài de fù mǔ。
english: He comes to visit his aged parents after work on every Friday.

hanzi: 我得大嚷大叫别人才能听见，我为此十分不快。
pinyin: wǒ de dà rǎng dà jiào bié rén cái néng tīng jiàn， wǒ wèi cǐ shí fēn bù kuài。
english: It irritated me to have to shout to be heard.

hanzi: 最近供暖设备已稍加改动以提高效率.
pinyin: zuì jìn gòng nuǎn shè bèi yǐ shāo jiā gǎi dòng yǐ tí gāo xiào lu:4.
english: The heating system has recently been modified to make it more efficient.

hanzi: 这三个人根据各自的能力被分配了工作。
pinyin: zhè sān gè rén gēn jù gè zi de néng lì bèi fēn pèi le gōng zuò。
english: The three men were given work according to their respective abilities.

hanzi: 这会引起污染，破坏我们的海洋和江河。
pinyin: zhè kuài yǐn qǐ wū rǎn， pò huài wǒ men de hǎi yáng huò jiāng hé。
english: It will cause pollution and the destruction of our seas and oceans.

hanzi: 这些蔬菜煮的时间太长了，都煮成糊了。
pinyin: zhè xie shū cài zhǔ de shí jiān tài cháng le， dōu zhǔ chéng hù le。
english: These vegetables have been boiling too long; they're cooked to a pulp.

hanzi: 他们邀请我们将来到那里时去他们家做客.
pinyin: tā men yāo qǐng wǒ men jiāng lái dào nà li shí qù tā men jiā zuò kè.
english: We have a standing invitation to visit them when we're in the area.

hanzi: 表否定的将一个词的意义由肯定变为否定的
pinyin: biǎo fǒu dìng de jiàng yī gè cí de yì yì yóu kěn dìng biàn wèi fǒu dìng de
english: Altering the meaning of a term from positive to negative.

hanzi: 那项政策经修改后才获得委员会同意。
pinyin: nà xiàng zhèng cè jīng xiū gǎi hòu cái huò dé wěi yuán huì tóng yì。
english: The policy was agreed by the committee, but only in a modified form.

hanzi: 法律面前人人平等是被认为理所当然的。
pinyin: fǎ lu:4 miàn qián rén rén píng děng shì bèi rèn wéi lǐ suǒ dāng rán de。
english: It is taken for granted that everyone is equal before the law.

hanzi: 那个流浪者把所有的东西捆成一包背在背上.
pinyin: nèi gè liú làng zhě bǎ suǒ yǒu de dōng xi kǔn chéng yī bāo bèi zài bèi shàng.
english: The tramp carried his belongings in a pack on his back.

hanzi: 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。
pinyin: wú xiàn de nài xīn shǐ tā chéng wéi zhè gè yī yuàn zuì hǎo de hù shi。
english: Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.

hanzi: 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。
pinyin: wú xiàn de nài xīn shǐ tā chéng wéi zhè gè yī yuàn zuì hǎo de hù shi。
english: Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.

hanzi: 文化交流是国与国之间建立联系的桥梁.
pinyin: wén huà jiāo liú shì guó yù guó zhī jiān jiàn lì lián xì de qiáo liáng.
english: Cultural exchanges are a way of building bridges between nations.

hanzi: 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。
pinyin: wú xiàn de nài xīn shǐ tā chéng wéi zhè gè yī yuàn zuì hǎo de hù shi。
english: Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.

hanzi: 虽然任务艰巨，他们还是设法及时完成。
pinyin: suī rán rèn wu jiān jù， tā men hái shì shè fǎ jí shí wán chéng。
english: Difficult though the task was, they managed to accomplish it in time.

hanzi: 我们将按照历史上的先后顺序研究这些事件。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng àn zhào lì shǐ shàng de xiān hòu shùn xù yán jiū zhè xie shì jiàn。
english: We will deal with events in historical sequence.

hanzi: 我们将按照历史上的先后顺序研究这些事件。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng àn zhào lì shǐ shàng de xiān hòu shùn xù yán jiū zhè xie shì jiàn。
english: We will deal with events in historical sequence.

hanzi: 印刷术的发明在社会上引起了重大的变化.
pinyin: yìn shuà zhú de fā míng zài shè huì shàng yǐn qǐ le zhòng dà de biàn huà.
english: The invention of printing caused important changes in society.

hanzi: 从他最近的表现来看，他应该很容易考及格。
pinyin: zòng tā zuì jìn de biǎo xiàn lái kàn， tā yīng gāi hěn róng yì kǎo jí gé。
english: Judge by recent form, he shall easily pass the exam.

hanzi: 她发觉退休后很难建立起新的生活规律。
pinyin: tā fā jué tuì xiū hòu hěn nàn jiàn lì qǐ xīn de shēng huó guī lu:4。
english: She found it difficult to establish a new routine after retirement.

hanzi: 这个模型是由球和杆组成的结构, 样子很奇特.
pinyin: zhè gè mó xíng shì yóu qiú huò gǎn zǔ chéng de jié gòu,  yàng zi hěn qí tè.
english: The model is an odd-looking structure of balls and rods.

hanzi: 有些教师觉得课堂秩序很难维持.
pinyin: yǒu xiē jiào shī jué de kè táng zhì xù hěn nàn wéi chí.
english: Some teachers find it difficult to keep order in their classes/to keep their classes in order.

hanzi: 她假装很喜欢他们，借以获得他们的帮助。
pinyin: tā jiǎ zhuāng hěn xǐ huan tā men， jiè yǐ huò dé tā men de bāng zhù。
english: She pretends that she likes them so that she can get their help.

hanzi: 青春期对人的性格形成是非常重要的。
pinyin: qīng chūn qī duì rén de xìng gé xíng chéng shì fēi cháng zhòng yào de。
english: The period of adolescence is very important in forming one's character.

hanzi: 这两个国家因为外交争端即将开战。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè guó jiā yīn wèi wài jiāo zhēng duān jí jiāng kāi zhàn。
english: The two countries were on the point of war due to the diplomatic disputes.

hanzi: 这个男孩下定决心成为一个优秀的建筑师。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái xià dìng jué xīn chéng wéi yī gè yōu xiù de jiàn zhú shī。
english: The boy made up his mind to become an excellent architect.

hanzi: 在离开办公室之前, 应把所有物品摆放好。
pinyin: zài lí kāi bàn gōng shì zhī qián,  yìng bǎ suǒ yǒu wù pǐn bǎi fàng hào。
english: Before you leave the office, everything should be put in place.

hanzi: 我算是放了暑假了, 但却未能真正休息.
pinyin: wǒ suàn shì fàng le shǔ jià le,  dàn què wèi néng zhēn zhèng xiū xi.
english: I had a kind of/sort of holiday in the summer but I couldn't really relax.

hanzi: 他喜欢深入研读他所选定的任何一门学科。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan shēn rù yán dú tā suǒ xuǎn dìng de rèn hé yī mén xué kē。
english: He likes to read deeply in any subject that he chooses to study.

hanzi: 这种冒险成分更给探险活动平添几分乐趣.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng mào xiǎn chéng fèn gèng jǐ tàn xiǎn huó dòng píng tiān jǐ fèn lè qù.
english: The element of risk gave (an) added zest to the adventure.

hanzi: 他总是到处乱闯，直到我叫他停才停了下来。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì dào chù luàn chuǎng， zhí dào wǒ jiào tā tíng cái tíng le xia lai。
english: He kept on barging about until I told him to stop.

hanzi: 这些蔬菜煮的时间太长了，都煮成糊了。
pinyin: zhè xie shū cài zhǔ de shí jiān tài cháng le， dōu zhǔ chéng hù le。
english: These vegetables have been boiling too long; they're cooked to a pulp.

hanzi: 我曾想带他去钓鱼，但我不好意思对他开口。
pinyin: wǒ zēng xiǎng dài tā qù diào yú， dàn wǒ bù hǎo yì si duì tā kāi kǒu。
english: I wanted to take him fishing but I was too timid to ask him.

hanzi: 我真想说一句, 叫他们谈话放严肃些....
pinyin: wǒ zhēn xiǎng shuō yī jù,  jiào tā men tán huà fàng yán sù xiē....
english: If I could intrude a note of seriousness into this frivolous conversation...

hanzi: 草案初步的草案或计划，如工程或建议的草案
pinyin: cǎo àn chū bù de cǎo àn huò jì huà， rú gōng chéng huò jiàn yì de cǎo àn
english: A preliminary draft or plan, as of a project or proposal.

hanzi: 某位哲学家认为, 存在的事物都是合理的。
pinyin: mǒu wèi zhé xué jiā rèn wéi,  cún zài de shì wù dōu shì hé lǐ de。
english: According to some philosopher, everything in existence is reasonable.

hanzi: 他的设想很好, 但实行起来却糟糕透顶.
pinyin: tā de shè xiǎng hěn hǎo,  dàn shí xíng qǐ lai què zāo gāo tòu dǐng.
english: His original idea was good, but his execution of the scheme was disastrous.

hanzi: 你不能穿那种衣服出席招待会--不太庄重.
pinyin: nǐ bù néng chuān nà zhòng yī fu chū xí zhāo dài huì-- bù tài zhuāng zhòng.
english: You can't wear that to the reception it's not dressy enough.

hanzi: 在今日的交易中, 日元已升值到历史的最高水平.
pinyin: zài jīn rì de jiāo yì zhòng,  rì yuán yǐ shēng zhí dào lì shǐ de zuì gāo shuǐ píng.
english: The yen hit a record high in trading today.

hanzi: 经过多月的努力, 这本新书渐渐像个样子了.
pinyin: jīng guò duō yuè de nǔ lì,  zhè běn xīn shū jiàn jiàn xiàng gè yàng zi le.
english: After months of work, the new book is gradually taking shape.

hanzi: 他是她的私人秘书, 能接触到她所有的信件.
pinyin: tā shì tā de sī rén mì shū,  néng jiē chù dào tā suǒ yǒu de xìn jiàn.
english: As her private secretary he has access to all her correspondence.

hanzi: 解放后这个国家的农业得到了巨大的发展。
pinyin: jiě fàng hòu zhè gè guó jiā de nóng yè dé dào le jù dà de fā zhǎn。
english: Agriculture in this country has developed greatly after liberation.

hanzi: 仔细研究市场情况是取得成功的先决条件.
pinyin: zǐ xì yán jiū shì chǎng qíng kuàng shì qǔ dé chéng gōng de xiān jué tiáo jiàn.
english: Careful study of the market is a prerequisite for success.

hanzi: 两个队都表现了高超的技艺和优良的作风。
pinyin: liǎng gè duì dōu biǎo xiàn le gāo chāo de jì yì huò yōu liáng de zuò fēng。
english: Both teams displayed first-rate technique and a fine spirit.

hanzi: 演完戏之后, 他们要求作者出来和大家见面。
pinyin: yǎn wán xì zhī hòu,  tā men yāo qiú zuó zhě chū lai huò dà jiā jiàn miàn。
english: After the play they called for the author to show himself.

hanzi: 在所有商品中, 我对棉布特别感兴趣。
pinyin: zài suǒ yǒu shāng pǐn zhòng,  wǒ duì mián bù tè bié gǎn xìng qu。
english: Among all the merchandise, I was interested in the cotton piece in particular.

hanzi: 恐怕我的方位感很差，因此我容易迷路。
pinyin: kǒng pà wǒ de fāng wèi gǎn hěn cī， yīn cǐ wǒ róng yì mí lù。
english: I'm afraid I haven't got a very good sense of directions, so I easily get lost.

hanzi: 他原来很著急, 我总算把他的情绪稳定下来了.
pinyin: tā yuán lái hěn著 jí,  wǒ zǒng suàn bǎ tā de qíng xù wěn dìng xia lai le.
english: He had been quite anxious, but I managed to settle his mind.

hanzi: 这个价钱把全部固定装置和设备都打在里面了。
pinyin: zhè gè jià qian bǎ quán bù gù dìng zhuāng zhì huò shè bèi dōu dǎ zài lǐ miàn le。
english: The price includes all fixtures and fittings.

hanzi: 他答应赶紧写好报告，今天就给我们送来。
pinyin: tā dā ying gǎn jǐn xiě hào bào gào， jīn tiān jiù jǐ wǒ men sòng lái。
english: He promised to hurry on with the report and send it to us today.

hanzi: 你的说法完全不真实，我要求立即道歉。
pinyin: nǐ de shuō fa wán quán bù zhēn shí， wǒ yāo qiú lì jí dào qiàn。
english: Your allegations are completely untrue, and I demand an immediate apology.

hanzi: 他们装出信心十足的样子却欺骗不了任何人。
pinyin: tā men zhuāng chū xìn xīn shí zú de yàng zi què qī piàn bù liǎo rèn hé rén。
english: Their assumptions of an air of confidence fooled nobody.

hanzi: 我上司让我给这位新网球冠军写篇小传。
pinyin: wǒ shàng si ràng wǒ jǐ zhè wèi xīn wǎng qiú guàn jūn xiě piān xiǎo zhuàn。
english: My boss asked me to write a profile for the new tennis champion.

hanzi: 这种冒险成分更给探险活动平添几分乐趣.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng mào xiǎn chéng fèn gèng jǐ tàn xiǎn huó dòng píng tiān jǐ fèn lè qù.
english: The element of risk gave (an) added zest to the adventure.

hanzi: 他应该主动提出付款--他有的是钱, 别忘了.
pinyin: tā yīng gāi zhǔ dòng tí chū fù kuǎn-- tā yǒu de shì qián,  biè wàng le.
english: He should have offered to pay he has plenty of money, after all.

hanzi: 一名通讯员被派去给前线士兵送消息。
pinyin: yī míng tōng xùn yuán bèi pài qù jǐ qián xiàn shì bīng sòng xiāo xi。
english: A messenger was despatched to take the news to the soldiers at the front.

hanzi: 吵闹声不绝于耳，我很难保持精神集中。
pinyin: chǎo nào shēng bù jué yú ěr， wǒ hěn nán bǎo chí jīng shén jí zhōng。
english: I found it hard to keep my concentration with such a noise going on.

hanzi: 如果你一直呆在家里，就永远不会有生活经验。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ yī zhí dāi zài jiā lǐ， jiù yǒng yuǎn bù huì yǒu shēng huó jīng yàn。
english: You'll never see life if you stay at home forever.

hanzi: 委员会决定取消对他那项计划的资助。
pinyin: wěi yuán huì jué dìng qǔ xiāo duì tā nà xiàng jì huà de zī zhù。
english: The committee decided to make a withdrawal of financial support for his scheme.

hanzi: 看到他仍然像以前一样健康，真叫人安心。
pinyin: kàn dào tā réng rán xiàng yǐ qián yí yàng jiàn kāng， zhēn jiào rén ān xīn。
english: It is a great relief to see him still as strong as he was.

hanzi: 那年轻画家的作品已在几家美术馆中展出.
pinyin: nà nián qīng huà jiā de zuò pǐn yǐ zài jǐ jiā měi shù guǎn zhòng zhǎn chū.
english: The young painter has exhibited (his work) in several galleries.

hanzi: 那位老师看着他所有的学生走进阅览室。
pinyin: nà wèi lǎo shī kàn zhuó tā suǒ yǒu de xué sheng zǒu jìn yuè lǎn shì。
english: That teacher is looking his all students walk into the reading room.

hanzi: 他的发现使我们的科学知识的面貌为之一新。
pinyin: tā de fā xiàn shǐ wǒ men de kē xué zhī shi de miàn mào wèi zhī yī xīn。
english: His discoveries have put a new face on our scientific knowledge.

hanzi: 这项研究仅仅是重复别人已经做过的工作。
pinyin: zhè xiàng yán jiū jǐn jǐn shì chóng fù bié rén yǐ jīng zuò guò de gōng zuò。
english: This research merely duplicates work already done elsewhere.

hanzi: 我们很早就动身去车站以便赶上头班火车。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn zǎo jiù dòng shēn qù chē zhàn yǐ biàn gǎn shàng tou bān huǒ chē。
english: We left for the station so early as to catch the first train.

hanzi: 她尽管很想再见到他, 但却不愿给他回信.
pinyin: tā jǐn guǎn hěn xiǎng zài jiàn dào tā,  dàn què bù yuàn jǐ tā huí xìn.
english: Despite wanting to see him again, she refused to reply to his letters.

hanzi: 让我看看买卖这块土地的所有官方文件。
pinyin: ràng wǒ kàn kan mǎi mài zhè kuài tǔ dì de suǒ yǒu guān fāng wén jiàn。
english: Let me see all the official documents concerning the sale of this land.

hanzi: 我警告你，如果你再这样干，我们就要处分你了。
pinyin: wǒ jǐng gào nǐ， rú guǒ nǐ zài zhè yàng gàn， wǒ men jiù yào chǔ fēn nǐ le。
english: I warn you if you do that again We'll punish you.

hanzi: 政府还没有找出对付失业的有效措施。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ huán méi yǒu zhǎo chū duì fu shī yè de yǒu xiào cuò shī。
english: The government hasn't worked out the effectual measures to combat unemployment.

hanzi: 恐怕我的方位感很差，因此我容易迷路。
pinyin: kǒng pà wǒ de fāng wèi gǎn hěn cī， yīn cǐ wǒ róng yì mí lù。
english: I'm afraid I haven't got a very good sense of directions, so I easily get lost.

hanzi: 我能使用文字处理机, 但不了解其运转机制.
pinyin: wǒ néng shǐ yòng wén zì chǔ lǐ jī,  dàn bù liǎo xiè qí yùn zhuǎn jī zhì.
english: I can use a word processor but I don't understand its operation.

hanzi: 电脑控制板上有许多小灯和电子设备。
pinyin: diàn nǎo kòng zhì bǎn shàng yǒu xǔ duō xiǎo dēng huò diàn zǐ shè bèi。
english: There are many lights and electrical instruments on the computer console.

hanzi: 人们普遍认为她是该国最优秀的作家之一。
pinyin: rén men pǔ biàn rèn wéi tā shì gāi guó zuì yōu xiù de zuò jiā zhī yī。
english: She is generally regarded as one of the best writers in the country.

hanzi: 助学金通常在大学一年级之后逐渐减少。
pinyin: zhù xué jīn tōng cháng zài dà xué yī nián jí zhī hòu zhú jiàn jiǎn shǎo。
english: Financial aids generally taper off after the first year of college.

hanzi: 她把糖放进咖啡里，用勺子把它们混合起来。
pinyin: tā bǎ táng fàng jìn kā fēi lǐ， yòng sháo zi bǎ tā men hùn hé qǐ lai。
english: She put the sugar into the coffee and mixed them up with a spoon.

hanzi: 被围困在城里的老百姓已空运到安全地区.
pinyin: bèi wéi kùn zài chéng lǐ de lǎo bǎi xìng yǐ kōng yùn dào ān quán dì qū.
english: Civilians trapped in the beleaguered city have been airlifted to safety.

hanzi: 我们再怎样强调学英文的重要性也不为过。
pinyin: wǒ men zài zěn yàng qiáng diào xué Yīng wén de zhòng yào xìng yě bù wèi guò。
english: We cannot emphasize too much the importance of learning English.

hanzi: 这间屋子里放了一堆奇形怪状的破烂家具。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wū zi lǐ fàng le yī duī qí xíng guài zhuàng de pò làn jiā jù。
english: There is an odd assemblage of broken bits of furniture in this room.

hanzi: 既然雨下得这么大，你与其离开倒不如待在这儿。
pinyin: jì rán yǔ xià de zhè me dà， nǐ yǔ qí lí kāi dào bù rú dài zài zhèr。
english: Since it is raining hard, you may as well stay here as leave.

hanzi: 气候学对气候及其引起的现象进行的气象研究
pinyin: qì hòu xué duì qì hòu jí qí yǐn qǐ de xiàn xiàng jìn xíng de qì xiàng yán jiū
english: The meteorological study of climates and their phenomena.

hanzi: 他不得不忍住悲痛，继续照常在车间干活。
pinyin: tā bù dé bù rěn zhù bēi tòng， jì xù zhào cháng zài chē jiàn gàn huó。
english: He was obliged to swallow his grief and work in the shop as usual.

hanzi: 新的汽车设计具备最新安全措施的一切特点。
pinyin: xīn de qì chē shè jì jù bèi zuì xīn ān quán cuò shī de yī qiè tè diǎn。
english: The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features.

hanzi: 到这次新闻发布时, 贸易量已达到最低点。
pinyin: dào zhè cì xīn wén fā bù shí,  mào yì liàng yǐ dá dào zuì dī diǎn。
english: At the time of this news release, trading had reached its lowest point.

hanzi: 我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌.
pinyin: wǒ men gēn jù kǒng lóng de yī xiē gú tou chóng zǔ kǒng lóng de yuán mào.
english: We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones.

hanzi: 他一方面受到批评，另一方面却受到鼓励。
pinyin: tā yī fāng miàn shòu dào pī píng， lìng yī fāng miàn què shòu dào gǔ lì。
english: He has been criticized on one hand and encouraged on the other.

hanzi: 正如他所指出的那样，一切反动派都是纸老虎。
pinyin: zhèng rú tā suǒ zhǐ chū de nà yàng， yī qiè fǎn dòng pài dōu shì zhǐ lǎo hǔ。
english: As he pointed out, all reactionaries are paper tiger.

hanzi: 礼拜仪式倡用人运用或提倡运用礼拜仪式的人
pinyin: lǐ bài yí shì chàng yòng rén yùn yòng huò tí chàng yùn yòng lǐ bài yí shì de rén
english: One who uses or advocates the use of liturgical forms.

hanzi: 消防队到达时, 整座建筑物正在熊熊燃烧著.
pinyin: xiāo fáng duì dào dá shí,  zhěng zuò jiàn zhù wù zhèng zài xióng xióng rán shāo著.
english: When the firemen arrived the whole building was blazing.

hanzi: 这项工作需要我拿出自己的全部精力和耐性。
pinyin: zhè xiàng gōng zuò xū yào wǒ ná chū zì jǐ de quán bù jīng lì huò nài xìng。
english: The job called for all my resources of energy and patience.

hanzi: 他们为穷人准备了米，面及其它各种食物。
pinyin: tā men wèi qióng rén zhǔn bèi le mǐ， miàn jí qí tā gè zhǒng shí wù。
english: They prepared rice, flour and sundry other items of food for the poor.

hanzi: 他们拒绝签约，从而使我们的处境有些困难。
pinyin: tā men jù jué qiān yuē， cóng ér shǐ wǒ men de chǔ jìng yǒu xiē kùn nan。
english: Their refusal to sign the contract has put us in a bit of a bind.

hanzi: 除了没挂名以外，实际上他就是委员会的主席。
pinyin: chú le mò guà míng yǐ wài， shí jì shàng tā jiù shì wěi yuán huì de zhǔ xí。
english: He is the chairman of the committee in all but the name.

hanzi: 考期临近了, 所以学生们确实在刻苦钻研。
pinyin: kǎo qī lín jìn le,  suǒ yǐ xué sheng men què shí zài kè kǔ zuān yán。
english: Now that the exam is near, the students are really going at their studies.

hanzi: 充分利用自然资源的愿望终究会实现。
pinyin: chōng fèn lì yòng zì rán zī yuán de yuàn wàng zhōng jiū kuài shí xiàn。
english: The wish of fully utilizing the natural resources will eventually come true.

hanzi: 我这篇小说中所有的地点和人物都是虚构的.
pinyin: wǒ zhè piān xiǎo shuō zhòng suǒ yǒu de dì diǎn huò rén wù dōu shì xū gòu de.
english: All the places and characters in my novel are entirely fictitious.

hanzi: 由于找不到工作，许我男人都报名参了军。
pinyin: yóu yú zhǎo bù dào gōng zuò， xǔ wǒ nán rén dōu bào míng shēn le jūn。
english: Many men sign up for the army because they can not get ordinary jobs.

hanzi: 这个报告使整个方针发生了决定性的变化。
pinyin: zhè gè bào gào shǐ zhěng gè fāng zhēn fā shēng le jué dìng xìng de biàn huà。
english: The report brought about a decisive change in the whole policy.

hanzi: 今天早上我在超级市场碰见了一个老同学。
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo shang wǒ zài chāo jí shì chǎng pèng jiàn le yī gè lǎo tóng xué。
english: I ran into an old schoolfriend at the supermarket this morning.

hanzi: 党的领导人的各种观点已统一为一致的政策.
pinyin: dǎng de lǐng dǎo rén de gè zhǒng guān diǎn yǐ tǒng yī wèi yī zhì de zhèng cè.
english: The views of party leaders coalesced to form a coherent policy.

hanzi: 只要红灯一亮，就表示有危及职工的险情。
pinyin: zhǐ yào hóng dēng yī liàng， jiù biǎo shì yǒu wēi jí zhí gōng de xiǎn qíng。
english: Only if the red light comes on is there any danger to employee.

hanzi: 充分利用自然资源的愿望终究会实现。
pinyin: chōng fèn lì yòng zì rán zī yuán de yuàn wàng zhōng jiū kuài shí xiàn。
english: The wish of fully utilizing the natural resources will eventually come true.

hanzi: 我曾想带他去钓鱼，但我不好意思对他开口。
pinyin: wǒ zēng xiǎng dài tā qù diào yú， dàn wǒ bù hǎo yì si duì tā kāi kǒu。
english: I wanted to take him fishing but I was too timid to ask him.

hanzi: 别尽用那种专门术语--用普通的词语解释吧.
pinyin: biè jìn yòng nà zhòng zhuān mén shù yǔ-- yòng pǔ tōng de cí yǔ jiě shì ba.
english: Don't use all that technical lingo try and explain in plain English.

hanzi: 通常, 是男士伸出手来邀请女士跳舞。
pinyin: tōng cháng,  shì nán shì shēn chū shǒu lái yāo qǐng nu:3 shì tiào wǔ。
english: As a rule, it's the gentleman that holds out his hand to invite a lady to dance.

hanzi: 老教授主持了一次理论物理学家的研讨会。
pinyin: lǎo jiào shòu zhǔ chí le yī cì lǐ lùn wù lǐ xué jiā de yán tǎo huì。
english: The old professor had presided over a seminar for theoretical physicists.

hanzi: 既然雨下得这么大，你与其离开倒不如待在这儿。
pinyin: jì rán yǔ xià de zhè me dà， nǐ yǔ qí lí kāi dào bù rú dài zài zhèr。
english: Since it is raining hard, you may as well stay here as leave.

hanzi: 那位作家拒绝和他们的出版社进一步商讨。
pinyin: nà wèi zuò jiā jù jué huò tā men de chū bǎn shè jìn yí bù shāng tǎo。
english: The writer refused to make further negotiations with their publisher.

hanzi: 尽管有那么多困难，我们仍然及时地到达了这儿。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn yǒu nà me duō kùn nan， wǒ men réng rán jí shí de dào dá le zhèr。
english: Disregarding all the difficulties, we arrived here in time.

hanzi: 他在一家汽车旅馆呆了一晚上，就又接着旅行了。
pinyin: tā zài yī jiā qì chē lu:3 guǎn dāi le yī wǎn shang， jiù yòu jiē zhe lu:3 xíng le。
english: He stayed one night in a motel and went on travelling.

hanzi: 他们虽然没有得到官方的支持, 但仍继续奋斗.
pinyin: tā men suī rán méi yǒu dé dào guān fāng de zhī chí,  dàn réng jì xù fèn dòu.
english: Though they lack official support they continue their struggle.

hanzi: 我必须找一个人，在我离开期间代理我的职务。
pinyin: wǒ bì xū zhǎo yī gè rén， zài wǒ lí kāi qī jiān dài lǐ wǒ de zhí wù。
english: I must find someone to act as a deputy for me during my absence.

hanzi: 这两样东西外表相同，但本质上却不样。
pinyin: zhè liǎng yàng dōng xi wài biǎo xiāng tóng， dàn běn zhì shàng què bù yàng。
english: The two things are the same in outward form but different in essence.

hanzi: 在我看来，这次演出恐怕不能算是完全成功的。
pinyin: zài wǒ kàn lai， zhè cì yǎn chū kǒng pà bù néng suàn shì wán quán chéng gōng de。
english: I'm afraid that the performance was not a total success.

hanzi: 她并不聪明，但在其他方面，她倒是个好姑娘。
pinyin: tā bìng bù cōng míng， dàn zài qí tā fāng miàn， tā dào shì gè hào gū niang。
english: She is not very clever, but otherwise she's a nice girl.

hanzi: 我们的电费已经高得付不起了--得节省些了.
pinyin: wǒ men de diàn fèi yǐ jīng gāo de fù bù qǐ le-- de jié shěng xiē le.
english: Our electricity bills are higher than we can afford we must start to economize.

hanzi: 我这篇小说中所有的地点和人物都是虚构的.
pinyin: wǒ zhè piān xiǎo shuō zhòng suǒ yǒu de dì diǎn huò rén wù dōu shì xū gòu de.
english: All the places and characters in my novel are entirely fictitious.

hanzi: 在孩子们住院期间, 有个私人教师给他们上课.
pinyin: zài hái zi men zhù yuàn qī jiān,  yǒu gè sī rén jiào shī jǐ tā men shàng kè.
english: There is a tutor to teach the children while they're in hospital.

hanzi: 消防队员需用呼吸器械才能进入燃烧著的房屋.
pinyin: xiāo fáng duì yuán xū yòng hū xī qì xiè cái néng jìn rù rán shāo著 de fáng wū.
english: Firemen needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house.

hanzi: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。
pinyin: zhè zuò gē tè shì de dà jiào táng xī yǐn le shì jiè gè dì de yóu kè。
english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world.

hanzi: 我们的人口在增长，因此我们需要更多的食物。
pinyin: wǒ men de rén kǒu zài zēng zhǎng， yīn cǐ wǒ men xū yào gèng duō de shí wù。
english: We have a growing population and therefore we need more food.

hanzi: 我决不背离我已经宣布的在这个问题上的政策。
pinyin: wǒ jué bù bèi lí wǒ yǐ jīng xuān bù de zài zhè gè wèn tí shàng de zhèng cè。
english: I will never swerve from my declared policy on this matter.

hanzi: 我会尽力帮忙，但我所能做的也是有限度的。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jìn lì bāng máng， dàn wǒ suǒ néng zuò de yě shì yǒu xiàn dù de。
english: I'll help as much as I can, but there is a limit to what I can do.

hanzi: 政府正在实施一项新的帮助失业者的政策。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng zài shí shī yí xiàng xīn de bāng zhù shī yè zhě de zhèng cè。
english: The government is implementing a new policy to help the unemployed.

hanzi: 他们对普遍存在的反政府情绪感到很吃惊。
pinyin: tā men duì pǔ biàn cún zài de fǎn zhèng fǔ qíng xù gǎn dào hěn chī jīng。
english: They are so surprised by the prevalence of anti-government sentiments.

hanzi: 这幅画的照片绝妙地再现了原作的色彩。
pinyin: zhè fú huà de zhào piàn jué miào de zài xiàn le yuán zuò de sè cǎi。
english: The photograph of the painting reproduces the colors of the original extremely well.

hanzi: 你可以在这本书的第一部分找到你要的资料。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zài zhè běn shū de dì yī bù fen zhǎo dào nǐ yào de zī liào。
english: You may find the information you need in the first portion of the book.

hanzi: 这届国会结束时，好几个议案制定成为法律。
pinyin: zhè jiè guó huì jié shù shí， hǎo jǐ gè yì àn zhì dìng chéng wéi fǎ lu:4。
english: Several bills were enacted at the end of this session of Parliament.

hanzi: 着火的房子的冒出的烟在几个街区外都能看到。
pinyin: zháo huǒ de fáng zi de mào chū de yān zài jǐ ge jiē qū wài dōu néng kàn dào。
english: The smoke of the burning house could be seen many blocks away.

hanzi: 他掏出烟斗，装满烟丝，一言不发地抽了起来。
pinyin: tā tāo chū yān dòu， zhuāng mǎn yān sī， yī yán bù fà de chōu le qǐ lai。
english: Fishing out his pipe, he filled it and puffed at it without a word.

hanzi: 无限度的武器竞赛当然会增加战争的危险性。
pinyin: wú xiàn dù de wǔ qì jìng sài dāng rán kuài zēng jiā zhàn zhēng de wēi xiǎn xìng。
english: An unlimited arms race may well increase the danger of war.

hanzi: 被围困在城里的老百姓已空运到安全地区.
pinyin: bèi wéi kùn zài chéng lǐ de lǎo bǎi xìng yǐ kōng yùn dào ān quán dì qū.
english: Civilians trapped in the beleaguered city have been airlifted to safety.

hanzi: 不久她看出，她已经到达这座城市的郊区。
pinyin: bù jiǔ tā kàn chū， tā yǐ jīng dào dá zhè zuò chéng shì de jiāo qū。
english: Presently she recognized that she was already in the outskirts of the city.

hanzi: 他做临时工作已一年多了, 想找个固定的工作.
pinyin: tā zuò lín shí gōng zuò yǐ yī nián duō le,  xiǎng zhǎo gè gù dìng de gōng zuò.
english: He's been temping for over a year now and wants a permanent job.

hanzi: 我喜欢书架上所有的书，但这本是我最喜欢的。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan shū jià shàng suǒ yǒu de shū， dàn zhè běn shì wǒ zuì xǐ huan de。
english: I like all the books on the shelf but this one is my favorite.

hanzi: 我用毯子把病人的腿包了起来，让他暖和一点儿。
pinyin: wǒ yòng tǎn zi bǎ bìng rén de tuǐ bāo le qǐ lai， ràng tā nuǎn huó yī diǎnr。
english: I wrapped the rug around the sick man's legs to keep him warm.

hanzi: 经济知识对于理解这个问题是至关重要的。
pinyin: jīng jì zhī shi duì yú lǐ jiě zhè gè wèn tí shì zhì guān zhòng yào de。
english: A knowledge of economics is fundamental to any understanding of this problem.

hanzi: 直到一八八四年，第一个人造纤维才制造出来。
pinyin: zhí dào yī bā bā sì nián， dì yī gè rén zào xiān wéi cái zhì zào chū lai。
english: It was not until 1884 that the first artificial fiber was made.

hanzi: 他们从这次实验中只得到了一组不完整的答案。
pinyin: tā men zòng zhè cì shí yàn zhòng zhǐ dé dào le yī zǔ bù wán zhěng de dá àn。
english: They only got an incomplete set of results from the experiment.

hanzi: 直到一八八四年，第一个人造纤维才制造出来。
pinyin: zhí dào yī bā bā sì nián， dì yī gè rén zào xiān wéi cái zhì zào chū lai。
english: It was not until 1884 that the first artificial fiber was made.

hanzi: 那位革命者为避免被捕在地下躲藏了几个星期。
pinyin: nà wèi gé mìng zhě wèi bì miǎn bèi bǔ zài dì xià duǒ cáng le jǐ ge xīng qī。
english: The revolutionist eluded capture for weeks by hiding underground.

hanzi: 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身分。
pinyin: nèi gè xīn wén gōng zuò zhě bù xiǎng tòu lù xiāo xi tí gōng rén de shēn fèn。
english: The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.

hanzi: 窗户的一边是一面镜子，另一边挂着一幅画。
pinyin: chuāng hu de yī biān shì yī miàn jìng zi， lìng yī biān guà zhuó yī fú huà。
english: On one side of the window was a mirror, and on the other a painting.

hanzi: 这届国会结束时，好几个议案制定成为法律。
pinyin: zhè jiè guó huì jié shù shí， hǎo jǐ gè yì àn zhì dìng chéng wéi fǎ lu:4。
english: Several bills were enacted at the end of this session of Parliament.

hanzi: 我们前面的那辆汽车突然转入左边的小路上去了.
pinyin: wǒ men qián mian de nà liàng qì chē tū rán zhuǎn rù zuǒ biān de xiǎo lù shàng qù le.
english: The car in front of us suddenly branched off to the left.

hanzi: 好学生通常都知道如何及时迅速地总结知识。
pinyin: hào xué sheng tōng cháng dōu zhī dào rú hé jí shí xùn sù de zǒng jié zhī shi。
english: A good student usually knows how to sum up knowledge in good time.

hanzi: 读者来信版是读者们交换意见的有益园地。
pinyin: dú zhě lái xìn bǎn shì dú zhě men jiāo huàn yì jiàn de yǒu yì yuán de。
english: The letters page serves as a useful forum for the exchange of readers' views.

hanzi: 你可以从我的错误中得到教训，避免犯同样错误。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zòng wǒ de cuò wù zhòng dé dào jiào xun， bì miǎn fàn tóng yàng cuò wù。
english: You can profit by my mistakes and avoid them yourself.

hanzi: 在他们讨论我的前途时，我恨不得能偷偷旁观。
pinyin: zài tā men tǎo lùn wǒ de qián tú shí， wǒ hèn bù dé néng tōu tōu páng guān。
english: I wish I could be a fly on the wall when they discuss my future.

hanzi: 这个餐馆有公共卫生部门官员定期前来检查.
pinyin: zhè gè cān guǎn yǒu gōng gòng wèi shēng bù mén guān yuán dìng qī qián lái jiǎn chá.
english: The restaurant is visited regularly by public health officers.

hanzi: 该药本身并无害处, 但与酒类同服则有危险.
pinyin: gāi yào běn shēn bìng wú hài chù,  dàn yù jiǔ lèi tóng fú zé yǒu wēi xiǎn.
english: The drug is not harmful per se, but is dangerous when taken with alcohol.

hanzi: 她最近的一部小说在出版当年就印行了三次.
pinyin: tā zuì jìn de yī bù xiǎo shuō zài chū bǎn dāng nián jiù yìn xíng le sān cì.
english: Her last novel ran into three reprints in its first year of publication.

hanzi: 采用这种新方法无须再用手工检验产品。
pinyin: cǎi yòng zhè zhǒng xīn fāng fǎ wú xū zài yòng shǒu gōng jiǎn yàn chǎn pǐn。
english: This new process has eliminated the need for checking the products by hand.

hanzi: 你真走运, 不用出席那死气沉沉的招待会.
pinyin: nǐ zhēn zǒu yùn,  bù yòng chū xí nà sǐ qì chén chén de zhāo dài huì.
english: You can thank your lucky stars (that) you don't have to go to this dreary reception.

hanzi: 兴建新剧院的计画因资金短缺只好搁置起来.
pinyin: xīng jiàn xīn jù yuàn de jì huà yīn zī jīn duǎn quē zhǐ hǎo gē zhì qǐ lai.
english: The plans for a new theatre have had to be shelved because of lack of money.

hanzi: 没有海关的许可，这些货物是不允许出口的。
pinyin: méi yǒu hǎi guān de xǔ kě， zhè xie huò wù shì bù yǔn xǔ chū kǒu de。
english: The goods are not allowed to be exported without approbation of the customs.

hanzi: 在这样远景鼓舞下，他们打算修建更多的水渠。
pinyin: zài zhè yàng yuǎn jǐng gǔ wǔ xià， tā men dǎ suàn xiū jiàn gèng duō de shuǐ qú。
english: Inspired by these prospects, they planned to build more canals.

hanzi: 由于目前的价格情况，我方不得不调整报价。
pinyin: yóu yú mù qián de jià gé qíng kuàng， wǒ fāng bù dé bù tiáo zhěng bào jià。
english: Due to the present price level, we cannot help but adjust our offer.

hanzi: 老师说他将要从我们中选一个人作他的助手。
pinyin: lǎo shī shuō tā jiāng yào zòng wǒ men zhòng xuǎn yī gè rén zuò tā de zhù shǒu。
english: The teacher said that he would like to choose an assistant among us.

hanzi: 阅览室有许多学生，也有一些消磨时间的人。
pinyin: yuè lǎn shì yǒu xǔ duō xué sheng， yě yǒu yī xiē xiāo mò shí jiān de rén。
english: The reading room held many students, as well as a few time killers.

hanzi: 有些人生就一副好嗓子, 有些人则需要训练.
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén shēng jiù yī fù hào sǎng zi,  yǒu xiē rén zé xū yào xùn liàn.
english: Some people have naturally beautiful voices while others need to be trained.

hanzi: 如今有些年轻人穿的服装真会把你吓一跳。
pinyin: rú jīn yǒu xiē nián qīng rén chuān de fú zhuāng zhēn kuài bǎ nǐ xià yī tiào。
english: The clothes some young people wear nowadays really make your hair curl.

hanzi: 结果一见分晓, 部长立即举行了记者招待会.
pinyin: jié guǒ yī xiàn fèn xiǎo,  bù zhǎng lì jí jǔ xíng le jì zhě zhāo dài huì.
english: The Minister called a press conference as soon as the results were known.

hanzi: 机场当局已答应重新检查他们的安全措施。
pinyin: jī chǎng dāng jú yǐ dā ying chóng xīn jiǎn chá tā men de ān quán cuò shī。
english: The airport authorities have promised to review their security measurements.

hanzi: 他确实是想帮忙，然而事实上却只是帮倒忙。
pinyin: tā què shí shì xiǎng bāng máng， rán ér shì shí shàng què zhǐ shì bāng dào máng。
english: No doubt he means to help, but in fact he just get in the way.

hanzi: 他有点神经质，但他的妻子是一个非常稳重的人。
pinyin: tā yǒu diǎn shén jīng zhì， dàn tā de qī zi shì yī gè fēi cháng wěn zhòng de rén。
english: He is a bit neurotic, but his wife is a very stable person.

hanzi: 他的白头发与黑皮肤形成了鲜明的对比.
pinyin: tā de bái tóu fà yù hēi pí fū xíng chéng le xiān míng de duì bǐ.
english: His white hair was in sharp contrast to (ie was very noticeably different from) his dark skin.

hanzi: 在学习一种新语言时，词典是非常有用的工具。
pinyin: zài xué xí yī zhòng xīn yǔ yán shí， cí diǎn shì fēi cháng yǒu yòng de gōng jù。
english: A dictionary is an invaluable aid in learning a new language.

hanzi: 在图画中的天使通常是身穿白衣, 生有翅膀.
pinyin: zài tú huà zhòng dì tiān shǐ tōng cháng shì shēn chuān bái yì,  shēng yǒu chì bǎng.
english: Angels are usually shown in pictures dressed in white, with wings.

hanzi: 那个有名的运动员已经没有优势赢得那场比赛了。
pinyin: nèi gè yǒu míng de yùn dòng yuán yǐ jīng méi yǒu yōu shì yíng dé nà chǎng bǐ sài le。
english: The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.

hanzi: 我比较了复印件和原件，但是差别不是很大。
pinyin: wǒ bǐ jiào le fù yìn jiàn huò yuán jiàn， dàn shì chā bié bú shì hěn dà。
english: I compared the copy with the original, but there was not much difference.

hanzi: 我向你们保证那是真事, 以免有人觉得奇怪.
pinyin: wǒ xiàng nǐ men bǎo zhèng nà shì zhēn shì,  yǐ miǎn yǒu rén jué de qí guài.
english: Lest anyone should think it strange, let me assure you that it is quite true.

hanzi: 上诉法院宣布少年法院发出的照看命令无效。
pinyin: shàng sù fǎ yuàn xuān bù shào nián fǎ yuàn fā chū de zhào kàn mìng lìng wú xiào。
english: The appeal court quash the care order make by the juvenile court.

hanzi: 旅游团成员从导游那里拿到详细的日程表。
pinyin: lu:3 yóu tuán chéng yuán zòng dǎo yóu nà li ná dào xiáng xì de rì chéng biǎo。
english: The member of the group is given a detailed tour itinerary by the courier.

hanzi: 您知道，我们可以供应各种类型和尺码的机床。
pinyin: nín zhī dào， wǒ men kě yǐ gōng yìng gè zhǒng lèi xíng huò chǐ mǎ de jī chuáng。
english: As you know, we can supply machine tools of all types and size.

hanzi: 我想拦住他, 不让他进门, 可是他硬闯进来了.
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng lán zhù tā,  bù ràng tā jìn mén,  kě shì tā yìng chuǎng jìn lái le.
english: I tried to stop him coming through the door but he just barged (his way) in.

hanzi: 演讲单调乏味，不久，听众就开始陆续离席了。
pinyin: yǎn jiǎng dān diào fá wèi， bù jiǔ， tīng zhòng jiù kāi shǐ lù xù lí xí le。
english: The lecture was so dull that soon the audience begin to drop away.

hanzi: 他不断要求我们帮助他，过分利用了我们对他的好意。
pinyin: tā bù duàn yāo qiú wǒ men bāng zhù tā， guò fèn lì yòng le wǒ men duì tā de hào yì。
english: His constant requests for help taxed our goodwill.

hanzi: 我们尽可谈论美的事物，然而美本身却是抽象的。
pinyin: wǒ men jìn kě tán lùn měi de shì wù， rán ér měi běn shēn què shì chōu xiàng de。
english: We may talk of beautiful things, but beauty itself is abstract.

hanzi: 他明确地把整个经过都对我讲了，一点不含糊。
pinyin: tā míng què de bǎ zhěng gè jīng guò dōu duì wǒ jiǎng le， yī diǎn bù hán hú。
english: He told me the whole story in spades and there's no doubt about it.

hanzi: 保险单内容不包括正常使用所导致的损坏。
pinyin: bǎo xiǎn shàn nèi róng bù bāo kuò zhèng cháng shǐ yòng suǒ dǎo zhì de sǔn huài。
english: The insurance policy do not cover damage cause by normal wear and tear.

hanzi: 看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。
pinyin: kàn qǐ lai tā sì hu hěn xǐ huan dà chéng shì de rè nao fán máng de shēng huó。
english: It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.

hanzi: 他们突然的攻击使我们更加注意我们周围的危险。
pinyin: tā men tū rán de gōng jī shǐ wǒ men gèng jiā zhù yì wǒ men zhōu wéi de wēi xiǎn。
english: Their sudden attack made us more aware of the danger around us.

hanzi: 他总是用这样得方式说话，所以每个人都讨厌他。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì yòng zhè yàng de fāng shì shuō huà， suǒ yǐ měi gè rén dōu tǎo yàn tā。
english: He always talks in such a way that everyone dislikes him.

hanzi: 我与她的第一次会面的情景经常出现在我的记忆中。
pinyin: wǒ yù tā de dì yī cì huì miàn de qíng jǐng jīng cháng chū xiàn zài wǒ de jì yì zhòng。
english: My first meeting with her often recurs to my memory.

hanzi: 那个傻孩子从来不做事，只是整天游手好闲。
pinyin: nèi gè shǎ hái zi cóng lái bù zuò shì， zhǐ shì zhěng tiān yóu shǒu hào xián。
english: That silly child never does anything; he just fools about all day long.

hanzi: 在外表上她保持着平静，但实际上她生气极了。
pinyin: zài wài biǎo shàng tā bǎo chí zhuó píng jìng， dàn shí jì shàng tā shēng qì jí le。
english: She maintained a calm exterior, though really she was furious.

hanzi: 不要把感情浪费在他身上，他是永远不会爱你的。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ gǎn qíng làng fèi zài tā shēn shàng， tā shì yǒng yuǎn bù huì ài nǐ de。
english: Don't squander your affection on him, he'll never love you.

hanzi: 不要把感情浪费在他身上，他是永远不会爱你的。
pinyin: bù yào bǎ gǎn qíng làng fèi zài tā shēn shàng， tā shì yǒng yuǎn bù huì ài nǐ de。
english: Don't squander your affection on him, he'll never love you.

hanzi: 这家石油公司将用船运出输油管道和重型设备。
pinyin: zhè jiā shí yóu gōng sī jiàng yòng chuán yùn chū shū yóu guǎn dào huò zhòng xíng shè bèi。
english: The oil company will ship out piping and heavy equipment.

hanzi: 处理这类案件的常规做法是请求法院发出指令。
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè lèi àn jiàn de cháng guī zuò fǎ shì qǐng qiú fǎ yuàn fā chū zhǐ lìng。
english: The general practice in such cases is to apply for a court order.

hanzi: 他说他是位医生，但后来却发现他是个骗子。
pinyin: tā shuō tā shì wèi yī shēng， dàn hòu lái què fā xiàn tā shì gè piàn zi。
english: He said he was a doctor, but it subsequently emerged that he was an impostor.

hanzi: 他们的女儿死去已一年多了, 但他们现在仍很悲痛.
pinyin: tā men de nu:3 ér sǐ qù yǐ yī nián duō le,  dàn tā men xiàn zài réng hěn bēi tòng.
english: Their daughter died over a year ago, but they are still grieving.

hanzi: 如果你感兴趣，你来后我把详细情况告诉你。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ gǎn xìng qu， nǐ lái hòu wǒ bǎ xiáng xì qíng kuàng gào su nǐ。
english: If you would be interested, I'll tell you all the details when you get here.

hanzi: 这家公司将为所有运动员提供全套运动服装。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī jiàng wèi suǒ yǒu yùn dòng yuán tí gōng quán tào yùn dòng fú zhuāng。
english: The company will provide the sports outfits for all the players.

hanzi: 水源污染已经达到危及居民健康的程度。
pinyin: shuǐ yuán wū rǎn yǐ jīng dá dào wēi jí jū mín jiàn kāng de chéng dù。
english: Pollution of the water supply reached a level pernicious to the health of the population.

hanzi: 这张古老的羊皮纸是在一个精致的铁盒子里发现的。
pinyin: zhè zhāng gǔ lǎo de yáng pí zhǐ shì zài yī gè jīng zhì de tiě hé zi lǐ fā xiàn de。
english: This ancient parchment was discovered in a delicate iron box.

hanzi: 在当前评论风气影响下，她的作品不怎么受欢迎。
pinyin: zài dāng qián píng lùn fēng qì yǐng xiǎng xià， tā de zuò pǐn bù zěn me shòu huān yíng。
english: In the current critical climate her work is not popular.

hanzi: 我们必须坚持人人都应该被平等对待这一原则。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū jiān chí rén rén dōu yīng gāi bèi píng děng duì dài zhè yī yuán zé。
english: We adhere to the principle that everyone should be treated fairly.

hanzi: 根据专家们的意见，他们马上放弃了这项试验。
pinyin: gēn jù zhuān jiā men de yì jiàn， tā men mǎ shàng fàng qì le zhè xiàng shì yàn。
english: According to expert opinions, they gave up the experiment immediately.

hanzi: 这两个研究所打算合并的事现在已经落空了。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè yán jiū suǒ dǎ suàn hé bìng de shì xiàn zài yǐ jīng luò kòng le。
english: The proposed amalgamation of the two institutes has mow fallen through.

hanzi: 我们必须把理论与实践相结合是个重要的原则。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū bǎ lǐ lùn yù shí jiàn xiàng jié hé shì gè zhòng yào de yuán zé。
english: It is an essential principle that we must combine theory with practice.

hanzi: 根据专家们的意见，他们马上放弃了这项试验。
pinyin: gēn jù zhuān jiā men de yì jiàn， tā men mǎ shàng fàng qì le zhè xiàng shì yàn。
english: According to expert opinions, they gave up the experiment immediately.

hanzi: 从她那封信的字里行间我得知, 她把他赶了出去。
pinyin: zòng tā nà fēng xìn de zì lǐ xìng jiàn wǒ dé zhī,  tā bǎ tā gǎn le chū qù。
english: Reading between the lines of her letter, I learned she had driven him out.

hanzi: 部长对此事的处理方法受到新闻界的严厉批评。
pinyin: bù zhǎng duì cǐ shì de chǔ lǐ fāng fǎ shòu dào xīn wén jiè de yán lì pī píng。
english: The minister was crucified by the press for his handling of the affair.

hanzi: 这家石油公司将用船运出输油管道和重型设备。
pinyin: zhè jiā shí yóu gōng sī jiàng yòng chuán yùn chū shū yóu guǎn dào huò zhòng xíng shè bèi。
english: The oil company will ship out piping and heavy equipment.

hanzi: 为了消磨时间等待展览开始, 我们逛了逛商场。
pinyin: wèi le xiāo mò shí jiān děng dài zhǎn lǎn kāi shǐ,  wǒ men guàng le guàng shāng chǎng。
english: To kill time until the exhibition opened, we looked round the shops.

hanzi: 当我到达山顶的时候，我有一种巨大的成就感。
pinyin: dàng wǒ dào dá shān dǐng de shí hou， wǒ yǒu yī zhòng jù dà de chéng jiù gǎn。
english: I felt a great sense of achievement when I reached the top of the mountain.

hanzi: 生产者与消费者之间的利益冲突将永远存在。
pinyin: shēng chǎn zhě yù xiāo fèi zhě zhī jiān de lì yì chōng tū jiàng yǒng yuǎn cún zài。
english: The conflicting interests of producers and consumers will be everlasting.

hanzi: 她丰富的经验使她比其他求职者具有有利条件。
pinyin: tā fēng fù de jīng yàn shǐ tā bì qí tā qiú zhí zhě jù yǒu yǒu lì tiáo jiàn。
english: Her rich experience gave her an advantage over other applicants for the job.

hanzi: 我用业余爱好来消除工作中产生的紧张情绪。
pinyin: wǒ yòng yè yú ài hào lái xiāo chú gōng zuò zhōng chǎn shēng de jǐn zhāng qíng xù。
english: My hobby is a good safety-valve for the tension that builds up at work.

hanzi: 他正在寻找未来的妻子，但还没有找到理想人选。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài xún zhǎo wèi lái de qī zi， dàn huán méi yǒu zhǎo dào lǐ xiǎng rén xuǎn。
english: He is looking for a wife but he hasn't found his ideal mate.

hanzi: 我希望你最近转变成的这样子永远不要再变。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng nǐ zuì jìn zhuǎn biàn chéng de zhè yàng zi yǒng yuǎn bù yào zài biàn。
english: I hope you'll never change back from the person you have recently become.

hanzi: 她的最新小说尽管广为宣传, 结果还是彻底失败.
pinyin: tā de zuì xīn xiǎo shuō jǐn guǎn guǎng wèi xuān chuán,  jié guǒ hái shì chè dǐ shī bài.
english: Despite all the publicity, her latest novel was a complete flop.

hanzi: 我们不会走错路的, 因为我对这儿的街道非常熟悉。
pinyin: wǒ men bù huì zǒu cuò lù de,  yīn wèi wǒ duì zhèr de jiē dào fēi cháng shú xī。
english: We won't go wrong, because I'm quite familiar with the streets here.

hanzi: 男校和女校联合而组成了一所新的综合中学.
pinyin: nán xiào huò nu:3 xiào lián hé ér zǔ chéng le yī suǒ xīn de zōng hé zhōng xué.
english: The boys' and girls' schools have (been) amalgamated to form a new comprehensive.

hanzi: 对于求职者，我们优先考虑有一定经验的人。
pinyin: duì yú qiú zhí zhě， wǒ men yōu xiān kǎo lu:4 yǒu yī dìng jīng yàn de rén。
english: In considering people for jobs, we give preference to those with some experience.

hanzi: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加.
pinyin: gōng huì lǐng xiù hào zhào kàng yì nà Tiān quán tǐ huì yuán jī jí cān jiā.
english: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

hanzi: 为了消磨时间等待展览开始, 我们逛了逛商场。
pinyin: wèi le xiāo mò shí jiān děng dài zhǎn lǎn kāi shǐ,  wǒ men guàng le guàng shāng chǎng。
english: To kill time until the exhibition opened, we looked round the shops.

hanzi: 照我这外行人听来, 你的嗓音差不多够专业水平了.
pinyin: zhào wǒ zhè wài háng rén tìng lái,  nǐ de sǎng yīn cī bù duō gòu zhuān yè shuǐ píng le.
english: To my untutored ear, your voice sounds almost professional.

hanzi: 当我到达山顶的时候，我有一种巨大的成就感。
pinyin: dàng wǒ dào dá shān dǐng de shí hou， wǒ yǒu yī zhòng jù dà de chéng jiù gǎn。
english: I felt a great sense of achievement when I reached the top of the mountain.

hanzi: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加.
pinyin: gōng huì lǐng xiù hào zhào kàng yì nà Tiān quán tǐ huì yuán jī jí cān jiā.
english: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

hanzi: 我有重要消息要告诉你--是好消息, 我得赶紧补充一句.
pinyin: wǒ yǒu zhòng yào xiāo xi yào gào su nǐ-- shì hào xiāo xi,  wǒ de gǎn jǐn bǔ chōng yī jù.
english: I have important news for you good news, I hasten to add.

hanzi: 把这份报告中的有关事项提交委员会讨论。
pinyin: bǎ zhè fèn bào gào zhòng dì yǒu guān shì xiàng tí jiāo wěi yuán huì tǎo lùn。
english: The relative items in this report will be submitted to the committee for discussion.

hanzi: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加.
pinyin: gōng huì lǐng xiù hào zhào kàng yì nà Tiān quán tǐ huì yuán jī jí cān jiā.
english: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

hanzi: 由于石油短缺, 任何一种新能源都会受欢迎。
pinyin: yóu yú shí yóu duǎn quē,  rèn hé yī zhòng xīn néng yuán dū huì shòu huān yíng。
english: Any new source of energy will be welcome, as there is a shortage of petroleum.

hanzi: 这种新式飞机在最初几次试飞中表现性能良好。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn shì fēi jī zài zuì chū jǐ cì shì fēi zhòng biǎo xiàn xìng néng liáng hǎo。
english: The new aircraft has performed very well in its initial trials.

hanzi: 我们每人各据一间小小的办公室，与其他人分隔开。
pinyin: wǒ men měi rén gè jù yī jiàn xiǎo xiǎo de bàn gōng shì， yǔ qí tā rén fēn gé kāi。
english: Each of us is boxed off( from the others)in his own little office.

hanzi: 我们的计划顺利完成了，于是我们很快就控制了局面。
pinyin: wǒ men de jì huà shùn lì wán chéng le， yú shì wǒ men hěn kuài jiù kòng zhì le jú miàn。
english: Our plan succeeded, and soon we were in complete control.

hanzi: 这间屋子在村子的中心草地上，处于引人注目的位置。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wū zi zài cūn zi de zhōng xīn cǎo dì shàng， chǔ yú yǐn rén zhù mù de wèi zhi。
english: The house is in a prominent position on the village green.

hanzi: 这件事明天可能宣布--也可能不宣布, 看情形吧.
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì míng tiān kě néng xuān bù-- yě kě néng bù xuān bù,  kàn qíng xing ba.
english: There may be an announcement about this tomorrow or not, as the case may be.

hanzi: 我们原来盼望著下星期放假--看样子走不了了.
pinyin: wǒ men yuán lái pàn wàng著 xià xīng qī fàng jià-- kàn yàng zi zǒu bù liǎo le.
english: We were hoping to have a holiday next week as it is, we may not be able to get away.

hanzi: 几家公司正为争取一项合同而互相竞争.
pinyin: jǐ jiā gōng sī zhèng wèi zhēng qǔ yí xiàng hé tong ér hù xiāng jìng zhēng.
english: Several companies are competing (against/with each other) for the contract/to gain the contract.

hanzi: 邻居们请他们停止吵闹, 可他们不听还是继续吵闹。
pinyin: lín jū men qǐng tā men tíng zhǐ chǎo nào,  kě tā men bù tìng hái shì jì xù chǎo nào。
english: The neighbors asked them to stop making a noise, but they kept on.

hanzi: 这个节目给普通观众提供了一个发表意见的机会.
