pinyin: zhè gè jié mù jǐ pǔ tōng guān zhòng tí gōng le yī gè fā biǎo yì jiàn de jī huì.
english: This programme gives ordinary viewers a chance to make their voice(s) heard.

hanzi: 他有个不大讨人喜欢的特点，就是爱当众责备妻子。
pinyin: tā yǒu gè bú dà tǎo rén xǐ huan de tè diǎn， jiù shì ài dāng zhòng zé bèi qī zi。
english: One of his less attractive traits is criticizing his wife in public.

hanzi: 我们的部队已经退下来重新整编，以便发动新的进攻。
pinyin: wǒ men de bù duì yǐ jīng tuì xia lai chóng xīn zhěng biān， yǐ biàn fā dòng xīn de jìn gōng。
english: Our armies have retired to regroup for a fresh attack.

hanzi: 如今必须有高度的竞争意识才能在体育运动中取胜.
pinyin: rú jīn bì xū yǒu gāo dù de jìng zhēng yì shí cái néng zài tǐ yù yùn dòng zhòng qǔ shèng.
english: You have to be highly competitive to do well in sport nowadays.

hanzi: 自从原子动力问世以后，工业发生了巨大的变化。
pinyin: zì cóng yuán zǐ dòng lì wèn shì yǐ hòu， gōng yè fā shēng le jù dà de biàn huà。
english: Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry.

hanzi: 如今必须有高度的竞争意识才能在体育运动中取胜.
pinyin: rú jīn bì xū yǒu gāo dù de jìng zhēng yì shí cái néng zài tǐ yù yùn dòng zhòng qǔ shèng.
english: You have to be highly competitive to do well in sport nowadays.

hanzi: 维修手册向您提供修理汽车所需的图表和说明。
pinyin: wéi xiū shǒu cè xiàng nín tí gōng xiū lǐ qì chē suǒ xū de tú biǎo huò shuō míng。
english: A maintenance manual gives diagrams and instructions for repairing your car.

hanzi: 餐厅的名字未必能告诉你很多它所供应的食物。
pinyin: cān tīng de míng zi wèi bì néng gào su nǐ hěn duō tā suǒ gōng yìng de shí wù。
english: The name of a restaurant won't necessarily tell you much about the food it serves.

hanzi: 那里的人民正在为摆脱外国统治争取自由而战斗。
pinyin: nà li de rén mín zhèng zài wèi bǎi tuō wài guó tǒng zhì zhēng qǔ zì yóu ér zhàn dòu。
english: The people there are fighting to gain their freedom from foreign control.

hanzi: 那些喜欢和他一起踢足球的小男孩都把他当作叔叔。
pinyin: nà xiē xǐ huan huò tā yī qǐ tī zú qiú de xiǎo nán hái dōu bǎ tā dàng zuò shū shu。
english: He is uncle to all the little boys who like to play football with him.

hanzi: 在沙漠地带，绝大多数时间都是大晴天，下雨天极少。
pinyin: zài shā mò dì dài， jué dà duō shù shí jiān dōu shì dà qíng tiān， xià yǔ tiān jí shào。
english: Sunny days predominate over rainy days in desert regions.

hanzi: 她做护士很不顺心, 但当管理人员似乎倒很适合.
pinyin: tā zuò hù shi hěn bù shùn xīn,  dàn dàng guǎn lǐ rén yuán sì hu dào hěn shì hé.
english: As a nurse she got very frustrated, but being an administrator seems to suit her.

hanzi: 李把他在生意中的道德标准运用到私人关系中去。
pinyin: lǐ bǎ tā zài shēng yi zhòng dì dào dé biāo zhǔn yùn yòng dào sī rén guān xi zhòng qù。
english: Lee carries over his business ethics into his personal relationships.

hanzi: 这位女士的年纪在五十岁之上，决不会少于五十岁。
pinyin: zhè wèi nu:3 shì de nián jì zài wǔ shí suì zhī shàng， jué bù kuài shào yú wǔ shí suì。
english: The woman may be above fifty, but (she may) not (be) below fifty.

hanzi: 那位记者发来了一篇描写极地生活的艰苦的文章。
pinyin: nà wèi jì zhě fà lái le yī piān miáo xiě jí de shēng huó de jiān kù de wén zhāng。
english: The reporter has sent an article describing the rigors of life at the poles.

hanzi: 她必须与拥护她的那些比较偏激的人保持一定的距离.
pinyin: tā bì xū yù yōng hù tā de nà xiē bǐ jiào piān jī de rén bǎo chí yī dìng de jù lí.
english: She needs to distance herself from some of her more extreme supporters.

hanzi: 那幅画给我们提供了采用透视画法的最早的范例.
pinyin: nà fú huà jǐ wǒ men tí gōng le cǎi yòng tòu shì huà fǎ de zuì zǎo de fàn lì.
english: The painting provides us with one of the earliest examples of the use of perspective.

hanzi: 球拍用于各种运动的球拍，如乒乓球和网球的球拍
pinyin: qiú pāi yòng yú gè zhǒng yùn dòng de qiú pāi， rú pīng pāng qiú huò wǎng qiú de qiú pāi
english: The racket used in various games, such as table tennis or racquets.

hanzi: 我们正处于严重危险之中，我们必须把军人动员起来。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng chǔ yú yán zhòng wēi xiǎn zhī zhōng， wǒ men bì xū bǎ jūn rén dòng yuán qǐ lai。
english: Our country's in great danger; we must mobilize the army.

hanzi: 他似乎比较像一个军官，而不像一个商业行政主管。
pinyin: tā sì hu bǐ jiào xiàng yī gè jūn guān， ér bù xiàng yī gè shāng yè xíng zhèng zhǔ guǎn。
english: He seems more like a military officer than a business executive.

hanzi: 这个小男孩沿着草地的边上走，小心不踩到地里。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nán hái yán zhe cǎo dì de biān shàng zǒu， xiǎo xīn bù cǎi dào de lǐ。
english: The little boy walked along the grass verge, trying not to step into the field.

hanzi: 我不相信能力均等，但我确实相信机会均等。
pinyin: wǒ bù xiāng xìn néng lì jūn děng， dàn wǒ què shí xiāng xìn jī huì jūn děng。
english: I do not believe in equality of capacity, but I do believe in equality of opportunity.

hanzi: 使醉的喝醉了的，被麻醉品例如可卡因或大麻麻醉了的
pinyin: shǐ zuì de hè zuì le de， bèi má zuì pǐn lì rú kě qiǎ yīn huò dà má má zuì le de
english: Intoxicated by or as if by alcohol or a drug, such as cocaine or marijuana.

hanzi: 那里的人民正在为摆脱外国统治争取自由而战斗。
pinyin: nà li de rén mín zhèng zài wèi bǎi tuō wài guó tǒng zhì zhēng qǔ zì yóu ér zhàn dòu。
english: The people there are fighting to gain their freedom from foreign control.

hanzi: 他把空余时间都用在园艺上了, 没有任何其他爱好.
pinyin: tā bǎ kòng yú shí jiān dōu yòng zài yuán yì shàng le,  méi yǒu rèn hé qí tā ài hào.
english: He spent his spare time gardening, to the exclusion of all other interests.

hanzi: 我正在成人学校补习法语，到时好让他们大吃一惊。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài chéng rén xué xiào bǔ xí fǎ yǔ， dào shí hào ràng tā men dà chī yī jīng。
english: I'm brushing up on my French at adult school just to surprise them.

hanzi: 我们所有的建议都遭到拒绝，不管这些建议的价值如何。
pinyin: wǒ men suǒ yǒu de jiàn yì dōu zāo dào jù jué， bù guǎn zhè xie jiàn yì de jià zhí rú hé。
english: All our proposals were rejected, regardless of their merits.

hanzi: 和面的方法很简单，只要把水和在面粉里就行了。
pinyin: huò miàn de fāng fǎ hěn jiǎn dān， zhǐ yào bǎ shuǐ huò zài miàn fěn lǐ jiù xìng le。
english: The way to make dough is very simple as you need only to mix flour with water.

hanzi: 大多数西红柿成熟时是红色的，但有些品种是黄色的。
pinyin: dà duō shù xī hóng shì chéng shú shí shì hóng sè de， dàn yǒu xiē pǐn zhǒng shì huáng sè de。
english: Most tomatoes are red when ripe, but some kinds are yellow.

hanzi: 他把文件使劲扔在我的桌子上便怒气冲冲地走了出去。
pinyin: tā bǎ wén jiàn shǐ jìn rēng zài wǒ de zhuō zi shàng pián nù qì chòng chòng de zǒu le chū qù。
english: He slammed the papers down on my desk and angrily walked out.

hanzi: 我没来得及把每件事都安排好, 因此心里七上八下的.
pinyin: wǒ mò lái de jí bǎ měi jiàn shì dōu ān pái hào,  yīn cǐ xīn lǐ qī shàng bā xià de.
english: I haven't had time to arrange everything, so I'm all at sixes and sevens.

hanzi: 她向我讲述了他是怎样跑到她跟前抢走她的手提包的.
pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ jiǎng shù le tā shì zěn yàng pǎo dào tā gēn qián qiǎng zǒu tā de shǒu tí bāo de.
english: She described to me how he ran up to her and grabbed her handbag.

hanzi: 只因为我的新书包和他的一模一样，他就说我学他的样。
pinyin: zhǐ yīn wèi wǒ de xīn shū bāo huò tā de yī mó yí yàng， tā jiù shuō wǒ xué tā de yàng。
english: He called me a copycat just because my schoolbag looks like his.

hanzi: 临近终点时，那几匹马齐头并进，简直分不出先后。
pinyin: lín jìn zhōng diǎn shí， nà jǐ pǐ mǎ qí tou bìng jìn， jiǎn zhí fèn bù chū xiān hòu。
english: As the horses raced towards the finishing post, there was nothing in it.

hanzi: 分隔物，分界线分界物或分割物，用作分配或分类
pinyin: fēn gé wù， fèn jiè xiàn fèn jiè wù huò fēn gē wù， yòng zuò fēn pèi huò fēn lèi
english: Something, such as a boundary or partition, that serves to divide or keep separate.

hanzi: 不断增长的失业大军引起了这名经济学家的关注。
pinyin: bù duàn zēng zhǎng de shī yè dà jūn yǐn qǐ le zhè míng jīng jì xué jiā de guān zhù。
english: The increasing army of the unemployed has attracted the attention of the economist.

hanzi: 我瞧不起那些工作不顺心就拿家里人出气 的男人。
pinyin: wǒ qiáo bù qǐ nà xiē gōng zuò bù shùn xīn jiù ná jiā lǐ rén chū qì  de nán rén。
english: I look down on man who vents his anger on his family after having a bad day at work.

hanzi: 大多数西红柿成熟时是红色的，但有些品种是黄色的。
pinyin: dà duō shù xī hóng shì chéng shú shí shì hóng sè de， dàn yǒu xiē pǐn zhǒng shì huáng sè de。
english: Most tomatoes are red when ripe, but some kinds are yellow.

hanzi: 两个人物为某件事情发生了严重或不严重的冲突。
pinyin: liǎng gè rén wù wèi mǒu jiàn shì qing fā shēng le yán zhòng huò bù yán zhòng de chōng tū。
english: Two characters are in disagreement, serious or otherwise, over some matter.

hanzi: 他们建造一个新的国家公园的工程将于明年完工。
pinyin: tā men jiàn zào yī gè xīn de guó jiā gōng yuán de gōng chéng jiàng yú míng nián wán gōng。
english: Their project to establish a new national park will be completed next year.

hanzi: 他们没有采取行动，表明他们对这个问题不感兴趣。
pinyin: tā men méi yǒu cǎi qǔ xíng dòng， biǎo míng tā men duì zhè gè wèn tí bù gǎn xìng qu。
english: Their failure to act is indicative of their lack of interest in the problem.

hanzi: 如果能开发出新产品，我们将乐于引进先进技术。
pinyin: rú guǒ néng kāi fā chū xīn chǎn pǐn， wǒ men Jiāng lè yú yǐn jìn xiān jìn jì shù。
english: If new product can be developed, we'll be very glad to import advanced technology.

hanzi: 从一间屋子的量度可以推断出整座建筑物的大小.
pinyin: zòng yī jiàn wū zi de liáng dù kě yǐ tuī duàn chū zhěng zuò jiàn zhù wù de dà xiǎo.
english: One can extrapolate the size of the building from the measurements of an average room.

hanzi: 运费中不包括火车站至轮船码头之间的运输费用。
pinyin: yùn fèi zhòng bù bāo kuò huǒ chē zhàn zhì lún chuán mǎ tóu zhī jiān de yùn shū fèi yòng。
english: Fares do not include conveyance between railway stations and steamer piers.

hanzi: 运费中不包括火车站至轮船码头之间的运输费用。
pinyin: yùn fèi zhòng bù bāo kuò huǒ chē zhàn zhì lún chuán mǎ tóu zhī jiān de yùn shū fèi yòng。
english: Fares do not include conveyance between railway stations and steamer piers.

hanzi: 半导体在自动化和信号上面即将起着重要作用。
pinyin: bàn dǎo tǐ zài zì dòng huà huò xìn hào shàng mian jí jiāng qǐ zhuó zhòng yào zuò yòng。
english: Semiconductors are going to play an important part in automation and signalling.

hanzi: 我希望我能穿一件深色的衣服把这个正式场合应付过去。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng wǒ néng chuān yī jiàn shēn shǎi de yī fu bǎ zhè gè zhèng shì chǎng hé yìng fu guò qu。
english: I hope I can get by in a dark suit for this formal occasion.

hanzi: 在天气干燥时把点燃的香烟扔进树林可能会引起火灾。
pinyin: zài tiān qì gān zào shí bǎ diǎn rán de xiāng yān rēng jìn shù lín kě néng kuài yǐn qǐ huǒ zāi。
english: A cigarette thrown into the woods in dry weather may start a fire.

hanzi: 她病了。然而她照旧去上班，并且尽力集中精神工作。
pinyin: tā bìng le。 rán ér tā zhào jiù qù shàng bān， bìng qiě jìn lì jí zhōng jīng shén gōng zuò。
english: She felt ill. She went to work, however, and tried to concentrate.

hanzi: 她看到自己办公桌上又是一堆要处理的东西就暗自叫苦.
pinyin: tā kàn dào zì jǐ bàn gōng zhuō shàng yòu shì yī duī yào chǔ lǐ de dōng xi jiù àn zì jiào kǔ.
english: She groaned inwardly as she saw the fresh pile of work on her desk.

hanzi: 这工作的附加福利包括一辆小汽车和免费健康保险。
pinyin: zhè gōng zuò de fù jiā fú lì bāo kuò yī liàng xiǎo qì chē huò miǎn fèi jiàn kāng bǎo xiǎn。
english: The fringe benefits of this job include a car and free health insurance.

hanzi: 对自己的错误后悔到不致重犯的程度是真正的后悔。
pinyin: duì zì jǐ de cuò wù hòu huǐ dào bù zhì zhòng fàn de chéng dù shì zhēn zhèng de hòu huǐ。
english: To regret one's errors to the point of not repeating them is true repentance.

hanzi: 我们的职员少一些也能发挥同样效率, 这是言之成理的.
pinyin: wǒ men de zhí yuán shào yī xiē yě néng fā huī tóng yàng xiào lu:4,  zhè shì yán zhī chéng lǐ de.
english: It is arguable that we would be just as efficient with fewer staff.

hanzi: 美国入侵这个国家一定是出于不可告人的政治目的。
pinyin: Měi guó rù qīn zhè gè guó jiā yī dìng shì chū yú bù kě gào rén de zhèng zhì mù dì。
english: America's invasion of the country must be done for unspeakable political purpose.

hanzi: 收成可能低于平均水平，请以同样价格再采购一些。
pinyin: shōu cheng kě néng dī yú píng jūn shuǐ píng， qǐng yǐ tóng yàng jià gé zài cǎi gòu yī xiē。
english: Crop likely below average will suggest renew purchase contract same price

hanzi: 在天气干燥时把点燃的香烟扔进树林可能会引起火灾。
pinyin: zài tiān qì gān zào shí bǎ diǎn rán de xiāng yān rēng jìn shù lín kě néng kuài yǐn qǐ huǒ zāi。
english: A cigarette thrown into the woods in dry weather may start a fire.

hanzi: 行医道德有规定, 禁止医生与病人谈恋爱.
pinyin: xìng Yī dào dé yǒu guī dìng,  jìn zhǐ yī shēng yù bìng rén tán liàn ài.
english: Medical ethics (ie those observed by the medical profession) forbid a doctor to have a love affair with a patient.

hanzi: 政府对国营和私营部门的就业情况作了一次调查。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì guó yíng huò sī yíng bù mén de jiù yè qíng kuàng zuò le yī cì diào chá。
english: The government made an investigation of the employment in the public and private sectors.

hanzi: 画报的封面上印上美女不过是吸引顾客的一种生意眼。
pinyin: huà bào de fēng miàn shàng yìn shàng měi nu:3 bù guò shì xī yǐn gù kè de yī zhòng shēng yi yǎn。
english: The pretty girl on the cover of the pictorial is just a sales gimmick.

hanzi: 回程用的时间比平时长, 因为飞机不能飞越战区.
pinyin: huí chéng yòng de shí jiān bì píng shí zhǎng,  yīn wèi fēi jī bù néng fēi yuè zhàn qū.
english: The journey back took longer than normal, because the plane could not overfly the war zone.

hanzi: 我们计算了成本, 清楚表明这项工程不合算.
pinyin: wǒ men jì suàn le chéng běn,  qīng chu biǎo míng zhè xiàng gōng chéng bù hé suàn.
english: When we had done the costings on the project, it was clear it would not be economical to go ahead with it.

hanzi: 要使这份报告包括最新资料，我仅有几点事实需补充。
pinyin: yào shǐ zhè fèn bào gào bāo kuò zuì xīn zī liào， wǒ jǐn yǒu jī diǎn shì shí xū bǔ chōng。
english: I have only a few additional facts to add to bring the report up to date.

hanzi: 夏天收获的大量水果可冷藏或装瓶装罐加以保存。
pinyin: xià tiān shōu huò de dà liàng shuǐ guǒ kě lěng cáng huò zhuāng píng zhuāng guàn jiā yǐ bǎo cún。
english: In the summer, large crops of fruit may be preserved by freezing or bottling.

hanzi: 这张照片没有真实地反映出花园的丰富色彩.
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhào piàn méi yǒu zhēn shí de fǎn yìng chū huā yuán de fēng fù sè cǎi.
english: The photograph does not do full justice to (ie does not truly reproduce) the rich colours of the gardens.

hanzi: 夏天收获的大量水果可冷藏或装瓶装罐加以保存。
pinyin: xià tiān shōu huò de dà liàng shuǐ guǒ kě lěng cáng huò zhuāng píng zhuāng guàn jiā yǐ bǎo cún。
english: In the summer, large crops of fruit may be preserved by freezing or bottling.

hanzi: 航空公司因有几架飞机暂时不能使用而正在赔钱.
pinyin: háng kōng gōng sī yīn yǒu jǐ jià fēi jī zàn shí bù néng shǐ yòng ér zhèng zài péi qián.
english: With several of their planes temporarily out of commission, the airline is losing money.

hanzi: 政府对国营和私营部门的就业情况作了一次调查。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì guó yíng huò sī yíng bù mén de jiù yè qíng kuàng zuò le yī cì diào chá。
english: The government made an investigation of the employment in the public and private sectors.

hanzi: 我们在穿越这个地区的旅途中，看到了不少美丽的景色。
pinyin: wǒ men zài chuān yuè zhè gè dì qū de lu:3 tú zhòng， kàn dào le bù shǎo měi lì de jǐng sè。
english: We passed through some beautiful scenery on our journey through this district.

hanzi: 将军推翻了那个国家的最后一个皇帝，建立了共和国。
pinyin: jiāng jūn tuī fān le nèi gè guó jiā de zuì hòu yī gè huáng dì， jiàn lì le gòng hé guó。
english: The general overthrew the last emperor of that country and established a public.

hanzi: 你显然不大明白办事的手续, 我很快就给你解释清楚.
pinyin: nǐ xiǎn ran bú dà míng bai bàn shì de shǒu xù,  wǒ hěn kuài jiù jǐ nǐ jiě shì qīng chu.
english: You're clearly rather muddled about office procedures but I'll soon straighten you out.

hanzi: 根据我们的记录，你借的书现在应该还给图书馆了。
pinyin: gēn jù wǒ men de jì lù， nǐ jiè de shū xiàn zài yīng gāi huán jǐ tú shū guǎn le。
english: According to our records, the books you have borrowed should now be returned to the library.

hanzi: 将军推翻了那个国家的最后一个皇帝，建立了共和国。
pinyin: jiāng jūn tuī fān le nèi gè guó jiā de zuì hòu yī gè huáng dì， jiàn lì le gòng hé guó。
english: The general overthrew the last emperor of that country and established a public.

hanzi: 根据我们的记录，你借的书现在应该还给图书馆了。
pinyin: gēn jù wǒ men de jì lù， nǐ jiè de shū xiàn zài yīng gāi huán jǐ tú shū guǎn le。
english: According to our records, the books you have borrowed should now be returned to the library.

hanzi: 在我们的城市，许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de chéng shì， xǔ duō shè huì fú wù réng rán shì yǒu zhì yuàn tuán tǐ tí gōng de。
english: Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city.

hanzi: 在过去的两年中, 那家钢铁厂一直提供给我们原材料。
pinyin: zài guò qu de liǎng nián zhòng,  nà jiā gāng tiě chǎng yī zhí tí gōng jǐ wǒ men yuán cái liào。
english: The steel works has been supplying us with raw material in large quantities.

hanzi: 这辆新汽车的车身没用多少金属材料, 大部分是塑料的.
pinyin: zhè liàng xīn qì chē de chē shēn méi yòng duō shao jīn shǔ cái liào,  dà bù fen shì sù liào de.
english: There isn't much metal in the bodywork of this new car; it's mainly plastic.

hanzi: 一个管理人员要想改善管理的话，就必须学点经济学。
pinyin: yī gè guǎn lǐ rén yuán yào xiǎng gǎi shàn guǎn lǐ de huà， jiù bì xū xué diǎn jīng jì xué。
english: A manager has to learn some economics if he wants to improve his management.

hanzi: 她花起钱来大手大脚了，事情很明显，钱是偷来的。
pinyin: tā huā qǐ qián lái dà shǒu dà jué le， shì qing hěn míng xiǎn， qián shì tōu lái de。
english: She'd begun spending a lot of money, and the obvious inference was that she'd stolen it.

hanzi: 他正跑开时，我在背后叫他，他连忙转过身来看看我。
pinyin: tā zhèng pǎo kāi shí， wǒ zài bèi hòu jiào tā， tā lián máng zhuàn guò shēn lái kàn kàn wǒ。
english: I called him as he was running away and he wheeled round and looked at me.

hanzi: 在生意上，你必须事先估计到你的竞争对手会如何行动。
pinyin: zài shēng yi shàng， nǐ bì xū shì xiān gū jì dào nǐ de jìng zhēng duì shǒu kuài rú hé xíng dòng。
english: In business, you've got to anticipate how your competitors will act.

hanzi: 把这两个计划仔细地加以对比就可以看出一些关键性的差异.
pinyin: bǎ zhè liǎng gè jì huà zǐ xì de jiā yǐ duì bǐ jiù kě yǐ kàn chū yī xiē guān jiàn xìng de chā yì.
english: Careful contrast of the two plans shows up some key differences.

hanzi: 把这两个计划仔细地加以对比就可以看出一些关键性的差异.
pinyin: bǎ zhè liǎng gè jì huà zǐ xì de jiā yǐ duì bǐ jiù kě yǐ kàn chū yī xiē guān jiàn xìng de chā yì.
english: Careful contrast of the two plans shows up some key differences.

hanzi: 当他看到这个理论加重了失业后，他彻底改变了看法。
pinyin: dàng tā kàn dào zhè gè lǐ lùn jiā zhòng le shī yè hòu， tā chè dǐ gǎi biàn le kàn fǎ。
english: When he saw how the theory increased unemployment, he underwent quite a conversion.

hanzi: 就在这些季节里，热气团与冷气团的温差最大。
pinyin: jiù zài zhè xie jì jié lǐ， rè qì tuán yù lěng qì tuán de wēn cī zuì dà。
english: It is during these seasons that the differences in temperature between warm and cold masses of air are greatest.

hanzi: 我认为这些数据是最近才得到的，但我乐于接受改正。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhè xie shù jù shì zuì jìn cái dé dào de， dàn wǒ yuè yú jiē shòu gǎi zhèng。
english: I believe these figures are the most recent available but I am open to correction.

hanzi: 那个聪明的男孩把他老师所能教他的所有的知识都吸收了。
pinyin: nèi gè cōng míng de nán hái bǎ tā lǎo shī suǒ néng jiào tā de suǒ yǒu de zhī shi dōu xī shōu le。
english: The clever boy absorbed all the knowledge his teacher could give him.

hanzi: 一些年青人喜欢流行音乐, 但仍有其它人喜欢古典音乐。
pinyin: yī xiē nián qīng rén xǐ huan liú xíng yīn yuè,  dàn réng yǒu qí tā rén xǐ huan gǔ diǎn yīn yuè。
english: Some young people like pop music, while still others like classical music.

hanzi: 皇室的领地并非属于国王私人所有，而是属于国家的。
pinyin: huáng shì de lǐng de bìng fēi shǔ yú guó wáng sī rén suǒ yǒu， ér shì shǔ yú guó jiā de。
english: Land belonging to the crown does not belong to the king personally but to the state.

hanzi: 如果你往树后更远处看，就正好可以看见远处的村庄。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ wàng shù hòu gèng yuǎn chù kàn， jiù zhèng hǎo kě yǐ kàn jiàn yuǎn chù de cūn zhuāng。
english: If you look beyond the tress, you can just see the village in the distance.

hanzi: 就在这些季节里，热气团与冷气团的温差最大。
pinyin: jiù zài zhè xie jì jié lǐ， rè qì tuán yù lěng qì tuán de wēn cī zuì dà。
english: It is during these seasons that the differences in temperature between warm and cold masses of air are greatest.

hanzi: 这位歌手终生致力于研究中国西北部的民间传说。
pinyin: zhè wèi gē shǒu zhōng shēng zhì lì yú yán jiū Zhōng guó xī běi bù de mín jiān chuán shuō。
english: The singer devoted his whole life in study of the folklore in the northwest part of China.

hanzi: 我想我们应该制订出一项行动计划，用来对付这种情况。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒ men yīng gāi zhì dìng chū yí xiàng xíng dòng jì huà， yòng lái duì fu zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng。
english: I think we should work out a strategy to deal with this situation.

hanzi: 一种表示确定的概念或观念的语言元素，例如字树。
pinyin: yī zhòng biǎo shì què dìng de gài niàn huò guān niàn de yǔ yán yuán sù， lì rú zì shù。
english: An element of language that expresses a definite image or idea, for example, the word tree.

hanzi: 扇形体形状似四分之一圆圈的机器零件或其他机械设备
pinyin: shàn xíng tǐ xíng zhuàng sì sì fēn zhī yī yuán quān de jī qì líng jiàn huò qí tā jī xiè shè bèi
english: A machine part or other mechanical device that is shaped like a quarter circle.

hanzi: 据说如果你在看见流星时许个愿，愿望就会实现。
pinyin: jù shuō rú guǒ nǐ zài kàn jiàn liú xīng shí xǔ gè yuàn， yuàn wàng jiù kuài shí xiàn。
english: It is said that if you make a wish when you see a meteor in the sky your wish will be realized.

hanzi: 我想您也许知道中国在对外贸易中采取了灵活政策。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng nín yě xǔ zhī dào Zhōng guó zài duì wài mào yì zhòng cǎi qǔ le líng huó zhèng cè。
english: I think you probably know that China have adopt a flexible policy in her foreign trade.

hanzi: 在年终联欢会季节，晚上是几乎不可能叫到计程车的。
pinyin: zài nián zhōng lián huān huì jì jié， wǎn shang shì jī hū bù kě néng jiào dào jì chéng jū de。
english: It's next to impossible to catch a taxi at night during the year- end party season.

hanzi: 汽车从车间的一个地方向另一地方移动时，就安装好了。
pinyin: qì chē zòng chē jiān de yī gè dì fang xiàng lìng yī dì fang yí dòng shí， jiù ān zhuāng hào le。
english: Motor-cars are assembled as they travel from one part of a workshop to another.

hanzi: 原生的出现于某一发展或进化早期阶段的或具有其特征的
pinyin: yuán shēng de chū xiàn yú mǒu yī fā zhǎn huò jìn huà zǎo qī jiē duàn de huò jù yǒu qí tè zhēng de
english: Occurring in or characteristic of an early stage of development or evolution.

hanzi: 这个城市在飞速发展，市中心的房地产价格越来越贵。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì zài fēi sù fā zhǎn， shì zhōng xīn de fáng dì chǎn jià gé yuè lái yuè guì。
english: The city is developing rapidly and property in the center is becoming more expensive.

hanzi: 在过去的几年中我们为了国民经济的恢复做了大量的工作。
pinyin: zài guò qu de jǐ nián zhòng wǒ men wèi le guó mín jīng jì de huī fù zuò le dà liàng de gōng zuò。
english: A lot has been done in the recovery of national economy in the past few years.

hanzi: 当我不得不离开时，这个孩子情绪异常激动，忍不住哭了起来。
pinyin: dàng wǒ bù dé bù lí kāi shí， zhè gè hái zi qíng xù yì cháng jī dòng， rěn bú zhù kū le qǐ lai。
english: The boy got very emotional when I had to leave, and started to cry.

hanzi: 她画了一排由近而远高度递减的树以演示透视法的规律.
pinyin: tā huà le yī pái yóu jìn ér yuǎn gāo dù dì jiǎn de shù yǐ yǎn shì tòu shì fǎ de guī lu:4.
english: She drew a row of trees receding into the distance to demonstrate the laws of perspective.

hanzi: 在训练班上，她接受了有关这个工作各方面的全面训练。
pinyin: zài xùn liàn bān shàng， tā jiē shòu le yǒu guān zhè gè gōng zuò gè fāng miàn de quán miàn xùn liàn。
english: On the course she received a thorough training in every aspect of the job.

hanzi: 专业人员的助手受过训练辅助专门人员的非专职人员
pinyin: zhuān yè rén yuán de zhù shǒu shòu guò xùn liàn fǔ zhù zhuān mén rén yuán de fēi zhuān zhí rén yuán
english: A trained worker who is not a member of a given profession but assists a professional.

hanzi: 我不可能及时赶到会场，除非我赶上了较找的一班火车。
pinyin: wǒ bù kě néng jí shí gǎn dào huì chǎng， chú fēi wǒ gǎn shàng le jiào zhǎo de yī bān huǒ chē。
english: I couldn't have got to the meeting on time -- unless I had caught an earlier train.

hanzi: 反动统治者发现要征服那些被压迫的当地人是很困难的。
pinyin: fǎn dòng tǒng zhì zhē fā xiàn yào zhēng fú nà xiē bèi yā pò de dāng dì rén shì hěn kùn nan de。
english: The reactionary rulers found it very difficult to bring the oppressed natives under.

hanzi: 我原来一直盼望著能收到她送的礼物, 所以因得不到而失望.
pinyin: wǒ yuán lái yī zhí pàn wàng著 néng shōu dào tā sòng de lǐ wù,  suǒ yǐ yīn de bù dào ér shī wàng.
english: I was expecting a present from her, so I was disappointed I didn't receive one.

hanzi: 大多数语言学家都会说，他们主要研究各种语言的结构。
pinyin: dà duō shù yǔ yán xué jiā dū huì shuō， tā men zhǔ yào yán jiū gè zhǒng yǔ yán de jié gòu。
english: Most linguists would say they were concerned primarily with the structure of languages.

hanzi: 他开始研究生态学，并决心将他的一生献身于这门科学。
pinyin: tā kāi shǐ yán jiū shēng tài xué， bìng jué xīn jiàng tā de yī shēng xiàn shēn yú zhè mén kē xué。
english: He started to study ecology and decided to devote his whole life to the science.

hanzi: 我认为在这些本来是无关紧要的评论中含有一定的真实性。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zài zhè xie běn lái shì wú guān jǐn yào de píng lùn zhòng hán yǒu yī dìng de zhēn shí xìng。
english: I think there is a kernel of truth in these otherwise frivolous comments.

hanzi: 半导体二极管主要作为整流器使用的一个有两端的半导体设备
pinyin: bàn dǎo tǐ èr jí guǎn zhǔ yào zuò wéi zhěng liú qì shǐ yòng de yī gè yǒu liǎng duān de bàn dǎo tǐ shè bèi
english: A two-terminal semiconductor device used chiefly as a rectifier.

hanzi: 现在人类所使用的所有纤维之中，有很大的百分比是人造的。
pinyin: xiàn zài rén lèi suǒ shǐ yòng de suǒ yǒu xiān wéi zhī zhōng， yǒu hěn dà de bǎi fēn bǐ shì rén zào de。
english: Of all the fibers now used by man, a very large percentage is man-made.

hanzi: 现在人类所使用的所有纤维之中，有很大的百分比是人造的。
pinyin: xiàn zài rén lèi suǒ shǐ yòng de suǒ yǒu xiān wéi zhī zhōng， yǒu hěn dà de bǎi fēn bǐ shì rén zào de。
english: Of all the fibers now used by man, a very large percentage is man-made.

hanzi: 好长时间，我妈妈和我嫂子一直争论这样小的细节问题。
pinyin: hào zhǎng shí jiān， wǒ mā ma huò wǒ sǎo zi yī zhí zhēng lùn zhè yàng xiǎo de xì jié wèn tí。
english: My mother and my sister-in-law have been arguing about such minor details for a long time.

hanzi: 关于那篇文章，报社收到了大量来信和接到了大量的电话。
pinyin: guān yú nà piān wén zhāng， bào shè shōu dào le dà liàng lái xìn huò jiē dào le dà liàng de diàn huà。
english: The newspaper received a deluge of letters and phone calls about the article.

hanzi: 会议可能要延长到夜里，因为今晚有太多问题要解决。
pinyin: huì yì kě néng yào yán cháng dào yè lǐ， yīn wèi jīn wǎn yǒu tài duō wèn tí yào jiě jué。
english: The meeting may be prolonged into the evening because so many problems have to be solved tonight.

hanzi: 因此有效对付这些常见病就是我们最迫切需要解决的问题。
pinyin: yīn cǐ yǒu xiào duì fu zhè xie cháng jiàn bìng jiù shì wǒ men zuì pò qiè xū yào jiě jué de wèn tí。
english: So the effective handling of the common diseases constitutes our most urgent problem.

hanzi: 在我回来途中，我停下来参观了这个县刚建立的两座工厂。
pinyin: zài wǒ huí lai tú zhōng， wǒ tíng xia lai cān guān le zhè gè xiàn gāng jiàn lì de liǎng zuò gōng chǎng。
english: On my return journey, I stopped to see two factories the county had just established.

hanzi: 我卖给你一本新的地理书，其余的钱你可以能够还的时候还我。
pinyin: wǒ mài jǐ nǐ yī běn xīn de dì lǐ shū， qí yú de qián nǐ kě yǐ néng gòu huán de shí hou huán wǒ。
english: I'll let you have the new geography and you may pay me the remainder of the money.

hanzi: 如果孩子上了私立学校，他的父母就要为孩子的教育付学费。
pinyin: rú guǒ hái zi shàng le sī lì xué xiào， tā de fù mǔ jiù yào wèi hái zi de jiào yù fù xué fèi。
english: If a child attends a private school, his parents pay the school for the child's education.

hanzi: 现在我们已打开门路，我们希望在中国开辟一个广阔的市场。
pinyin: xiàn zài wǒ men yǐ dǎ kāi mén lù， wǒ men xī wàng zài Zhōng guó kāi pì yī gè guǎng kuò de shì chǎng。
english: Now we've got a foot in the door, we are hoping to open up a big market in China.

hanzi: 我不住地看手表，他却一个劲儿地讲个没完，他不能领会暗示。
pinyin: wǒ bú zhù de kàn shǒu biǎo， tā què yī gè jìng er de jiǎng gè mò wán， tā bù néng lǐng huì àn shì。
english: I kept looking at my watch, but he just continued talking: he can't take a hint.

hanzi: 据报道，就宾客的舒适程度来说，这家宾馆管理得很好。
pinyin: jù bào dào， jiù bīn kè de shū shì chéng dù lái shuō， zhè jiā bīn guǎn guǎn lǐ de hěn hào。
english: The hotel was, from all accounts, very well run as far as the comfort of the guests was concerned.

hanzi: 虽然她彻底地用力擦洗那只旧壶，但她无法把它完全洗干净。
pinyin: suī rán tā chè dǐ de yòng lì cā xǐ nà zhǐ jiù hú， dàn tā wú fǎ bǎ tā wán quán xǐ gān jìng。
english: Although she scrubbed the old pot thoroughly, she could not make it look completely clean.

hanzi: 一个英国人，尽管只有他一个人，也会独个儿排成整整齐齐的一队。
pinyin: yī gè Yīng guó rén， jǐn guǎn zhǐ yǒu tā yī gè rén， yě kuài dú gè er pǎi chéng zhěng zhěng qí qí de yī duì。
english: An Englishman, even if he is alone, forms an orderly queue of one.

hanzi: 旅馆工作人员对我们照顾得无微不至，尽量让我们住得舒适，
pinyin: lu:3 guǎn gōng zuò rén yuán duì wǒ men zhào gu de wú wēi bù zhì， jìn liàng ràng wǒ men zhù de shū shì，
english: The hotel staff spared no pains to ensure that our stay was as enjoyable as possible.

hanzi: 香瓜属植物任一种相关或类似植物的统称，如刺瓜和黄瓜
pinyin: xiāng guā zhǔ zhí wù rèn yī zhòng xiāng guān huò lèi sì zhí wù de tǒng chēng， rú cì guā huò huáng guā
english: Any of several related or similar plants, such as the bur cucumber or the squirting cucumber.

hanzi: 我丈夫想买一条小狗，但我得照料它，因此我坚持不同意。
pinyin: wǒ zhàng fu xiǎng mǎi yī tiáo xiǎo gǒu， dàn wǒ de zhào liào tā， yīn cǐ wǒ jiān chí bù tóng yì。
english: My husband wanted to buy a puppy, but I would have to look after it so I put my foot down and said No.

hanzi: 我们班上有三十位学生，只有一位通过考试，其余都不及格。
pinyin: wǒ men bān shàng yǒu sān shí wèi xué sheng， zhǐ yǒu yī wèi tōng guò kǎo shì， qí yú dōu bù jí gé。
english: We have 30 students in our class; one passed the exam, and the others (=the rest) all failed.

hanzi: 我们班上有三十位学生，只有一位通过考试，其余都不及格。
pinyin: wǒ men bān shàng yǒu sān shí wèi xué sheng， zhǐ yǒu yī wèi tōng guò kǎo shì， qí yú dōu bù jí gé。
english: We have 30 students in our class; one passed the exam, and the others (=the rest) all failed.

hanzi: 默许的以无反应或不行动作为回应而接受或服从于某一行动的
pinyin: mò xǔ de yǐ wú fǎn yìng huò bù xíng dòng zuò wèi huí yìng ér jiē shòu huò fú cóng yú mǒu yī xíng dòng de
english: Receiving or subjected to an action without responding or initiating an action in return.

hanzi: 他们全家除他以外头发都是红的. 正所谓有例外才证明有规律嘛.
pinyin: tā men quán jiā chú tā yǐ wài tóu fa dōu shì hóng de.  zhèng suǒ wèi yǒu lì wài cái zhèng míng yǒu guī lu:4 ma.
english: All his family have red hair except him. He is the exception which proves the rule.

hanzi: 一个学生犯了错误不要光去责备他，我们最好帮助他改正错误。
pinyin: yī gè xué sheng fàn le cuò wù bù yào guāng qù zé bèi tā， wǒ men zuì hǎo bāng zhù tā gǎi zhèng cuò wù。
english: Instead of railing at a student for his mistakes, we had better help him to correct them.

hanzi: 我们所办不到的是要使云产生雨，如果它不是随时要产生雨的话。
pinyin: wǒ men suǒ bàn bù dào de shì yào shǐ yún chǎn shēng yǔ， rú guǒ tā bú shì suí shí yào chǎn shēng yǔ de huà。
english: What we can not do is make a cloud produce rain if it is not ready to produce it.

hanzi: 这两种体系只是在表面上有某种相似之处, 其实根本不同.
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng tǐ xì zhǐ shì zài biǎo miàn shàng yǒu mǒu zhǒng xiāng sì zhī chù,  qí shí gēn běn bù tóng.
english: There is only a formal resemblance between the two systems; they are in fact radically different.

hanzi: 我前来看你，是因为安德森先生说你对我们的工程很感兴趣。
pinyin: wǒ qián lái kàn nǐ， shì yīn wèi ān dé sēn xiān sheng shuō nǐ duì wǒ men de gōng chéng hěn gǎn xìng qu。
english: I came to see you on the ground that Mr Anderson said that you were interested in our project.

hanzi: 你本来应该有足够的常识，在拆开电线之前先把电源切断。
pinyin: nǐ běn lái yīng gāi yǒu zú gòu de cháng shí， zài chāi kāi diàn xiàn zhī qián xiān bǎ diàn yuán qiē duàn。
english: You should have had enough sense to turn off the electricity supply before disconnecting the wires.

hanzi: 政治家不应该参与那些可能会影响其政治判断力的商业事务。
pinyin: zhèng zhì jiā bù yīng gāi cān yù nà xiē kě néng kuài yǐng xiǎng qí zhèng zhì pàn duàn lì de shāng yè shì wù。
english: Politicians should not engage in business affairs that might affect their political judgement.

hanzi: 年代从某一具体日期算起的一段时间，也用作其年代系统的根据
pinyin: nián dài zòng mǒu yī jù tǐ rì qī suàn qǐ de yī duàn shí jiān， yě yòng zuò qí nián dài xì tǒng de gēn jù
english: A period of time as reckoned from a specific date serving as the basis of its chronological system.

hanzi: 那个小男孩不得不按吩咐的去做，否则他哥哥要将他痛打一顿。
pinyin: nèi gè xiǎo nán hái bù dé bù àn fēn fù de qù zuò， fǒu zé tā gē ge yào jiàng tā tòng dǎ yī dùn。
english: The little boy had to do as he was told or his brother would have knocked him into the middle of next week.

hanzi: 中间色，半调色在光线最强处与黑色暗影之间的一种色调或明暗的配合
pinyin: zhōng jiān shǎi， bàn tiáo shǎi zài guāng xiàn zuì qiáng chù yù hēi sè àn yǐng zhī jiān de yī zhòng sè diào huò míng àn de pèi hé
english: A tone or value halfway between a highlight and a dark shadow.

hanzi: 这套书出版以来，在市场上反应良好，我们决定推广这种学习方法。
pinyin: zhè tào shū chū bǎn yǐ lái， zài shì chǎng shàng fǎn yìng liáng hǎo， wǒ men jué dìng tuī guǎng zhè zhǒng xué xí fāng fǎ。
english: The series of books gained applause. We decided to popularize the method.

hanzi: 在人们意识到应当保护自然资源的这个时代, 草原已不容再受破坏了.
pinyin: zài rén men yì shí dào yīng dāng bǎo hù zì rán zī yuán de zhè gè shí dài,  cǎo yuán yǐ bù róng zài shòu pò huài le.
english: In these conservation-conscious times, areas of grassland are no longer expendable.

hanzi: 沿海地区的冬天天气暖和，可是相比之下中部平原却异常寒冷。
pinyin: yán hǎi dì qū de dōng tiān tiān qì nuǎn huó， kě shì xiāng bǐ zhī xià zhōng bù píng yuán què yì cháng hán lěng。
english: The coastal areas have mild winters, but by contrast the central plains become extremely cold.

hanzi: 你如果考虑到她学英语才不过六个月，那么她英语讲得的确不错了。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ kǎo lu:4 dào tā xué Yīng yǔ cái bù guò liù gè yuè， nà me tā Yīng yǔ jiǎng de dí què bù cuò le。
english: If you consider that she has only been studying English for six months, she speaks it very well.

hanzi: 如您所知，由于本公司存货已不多，所以对此项货物的需求极为迫切。
pinyin: rú nín suǒ zhī， yóu yú běn gōng sī cún huò yǐ bù duō， suǒ yǐ duì cǐ xiàng huò wù de xū qiú jí wéi pò qiè。
english: As you know, we have been in urgent need of these items as we have only a few in stock.

hanzi: 我在街上遇到她，可是当我向她微笑时，她却连招呼都没有向我打一个。
pinyin: wǒ zài jiē shàng yù dào tā， kě shì dàng wǒ xiàng tā wēi xiào shí， tā què lián zhāo hu dōu méi yǒu xiàng wǒ dǎ yī gè。
english: I passed her in the street but she didn't even acknowledge me when I smiled.

hanzi: 此外，我父亲过去是个水手，我想了解他过去常去的那些地方的情况。
pinyin: cǐ wài， wǒ fù qīn guò qu shì gè shuǐ shǒu， wǒ xiǎng liǎo jiě tā guò qu cháng qù de nà xiē dì fang de qíng kuàng。
english: Besides, my father was a sailor, and I want to know about the places he used to go to.

hanzi: 那影片招致许多人的反感, 尤其是工人不满其中对工人生活的描写.
pinyin: nà yǐng piàn zhāo zhì xǔ duō rén de fǎn gǎn,  yóu qí shì gōng rén bù mǎn qí zhōng duì gōng rén shēng huó de miáo xiě.
english: The film caused a lot of bad feeling, not least among the workers whose lives it described.

hanzi: 在看过建筑师的设计图后。他很容易想像出房子完工时的模样。
pinyin: zài kàn guò jiàn zhú shī de shè jì tú hòu。 tā hěn róng yì xiǎng xiàng chū fáng zi wán gōng shí de mú yàng。
english: After looking at the architect's plans, it was easy for him to see the completed house in his mind's eye.

hanzi: 很多交际上的访问，你以为是来拜会你本人的，其实是来拜会你的酒瓶子。
pinyin: hěn duō jiāo jì shàng de fǎng wèn， nǐ yǐ wéi shì lái bài huì nǐ běn rén de， qí shí shì lái bài huì nǐ de jiǔ píng zi。
english: Many social visits that you think pay to yourself is paying to your bottle.

hanzi: 优越的位置提供广泛全面的观点或看法的位置，如一个地方或一种情形
pinyin: yōu yuè de wèi zhi tí gōng guǎng fàn quán miàn de guān diǎn huò kàn fǎ de wèi zhi， rú yī gè dì fang huò yī zhòng qíng xing
english: A position that affords a broad overall view or perspective, as of a place or situation.

hanzi: 在劳资集体谈判制度下，工人作为一个团体同公司经理进行谈判。
pinyin: zài láo zī jí tǐ tán pàn zhì dù xià， gōng rén zuò wéi yī gè tuán tǐ tóng gōng sī jīng lǐ jìn xíng tán pàn。
english: In a system of collective bargaining, the workers as a group negotiate with the managers of the company.

hanzi: 许多国家里，年轻人仍保持着妇女结婚时穿白色长礼服的传统。
pinyin: xǔ duō guó jiā lǐ， nián qīng rén réng bǎo chí zhuó fù nu:3 jié hūn shí chuān bái sè zhǎng lǐ fú de chuán tǒng。
english: In many countries young people still keep up the tradition that women will get married in a long white dress.

hanzi: 叶绿素是生长在植物中的绿色物质，它能吸收阳光，促进植物生长。
pinyin: yè lu:4 sù shì shēng zhǎng zài zhí wù zhòng dì lu:4 sè wù zhì， tā néng xī shōu yáng guāng， cù jìn zhí wù shēng zhǎng。
english: Chlorophyll is a green substance in plants that absorbs energy from sunlight and helps them grow.

hanzi: 当一束光线穿进暗淡的房间时，我们可以看到空气中有许多小颗粒在飞舞。
pinyin: dàng yī shù guāng xiàn chuān jìn àn dàn de fáng jiān shí， wǒ men kě yǐ kàn dào kōng qì zhòng yǒu xǔ duō xiǎo kē lì zài fēi wǔ。
english: We can see many molecules flying in the air when a sunbeam penetrated the dark room.

hanzi: 和朋友聊天是愉快的，而这种情形没有比和知己的朋友聊天更为愉快。
pinyin: huò péng you liáo tiān shì yú kuài de， ér zhè zhǒng qíng xing méi yǒu bì huò zhī jǐ de péng you liáo tiān gèng wèi yú kuài。
english: It is pleasant to chat with friends, and with no chat is it more pleasant than with close friends.

hanzi: 学校教育的最大用处，与其说是教你事物，不如说是教你学习的方法。
pinyin: xué xiào jiào yù de zuì dà yòng chu， yǔ qí shuō shì jiào nǐ shì wù， bù rú shuō shì jiào nǐ xué xí de fāng fǎ。
english: The great use of a school education is not so much to teach you things as to teach you the art of learning.

hanzi: 学校教育的最大用处，与其说是教你事物，不如说是教你学习的方法。
pinyin: xué xiào jiào yù de zuì dà yòng chu， yǔ qí shuō shì jiào nǐ shì wù， bù rú shuō shì jiào nǐ xué xí de fāng fǎ。
english: The great use of a school education is not so much to teach you things as to teach you the art of learning.

hanzi: 对于历史上的事件，当时的报道往往比现代历史学家的评述更为有趣。
pinyin: duì yú lì shǐ shàng de shì jiàn， dāng shí de bào dào wǎng wǎng bì xiàn dài lì shǐ xué jiā de píng shù gèng wèi yǒu qù。
english: Contemporary reports of the past events are often more interesting than modern historians' view of them.

hanzi: 对于历史上的事件，当时的报道往往比现代历史学家的评述更为有趣。
pinyin: duì yú lì shǐ shàng de shì jiàn， dāng shí de bào dào wǎng wǎng bì xiàn dài lì shǐ xué jiā de píng shù gèng wèi yǒu qù。
english: Contemporary reports of the past events are often more interesting than modern historians' view of them.

hanzi: 我敢说，如果你受邀到他们那儿去做客，那将是你一生中度过的最愉快的时光。
pinyin: wǒ gǎn shuō， rú guǒ nǐ shòu yāo dào tā men nà r qù zuò kè， nà jiàng shì nǐ yī shēng zhòng dù guò de zuì yú kuài de shí guāng。
english: If you are invited to visit them you'll have the time of your life, I can tell you.

hanzi: 条款书面文件中的具体章节或一系列中的条款，如合同，章程或条约
pinyin: tiáo kuǎn shū miàn wén jiàn zhòng dì jù tǐ zhāng jié huò yī xì liè zhòng dì tiáo kuǎn， rú hé tong， zhāng chéng huò tiáo yuē
english: A particular section or item of a series in a written document, as in a contract, constitution, or treaty.

hanzi: 按一般人在这些问题上的看法，选民常常着眼于国内问题来选择候选人。
pinyin: àn yī bān rén zài zhè xie wèn tí shàng de kàn fǎ， xuǎn mín cháng cháng zhuó yǎn yú guó nèi wèn tí lái xuǎn zé hòu xuǎn rén。
english: According to conventional wisdom, voters usually make their choice on the basis of domestic issues.

hanzi: 随着逐渐成熟，许多年轻的激进分子对 生活和社会渐持较为宽容的态度。
pinyin: suí zhe zhú jiàn chéng shú， xǔ duō nián qīng de jī jìn fèn zǐ duì  shēng huó huò shè huì jiàn chí jiào wèi kuān róng de tài du。
english: As they mature, many young radicals mellow into a more tolerant attitude towards life and society.

hanzi: 异种移植术用外科手术的方法把某一个体或物中的组织移植到另一个体或物体上
pinyin: yì zhòng yí zhí zhú yòng wài kē shǒu shù de fāng fǎ bǎ mǒu yī gè tǐ huò wù zhòng dì zǔ zhī yí zhí dào lìng yī gè tǐ huò wù tǐ shàng
english: The surgical grafting of tissue obtained from one individual or species to another.

hanzi: 在战争前那些美好的岁月里，似乎没有任何东西能打破我们平静的生活进程。
pinyin: zài zhàn zhēng qián nà xiē měi hǎo de suì yuè lǐ， sì hu méi yǒu rèn hé dōng xi néng dǎ pò wǒ men píng jìng de shēng huó jìn chéng。
english: It seemed nothing could disturb the even tenor of our existence in those happy prewar days.

hanzi: 一本好的学生字典应该既提供词语的含义，又举出应用这些词语的例子。
pinyin: yī běn hǎo de xué sheng zì diǎn yīng gāi jì tí gōng cí yǔ de hán yì， yòu jǔ chū yìng yòng zhè xie cí yǔ de lì zi。
english: A good learner's dictionary should give both the meanings of the words and examples of the constructions in which they are used.

hanzi: 大家都知道这老头儿精神有点失常，可是他有些想法听起来并不那么古怪。
pinyin: dà jiā dōu zhī dào zhè lǎo tóu er jīng shén yǒu diǎn shī cháng， kě shì tā yǒu xiē xiǎng fǎ tìng qǐ lai bìng bù nà me gǔ guài。
english: Everybody knows the old man's got bats in the belfry, but some of his ideas are not as crazy as they sound.

hanzi: 他从前写过一些成功的小说，但在最近的一部中他才真正充分发挥了自己的特长。
pinyin: tā cóng qián xiě guò yī xiē chéng gōng de xiǎo shuō， dàn zài zuì jìn de yī bù zhòng tā cái zhēn zhèng chōng fèn fā huī le zì jǐ de tè zhǎng。
english: He wrote successful novels before, but he really come into his own with the latest one.

hanzi: 秘密的调情动作调情动作，其中一方在桌下偷偷地用脚或腿磨擦对方的腿或脚
pinyin: mì mì de tiáo qíng dòng zuò tiáo qíng dòng zuò， qí zhōng yī fāng zài zhuō xià tōu tōu de yòng jué huò tuǐ mó cā duì fāng de tuǐ huò jué
english: The act of flirting in which one secretly touches the feet or legs of another with one's own, as under a table.

hanzi: 很抱歉，你的病刚好我就给你加上了新的负担，但确实没有别的人能干这活。
pinyin: hěn bào qiàn， nǐ de bìng gāng hǎo wǒ jiù jǐ nǐ jiā shàng le xīn de fù dān， dàn què shí méi yǒu bié de rén néng gàn zhè huó。
english: I am sorry to impose a new burden on you so soon after your illness, but there is no one else who is capable of doing this work.

hanzi: 录像磁带一种比较宽的磁带，用来记录图像和对应的声音以进行复放或者播放
pinyin: lù xiàng cí dài yī zhòng bǐ jiào kuān de cí dài， yòng lái jì lù tú xiàng huò duì yìng de shēng yīn yǐ jìn xíng fù fàng huò zhě bō fàng
english: A relatively wide magnetic tape used to record visual images and associated sound for subsequent playback or broadcasting.

hanzi: 两家互相竞争的纺织公司中，奖金较多，管理较好的一家很快就占了上风。
pinyin: liǎng jiā hù xiāng jìng zhēng de fǎng zhī gōng sī zhòng， jiǎng jīn jiào duō， guǎn lǐ jiào hǎo de yī jiā hěn kuài jiù zhàn le shàng fēng。
english: Of two rival spinning companies, one is richer and better managed than the other, and therefore soon gets the upper hand.

hanzi: 那老太太每天去买报纸, 不多时便觉乐在其中, 因为她主要是想和店主聊天.
pinyin: nà lǎo tài tai měi tiān qù mǎi bào zhǐ,  bù duō shí pián jué yuè zài qí zhōng,  yīn wèi tā zhǔ yào shì xiǎng huò diàn zhǔ liáo tiān.
english: For the old lady buying the daily newspaper soon became an end in itself, since she really just wanted to chat with the shopkeeper.

hanzi: 运动员护身一种运动员用的护身弹性织物，有用保护性的坚硬塑料或金属制成的加强层
pinyin: yùn dòng yuán hù shēn yī zhòng yùn dòng yuán yòng de hù shēn tán xìng zhī wù， yǒu yòng bǎo hù xìng de jiān yìng sù liào huò jīn shǔ zhì chéng de jiā qiáng céng
english: An athletic supporter having a protective reinforcement of rigid plastic or metal.

hanzi: 社会是由形形色色的人组成。有些人很好，有些人很坏，也有些人介乎两者之间。
pinyin: shè huì shì yóu xíng xíng shǎi shǎi de rén zǔ chéng。 yǒu xiē rén hěn hǎo， yǒu xiē rén hěn huài， yě yǒu xiē rén jiè hū liǎng zhě zhī jiān。
english: Society is made up of a variety of people; some are good, others (are) bad, and still others (are) in between.

hanzi: 那老太太每天去买报纸, 不多时便觉乐在其中, 因为她主要是想和店主聊天.
pinyin: nà lǎo tài tai měi tiān qù mǎi bào zhǐ,  bù duō shí pián jué yuè zài qí zhōng,  yīn wèi tā zhǔ yào shì xiǎng huò diàn zhǔ liáo tiān.
english: For the old lady buying the daily newspaper soon became an end in itself, since she really just wanted to chat with the shopkeeper.

hanzi: 担保一种字据或保证，通常为书面的，以保证某种产品或服务的质量或耐用性
pinyin: dān bǎo yī zhòng zì jù huò bǎo zhèng， tōng cháng wèi shū miàn de， yǐ bǎo zhèng mǒu zhǒng chǎn pǐn huò fú wù de zhì liàng huò nài yòng xìng
english: A promise or an assurance, especially one given in writing, that attests to the quality or durability of a product or service.

hanzi: 既然死人占多数，我们在死人之中比在生人之中有更多的朋友，就是理所当然的事情。
pinyin: jì rán sǐ rén zhàn duō shù， wǒ men zài sǐ rén zhī zhōng bì zài shēng rén zhī zhōng yǒu gèng duō de péng you， jiù shì lǐ suǒ dāng rán de shì qing。
english: The dead being the majority, it is natural that we should have more friends among them than among the living.

hanzi: 常去教堂的英国人更喜欢严格的布教者，因为他认为一些深刻的真理不至于伤害他的邻居。
pinyin: cháng qù jiào táng de Yīng guó rén gèng xǐ huan yán gé de bù jiào zhě， yīn wèi tā rèn wéi yī xiē shēn kè de zhēn lǐ bù zhì yú shāng hài tā de lín jū。
english: The british churchgoer prefer a severe preacher because he think a few home truth with do his neighbour no harm.

hanzi: 在你生日之际，向你致以亲切的祝贺。生日意味着一个新的开端，意味着重新把握生活的机会。
pinyin: zài nǐ shēng rì zhī jì， xiàng nǐ zhì yǐ qīn qiè de zhù hè。 shēng rì yì wèi zhe yī gè xīn de kāi duān， yì wèi zhe chóng xīn bǎ wò shēng huó de jī huì。
english: Affectionate birthday greetings. Birthday means a new beginning and a new chance to take hold on life.

hanzi: 现在有一百多家美国大专院校和几乎同样多的中国大专院校建立了教育上的交流关系。
pinyin: xiàn zài yǒu yī bǎi duō jiā Měi guó dà zhuān yuàn xiào huò jī hū tóng yàng duō de Zhōng guó dà zhuān yuàn xiào jiàn lì le jiào yù shàng de jiāo liú guān xi。
english: More than one hundred American colleges and universities now have educational exchanges with nearly as many Chinese institutions.

hanzi: 他珍视生命。
pinyin: tā zhēn shì shēng mìng。
english: He holds life dear.

hanzi: 铁容易生锈。
pinyin: tiě róng yì shēng xiù。
english: Iron is apt to rust.

hanzi: 他直晃脑袋.
pinyin: tā zhí huàng nǎo dài.
english: His head keeps jerking.

hanzi: 他得了肝癌。
pinyin: tā dé le gān ái。
english: He's got a cancer in his liver.

hanzi: 饥饿引起犯罪。
pinyin: jī è yǐn qǐ fàn zuì。
english: Hunger begets crime.

hanzi: 他奔向书架。
pinyin: tā bèn xiàng shū jià。
english: He ran to the bookshelf.

hanzi: 狗露出了牙齿。
pinyin: gǒu lù chū le yá chǐ。
english: The dog bared its teeth.

hanzi: 她善于理财。
pinyin: tā shàn yú lǐ cái。
english: She is wise in money matters.

hanzi: 他性格放纵。
pinyin: tā xìng gé fàng zòng。
english: His character is indulgent.

hanzi: 吸烟可致肺癌.
pinyin: xī yān kě zhì fèi ái.
english: Smoking can cause lung cancer.

hanzi: 铁很容易氧化。
pinyin: tiě hěn róng yì yǎng huà。
english: Iron is easily oxidized.

hanzi: 狼总是成群猎食.
pinyin: láng zǒng shì chéng qún liè sì.
english: Wolves hunt in packs.

hanzi: 变形形状的扭曲
pinyin: biàn xíng xíng zhuàng de niǔ qū
english: A distortion of shape.

hanzi: 寒风掠过平原.
pinyin: hán fēng lu:è guò píng yuán.
english: Cold winds swept the plains.

hanzi: 他拉弓放了一箭.
pinyin: tā lā gōng fàng le yī jiàn.
english: He shot an arrow from his bow.

hanzi: 他出生于英格兰。
pinyin: tā chū shēng yú yīng gé lán。
english: He was born in England.

hanzi: 拐棍已折柱不得。
pinyin: guǎi gùn yǐ zhé zhù bù dé。
english: Never lean on a break staff.

hanzi: 粥有益于消化。
pinyin: zhōu yǒu yì yú xiāo huà。
english: Porridge is good for digestion.

hanzi: 伤口渐渐愈合。
pinyin: shāng kǒu jiàn jiàn yù hé。
english: The wound gradually scarred over.

hanzi: 汽油快要耗尽了。
pinyin: qì yóu kuài yào hào jìn le。
english: The petrol is running out.

hanzi: 步兵防守甚佳。
pinyin: bù bīng fáng shǒu shèn jiā。
english: The infantry are defending well.

hanzi: 吵闹声使他烦躁。
pinyin: chǎo nào shēng shǐ tā fán zào。
english: The loud noise chafed him.

hanzi: 我们在御座前跪下.
pinyin: wǒ men zài yù zuò qián guì xià.
english: We knelt before the throne.

hanzi: 草上沾满了露珠.
pinyin: cǎo shàng zhān mǎn le lù zhū.
english: The grass was sprinkled with dew.

hanzi: 父辈应当被尊重。
pinyin: fù bèi yīng dāng bèi zūn zhòng。
english: A sire should be respected.

hanzi: 她是语音学权威.
pinyin: tā shì yǔ yīn xué quán wēi.
english: She's an authority on phonetics.

hanzi: 蜡烛已烧去一半。
pinyin: là zhú yǐ shāo qù yī bàn。
english: Half the candle had burnt away.

hanzi: 炮弹在四处爆炸。
pinyin: pào dàn zài sì chù bào zhà。
english: Shells were bursting all around.

english: All these items have been checked up.

hanzi: 大街上突然发生了暴乱.
pinyin: dà jiē shàng tū rán fā shēng le bào luàn.
english: Violence has erupted on the streets.

hanzi: 此庙由粗大的柱子支撑.
pinyin: cǐ miào yóu cū dà de zhù zi zhī chēng.
english: The temple is supported by massive columns.

hanzi: 这些争论彼此势均力敌。
pinyin: zhè xie zhēng lùn bǐ cǐ shì jūn lì dí。
english: These arguments cancel each other out.

hanzi: 白菜一星期内就发芽了。
pinyin: bái cài yī xīng qī nèi jiù fā yá le。
english: The cabbage germinated within a week.

hanzi: 我对他的粗暴提出抗议。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā de cū bào tí chū kàng yì。
english: I made remonstrance against his rudeness.

hanzi: 他出生在一个富裕的家庭。
pinyin: tā chū shēng zài yī gè fù yù de jiā tíng。
english: He was born in a wealthy family.

hanzi: 当时没有印刷的书籍。
pinyin: dāng shí méi yǒu yìn shuà de shū jí。
english: There were no printed books in those days.

hanzi: 她的微笑掩饰了她的感情。
pinyin: tā de wēi xiào yǎn shì le tā de gǎn qíng。
english: Her smile masked true feelings.

hanzi: 她的微笑掩饰了她的感情。
pinyin: tā de wēi xiào yǎn shì le tā de gǎn qíng。
english: Her smile masked true feelings.

hanzi: 有些水果和种子有外壳。
pinyin: yǒu xiē shuǐ guǒ huò zhǒng zi yǒu wài ké。
english: Some fruits and seeds have hulls.

hanzi: 她拍摄鸟儿飞行的照片。
pinyin: tā pāi shè niǎo er fēi xíng de zhào piàn。
english: She photographed the birds in flight.

hanzi: 她的一生被疾病所摧残。
pinyin: tā de yī shēng bèi jí bìng suǒ cuī cán。
english: Her life was blighted by ill health.

hanzi: 他主张削减军费开支。
pinyin: tā zhǔ zhāng xuē jiǎn jūn fèi kāi zhī。
english: He advocates reducing military spending.

hanzi: 公司把汽车当做抵押品。
pinyin: gōng sī bǎ qì chē dàng zuò dǐ yá pǐn。
english: The company took the cars as hostage.

hanzi: 我一点也不惊讶她的率直。
pinyin: wǒ yī diǎn yě bù jīng yà tā de lu:4 zhí。
english: I'm not surprised at her frankness.

hanzi: 她的头发几乎垂到了腰部.
pinyin: tā de tóu fa jī hū chuí dào le yāo bù.
english: Her hair nearly reached down to her waist.

hanzi: 我们趁便参观了皇宫.
pinyin: wǒ men chèn pián cān guān le huáng gōng.
english: We took the opportunity of visiting the palace.

hanzi: 别再争辩逗号的用法了.
pinyin: biè zài zhēng biàn dòu hào de yòng fǎ le.
english: Stop quibbling about the use of the comma.

hanzi: 我不幸错过了末班火车。
pinyin: wǒ bù xìng cuò guò le mò bān huǒ chē。
english: Unfortunately, I missed the last train.

hanzi: 她穿着半透明丝质长袍。
pinyin: tā chuān zhuó bàn tòu míng sī zhì cháng páo。
english: She wears a translucent silk gown.

hanzi: 英国的货币单位是镑.
pinyin: Yīng guó de huò bì dān wèi shì bàng.
english: The monetary unit of Great Britain is the pound.

hanzi: 爆炸发出巨大的声响。
pinyin: bào zhà fā chū jù dà de shēng xiǎng。
english: The explosion gave forth a tremendous sound.

hanzi: 洪水冲毁了许多桥梁.
pinyin: hóng shuǐ chòng huǐ le xǔ duō qiáo liáng.
english: Many bridges were swept away by the floods.

hanzi: 狮子抓住猎物，把它吃了。
pinyin: shī zi zhuā zhù liè wù， bǎ tā jí le。
english: The lion seized its prey and ate it.

hanzi: 财富并不一定带来快乐。
pinyin: cái fù bìng bù yī dìng dài lái kuài lè。
english: Money doesn't always bring happiness.

hanzi: 钢笔从我指缝中滑下去了。
pinyin: gāng bǐ zòng wǒ zhǐ fèng zhòng huá xià qu le。
english: The pen slips out of my fingers.

hanzi: 她拍摄鸟儿飞行的照片。
pinyin: tā pāi shè niǎo er fēi xíng de zhào piàn。
english: She photographed the birds in flight.

hanzi: 我至今尚未收到他的信.
pinyin: wǒ zhì jīn shàng wèi shōu dào tā de xìn.
english: I haven't received a letter from him yet.

hanzi: 牙科医生常常给患者补牙.
pinyin: yá kē yī shēng cháng cháng jǐ huàn zhě bǔ yá.
english: A dentist often has to fill teeth.

hanzi: 这样浪费金钱简直是罪恶。
pinyin: zhè yàng làng fèi jīn qián jiǎn zhí shì zuì è。
english: It's a wicked waste of money.

hanzi: 他把钥匙插入锁里转动。
pinyin: tā bǎ yào shi chā rù suǒ lǐ zhuǎn dòng。
english: He put the key in the lock and turned it.

hanzi: 这样浪费金钱简直是罪恶。
pinyin: zhè yàng làng fèi jīn qián jiǎn zhí shì zuì è。
english: It's a wicked waste of money.

hanzi: 社会年刊已经出版了。
pinyin: shè huì nián kān yǐ jīng chū bǎn le。
english: The annals of the society have been published.

hanzi: 他收到一个扎得很紧的包裹。
pinyin: tā shōu dào yī gè zhá de hěn jǐn de bāo guǒ。
english: He received a compact package.

hanzi: 这是一个纯学术性的问题。
pinyin: zhè shì yī gè chún xué shù xìng de wèn tí。
english: The question is purely academic.

hanzi: 那块石头差点儿砸到男孩。
pinyin: nà kuài shí tou cī diǎn er zá dào nán hái。
english: The stone just missed the boy.

hanzi: 恐怕我们要遇上暴风雨了。
pinyin: kǒng pà wǒ men yào yù shàng bào fēng yǔ le。
english: I'm afraid we're in for a storm.

hanzi: 塑胶有时可以替代皮革。
pinyin: sù jiāo yǒu shí kě yǐ tì dài pí gé。
english: Plastic is sometimes used instead of leather.

hanzi: 她仍然坚持要求赔偿.
pinyin: tā réng rán jiān chí yāo qiú péi cháng.
english: She is still pressing her claim for compensation.

hanzi: 俄国于是对土耳其宣战。
pinyin: E2 guó yú shì duì tǔ ěr qí xuān zhàn。
english: Russia thereupon declared war upon Turkey.

hanzi: 鱼浮到水面上捕捉昆虫。
pinyin: yú fú dào shuǐ miàn shàng bǔ zhuō kūn chóng。
english: Fish were surfacing to catch insects.

hanzi: 圣诞节应是欢乐的时刻.
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié yìng shì huān lè de shí kè.
english: Christmas should be a time of great cheer.

hanzi: 鱼浮到水面上捕捉昆虫。
pinyin: yú fú dào shuǐ miàn shàng bǔ zhuō kūn chóng。
english: Fish were surfacing to catch insects.

hanzi: 他处于异常焦虑的状态。
pinyin: tā chǔ yú yì cháng jiāo lu:4 de zhuàng tài。
english: He was in a state of great agitation.

hanzi: 他的童年是压抑而孤独的。
pinyin: tā de tóng nián shì yā yì ér gū dú de。
english: His childhood was repressed and solitary.

hanzi: 酸把银器的表面腐蚀了。
pinyin: suān bǎ yín qì de biǎo miàn fǔ shí le。
english: Acid had pitted the surface of the silver.

hanzi: 我丈夫不允许我染指甲。
pinyin: wǒ zhàng fu bù yǔn xǔ wǒ rǎn zhī jia。
english: My husband doesn't allow me to paint my nails.

hanzi: 我们绝不会向侵略者屈服。
pinyin: wǒ men jué bù kuài xiàng qīn lu:è zhě qū fú。
english: We will never yield to invaders.

hanzi: 恐怖分子占领了大使馆.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ zhàn lǐng le dà shǐ guǎn.
english: The terrorists have occupied the Embassy.

hanzi: 口袋裂开了, 大米撒出来了.
pinyin: kǒu dài liè kāi le,  dà mǐ sǎ chū lai le.
english: The sack split and the rice poured out.

hanzi: 大部分有学问的人都很谦虚。
pinyin: dà bù fen yǒu xué wèn de rén dōu hěn qiān xū。
english: Most learned men are modest.

hanzi: 该油漆以粉制品形式出售.
pinyin: gāi yóu qī yǐ fěn zhì pǐn xíng shì chū shòu.
english: The paint is sold in powdered form.

hanzi: 大家都对他的逝世表示悲痛.
pinyin: dà jiā dōu duì tā de shì shì biǎo shì bēi tòng.
english: They all mourned his passing.

hanzi: 我喜欢步行更甚于骑自行车。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan bù xíng gèng shèn yú qí zì xíng chē。
english: I prefer walking to cycling.

hanzi: 她往餐具柜里放了些盘子。
pinyin: tā wàng cān jù jǔ lǐ fàng le xiē pán zi。
english: She put some plates in the sideboard.

pinyin: tā men zuì hòu zhōng yú dá chéng le xié yì。
english: Finally, they arrived at an agreement.

hanzi: 该雕像大小为实体的两倍。
pinyin: gāi diāo xiàng dà xiǎo wèi shí tǐ de liǎng bèi。
english: The statue is twice life-size.

hanzi: 我们凑巧一同到达这儿。
pinyin: wǒ men còu qiǎo yī tóng dào dá zhèr。
english: By coincidence, we arrived here at the same time.

hanzi: 报告披露他曾坐过牢。
pinyin: bào gào pī lù tā zēng zuò guò láo。
english: The report disclosed that he had served in prison.

pinyin: rén tǐ de zǔ zhī shì yóu xì bāo gòu chéng de.
english: Human tissue is made up of cells.

hanzi: 那条路是用鹅卵石铺成的。
pinyin: nà tiáo lù shì yòng é luǎn shí pù chéng de。
english: The road was paved with cobblestones.

hanzi: 我个人还是赞成炸香肠。
pinyin: wǒ gè rén hái shì zàn chéng zhà xiāng cháng。
english: I personally vote for fried sausage.

hanzi: 暴风雨的破坏力是巨大的。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ de pò huài lì shì jù dà de。
english: The destructive force of the storm is huge.

hanzi: 她的命运一直与悲哀相连。
pinyin: tā de mìng yùn yī zhí yù bēi āi xiāng lián。
english: Sorrow has always been her portion.

hanzi: 请改正我帐单上的错误。
pinyin: qǐng gǎi zhèng wǒ zhàng dān shàng de cuò wù。
english: Please rectify the mistake in my bill.

hanzi: 我爷爷在旧社会死于饥饿。
pinyin: wǒ yé ye zài jiù shè huì sǐ yú jī è。
english: My grandpa died of hunger in the old days.

hanzi: 有些人睡觉时磨牙齿。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén shuì jiào shí mò yá chǐ。
english: Some people grind their teeth while they are asleep.

hanzi: 协议对双方具有约束力。
pinyin: xié yì duì shuāng fāng jù yǒu yuē shù lì。
english: The agreement is binding on both parties.

hanzi: 协议对双方具有约束力。
pinyin: xié yì duì shuāng fāng jù yǒu yuē shù lì。
english: The agreement is binding on both parties.

hanzi: 学校就位于镇子的外面。
pinyin: xué xiào jiù wèi yú zhèn zi de wài mian。
english: The school is situated just outside the town.

hanzi: 与其说她善良不如说她单纯。
pinyin: yǔ qí shuō tā shàn liáng bù rú shuō tā dān chún。
english: She is not so kind as simple.

hanzi: 我的助手将操纵录音机.
pinyin: wǒ de zhù shǒu jiàng cāo zòng lù yīn jī.
english: My assistant will operate the tape-recorder.

hanzi: 这座建筑物有旗子作装饰.
pinyin: zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù yǒu qí zi zuò zhuāng shì.
english: The building was decorated with flags.

hanzi: 他已经登上事业的顶峰。
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng dēng shàng shì yè de dǐng fēng。
english: He has reached the pinnacle of his career.

hanzi: 封建贵族对人民很残酷。
pinyin: fēng jiàn guì zú duì rén mín hěn cán kù。
english: The feudal barons were cruel to the people.

hanzi: 他对我的建议轻蔑地一笑。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ de jiàn yì qīng miè de yī xiào。
english: He gave a scornful laugh at my proposal.

hanzi: 孩子们彼此的年龄很接近.
pinyin: hái zi men bǐ cǐ de nián líng hěn jiē jìn.
english: The children are close to each other in age.

hanzi: 一股巨浪从甲板上卷了过去。
pinyin: yī gǔ jù làng zòng jiǎ bǎn shàng juàn le guò qu。
english: A huge wave swept over the deck.

hanzi: 我们一定要消灭恐怖主义。
pinyin: wǒ men yī dìng yào xiāo miè kǒng bù zhǔ yì。
english: We are determined to smash terrorism.

hanzi: 血液在动脉血管中循环。
pinyin: xuè yè zài dòng mài xuè guǎn zhòng xún huán。
english: The blood coursed through the arteries.

hanzi: 他觉得自己在逐步走向死亡。
pinyin: tā jué de zì jǐ zài zhú bù zǒu xiàng sǐ wáng。
english: He saw himself dying by inches.

hanzi: 这次地震是个可怕的灾难。
pinyin: zhè cì dì zhèn shì gè kě pà de zāi nàn。
english: The earthquake was a terrible catastrophe.

hanzi: 他申请延长签证有效期。
pinyin: tā shēn qǐng yán cháng qiān zhèng yǒu xiào qī。
english: He asked for an extension of his visa.

hanzi: 他把他的成功归功于幸运。
pinyin: tā bǎ tā de chéng gōng guī gōng yú xìng yùn。
english: He ascribes his success to good luck.

hanzi: 他们担心河流会发洪水。
pinyin: tā men dān xīn hé liú kuài fà hóng shuǐ。
english: They were fearful that the river would flood.

hanzi: 现在改变方针是不明智的.
pinyin: xiàn zài gǎi biàn fāng zhēn shì bù míng zhì de.
english: It would be unwise to change tack now.

hanzi: 这间屋子陈设得简单朴素。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wū zi chén shè de jiǎn dān pǔ sù。
english: The room was furnished in austere style.

hanzi: 你欠我的债可以慢慢还。
pinyin: nǐ qiàn wǒ de zhài kě yǐ màn màn huán。
english: You can take your time to pay the debt you owe me.

hanzi: 她说的斯瓦希里语非常流利.
pinyin: tā shuō de sī wǎ xī lǐ yù fēi cháng liú lì.
english: She speaks Swahili with great fluency.

hanzi: 暴风雨的破坏力是巨大的。
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ de pò huài lì shì jù dà de。
english: The destructive force of the storm is huge.

hanzi: 教幼儿需有极大的耐心。
pinyin: jiào yòu ér xū yǒu jí dà de nài xīn。
english: Teaching little children takes infinite patience.

hanzi: 我感到浑身血液在沸腾。
pinyin: wǒ gǎn dào hún shēn xuè yè zài fèi téng。
english: I could feel blood pulsing through my veins.

hanzi: 他一下子就猜中了谜底.
pinyin: tā yí xià zi jiù cāi zhòng le mí dǐ.
english: He got the answer to the riddle as quick as a flash.

hanzi: 那条街经常交通阻塞。
pinyin: nà tiáo jiē jīng cháng jiāo tōng zǔ sè。
english: There is always traffic congestion in that street.

hanzi: 你应该继续保留著石油股份.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jì xù bǎo liú著 shí yóu gǔ fèn.
english: You should hold on to your oil shares.

hanzi: 这个商店专门出售巧克力。
pinyin: zhè gè shāng diàn zhuān mén chū shòu qiǎo kè lì。
english: This shop specializes in chocolates.

hanzi: 他在脑中权衡着这些想法。
pinyin: tā zài nǎo zhòng quán héng zhuó zhè xie xiǎng fǎ。
english: He weighed the ideas in his mind.

hanzi: 她正把烟筒里的黑灰扫掉。
pinyin: tā zhèng bǎ yān tǒng lǐ de hēi huī sào diào。
english: She is sweeping the soot off the chimney.

hanzi: 谨慎是那人性格的本质。
pinyin: jǐn shèn shì nà rén xìng gé de běn zhì。
english: Caution is the essence of that man's character.

hanzi: 造成死亡的直接原因不明.
pinyin: zào chéng sǐ wáng de zhí jiē yuán yīn bù míng.
english: The immediate cause of death is unknown.

hanzi: 他语气中带有威胁的口吻。
pinyin: tā yǔ qì zhòng dài yǒu wēi xié de kǒu wěn。
english: A tone of menace entered into his voice.

hanzi: 那顶帽子上饰有彩色珠子。
pinyin: nà dǐng mào zi shàng shì yǒu cǎi sè zhū zi。
english: The hat was decorated with colored beads.

hanzi: 他观察敏锐, 但是很少说话.
pinyin: tā guān chá mǐn ruì,  dàn shì hěn shǎo shuō huà.
english: He observes keenly, but says little.

hanzi: 正发育的孩子必须睡眠充足.
pinyin: zhèng fā yù de hái zi bì xū shuì mián chōng zú.
english: A growing child needs plenty of sleep.

hanzi: 那个邮递员被一只恶狗咬了。
pinyin: nèi gè yóu dì yuán bèi yī zhǐ wù gǒu yǎo le。
english: The postman was bitten by a fierce dog.

hanzi: 这本杂志登载优秀的小说。
pinyin: zhè běn zá zhì dēng zài yōu xiù de xiǎo shuō。
english: This magazine published excellent stories.

hanzi: 每年春天河水把山谷淹没。
pinyin: měi nián chūn tiān hé shuǐ bǎ shān gǔ yān mò。
english: Every spring the river floods the valley.

hanzi: 那个男人曾是个好色之徒。
pinyin: nèi gè nán rén zēng shì gè hào shǎi zhī tú。
english: That man used to be a lascivious person.

hanzi: 这艘船被敌人的鱼雷击沉了。
pinyin: zhè sōu chuán bèi dí rén de yú léi jī chén le。
english: The ship was sunk by an enemy torpedo.

hanzi: 我与其嫁给他，倒不如去死算了。
pinyin: wǒ yǔ qí jià jǐ tā， dào bù rú qù sǐ suàn le。
english: I may as well die as marry him.

hanzi: 一场示威游行将要发生。
pinyin: yī chǎng shì wēi yóu xíng jiāng yào fā shēng。
english: A disorderly demonstration will take place.

hanzi: 数学是研究纯数量的科学.
pinyin: shù xué shì yán jiū chún shù liàng de kē xué.
english: Mathematics is the science of pure quantity.

hanzi: 看日程表就使我头昏脑胀。
pinyin: kàn rì chéng biǎo jiù shǐ wǒ tou hūn nǎo zhàng。
english: Look at my schedule make my head spin.

hanzi: 我在黑暗中摸索着门把手。
pinyin: wǒ zài hēi àn zhòng mō suo zhuó mén bǎ shǒu。
english: I groped for the door handle in the dark.

hanzi: 他获得了这项发明的专利权。
pinyin: tā huò dé le zhè xiàng fā míng de zhuān lì quán。
english: He got a patent for this invention.

pinyin: zhuō zi shàng de liè fèng yuè biàn yuè kuān。
english: The cranny in the table became more and more wide.

english: He laid his opponent low with a single punch.

pinyin: zhēn zuì dà de máo bìng shì tā de jí xìng zi。
english: Jane's worst fault is her quick temper.

pinyin: jǐng chá shì bù yǔn xǔ jiē shòu chóu jīn de。
english: The police are not allowed to accept rewards.

pinyin: zhí chén dòng cí chén shù yǔ qì zhòng yòng de dòng cí
english: A verb in the indicative mood.

pinyin: chāo jí shì chǎng xiāo shòu gè zhǒng huò wù。
english: The supermarket sells goods of all descriptions.

pinyin: tā yī shēng xiàn shēn yú yán jiū wǔ dǎo。
english: Her whole life has been given to the study of dance.

english: The sunlight filtered through the curtains.

pinyin: tā yǐ jīng dá dào le tā shì yè de dǐng fēng。
english: He has reached the zenith of his career.

pinyin: shè huì shàng de zuì è shì zhí de sī kǎo de。
english: The society's evils are worth meditative.

pinyin: xìn zhòng jiá chāo piào zuì hǎo jì guà hào.
english: It's wise to register letters containing banknotes.

english: The temperature today is seventy degrees Fahrenheit.

pinyin: tā huà le gēn huǒ chái,  diǎn著 le dǎo huǒ suǒ.
english: He struck a match and ignited the fuse.

english: Her mission was to reclaim former criminals.

pinyin: tā bǎ yī jiàn wū zi gǎi jiàn chéng le wò shì。

english: Sound waves are measured by their amplitude.

english: Abstract art is an acquired taste.

english: The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing.

english: Complications set in, and the patient died.

english: He's so clever, he makes me feel inferior.

pinyin: tā shēn tǐ de zhòng liàng bǎ shù zhī yà wān le.

hanzi: 警察是不允许接受酬金的。
pinyin: jǐng chá shì bù yǔn xǔ jiē shòu chóu jīn de。
english: The police are not allowed to accept rewards.

english: All the local clergy attended the ceremony.

hanzi: 警察是不允许接受酬金的。
pinyin: jǐng chá shì bù yǔn xǔ jiē shòu chóu jīn de。
english: The police are not allowed to accept rewards.

hanzi: 这个概念是她的理论的核心.
pinyin: zhè gè gài niàn shì tā de lǐ lùn de hé xīn.
english: This concept is at the very core of her theory.

english: She cast her eyes down to avoid direct eye contact.

pinyin: tài píng yáng shì yī piàn guǎng dà de shuǐ yù。

pinyin: bìng rén yīn chū xiàn bìng fā zhèng ér sǐ wáng。
english: Complications set in, and the patient died.

english: An area or a region lying in the east.

pinyin: duì wǒ lái shuō， jià gé tài gāo shì yī gè zhàng ài。

pinyin: zhè liàng kǎ chē zuì dà zài zhòng liàng shì yī dùn。

english: He poured some wine into the goblet.

pinyin: tā qiáng diào xiǎo xīn jià shǐ de zhòng yào xìng。

hanzi: 他强调小心驾驶的重要性。
pinyin: tā qiáng diào xiǎo xīn jià shǐ de zhòng yào xìng。
english: He emphasized the importance of careful driving.

pinyin: tā men de hūn lǐ yóu dāng dì mù shī zhǔ chí。
english: Their nuptials were performed by the local priest.

english: The core of our appeal is freedom of speech.

pinyin: bào yǔ zhòng chū xiàn le hǎo duō cì shǎn diàn。
english: There were many flashes of lightning during the storm.

pinyin: nèi gè chāo xiě yuán xīn qín gōng zuò lái yǎng jiā。
english: The scribe worked hard to support his family.

pinyin: bào zhà de lì liang bǎ tǎ zhà de fěn suì。
english: The tower was blown to atoms by the force of the explosion.

pinyin: tā zì háo de kàn著 zì jǐ de gōng zuò chéng guǒ.

hanzi: 那个抄写员辛勤工作来养家。
pinyin: nèi gè chāo xiě yuán xīn qín gōng zuò lái yǎng jiā。
english: The scribe worked hard to support his family.

pinyin: nà gǒu yī lù gēn zài wǒ shēn páng biān chuǎn biān pǎo.
english: The dog panted along (the road) beside me.

pinyin: zhè xie wǔ qì shì duì shì jiè hé píng de wēi xié。
english: These weapons are a menace to world peace.

hanzi: 她要求赞助却遭到粗暴拒绝。
pinyin: tā yāo qiú zàn zhù què zāo dào cū bào jù jué。
english: Her request for a donation met with a rude repulse.

english: The spilt milk made a terrible mess on the carpet.

hanzi: 她要求赞助却遭到粗暴拒绝。
pinyin: tā yāo qiú zàn zhù què zāo dào cū bào jù jué。
english: Her request for a donation met with a rude repulse.

hanzi: 老板对他缓慢的进度不满意。

hanzi: 武士们冲进宫里保护国王。
pinyin: wǔ shì men chōng jìn gōng lǐ bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The cavaliers rushed into the palace to protect the king.

hanzi: 士兵们加强了他们的防御工事。
pinyin: shì bīng men jiā qiáng le tā men de fáng yù gōng shì。
english: The soldiers strengthened their defenses.

hanzi: 我很惊讶你对他印象不佳。
pinyin: wǒ hěn jīng yà nǐ duì tā yìn xiàng bù jiā。
english: I am surprised you got an unfavorable impression of him.

hanzi: 她是一个胸怀非常广阔的女子。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè xiōng huái fēi cháng guǎng kuò de nu:3 zǐ。
english: She is a woman of great breadth of mind.

hanzi: 这家企业是信用证的申请者。
pinyin: zhè jiā qǐ yè shì xìn yòng zhèng de shēn qǐng zhě。
english: The enterprise is an applicant of this credit.

hanzi: 他们通常不监禁初次犯罪的人。
pinyin: tā men tōng cháng bù jiān jìn chū cì fàn zuì de rén。
english: They don't usually imprison first offenders.

hanzi: 庆祝会的高潮是燃放烟火。
pinyin: qìng zhù kuài de gāo cháo shì rán fàng yān huǒ。
english: The climax of the celebration was a firework display.

hanzi: 猴子头向下倒挂在树枝上。
pinyin: hóu zi tou xiàng xià dào guà zài shù zhī shàng。
english: The monkey was hanging head downwards from the branch.

hanzi: 他过去的经历笼罩着神秘气氛。
pinyin: tā guò qu de jīng lì lǒng zhào zhuó shén mì qì fēn。
english: His past is enveloped in a shroud of mystery.

hanzi: 他点燃了生日蛋糕上的小蜡烛。
pinyin: tā diǎn rán le shēng rì dàn gāo shàng de xiǎo là zhú。
english: He lit the candles on the birthday cake.

hanzi: 他在英格兰西南部有一处房地产.
pinyin: tā zài yīng gé Lán xī nán bù yǒu yī chù fáng dì chǎn.
english: He has a property in the West Country.

hanzi: 你可以接通全国计算机网络。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ jiē tōng quán guó jì suàn jī wǎng luò。
english: You can plug into the national computer network.

hanzi: 老师给全班同学朗诵这首诗歌。
pinyin: lǎo shī jǐ quán bān tóng xué lǎng sòng zhè shǒu shī gē。
english: The teacher read the poem to the class.

hanzi: 我冒雨出去，结果被淋得湿透了。
pinyin: wǒ mào yǔ chū qù， jié guǒ bèi lìn de shī tòu le。
english: I went out in the rain and got wet through.

hanzi: 这家剧院光顾者寡只好关闭。
pinyin: zhè jiā jù yuàn guāng gù zhě guǎ zhǐ hǎo guān bì。
english: The theatre has had to close for lack of support.

hanzi: 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。
pinyin: mù shī zài chuán lí gǎng zhī qián wèi qí zhù fú。
english: The priest blessed the ship before it left port.

hanzi: 他们打扮得漂漂亮亮去参加聚会。
pinyin: tā men dǎ bàn de piào piào liang liàng qù cān jiā jù huì。
english: They all spruced up for the party.

hanzi: 那个抄写员辛勤工作来养家。
pinyin: nèi gè chāo xiě yuán xīn qín gōng zuò lái yǎng jiā。
english: The scribe worked hard to support his family.

hanzi: 随便摘花的人会被罚款。
pinyin: suí biàn zhāi huā de rén kuài bèi fá kuǎn。
english: They will impose a fine on anyone who should pick flowers at will.

hanzi: 请您放心，还款是有保障的。
pinyin: qǐng nín fàng xīn， huán kuǎn shì yǒu bǎo zhàng de。
english: Please rest assured that repayment is ensured.

hanzi: 我们得想个办法阻止他和她来往。
pinyin: wǒ men de xiǎng gè bàn fǎ zǔ zhǐ tā huò tā lái wǎng。
english: We must stop him from seeing her somehow.

hanzi: 潮湿的日子里，食物很容易发霉。
pinyin: cháo shī de rì zi lǐ， shí wù hěn róng yì fà méi。
english: Foods are easily to be mouldy in humid days.

hanzi: 人们抵受不住酷热而纷纷倒下.
pinyin: rén men dǐ shòu bú zhù kù rè ér fēn fēn dào xià.
english: Men were dropping like flies in the intense heat.

hanzi: 一片片的锈从旧铁锅上落下。
pinyin: yī piàn piàn de xiù zòng jiù tiě guō shàng luò xià。
english: Flakes of rust are falling from the old iron pan.

hanzi: 武士们冲进宫里保护国王。
pinyin: wǔ shì men chōng jìn gōng lǐ bǎo hù guó wáng。
english: The cavaliers rushed into the palace to protect the king.

hanzi: 你放心好了, 本周末一定下雨.
pinyin: nǐ fàng xīn hào le,  běn zhōu mò yī dìng xià yǔ.
english: You can rely upon it that it will rain this weekend.

hanzi: 乘火车的旅客要长时间受阻.
pinyin: chéng huǒ chē de lu:3 kè yào zhǎng shí jiān shòu zǔ.
english: There will be prolonged delays for rail travellers.

hanzi: 他在手上涂了些药膏来止痛。
pinyin: tā zài shǒu shàng tú le xiē yào gào lái zhǐ tòng。
english: He smeared some balm on his hand to soothe the pain.

hanzi: 我们把码头工人罢工当作头条新闻
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ mǎ tóu gōng rén bà gōng dàng zuò tóu tiáo xīn wén
english: We'll lead with the dock strike.

hanzi: 科学家已经揭开了原子的秘密。
pinyin: kē xué jiā yǐ jīng jiē kāi le yuán zǐ de mì mì。
english: Scientists have unlocked the secret of the atom.

hanzi: 她也受到波及，但程度较轻。
pinyin: tā yě shòu dào bō jí， dàn chéng dù jiào qīng。
english: She had also been affected, but to a lesser degree.

hanzi: 她并不因独自一人而稍有不悦.
pinyin: tā bìng bù yīn dú zì yī rén ér shāo yǒu bù yuè.
english: She wasn't any (the) less happy for being on her own.

hanzi: 他给我看了一些空中拍摄的照片。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ kàn le yī xiē kōng zhōng pāi shè de zhào piàn。
english: He showed me some aerial photographs.

hanzi: 他拐弯抹角地说她缺乏经验。
pinyin: tā guǎi wān mò jué de shuō tā quē fá jīng yàn。
english: He made oblique references to her lack of experience.

hanzi: 警方正在追捕一名越狱的逃犯。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài zhuī bǔ yī míng yuè yù de táo fàn。
english: The police are pursuing an escaped prisoner.

hanzi: 那次宴会上有大量饮料供应。
pinyin: nà cì yàn huì shàng yǒu dà liàng yǐn liào gōng yìng。
english: There was a liberal supply of drinks at the party.

hanzi: 政府试图阻止资源的减少。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shì tú zǔ zhǐ zī yuán de jiǎn shǎo。
english: The government tried to prevent the diminution of resources.

hanzi: 圣诞节我们度过了一个狂欢之夜。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié wǒ men dù guò le yī gè kuáng huān zhī yè。
english: We spent a riotous night at Christmas.

hanzi: 这只老虎拖着它的猎物进了丛林。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ lǎo hǔ tuō zhuó tā de liè wù jìn le cóng lín。
english: The tiger dragged its kill into the jungle.

hanzi: 教义问答法常用于宗教教学。
pinyin: jiào yì wèn dá fǎ cháng yòng yú zōng jiào jiào xué。
english: The catechism is used for religious instruction.

hanzi: 今日股票交投活跃, 价格看涨.
pinyin: jīn rì gǔ piào jiāo tóu huó yuè,  jià gé kàn zhàng.
english: Share prices were buoyant today in active trading.

hanzi: 他因过早出院而使病情恶化.
pinyin: tā yīn guò zǎo chū yuàn ér shǐ bìng qíng è huà.
english: He aggravated his condition by leaving hospital too soon.

hanzi: 财政部原则上反对这些提议。
pinyin: cái zhèng bù yuán zé shàng fǎn duì zhè xie tí yì。
english: The Treasury was opposed in principle to the proposals.

hanzi: 达成和平协定的概率是零。
pinyin: dá chéng hé píng xié dìng de gài lu:4 shì líng。
english: The probability of a peace agreement being reached is zero.

hanzi: 她把食物和饮料放在客人面前。
pinyin: tā bǎ shí wù huò yǐn liào fàng zài kè ren miàn qián。
english: She set the foods and drink before the guest.

hanzi: 他们对她的外表横加粗暴的评论。
pinyin: tā men duì tā de wài biǎo hèng jiā cū bào de píng lùn。
english: They made rude remarks about her appearance.

hanzi: 婴儿把吃进去的东西吐在桌子上了.
pinyin: yīng ér bǎ jí jìn qù de dōng xi tù zài zhuō zi shàng le.
english: The baby spat its food (out) onto the table.

hanzi: 政府对这次罢工的镇压失败了。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì zhè cì bà gōng de zhèn yā shī bài le。
english: The government's repression of the strike failed.

hanzi: 是用两幅布料拼成的这个帘子.
pinyin: shì yòng liǎng fú bù liào pīn chéng de zhè gè lián zi.
english: Two widths of cloth were joined to make the curtain.

hanzi: 公共汽车开过时溅了我一身泥。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē kāi guò shí jiàn le wǒ yī shēn nì。
english: As the bus passed, it spattered mud on my clothes.

hanzi: 我们初次见面时相互打量了一番.
pinyin: wǒ men chū cì jiàn miàn shí xiāng hù dǎ liang le yī pān.
english: We sized each other up at our first meeting.

hanzi: 这几页都粘在一起了--我揭不开.
pinyin: zhè jǐ yè dōu zhān zài yī qǐ le-- wǒ jiē bù kāi.
english: These pages are stuck together I can't pull them apart.

hanzi: 他心脏停止了跳动, 随即死亡.
pinyin: tā xīn zàng tíng zhǐ le tiào dòng,  suí jí sǐ wáng.
english: His heart stopped beating and he died soon afterwards.

hanzi: 入侵的军队将该城镇掠夺一空。
pinyin: rù qīn de jūn duì jiàng gāi chéng zhèn lu:è duó yī kòng。
english: The town was pillaged by the invading army.

hanzi: 画家要求模特取斜倚着的姿势。
pinyin: huà jiā yāo qiú mó tè qǔ xié yǐ zhuó de zī shì。
english: The artist asked his model to take a reclining posture.

hanzi: 哼一哼你喜爱的曲子的开头几个小节.
pinyin: hng yī hng nǐ xǐ ài de qǔ zi de kāi tóu jǐ ge xiǎo jié.
english: Hum the opening bars of your favourite tune.

hanzi: 西班牙曾以其强大的舰队而著称.
pinyin: xī bān yá zēng yǐ qí qiáng dà de jiàn duì ér著 chèng.
english: Spain used to be famous for its strong armada.

hanzi: 水从冷凝器流出，流入灰浆室。
pinyin: shuǐ zòng lěng níng qì liú chū， liú rù huī jiàng shì。
english: Water flows from the condenser to the ash room.

hanzi: 这只老虎拖着它的猎物进了丛林。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ lǎo hǔ tuō zhuó tā de liè wù jìn le cóng lín。
english: The tiger dragged its kill into the jungle.

hanzi: 菠菜豆腐是我最爱吃的一种菜。
pinyin: bō cài dòu fu shì wǒ zuì ài jí de yī zhòng cài。
english: Spinach with bean curd is one of my favourite dishes.

hanzi: 他喝酒过多, 身体逐渐衰弱了.
pinyin: tā hē jiǔ guò duō,  shēn tǐ zhú jiàn shuāi ruò le.
english: He started to drink too much and gradually ran to seed.

hanzi: 由衷的称赞可鼓舞一个人的精神。
pinyin: yóu zhōng de chēng zàn kě gǔ wǔ yī gè rén de jīng shén。
english: A sincere compliment boosts one's morale.

hanzi: 你离家不归, 你母亲极为伤心.
pinyin: nǐ lí jiā bù guī,  nǐ mǔ qīn jí wéi shāng xīn.
english: Your mother is very grieved by your refusal to return home.

hanzi: 她姿色迷人，因而评委都偏向她。
pinyin: tā zī sè mí rén， yīn ér píng wěi dōu piān xiàng tā。
english: Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.

hanzi: 这副马蹄铁该换了，都磨光了。
pinyin: zhè fù mǎ tí tiě gāi huàn le， dōu mò guāng le。
english: This pair of horseshoes has to be changed; it's worn out.

hanzi: 这种建筑风格让我感到很压抑。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jiàn zhù fēng gé ràng wǒ gǎn dào hěn yā yì。
english: This kind of architectural style depresses me.

hanzi: 他掀起垫子把钥匙悄悄放在下面.
pinyin: tā xiān qǐ diàn zǐ bǎ yào shi qiǎo qiǎo fàng zài xià mian.
english: He lifted the mat and slid the key under (it).

hanzi: 博物馆展出了许多出土文物。
pinyin: bó wù guǎn zhǎn chū le xǔ duō chū tǔ wén wù。
english: Many unearthed cultural relics were exhibited at the museum.

hanzi: 用绳子穿著的旗子横悬在街道上.
pinyin: yòng shéng zi chuān著 de qí zi hèng xuán zài jiē dào shàng.
english: Flags had been strung up across the street.

hanzi: 神父把圣水洒在婴儿的额头上.
pinyin: shén fù bǎ shèng shuǐ sǎ zài yīng ér de é tóu shàng.
english: The priest sprinkled holy water on the baby's forehead.

hanzi: 浮冰对这一带的航运是一种威胁.
pinyin: fú bīng duì zhè yī dài de háng yùn shì yī zhòng wēi xié.
english: Ice-floes are a threat to shipping in the area.

hanzi: 我的邻居是一个具有高尚品德的人。
pinyin: wǒ de lín jū shì yī gè jù yǒu gāo shàng pǐn dé de rén。
english: My neighbor is a man of highest virtue.

hanzi: 她觉得没有汽车并非重大缺憾.
pinyin: tā jué de méi yǒu qì chē bìng fēi zhòng dà quē hàn.
english: She didn'tfind the lack of a car any great privation.

hanzi: 他们中大多数侨民是爱国主义者。
pinyin: tā men zhòng dà duō shù qiáo mín shì ài guó zhǔ yì zhě。
english: Most emigrants among them are patriots.

hanzi: 无线电通讯已消除了空间的阻隔。
pinyin: wú xiàn diàn tōng xùn yǐ xiāo chú le kōng jiān de zǔ gé。
english: Radio communication has annihilated space.

hanzi: 请你把废物扔到预备好的垃圾箱里.
pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ fèi wù rēng dào yù bèi hǎo de垃圾 xiāng lǐ.
english: Please put your litter in the bin provided.

hanzi: 专家已经确认了该画是真迹。
pinyin: zhuān jiā yǐ jīng què rèn le gāi huà shì zhēn jī。
english: The experts have vouched for the painting's authenticity.

hanzi: 我们前进时受到了恶劣天气的阻碍.
pinyin: wǒ men qián jìn shí shòu dào le è liè tiān qì de zǔ ài.
english: Our progress was hampered by the bad weather.

hanzi: 肌肉的收缩是人体的一种反应。
pinyin: jī ròu de shōu suō shì rén tǐ de yī zhòng fǎn yìng。
english: The contraction of muscle is a reaction of the body.

hanzi: 你的胶卷后天就可以冲洗出来。
pinyin: nǐ de jiāo juān hòu tiān jiù kě yǐ chōng xǐ chū lai。
english: Your film will be processed the day after tomorrow.

hanzi: 大雪妨碍了这项建筑工程的进行。
pinyin: dà xuě fáng ài le zhè xiàng jiàn zhù gōng chéng de jìn xíng。
english: Heavy snow hindered the construction work.

hanzi: 把那棵植物在水里浸泡几分钟。
pinyin: bǎ nà kē zhí wù zài shuǐ lǐ jìn pào jǐ fēn zhōng。
english: Please immerse the plant in water for a few minutes.

hanzi: 滚筒是洗衣机必不可少的部分。
pinyin: gǔn tóng shì xǐ yì jī bì bù kě shào de bù fen。
english: The cylinder is a crucial part of the washing machine.

hanzi: 狗守卫着房屋，不让陌生人进去。
pinyin: gǒu shǒu wèi zhuó fáng wū， bù ràng mò shēng rén jìn qù。
english: The dog guarded the house against strangers.

hanzi: 他们坐在凉亭里，边喝茶边聊天。
pinyin: tā men zuò zài liáng tíng lǐ， biān hè chá biān liáo tiān。
english: They sat in the arbor and chatted over tea.

hanzi: 这个博物馆里不准使用闪光灯。
pinyin: zhè gè bó wù guǎn lǐ bù zhǔn shǐ yòng shǎn guāng dēng。
english: Flashes are not allowed to be used in this museum.

hanzi: 她被判有罪, 因而失去了工作.
pinyin: tā bèi pàn yǒu zuì,  yīn ér shī qù le gōng zuò.
english: She was found guilty, and lost her job in consequence (of it).

hanzi: 饥荒往往是战争或干旱造成的。
pinyin: jī huang wǎng wǎng shì zhàn zhēng huò gān hàn zào chéng de。
english: Famine is often the sequel to war or drought.

hanzi: 我们用粗绳把所有包裹捆扎妥当。
pinyin: wǒ men yòng cū shéng bǎ suǒ yǒu bāo guǒ kǔn zhá tuǒ dàng。
english: We tied up both package well with heavy cord.

hanzi: 营长命令士兵们沿铁轨排开。
pinyin: yíng zhǎng mìng lìng shì bīng men yàn tiě guǐ pǎi kāi。
english: The battalion commander lined his men along the railway.

hanzi: 他由于烧伤，被送入医院治疗。
pinyin: tā yóu yú shāo shāng， bèi sòng rù yī yuàn zhì liáo。
english: He was admitted to the hospital suffering from burns.

hanzi: 他的聪明和技巧使我们赞叹不已。
pinyin: tā de cōng míng huò jì qiǎo shǐ wǒ men zàn tàn bù yǐ。
english: His cleverness and skill compel our admiration.

hanzi: 大多数蜜蜂和黄蜂都是群居昆虫。
pinyin: dà duō shù mì fēng huò huáng fēng dōu shì qún jū kūn chóng。
english: Most bees and wasps are social insects.

hanzi: 湿杯子在桌面上留下一个痕迹。
pinyin: shī bēi zi zài zhuō miàn shàng liú xià yī gè hén jī。
english: The wet glass left a mark on the surface of the table.

hanzi: 吃早饭时，做稀粥是很方便的。
pinyin: jí zǎo fàn shí， zuò xī zhōu shì hěn fāng biàn de。
english: Gruel is convenient to make in the morning for breakfast.

hanzi: 如果你被捕，你有权保持沉默。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bèi bǔ， nǐ yǒu quán bǎo chí chén mò。
english: If you are arrested you have the right to remain silent.

hanzi: 他为了自己的革命原则而蒙受苦难。
pinyin: tā wèi le zì jǐ de gé mìng yuán zé ér méng shòu kǔ nàn。
english: He suffered for his revolutionary principles.

hanzi: 他斜坡滑雪的技能使我们赞叹不已.
pinyin: tā xié pō huá xuě de jì néng shǐ wǒ men zàn tàn bù yǐ.
english: We were amazed at his expertise on the ski slopes.

hanzi: 那老人好容易喘著气说出几句话。
pinyin: nà lǎo rén hào róng yì chuǎn著 qì shuō chū jǐ jù huà。
english: The old man manage to puff out a few words.

hanzi: 因矿井已关闭, 镇上一片死气沉沉.
pinyin: yīn kuàng jǐng yǐ guān bì,  zhèn shàng yī piàn sǐ qì chén chén.
english: The town is dead now the mine has closed.

hanzi: 这条路把所有的新城镇都连接起来了。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù bǎ suǒ yǒu de xīn chéng zhèn dōu lián jiē qǐ lai le。
english: The road links all the new towns.

hanzi: 这个运动员具有惊人的爆发速度。
pinyin: zhè gè yùn dòng yuán jù yǒu jīng rén de bào fā sù dù。
english: The athlete has an electrifying burst of speed.

hanzi: 政府决心把通货膨胀率降低。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jué xīn bǎ tōng huò péng zhàng shuài jiàng dī。
english: The government is determined to bring down inflation.

hanzi: 他的家乡在北回归线的北面。
pinyin: tā de jiā xiāng zài běi huí guī xiàn de běi miàn。
english: His hometown is located in the north to the tropic of cancer.

hanzi: 他继承了那片庄园及其一切特权.
pinyin: tā jí chéng le nà piàn zhuāng yuán jí qí yī qiè tè quán.
english: He inherited the manor and all its appurtenances.

hanzi: 耐心结合勤奋是成功所必需的。
pinyin: nài xīn jié hé qín fèn shì chéng gōng suǒ bì xū de。
english: Patience combined with diligence is necessary to success.

hanzi: 我得在黑暗中摸索著找电灯开关.
pinyin: wǒ de zài hēi àn zhòng mō suo著 zhǎo diàn dēng kāi guān.
english: I had to feel about in the dark for the light switch.

hanzi: 他一记有力的左手拳将对手击倒.
pinyin: tā yī jì yǒu lì de zuǒ shǒu quán jiàng duì shǒu jí dǎo.
english: He knocked down his opponent with a powerful left.

hanzi: 要鼓励消费者对劣质商品投诉.
pinyin: yào gǔ lì xiāo fèi zhě duì liè zhì shāng pǐn tóu sù.
english: Consumers are encouraged to complain about faulty goods.

hanzi: 人们不会忘记他统治时期的暴行。
pinyin: rén men bù huì wàng jì tā tǒng zhì shí qī de bào xíng。
english: People will remember the tyrannies of his reign.

hanzi: 隔壁房间里突然爆发出一阵笑声。
pinyin: gé bì fáng jiān lǐ tū rán bào fā chū yī zhèn xiào shēng。
english: There was a burst of laughter in the next room.

hanzi: 他超过了同时期的所有其他作曲家。
pinyin: tā chāo guò le tóng shí qī de suǒ yǒu qí tā zuò qǔ jiā。
english: He excels all other composers of his period.

hanzi: 他穿著厚实的大衣以抵御严寒.
pinyin: tā chuān著 hòu shí de dà yī yǐ dǐ yù yán hán.
english: He wore a thick overcoat as a protection against the bitter cold.

hanzi: 不断增加的失业引起了社会骚乱。
