pinyin: bù duàn zēng jiā de shī yè yǐn qǐ le shè huì sāo luàn。
english: The increasing unemployment caused social unrest.

hanzi: 这个男孩正在接受心脏病治疗。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái zhèng zài jiē shòu xīn zàng bìng zhì liáo。
english: This boy is being treated for a heart condition.

hanzi: 他点燃一支香烟，镇定一下情绪。
pinyin: tā diǎn rán yī zhī xiāng yān， zhèn dìng yī xià qíng xù。
english: He lit a cigarette in order to calm his mind.

hanzi: 他对所谓的流行歌曲很感兴趣。
pinyin: tā duì suǒ wèi de liú xíng gē qǔ hěn gǎn xìng qu。
english: He is very interested in what are called popular songs.

hanzi: 我们都沉浸在春节的欢乐之中。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu chén jìn zài chūn jié de huān lè zhī zhōng。
english: We all immersed in the gaiety of the Spring Festival.

hanzi: 一支孤烛使黑暗的房间亮了起来。
pinyin: yī zhī gū zhú shǐ hēi àn de fáng jiān liàng le qǐ lai。
english: A solitary candle lightened the darkness of the room.

hanzi: 带动转盘旋转的机械装置坏了.
pinyin: dài dòng zhuàn pán xuán zhuàn de jī xiè zhuāng zhì huài le.
english: The mechanism that revolves the turntable is broken.

hanzi: 一组护士协助医生施行手术。
pinyin: yī zǔ hù shi xié zhù yī shēng shī xíng shǒu shù。
english: A team of nurses assisted the doctor in performing the operation.

hanzi: 这是五镑的钞票--零钱不用找了.
pinyin: zhè shì wǔ bàng de chāo piào-- líng qián bù yòng zhǎo le.
english: Here's a five-pound note -- you can keep the change.

hanzi: 她单凭个人气势就镇住了会场。
pinyin: tā shàn píng gè rén qì shì jiù zhèn zhù le huì chǎng。
english: She dominated the meeting by sheer force of character.

hanzi: 碰巧在附近有个公用电话亭。
pinyin: pèng qiǎo zài fù jìn yǒu gè gōng yòng diàn huà tíng。
english: It happened that there was a telephone booth nearby.

hanzi: 市外公路上有一处很陡的上坡路。
pinyin: shì wài gōng lù shang yǒu yī chù hěn dǒu de shàng pō lù。
english: There was a steep climb on the road out of town.

hanzi: 炮火掩护步兵前进.
pinyin: pào huǒ yǎn hù bù bīng qián jìn.
english: Artillery gave cover (ie fired at the enemy to stop them firing back) while the infantry advanced.

hanzi: 有很多因素妨碍了我们实现计画.
pinyin: yǒu hěn duō yīn sù fáng ài le wǒ men shí xiàn jì huà.
english: Many factors militated against the success of our plan.

hanzi: 那些年国际事态不很协调。
pinyin: nà xiē nián guó jì shì tài bù hěn xié tiáo。
english: There was not much harmony in international affairs during those years.

hanzi: 图上交错的树枝看起来很有诗意。
pinyin: tú shàng jiāo cuò de shù zhī kàn qǐ lai hěn yǒu shī yì。
english: The interlacing branches on the picture look poetic.

hanzi: 他拣起信封时，一把钥匙掉了出来。
pinyin: tā jiǎn qǐ xìn fēng shí， yī bǎ yào shi diào le chū lai。
english: As he picked up the envelope, a key dropped out.

hanzi: 叙述清楚比语言优美更重要。
pinyin: xù shù qīng chu bì yǔ yán yōu měi gèng zhòng yào。
english: Clearness of statement is more important than beauty of language.

hanzi: 这场辩论逐渐变成了激烈的争吵.
pinyin: zhè chǎng biàn lùn zhú jiàn biàn chéng le jī liè de zhēng chǎo.
english: The argument developed into a bitter quarrel.

hanzi: 他只是偶尔一次公开自己的观点。
pinyin: tā zhǐ shì ǒu ěr yī cì gōng kāi zì jǐ de guān diǎn。
english: Only rarely does he let his own views become public.

hanzi: 他发出一声绝望的叹息，转身走开了。
pinyin: tā fā chū yī shēng jué wàng de tàn xí， zhuǎn shēn zǒu kāi le。
english: With a hopeless sigh, he turned away.

hanzi: 水在穿透岩石的过程中获得了净化.
pinyin: shuǐ zài chuān tòu yán shí de guò chéng zhòng huò dé le jìng huà.
english: Water is purified by passing through rock.

hanzi: 铁路模型展销会将于星期五举行。
pinyin: tiě lù mó xíng zhǎn xiāo kuài jiàng yú xīng qī wǔ jǔ xíng。
english: A model railway mart will be held on Friday.

hanzi: 出售枪支受到许多法律限制。
pinyin: chū shòu qiāng zhī shòu dào xǔ duō fǎ lu:4 xiàn zhì。
english: The sale of firearms is subject to many legal restrictions.

hanzi: 使我惊讶的是，他又犯了同样的错误。
pinyin: shǐ wǒ jīng yà de shì， tā yòu fàn le tóng yàng de cuò wù。
english: To my dismay, he made the same mistakes.

hanzi: 他因遭蛇咬而被送到医院治疗。
pinyin: tā yīn zāo shé yǎo ér bèi sòng dào yī yuàn zhì liáo。
english: He was taken to the hospital to be treated for snake bite.

hanzi: 展览会上陈列著所有的新产品。
pinyin: zhǎn lǎn huì shàng chén liè著 suǒ yǒu de xīn chǎn pǐn。
english: All the new products are on show at the exhibition.

hanzi: 圣诞节期间生意一向很好.
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié qī jiān shēng yi yí xiàng hěn hǎo.
english: Trade is always good (ie Many goods are sold) over the Christmas period.

hanzi: 耐心结合勤奋是成功所必需的。
pinyin: nài xīn jié hé qín fèn shì chéng gōng suǒ bì xū de。
english: Patience combined with diligence is necessary to success.

hanzi: 他因遭蛇咬而被送到医院治疗。
pinyin: tā yīn zāo shé yǎo ér bèi sòng dào yī yuàn zhì liáo。
english: He was taken to the hospital to be treated for snake bite.

hanzi: 银行随时兑换见票即付的汇票。
pinyin: yín háng suí shí duì huàn xiàn piào jí fù de huì piào。
english: The bank receives drafts payable at sight at any time.

hanzi: 那女孩随时都准备着去参加聚会。
pinyin: nà nu:3 hái suí shí dōu zhǔn bèi zhuó qù cān jiā jù huì。
english: The girl is ready at all times to go to parties.

hanzi: 那座大山的轮廓看上去像一条龙。
pinyin: nà zuò dà shān de lún kuò kàn shàng qù xiàng yī tiáo lóng。
english: The contour of that mountain looks like a dragon.

hanzi: 鉴于税务原因，我们得组成公司。
pinyin: jiàn yú shuì wù yuán yīn， wǒ men de zǔ chéng gōng sī。
english: We had to incorporate for a company for tax reasons.

hanzi: 寒冷的天气终于在三月末结束了。
pinyin: hán lěng de tiān qì zhōng yú zài sān yuè mò jié shù le。
english: The cold weather at last broke at the end of March.

hanzi: 这座山向北的一面几乎是垂直的。
pinyin: zhè zuò shān xiàng běi de yī miàn jī hū shì chuí zhí de。
english: The northern face of the mountain is almost vertical.

hanzi: 我们头顶上的天花板上吊著一盏灯.
pinyin: wǒ men tou dǐng shàng de tiān huā bǎn shàng diào著 yī zhǎn dēng.
english: A lamp was suspended from the ceiling above us.

hanzi: 在我们家里，丈夫和我都挣工资。
pinyin: zài wǒ men jiā lǐ， zhàng fu huò wǒ dōu zhèng gōng zī。
english: In our family both my husband and I are wage earners.

hanzi: 我偶尔喝杯咖啡, 但平常都喝茶.
pinyin: wǒ ǒu ěr hè bēi kā fēi,  dàn píng cháng dōu hè chá.
english: I drink an occasional cup of coffee; but usually I take tea.

hanzi: 登记出生或死亡的手续很简单.
pinyin: dēng jì chū shēng huò sǐ wáng de shǒu xù hěn jiǎn dān.
english: Registering a birth or death is a straightforward procedure.

hanzi: 对罪犯的改造有了明显的效果。
pinyin: duì zuì fàn de gǎi zào yǒu le míng xiǎn de xiào guǒ。
english: The reformation of criminals has produced an obvious result.

hanzi: 奥运会期间，旅馆房间很难找。
pinyin: Aò yùn huì qī jiān， lu:3 guǎn fáng jiān hěn nàn zhǎo。
english: Hotel accommodation was scarce during the Olympic Games.

hanzi: 他不听母亲的劝告，参加了那次聚会。
pinyin: tā bù tìng mǔ qīn de quàn gào， cān jiā le nà cì jù huì。
english: He disobeyed his mother and went to the party.

hanzi: 登圣母峰绝不是一次轻松的旅途。
pinyin: dēng shèng mǔ fēng jué bù shì yī cì qīng sōng de lu:3 tú。
english: Climbing Mt. Everest is anything but a pleasure trip.

hanzi: 我把石头搬起来时，那只甲虫跑了。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ shí tou bān qǐ lai shí， nà zhǐ jiǎ chóng pǎo le。
english: The beetle scuttled away when I lifted the stone.

hanzi: 即使我们富裕了也仍应该厉行节约。
pinyin: jí shǐ wǒ men fù yù le yě réng yīng gāi lì xìng jié yuē。
english: We should practice economy even if we are rich.

hanzi: 她的儿子死去时，她悲伤得几乎疯了。
pinyin: tā de ér zi sǐ qù shí， tā bēi shāng de jī hū fēng le。
english: She was almost mad with grief when her son died.

hanzi: 他发挥艺术天才, 成了雕刻家.
pinyin: tā fā huī yì shù tiān cái,  chéng le diāo kè jiā.
english: He turned his artistic gifts to good account by becoming a sculptor.

hanzi: 家庭小商业遭到大公司的吞并.
pinyin: jiā tíng xiǎo shāng yè zāo dào dà gōng sī de tūn bìng.
english: Small family businesses are often gobbled up by larger firms.

hanzi: 大声叫嚷的孩子听不到妈妈的叫唤。
pinyin: dà shēng jiào rǎng de hái zi tìng bù dào mā ma de jiào huan。
english: The shouting boy did not hear his mother call him.

hanzi: 在一阵痛恨的狂乱中，他杀死了敌人。
pinyin: zài yī zhèn tòng hèn de kuáng luàn zhòng， tā shā sǐ le dí rén。
english: In a frenzy of hate he killed his enemy.

hanzi: 他们是彼此争夺第一名的老对手。
pinyin: tā men shì bǐ cǐ zhēng duó dì yī míng de lǎo duì shǒu。
english: They are old rivals vying with each other for first place.

hanzi: 警方在广场的入口处设置了路障.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zài guǎng chǎng de rù kǒu chù shè zhì le lù zhàng.
english: The police barricaded off the entrance to the square.

hanzi: 这个奴隶从未体验过自由的快乐。
pinyin: zhè gè nú lì zòng wèi tǐ yàn guò zì yóu de kuài lè。
english: The slave has never experienced the sweetness of freedom.

hanzi: 他有才干能在本行业中首屈一指。
pinyin: tā yǒu cái gàn néng zài běn háng yè zhòng shǒu qū yī zhǐ。
english: His ability carried him to the top of his profession.

hanzi: 请仔细核对单子以避免发生错误。
pinyin: qǐng zǐ xì hé duì dān zi yǐ bì miǎn fā shēng cuò wù。
english: Please check the list carefully so as to avoid mistakes.

hanzi: 他们钻透了几层岩石以寻找石油.
pinyin: tā men zuàn tòu le jǐ céng yán shí yǐ xún zhǎo shí yóu.
english: They drilled through several layers of rock to reach the oil.

hanzi: 园艺叉子的一个尖齿把他的脚扎了.
pinyin: yuán yì chā zi de yī gè jiān chǐ bǎ tā de jué zhá le.
english: One of the prongs of the garden fork went through his foot.

hanzi: 她只有坐在壁炉前才感觉到暖和。
pinyin: tā zhǐ yǒu zuò zài bì lú qián cái gǎn jué dào nuǎn huó。
english: She felt warm only when she sat before the fireplace.

hanzi: 桌子接触墙壁的地方漆皮已剥落。
pinyin: zhuō zi jiē chù qiáng bì de dì fang qī pí yǐ bō luò。
english: The paint has chipped off where the table touches the wall.

hanzi: 登圣母峰绝不是一次轻松的旅途。
pinyin: dēng shèng mǔ fēng jué bù shì yī cì qīng sōng de lu:3 tú。
english: Climbing Mt. Everest is anything but a pleasure trip.

hanzi: 这位摄影师拍了一张象群的照片。
pinyin: zhè wèi shè yǐng shī pāi le yī zhāng xiàng qún de zhào piàn。
english: The photographer took a photo of a herd of elephants.

hanzi: 越狱的逃犯已经再次被警方抓获。
pinyin: yuè yù de táo fàn yǐ jīng zài cì bèi jǐng fāng zhuā huò。
english: The escaped convict has been caught by the police again.

hanzi: 恋爱与丑闻，是喝茶的最佳甜点心。
pinyin: liàn ài yù chǒu wén， shì hè chá de zuì jiā tián diǎn xīn。
english: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.

hanzi: 请把面粉和牛奶调至恰当的浓度。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ miàn fěn huò niú nǎi tiáo zhì qià dàng de nóng dù。
english: Please mix the flour and milk to the right consistency.

hanzi: 我心情愁闷, 不想和任何人讲话。
pinyin: wǒ xīn qíng chóu mèn,  bù xiǎng huò rèn hé rén jiǎng huà。
english: I am out of spirits and don't want to speak to anyone.

hanzi: 他以两杆的成绩赢得了这场高尔夫球赛。
pinyin: tā yǐ liǎng gǎn de chéng jī yíng dé le zhè chǎng gāo ěr fū qiú sài。
english: He won the golf match by two shots.

hanzi: 他站在边上等待跳水时浑身发抖.
pinyin: tā zhàn zài biān shàng děng dài tiào shuǐ shí hún shēn fā dǒu.
english: He stood shivering on the brink, waiting to dive in.

hanzi: 她把她姓名的起首字母绣在手帕上。
pinyin: tā bǎ tā xìng míng de qǐ shǒu zì mǔ xiù zài shǒu pà shàng。
english: She embroidered her initials on the handkerchief.

hanzi: 你的文章只粗略地涉及到这个问题.
pinyin: nǐ de wén zhāng zhǐ cū lu:è de shè jí dào zhè gè wèn tí.
english: Your essay gives a rather sketchy treatment of the problem.

hanzi: 奥运会上，他创造了新的世界纪录。
pinyin: Aò yùn huì shàng， tā chuàng zào le xīn de shì jiè jì lù。
english: At the Olympic Games, he created a new world record.

hanzi: 这个司机的驾驶执照被警察吊销了。
pinyin: zhè gè sī jī de jià shǐ zhí zhào bèi jǐng chá diào xiāo le。
english: The driver's certificate was suspended by the police.

hanzi: 这位法官是监狱改革的坚决拥护者。
pinyin: zhè wèi fǎ guān shì jiān yù gǎi gé de jiān jué yōng hù zhě。
english: This judge is a strong advocate of prison reform.

hanzi: 十二宫图用于占星术中预测未来。
pinyin: shí èr gōng tú yòng yú zhàn xīng zhú zhòng yù cè wèi lái。
english: The zodiac is used in astrology to predict the future.

hanzi: 那士兵看见一支枪从矮树丛伸出来。
pinyin: nà shì bīng kàn jiàn yī zhī qiāng zòng ǎi shù cóng shēn chū lái。
english: The soldier saw a gun jutting out from a bush.

hanzi: 你拿可怜的迈克尔打趣可要出圈儿了.
pinyin: nǐ ná kě lián de mài kè ěr dǎ qù kě yào chū quān er le.
english: All your teasing of poor Michael is getting beyond a joke.

hanzi: 我们得把发动机拆卸开来找出毛病。
pinyin: wǒ men de bǎ fā dòng jī chāi xiè kāi lái zhǎo chū máo bìng。
english: We'll have to strip the engine down to find the fault.

hanzi: 在死者胃中找到了少量的毒药。
pinyin: zài sǐ zhě wèi zhòng zhǎo dào le shǎo liàng de dú yào。
english: Small quantities of poison were detected in the dead man's stomach.

hanzi: 我使尽了浑身解数也劝不动他们.
pinyin: wǒ shǐ jìn le hún shēn xiè shuò yě quàn bù dòng tā men.
english: I tried every trick in the book but I still couldn't persuade them.

hanzi: 殖民地人民反抗他们的英国统治者。
pinyin: zhí mín dì rén mín fǎn kàng tā men de Yīng guó tǒng zhì zhē。
english: The colonists revolted against their British ruler.

hanzi: 所有参加辩论的人都有机会发言.
pinyin: suǒ yǒu cān jiā biàn lùn de rén dōu yǒu jī kuài fā yán.
english: All the participants in the debate had an opportunity to speak.

hanzi: 从右边驶来的车辆享有优先通行权.
pinyin: zòng yòu biān shǐ lái de chē liàng xiǎng yǒu yōu xiān tōng xíng quán.
english: Vehicles coming from the right have priority.

hanzi: 他们沿着报春花盛开的河岸边走边聊。
pinyin: tā men yán zhe bào chūn huā shèng kāi de hé àn biān zǒu biān liáo。
english: They walked along the primrose bank chatting.

hanzi: 他遭解雇一事, 有关的人都很为难.
pinyin: tā zāo jiě gù yī shì,  yǒu guān de rén dōu hěn wéi nán.
english: His dismissal was rather a sticky business for all concerned.

hanzi: 花朵在阳光下清晰地显现出轮廓。
pinyin: huā duǒ zài yáng guāng xià qīng xī de xiǎn xiàn chū lún kuò。
english: The flower was clearly outlined in the light of the lamp.

hanzi: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法。
pinyin: kē xué jiā réng zài xún qiú zhì liáo gǎn mào de fāng fǎ。
english: Scientists are still searching for a cure to the common cold.

hanzi: 我们的狗别看样子凶，其实很温顺。
pinyin: wǒ men de gǒu biè kàn yàng zi xiōng， qí shí hěn wēn shùn。
english: Our dog may look fierce but he wouldn't hurt a fly.

hanzi: 我送给她一条编织的披肩作圣诞礼物。
pinyin: wǒ sòng jǐ tā yī tiáo biān zhī de pī jiān zuò Shèng dàn lǐ wù。
english: I gave her a knitted shawl as a Christmas gift.

hanzi: 世代居住在城市里使他们磨练了才智。
pinyin: shì dài jū zhù zài chéng shì lǐ shǐ tā men mò liàn le cái zhì。
english: Generations of urban living sharpened their wits.

hanzi: 他终生献身于珍稀动物的保护。
pinyin: tā zhōng shēng xiàn shēn yú zhēn xī dòng wù de bǎo hù。
english: He's devoted his whole life to the protection of the rare animals.

hanzi: 他使劲儿把食物咽下去, 嘴唇都扭曲起来.
pinyin: tā shǐ jìn er bǎ shí wù yè xià qu,  zuǐ chún dōu niǔ qū qǐ lai.
english: His lips worked as he tried to swallow the food.

hanzi: 哪怕失业，我也要遵循自己的原则。
pinyin: nǎ pà shī yè， wǒ yě yào zūn xún zì jǐ de yuán zé。
english: I shall stand by my principles even if it means losing my job.

hanzi: 那家商场的西洋梳镜柜看上去很特别。
pinyin: nà jiā shāng chǎng de xī yáng shū jìng jǔ kàn shàng qù hěn tè bié。
english: The chiffonier in that shop looks special.

hanzi: 谷物轮种使土壤保持了肥力和高质。
pinyin: gǔ wù lún zhòng shǐ tǔ rǎng bǎo chí le féi lì huò gāo zhì。
english: The rotation of crops keeps the soil healthy and fertile.

hanzi: 旅馆中的每个房间都有一个单独浴室。
pinyin: lu:3 guǎn zhòng dì měi gè fáng jiān dōu yǒu yī gè dān dú yù shì。
english: Every room in the hotel has a private bathroom.

hanzi: 他公然蔑视上司，并要求他作出解释。
pinyin: tā gōng rán miè shì shàng si， bìng yāo qiú tā zuò chū jiě shì。
english: He bearded his boss and demanded an explanation.

hanzi: 必须办妥某些手续方可移居他国.
pinyin: bì xū bàn tuǒ mǒu xiē shǒu xù fāng kě yí jū tā guó.
english: Certain formalities have to be gone through before one can emigrate.

hanzi: 音乐的声音太大了，把我耳朵震得直响。
pinyin: yīn yuè de shēng yīn tài dà le， bǎ wǒ ěr duo zhèn de zhí xiǎng。
english: The music was so loud it made my ears ring.

hanzi: 谷物轮种使土壤保持了肥力和高质。
pinyin: gǔ wù lún zhòng shǐ tǔ rǎng bǎo chí le féi lì huò gāo zhì。
english: The rotation of crops keeps the soil healthy and fertile.

hanzi: 这些珍贵的老虎受到专门法律的保护。
pinyin: zhè xie zhēn guì de lǎo hǔ shòu dào zhuān mén fǎ lu:4 de bǎo hù。
english: These rare tigers are protected by special laws.

hanzi: 火箭绕地球运行一周后返回基地。
pinyin: huǒ jiàn rào dì qiú yùn xíng yī zhōu hòu fǎn huí jī dì。
english: The rocket did one circuit of the earth and returned to base.

hanzi: 决定大选的日期是首相的特权。
pinyin: jué dìng dà xuǎn de rì qī shì shǒu xiàng de tè quán。
english: It's the Prime Minister's prerogative to decide when to call an election.

hanzi: 他驾驶测验不及格，这次算第十次了。
pinyin: tā jià shǐ cè yàn bù jí gé， zhè cì suàn dì shí cì le。
english: That makes the tenth time he's failed his driving test!

hanzi: 他闪身躲过了滚落的岩石，安然脱险了。
pinyin: tā shǎn shēn duǒ guò le gǔn luò de yán shí， ān rán tuō xiǎn le。
english: He dodged the falling rock and escaped unhurt.

hanzi: 那个计划取消了，这让我们非常惊讶。
pinyin: nèi gè jì huà qǔ xiāo le， zhè ràng wǒ men fēi cháng jīng yà。
english: It dismayed us that the project had been canceled.

hanzi: 我肚子上挨了一拳一时完全喘不过气来.
pinyin: wǒ dù zi shàng ái le yī quán yī shí wán quán chuǎn bù guò qì lái.
english: The punch in the stomach completely winded me.

hanzi: 猎人把狮子的头挂在墙上当纪念品。
pinyin: liè rén bǎ shī zi de tou guà zài qiáng shàng dàng jì niàn pǐn。
english: The hunter put the lion's head on the wall as a trophy.

hanzi: 处于这种可怕的压力之下，不疯才怪呢。
pinyin: chǔ yú zhè zhǒng kě pà de yā lì zhī xià， bù fēng cái guài ne。
english: It's hard to stay sane under such awful pressure.

hanzi: 瘦肉上可加咸肉片烤制以保持水分。
pinyin: shòu ròu shàng kě jiā xián ròu piàn kǎo zhì yǐ bǎo chí shuǐ fèn。
english: Lean meat can be larded to keep it moist in the oven.

hanzi: 科学知识被滥用于破坏和战争。
pinyin: kē xué zhī shi bèi làn yòng yú pò huài huò zhàn zhēng。
english: Scientific knowledge was perverted to help cause destruction and war.

hanzi: 大群的人迅速地在演说者周围聚集起来。
pinyin: dà qún de rén xùn sù de zài yǎn shuō zhě zhōu wéi jù jí qǐ lai。
english: A crowd quickly congregated round the speaker.

hanzi: 我们的最终目标是消除所有核武器。
pinyin: wǒ men de zuì zhōng mù biāo shì xiāo chú suǒ yǒu hé wǔ qì。
english: Our ultimate objective is the removal of all nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 经分析发现蛋糕里含有微量的毒素。
pinyin: jīng fēn xī fā xiàn dàn gāo lǐ hán yǒu wēi liàng de dú sù。
english: The cake on analysis was found to contain traces of toxin.

hanzi: 废除农奴制度后，农奴们获得了解放。
pinyin: fèi chú nóng nú zhì dù hòu， nóng nú men huò dé liǎo jiě fàng。
english: The serfs were liberated after abolishing serfdom.

hanzi: 我们决定就工资问题与雇主谈判。
pinyin: wǒ men jué dìng jiù gōng zī wèn tí yù gù zhǔ tán pàn。
english: We've decided to negotiate with the employers about our wage claim.

hanzi: 我很匆忙, 所以随便地把衣服穿上了。
pinyin: wǒ hěn cōng máng,  suǒ yǐ suí biàn de bǎ yī fu chuān shàng le。
english: I was in such a hurry that I put my clothes on anyhow.

hanzi: 别把热水倒进玻璃杯里，不然它会炸的。
pinyin: biè bǎ rè shuǐ dào jìn bō li bēi lǐ， bù rán tā kuài zhà de。
english: Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.

hanzi: 他们因对手权柄在握, 反抗也没用.
pinyin: tā men yīn duì shǒu quán bǐng zài wò,  fǎn kàng yě méi yòng.
english: Their opponents had the whip hand and it was useless to resist.

hanzi: 他的话对社区所有成员是故意的侮辱。
pinyin: tā de huà duì shè qū suǒ yǒu chéng yuán shì gù yì de wǔ rù。
english: His speech was an affront to all members of the community.

hanzi: 他们因对手权柄在握, 反抗也没用.
pinyin: tā men yīn duì shǒu quán bǐng zài wò,  fǎn kàng yě méi yòng.
english: Their opponents had the whip hand and it was useless to resist.

hanzi: 当他跌倒时, 便往一条悬挂的绳子抓去。
pinyin: dàng tā diē dào shí,  pián wàng yī tiáo xuán guà de shéng zi zhuā qù。
english: As he fell, he caught hold of a hanging chain.

hanzi: 在运输中要允许有百分之五的损耗量.
pinyin: zài yùn shū zhòng yào yǔn xǔ yǒu bǎi fēn zhī wǔ de sǔn hào liàng.
english: You must allow for five per cent wastage in transit.

hanzi: 早餐时总统会见了白宫的高级助手.
pinyin: zǎo cān shí zǒng tǒng huì jiàn le Bái gōng de gāo jí zhù shǒu.
english: The President met with senior White House aides at breakfast.

hanzi: 我牙缝里塞了点东西，就是弄不出来。
pinyin: wǒ yá fèng lǐ sè le diǎn dōng xi， jiù shì nòng bù chū lai。
english: There is something between my teeth and I can't dislodge it.

hanzi: 他偷偷溜进了电影院而没有被人逮着。
pinyin: tā tōu tōu liū jìn le diàn yǐng yuàn ér méi yǒu bèi rén dài zhuó。
english: He stole into the cinema without being caught.

hanzi: 观赏一幅美丽的图画使人心满意足。
pinyin: guān shǎng yī fú měi lì de tú huà shǐ rén xīn mǎn yì zú。
english: Looking at a beautiful painting always gives one satisfaction.

hanzi: 他号召工人为争取自己的权利而斗争。
pinyin: tā hào zhào gōng rén wèi zhēng qǔ zì jǐ de quán lì ér dòu zhēng。
english: He called on the workers to fight for their rights.

hanzi: 雕刻家把大理石块凿成优美的雕像.
pinyin: diāo kè jiā bǎ dà lǐ shí kuài zuò chéng yōu měi de diāo xiàng.
english: The sculptor chiselled the lump of marble into a fine statue.

hanzi: 这件事唤起了他对过去苦难经历的回忆。
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì huàn qǐ le tā duì guò qu kǔ nàn jīng lì de huí yì。
english: The incident woke memories of his past sufferings.

hanzi: 父亲终于与大陆上的弟弟联络上了。
pinyin: fù qīn zhōng yú yù dà lù shàng de dì di lián luò shàng le。
english: Father finally got in touch with his brother in mainland China.

hanzi: 如果你不把煤气调小一点，肉就要焦了。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù bǎ méi qì tiáo xiǎo yī diǎn， ròu jiù yào jiāo le。
english: The meat will scorch if you don't lower the gas.

hanzi: 该制造业若不现代化就不能继续存在.
pinyin: gāi zhì zào yè ruò bù xiàn dài huà jiù bù néng jì xù cún zài.
english: If the industry doesn't modernize it will not survive.

hanzi: 他索赔过高反而使他的要求无法实现。
pinyin: tā suǒ péi guò gāo fǎn ér shǐ tā de yāo qiú wú fǎ shí xiàn。
english: He prejudiced his claim by demanding too much compensation.

hanzi: 我们等有空再对这题目展开辩论。
pinyin: wǒ men děng yǒu kòng zài duì zhè tí mù zhǎn kāi biàn lùn。
english: We will debate the subject at length later when we are at leisure.

hanzi: 新来的销售部主任大家还不大了解。
pinyin: xīn lái de xiāo shòu bù zhǔ rèn dà jiā huán bú dà liǎo jiě。
english: The new sales director is still a bit of an unknown quantity.

hanzi: 他舒展开身体躺在炉火旁边睡著了.
pinyin: tā shū zhǎn kāi shēn tǐ tǎng zài lú huǒ páng biān shuì著 le.
english: He stretched (himself) out in front of the fire and fell asleep.

hanzi: 委员会一致同意拒绝这项申请。
pinyin: wěi yuán huì yī zhì tóng yì jù jué zhè xiàng shēn qǐng。
english: The committee were unanimous that the application should be turned down.

hanzi: 这件文物，接触空气之后，变成了粉末。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wén wù， jiē chù kōng qì zhī hòu， biàn chéng le fěn mò。
english: The relic, when exposed to air, turned to dust.

hanzi: 他的话已在他们心中播下怀疑的种子。
pinyin: tā de huà yǐ zài tā men xīn zhōng bō xià huái yí de zhǒng zi。
english: His words had sowed the seeds of suspicion in their minds.

hanzi: 她竭力巴结主任希望得到提升.
pinyin: tā jié lì bā jié zhǔ rèn xī wàng dé dào tí shēng.
english: She tried to ingratiateherself with the director, in the hope of getting promotion.

hanzi: 那样调换他的工作等于是解雇了他。
pinyin: nà yàng diào huàn tā de gōng zuò děng yú shì jiě gù le tā。
english: Changing his job like that is equivalent to giving him the sack.

hanzi: 这些收音机制造厂的产品打不开销路。
pinyin: zhè xie shōu yīn jī zhì zào chǎng de chǎn pǐn dǎ bù kāi xiāo lù。
english: The radios producers could not find a market for them.

hanzi: 他用塑料铲把盆里的混合料刮了出来.
pinyin: tā yòng sù liào chǎn bǎ pén lǐ de hùn hé liào guā le chū lai.
english: He scraped the mixture out of the bowl with a plastic spatula.

hanzi: 政府正为处理失业问题的另一计画拨款.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng wèi chǔ lǐ shī yè wèn tí de lìng yī jì huà bō kuǎn.
english: The government is funding another unemployment scheme.

hanzi: 最近已经发布了禁止进口毒品的法令。
pinyin: zuì jìn yǐ jīng fā bù le jìn zhǐ jìn kǒu dú pǐn de fǎ lìng。
english: A ban on the importation of drugs had been issued recently.

hanzi: 你应该立即申请, 亲自去也好, 写信也好.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi lì jí shēn qǐng,  qīn zì qù yě hào,  xiě xìn yě hào.
english: You should apply immediately, in person or by letter.

hanzi: 跳伞者大胆的冒险动作令人赞叹不已.
pinyin: tiào sǎn zhě dà dǎn de mào xiǎn dòng zuò lìng rén zàn tàn bù yǐ.
english: The daring exploits of the parachutists were much admired.

hanzi: 她举起一根手指放在唇边，示意肃静。
pinyin: tā jǔ qǐ yī gēn shǒu zhǐ fàng zài chún biān， shì yì sù jìng。
english: She raised her finger to her lips as a sign for silence.

hanzi: 据说法国人是世界上最好的园丁。
pinyin: jù shuō fǎ guó rén shì shì jiè shàng zuì hǎo de yuán dīng。
english: It is said that the Frenchman may be the best gardener in the world.

hanzi: 我可以很清楚地看到灯泡里的细丝断了。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ hěn qīng chu de kàn dào dēng pào lǐ de xì sī duàn le。
english: I can see clearly that the filament in the bulb is broken.

hanzi: 他未做认真的调查就仓促做出了结论。
pinyin: tā wèi zuò rèn zhēn de diào chá jiù cāng cù zuò chū le jié lùn。
english: He jumped to a conclusion without careful investigation.

hanzi: 维多利亚女王的统治持续了六十多年。
pinyin: wéi Duō lì yà nu:3 wáng de tǒng zhì chí xù le liù shí duō nián。
english: The reign of Queen Victoria lasted more than sixty years.

hanzi: 防御工事已筑好，准备对付敌人进攻。
pinyin: fáng yù gōng shì yǐ zhú hào， zhǔn bèi duì fu dí rén jìn gōng。
english: The defences are kept in readiness for any enemy attack.

hanzi: 看见他的健康情况这样不佳，我很伤心。
pinyin: kàn jiàn tā de jiàn kāng qíng kuàng zhè yàng bù jiā， wǒ hěn shāng xīn。
english: It grieves me to see him in such bad health.

hanzi: 甚至在日落之后，气温也不见降低。
pinyin: shèn zhì zài rì luò zhī hòu， qì wēn yě bù xiàn jiàng dī。
english: Even after sunset there was little moderation in the temperature.

hanzi: 从资料库借磁带是退而求其次的办法。
pinyin: zòng zī liào kù jiè cí dài shì tuì ér qiú qí cì de bàn fǎ。
english: Borrowing tapes from the library would be the next-best thing.

hanzi: 凡是飞机驾驶员均应对乘客的安全负责.
pinyin: fán shì fēi jī jià shǐ yuán jūn yìng duì chéng kè de ān quán fù zé.
english: All pilots are responsible for their passengers' safety.

hanzi: 他很有礼貌地帮助那个老太太扛包裹。
pinyin: tā hěn yǒu lǐ mào de bāng zhù nèi gè lǎo tài tai káng bāo guǒ。
english: It was courteous of him to help the old lady with her bundles.

hanzi: 这些收音机制造厂的产品打不开销路。
pinyin: zhè xie shōu yīn jī zhì zào chǎng de chǎn pǐn dǎ bù kāi xiāo lù。
english: The radios producers could not find a market for them.

hanzi: 据报道，这艘客轮与一艘油轮相撞。
pinyin: jù bào dào， zhè sōu kè lún yù yī sōu yóu lún xiàng zhuàng。
english: The liner is reported to have been in collision with an oil tanker.

hanzi: 新的住宅区一直延伸到游乐场的那一边.
pinyin: xīn de zhù zhái qū yī zhí yán shēn dào yóu lè chǎng de nà yī biān.
english: The new housing estate stretches beyond the playing-fields.

hanzi: 她是个很好的妇人，冷酷不是她的本性。
pinyin: tā shì gè hěn hǎo de fù rén， lěng kù bú shì tā de běn xìng。
english: She's a very good woman; unkindness is foreign to her nature.

hanzi: 蒸气接触冷的表面而凝结成水珠.
pinyin: zhēng qì jiē chù lěng de biǎo miàn ér níng jié chéng shuǐ zhū.
english: Steam condenses/is condensed into water when it touches a cold surface.

hanzi: 这个中心提供各种娱乐活动设施。
pinyin: zhè gè zhōng xīn tí gōng gè zhǒng yú lè huó dòng shè shī。
english: The center provides facilities for a whole range of leisure activities.

hanzi: 用不著这样匆忙--我们有的是时间.
pinyin: yòng bù著 zhè yàng cōng máng-- wǒ men yǒu de shì shí jiān.
english: There's no need to be in such a tearing hurry we've got plenty of time.

hanzi: 去年是作曲家一生中创作丰收的时期。
pinyin: qù nián shì zuò qǔ jiā yī shēng zhòng chuàng zuò fēng shōu de shí qī。
english: Last year was a prolific period in the composer's life.

hanzi: 要是你老这样举棋不定, 我们就来不及了.
pinyin: yào shì nǐ lǎo zhè yàng jǔ qí bù dìng,  wǒ men jiù lái bù jí le.
english: If you keep shilly-shallying like this we'll be late.

hanzi: 国际恐怖主义并不是近年才有的现象。
pinyin: guó jì kǒng bù zhǔ yì bìng bù shì jìn nián cái yǒu de xiàn xiàng。
english: International terrorism is not just a recent phenomenon.

hanzi: 经理把工作尽量平均分配给雇员.
pinyin: jīng lǐ bǎ gōng zuò jìn liàng píng jūn fēn pèi jǐ gù yuán.
english: The manager tried to even out the distribution of work among his employees.

hanzi: 地球只是宇宙中众多星球中的一个。
pinyin: dì qiú zhǐ shì yǔ zhòu zhòng zhòng duō xīng qiú zhòng dì yī gè。
english: The Earth is only one of the numerous planets in the universe.

hanzi: 下星期，他将要参加一场国际象棋比赛。
pinyin: xià xīng qī， tā jiāng yào cān jiā yī chǎng guó jì xiàng qí bǐ sài。
english: He will take part in a chess tournament next week.

hanzi: 我希望他成为钢琴家的梦想可以成真。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng tā chéng wéi gāng qín jiā de mèng xiǎng kě yǐ chéng zhēn。
english: I hope his dream of becoming a pianist will come true.

hanzi: 有些罪犯被释放后有可能重新犯罪。
pinyin: yǒu xiē zuì fàn bèi shì fàng hòu yǒu kě néng chóng xīn fàn zuì。
english: Some criminals are likely to offend again when they are released.

hanzi: 这座建筑物很不起眼, 甚至可以说很难看.
pinyin: zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù hěn bù qǐ yǎn,  shèn zhì kě yǐ shuō hěn nán kàn.
english: It's an unattractive building, even ugly/ugly even.

hanzi: 史密斯一个回头球，打到了自己的三柱门上。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī yī gè huí tóu qiú， dǎ dào le zì jǐ de sān zhù mén shàng。
english: Smith played a turning ball on to the stumps.

hanzi: 据报道，这艘客轮与一艘油轮相撞。
pinyin: jù bào dào， zhè sōu kè lún yù yī sōu yóu lún xiàng zhuàng。
english: The liner is reported to have been in collision with an oil tanker.

hanzi: 政府将制定法规限制枪支出售。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jiàng zhì dìng fǎ guī xiàn zhì qiāng zhī chū shòu。
english: The government will introduce legislation to restrict the sale of firearms.

hanzi: 我是为那个老人女儿的缘故才照顾他的。
pinyin: wǒ shì wèi nèi gè lǎo rén nu:3 ér de yuán gù cái zhào gu tā de。
english: I went to look after the old man on the score of his daughter.

hanzi: 这个国家应该主动提出禁止核武器.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā yīng gāi zhǔ dòng tí chū jìn zhǐ hé wǔ qì.
english: It's up to this country to take the initiative in banning nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 过敏是身体对某些物质的不良反应。
pinyin: guò mǐn shì shēn tǐ duì mǒu xiē wù zhì de bù liáng fǎn yìng。
english: An allergy is an adverse reaction of the body to certain substances.

hanzi: 警方搜遍这个地区寻找这个走失的孩子。
pinyin: jǐng fāng sōu biàn zhè gè dì qū xún zhǎo zhè gè zǒu shī de hái zi。
english: The police scoured the area looking for the lost child.

hanzi: 把无辜的人投入监狱显然是审判不公.
pinyin: bǎ wú gū de rén tóu rù jiān yù xiǎn ran shì shěn pàn bù gōng.
english: Sending an innocent man to prison is a clear miscarriage of justice.

hanzi: 过敏是身体对某些物质的不良反应。
pinyin: guò mǐn shì shēn tǐ duì mǒu xiē wù zhì de bù liáng fǎn yìng。
english: An allergy is an adverse reaction of the body to certain substances.

hanzi: 他的母亲已经把他训练成循规蹈矩的人。
pinyin: tā de mǔ qīn yǐ jīng bǎ tā xùn liàn chéng xún guī dǎo jǔ de rén。
english: His mother has trained him to be a very proper young man.

hanzi: 这骚乱仅仅是人们不满的一种表露而已。
pinyin: zhè sāo luàn jǐn jǐn shì rén men bù mǎn de yī zhòng biǎo lù ér yǐ。
english: This riot is only one manifestation of people's discontent.

hanzi: 在国际市场上，我们的商品不亚于任何人。
pinyin: zài guó jì shì chǎng shàng， wǒ men de shāng pǐn bù yà yú rèn hé rén。
english: Our goods are second to none on the world market.

hanzi: 警方在跟犯罪分子的斗争中决不手软。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zài gēn fàn zuì fèn zǐ de dòu zhēng zhòng jué bù shǒu ruǎn。
english: The police will not relent in their fight against crime.

hanzi: 他们跟她开玩笑, 把她往游泳池里浸了一下.
pinyin: tā men gēn tā kāi wán xiào,  bǎ tā wàng yóu yǒng chí lǐ jìn le yī xià.
english: They dunked her in the swimming-pool as a joke.

hanzi: 公共汽车星期日行驶不一定准能赚钱。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē xīng qī rì xíng shǐ bù yī dìng zhǔn néng zhuàn qián。
english: It is not always economic for buses to run on Sunday.

hanzi: 削减公费开支意味著要砍掉几所医院.
pinyin: xuē jiǎn gōng fèi kāi zhī yì wèi著 yào kǎn diào jǐ suǒ yī yuàn.
english: The public spending cuts will mean the chop for several hospitals.

hanzi: 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。
pinyin: jìn chū kǒu de gāo guān shuì shì guó jì mào yì de zhàng ài。
english: Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade.

hanzi: 我现在辞去主席职位，交由我的副手接替。
pinyin: wǒ xiàn zài cí qù zhǔ xí zhí wèi， jiāo yóu wǒ de fù shǒu jiē tì。
english: I am resigning as chairman and handing over to my deputy.

hanzi: 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。
pinyin: jìn chū kǒu de gāo guān shuì shì guó jì mào yì de zhàng ài。
english: Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade.

hanzi: 战胜国要求战败国交付巨额赔款.
pinyin: zhàn shèng guó yāo qiú zhàn bài guó jiāo fù jù é péi kuǎn.
english: The victorious nations are demanding huge indemnities from their former enemies.

hanzi: 幕后牵线者如木偶戏中牵金属线或棉线的人
pinyin: mù hòu qiān xiàn zhě rú mù ǒu xì zhòng qiān jīn shǔ xiàn huò mián xiàn de rén
english: One who pulls wires or strings, as of puppets.

hanzi: 麻疯病是一种影响皮肤和神经的疾病。
pinyin: má fēng bìng shì yī zhòng yǐng xiǎng pí fū huò shén jīng de jí bìng。
english: Leprosy is a kind of disease affecting the skin and nerves.

hanzi: 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。
pinyin: jìn chū kǒu de gāo guān shuì shì guó jì mào yì de zhàng ài。
english: Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade.

hanzi: 专业，主修课选作学术专业的一个研究领域
pinyin: zhuān yè， zhǔ xiū kè xuǎn zuò xué shù zhuān yè de yī gè yán jiū lǐng yù
english: A field of study chosen as an academic specialty.

hanzi: 个人清洁对于健康和仪表同样重要。
pinyin: gè rén qīng jié duì yú jiàn kāng huò yí biǎo tóng yàng zhòng yào。
english: Personal cleanliness is important to health as well as to appearance.

hanzi: 我已经决定买一部脚踏车，不论贵不贵。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng jué dìng mǎi yī bù jué tà jū， bù lùn guì bù guì。
english: I have decided to buy a bicycle, whether it is expensive or not.

hanzi: 医生告诉他每天饭前吃两片阿斯匹林。
pinyin: yī shēng gào su tā měi tiān fàn qián jí liǎng piàn ē sī pǐ lín。
english: The doctor told him to take two tablets of aspirin before every meal.

hanzi: 这出戏公演时，当地报纸对它评价不佳。
pinyin: zhè chū xì gōng yǎn shí， dāng dì bào zhǐ duì tā píng jià bù jiā。
english: When the play opened, the local press gave it the thumbs down.

hanzi: 由于天气恶劣，许多选民今天没有投票。
pinyin: yóu yú tiān qì è liè， xǔ duō xuǎn mín jīn tiān méi yǒu tóu piào。
english: Many electors didn't vote today because of the bad weather.

hanzi: 风猛烈地刮了一整天后，日落后变小了。
pinyin: fēng měng liè de guā le yī zhěng tiān hòu， rì luò hòu biàn xiǎo le。
english: The wind was strong all day, but it moderated after sunset.

hanzi: 医生告诉他每天饭前吃两片阿斯匹林。
pinyin: yī shēng gào su tā měi tiān fàn qián jí liǎng piàn ē sī pǐ lín。
english: The doctor told him to take two tablets of aspirin before every meal.

hanzi: 他被认为是本世纪第一流的作曲家之一。
pinyin: tā bèi rèn wéi shì běn shì jì dì yī liú de zuò qǔ jiā zhī yī。
english: He is regarded as one of the classical composers in this century.

hanzi: 他被认为是本世纪第一流的作曲家之一。
pinyin: tā bèi rèn wéi shì běn shì jì dì yī liú de zuò qǔ jiā zhī yī。
english: He is regarded as one of the classical composers in this century.

hanzi: 那位著名的政治家死于一场悲惨的意外事故。
pinyin: nà wèi著 míng de zhèng zhì jiā sǐ yú yī chǎng bēi cǎn de yì wài shì gù。
english: The famous politician died in a tragic accident.

hanzi: 主席的简短陈辞概括了委员会的观点.
pinyin: zhǔ xí de jiǎn duǎn chén cí gài kuò le wěi yuán huì de guān diǎn.
english: The chairman's short statement encapsulates the views of the committee.

hanzi: 这个星期天浸信会教友将要举行一场典礼。
pinyin: zhè gè xīng qī tiān jìn xìn kuài jiào yǒu jiāng yào jǔ xíng yī chǎng diǎn lǐ。
english: The Baptist will hold a ceremony this Sunday.

hanzi: 他因为玩忽职守而失去工作，罪有应得。
pinyin: tā yīn wèi wàn hū zhí shǒu ér shī qù gōng zuò， zuì yǒu yīng dé。
english: It served him right to lose that job, because he neglected it.

hanzi: 这所学院接待了一批来访的俄国科学家.
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué yuàn jiē dài le yī pī lái fǎng de E2 guó kē xué jiā.
english: The college is (playing) host to a group of visiting Russian scientists.

hanzi: 风向的突然转变预示着暴风雨即将来临。
pinyin: fēng xiàng de tū rán zhuǎn biàn yù shì zhuó bào fēng yǔ jí jiāng lái lín。
english: A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm.

hanzi: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。
pinyin: bù zhǎng jiù jú shì de zuì xīn fā zhǎn zuò le lìng yī pān jiě shì。
english: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.

hanzi: 突然窗帘拉了开来，一道强光照了进来。
pinyin: tū rán chuāng lián lā le kāi lái， yī dào qiáng guāng zhào le jìn lái。
english: The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.

hanzi: 我可以给你举出她故意粗暴待人的几个例子.
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ jǐ nǐ jǔ chū tā gù yì cū bào dài rén de jǐ ge lì zi.
english: I can quote you several instances of her being deliberately rude.

hanzi: 她一定已经收到包裹了, 我是用挂号寄的.
pinyin: tā yī dìng yǐ jīng shōu dào bāo guǒ le,  wǒ shì yòng guà hào jì de.
english: She must have received the parcel: I sent it by registered post.

hanzi: 他用冰凉的手捧起一杯滚热的巧克力饮料。
pinyin: tā yòng bīng liáng de shǒu pěng qǐ yī bēi gǔn rè de qiǎo kè lì yǐn liào。
english: He cupped his cold hands round the cup of hot chocolate.

hanzi: 这恰恰减低了他正在提倡的政策本身的价值。
pinyin: zhè qià qià jiǎn dī le tā zhèng zài tí chàng de zhèng cè běn shēn de jià zhí。
english: It beggars the very policy he was advocating.

hanzi: 我可以给你举出她故意粗暴待人的几个例子.
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ jǐ nǐ jǔ chū tā gù yì cū bào dài rén de jǐ ge lì zi.
english: I can quote you several instances of her being deliberately rude.

hanzi: 他看不起他们的意见，认为那些意见很幼稚。
pinyin: tā kàn bù qǐ tā men de yì jiàn， rèn wéi nà xiē yì jiàn hěn yòu zhì。
english: He spat at their ideas, treating them as childish.

hanzi: 这两块粘合得真好, 几乎看不出接缝.
pinyin: zhè liǎng kuài zhān hé de zhēn hào,  jī hū kàn bù chū jiē fèng.
english: The two pieces were stuck together so well that you could hardly see the join.

hanzi: 他出事后重新学习走路要有极大的毅力。
pinyin: tā chū shì hòu chóng xīn xué xí zǒu lù yào yǒu jí dà de yì lì。
english: Learning to walk again after his accident required great patience.

hanzi: 发射以光线或波的形式发出和传播能量
pinyin: fā shè yǐ guāng xiàn huò bō de xíng shì fā chū huò chuán bō néng liàng
english: Emission and propagation of energy in the form of rays or waves.

hanzi: 摄政者在他的国家推行了一套先进的制度。
pinyin: shè zhèng zhě zài tā de guó jiā tuī xíng le yī tào xiān jìn de zhì dù。
english: The regent carried out an advanced system in his country.

hanzi: 摄政者在他的国家推行了一套先进的制度。
pinyin: shè zhèng zhě zài tā de guó jiā tuī xíng le yī tào xiān jìn de zhì dù。
english: The regent carried out an advanced system in his country.

hanzi: 看到他在挣扎，我给他扔了一个救生圈过去。
pinyin: kàn dào tā zài zhēng zhá， wǒ jǐ tā rēng le yī gè jiù shēng quān guò qu。
english: I threw a life buoy to him when I saw his struggling.

hanzi: 老人们为电影和小说的大胆感到震惊。
pinyin: lǎo rén men wèi diàn yǐng huò xiǎo shuō de dà dǎn gǎn dào zhèn jīng。
english: The old people is shocked by the new freedom in movies and novels.

hanzi: 敌人掠夺了这个地区，并且杀害了许多村民。
pinyin: dí rén lu:è duó le zhè gè dì qū， bìng qiě shā hài le xǔ duō cūn mín。
english: The enemy raped the country and killed many villagers.

hanzi: 小女孩失去了平衡，从平衡木上摔了下来。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái shī qù le píng héng， zòng píng héng mù shàng shuāi le xia lai。
english: The girl lost her balance and fell off the balance beam.

hanzi: 这些小学生尚未学会正确使用标点符号.
pinyin: zhè xie xiǎo xué shēng shàng wèi xué huì zhèng què shǐ yòng biāo diǎn fú hào.
english: The children have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.

hanzi: 我们必须通过智力测验才能被老板雇用。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū tōng guò zhì lì cè yàn cái néng bèi lǎo bǎn gù yòng。
english: We must pass an intelligence test before being hired by the boss.

hanzi: 一个人未被证明有罪前，被视为是清白的。
pinyin: yī gè rén wèi bèi zhèng míng yǒu zuì qián， bèi shì wéi shì qīng bái de。
english: A man is accounted innocent until he is proven guilty.

hanzi: 有几束隐约的阳光使阴暗的下午有些明亮.
pinyin: yǒu jǐ shù yǐn yuē de yáng guāng shǐ yīn àn de xià wǔ yǒu xiē míng liàng.
english: A few faint gleams of sunshine lit up the gloomy afternoon.

hanzi: 一艘拖轮牵引着那条船的船头把它转了个方向。
pinyin: yī sōu tuō lún qiān yǐn zhuó nà tiáo chuán de chuán tou bǎ tā zhuàn le gè fāng xiàng。
english: A tug pulled the bow of the ship round.

hanzi: 在离开停车场之前, 我们鼓励了史密斯一家。
pinyin: zài lí kāi tíng chē chǎng zhī qián,  wǒ men gǔ lì le shǐ mì sī yī jiā。
english: We encouraged the Smiths before leaving the parking lot.

hanzi: 在党的培育下，他已成长为一个优秀的战士。
pinyin: zài dǎng de péi yù xià， tā yǐ chéng zhǎng wèi yī gè yōu xiù de zhàn shì。
english: Nurtured by the Party, he grown into a good fighter.

hanzi: 手绣的丝制手帕在西方市场销路很好。
pinyin: shǒu xiù de sī zhì shǒu pà zài xī fāng shì chǎng xiāo lù hěn hǎo。
english: Silk handkerchiefs embroidered by hand sell well in the Western market.

hanzi: 手绣的丝制手帕在西方市场销路很好。
pinyin: shǒu xiù de sī zhì shǒu pà zài xī fāng shì chǎng xiāo lù hěn hǎo。
english: Silk handkerchiefs embroidered by hand sell well in the Western market.

hanzi: 我涂了大量胶水，可那张海报就是贴不住。
pinyin: wǒ tú le dà liàng jiāo shuǐ， kě nà zhāng hǎi bào jiù shì tiē bú zhù。
english: The poster wouldn't stick even though I drenched it with glue.

hanzi: 他在股票交易中买卖精明, 赚了很多钱.
pinyin: tā zài gǔ piào jiāo yì zhòng mǎi mài jīng míng,  zuàn le hěn duō qián.
english: His clever manipulation of the stock markets makes him lots of money.

hanzi: 这家公司现在使用电脑来计算所有的帐目。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī xiàn zài shǐ yòng diàn nǎo lái jì suàn suǒ yǒu de zhàng mù。
english: The company now uses a computer to do all its account.

hanzi: 这样的行为与她情操高尚的原则是矛盾的。
pinyin: zhè yàng de xíng wéi yù tā qíng cāo gāo shàng de yuán zé shì máo dùn de。
english: Such behavior is inconsistent with her high-minded principles.

hanzi: 我打开了邮件，惊讶地发现了一个打碎的花瓶。
pinyin: wǒ dǎ kāi le yóu jiàn， jīng yà de fā xiàn le yī gè dǎ suì de huā píng。
english: I opened my mail and was surprised to see a broken vase.

hanzi: 他搜集以前的作品，编成了所谓的五经。
pinyin: tā sōu jí yǐ qián de zuò pǐn， biān chéng le suǒ wèi de Wǔ Jīng。
english: He gathered earlier writings to prepare what are called the Five Classics.

hanzi: 我请求他从新疆回来时给我带些葡萄干。
pinyin: wǒ qǐng qiú tā zòng xīn jiāng huí lai shí jǐ wǒ dài xiē pú tao gàn。
english: I asked him to bring me some raisins when he returns from Xinjiang.

hanzi: 他在青年时代曾经有过想当钢琴家的雄心。
pinyin: tā zài qīng nián shí dài céng jīng yǒu guò xiǎng dàng gāng qín jiā de xióng xīn。
english: In his youth he had the ambition of being a pianist.

hanzi: 污染对这一物种的继续生存造成了威胁。
pinyin: wū rǎn duì zhè yī wù zhǒng de jì xù shēng cún zào chéng le wēi xié。
english: Pollution poses a threat to the continued existence of this species.

hanzi: 那部新出版的美国小说是市场上的畅销货。
pinyin: nà bù xīn chū bǎn de Měi guó xiǎo shuō shì shì chǎng shàng de chàng xiāo huò。
english: The newly published American novel sold like hot cakes.

hanzi: 那把刀子被卡住了，她猛地一拔，把它拔了出来。
pinyin: nà bǎ dāo zi bèi qiǎ zhù le， tā měng de yī bá， bǎ tā bá le chū lai。
english: The knife was stuck but she pulled it out with a jerk.

hanzi: 这本书被翻译成多种译文并行销全球。
pinyin: zhè běn shū bèi fān yì chéng duō zhǒng yì wén bìng xíng xiāo quán qiú。
english: The book was translated into many versions and sold all over the world.

hanzi: 新娘的男亲属们聚集在一起为婚礼做准备。
pinyin: xīn niáng de nán qīn shǔ men jù jí zài yī qǐ wèi hūn lǐ zuò zhǔn bèi。
english: The bride's kinsman gathered to make preparations for the wedding.

hanzi: 这样的行为与她情操高尚的原则是矛盾的。
pinyin: zhè yàng de xíng wéi yù tā qíng cāo gāo shàng de yuán zé shì máo dùn de。
english: Such behavior is inconsistent with her high-minded principles.

hanzi: 还没有装订成册的论文稿件堆放在桌子上。
pinyin: huán méi yǒu zhuāng dìng chéng cè de lùn wén gǎo jiàn duī fàng zài zhuō zi shàng。
english: The unbound sheets of paper were piled up on the table.

hanzi: 对不信上帝的人引用圣经的话是没用的。
pinyin: duì bù xìn shàng dì de rén yǐn yòng shèng jīng de huà shì méi yòng de。
english: It's no use citing the Bible to somebody who doesn't believe in God.

hanzi: 他要求他们把他著作的销售情况随时告诉他。
pinyin: tā yāo qiú tā men bǎ tā著 zuò de xiāo shòu qíng kuàng suí shí gào su tā。
english: He ask them to keep him posted about the sale of his book.

hanzi: 我们只好匆忙找套房子--没有时间挑选了.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ hǎo cōng máng zhǎo tào fáng zi-- méi yǒu shí jiān tiāo xuǎn le.
english: We had to find a flat in a hurry there was no time to pick and choose.

hanzi: 根据圣经的说法，我们可以活到七十岁。
pinyin: gēn jù shèng jīng de shuō fa， wǒ men kě yǐ huó dào qī shí suì。
english: According to the Bible, we can expect to live for three score years and ten.

hanzi: 我们十几个人像沙丁鱼罐头一样挤成一团。
pinyin: wǒ men shí jǐ ge rén xiàng shā dīng yú guàn tou yí yàng jǐ chéng yī tuán。
english: The ten of us were squashed together like sardines in the tin.

hanzi: 请站到一边，你的影子计划遮住了他的活儿。
pinyin: qǐng zhàn dào yī biān， nǐ de yǐng zi jì huà zhē zhù le tā de huór。
english: Please stand to one side, you're casting your shadow over his work.

hanzi: 法律是为保卫人民的权利和财产而制定的。
pinyin: fǎ lu:4 shì wèi bǎo wèi rén mín de quán lì huò cái chǎn ér zhì dìng de。
english: Laws are constituted to protect individual rights and properties.

hanzi: 在有关钱的问题上，我总是尽量小心谨慎。
pinyin: zài yǒu guān qián de wèn tí shàng， wǒ zǒng shì jìn liàng xiǎo xīn jǐn shèn。
english: Where money is concerned, I always try to be very careful.

hanzi: 当年流落他乡的犹太人现在生活在以色列.
pinyin: dāng nián liú luò tā xiāng de Yóu tài rén xiàn zài shēng huó zài yǐ shǎi liè.
english: People from every country of the Diaspora now live in Israel.

hanzi: 稻田一块专门灌溉的土地，水稻生长的地方
pinyin: dào tián yī kuài zhuān mén guàn gài de tǔ dì， shuǐ dào shēng zhǎng de dì fang
english: A specially irrigated or flooded field where rice is grown.

hanzi: 我不太懂得瓷器，估计不出这些盘子的价钱。
pinyin: wǒ bù tài dǒng de cí qì， gū jì bù chū zhè xie pán zi de jià qian。
english: I don't know enough about porcelain to be able to price these plates.

hanzi: 政府已成立工作组调查滥用毒品问题.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ chéng lì gōng zuò zǔ diào chá làn yòng dú pǐn wèn tí.
english: The government has set up a working party to look into the problem of drug abuse.

hanzi: 骚乱恶化，政府只得宣布进入紧急状态。
pinyin: sāo luàn è huà， zhèng fǔ zhǐ dé xuān bù jìn rù jǐn jí zhuàng tài。
english: The rioting grew worse and the government declared a state of emergency.

hanzi: 足球队输球后球迷们在街上聚众闹事。
pinyin: zú qiú duì shū qiú hòu qiú mí men zài jiē shàng jù zhòng nào shì。
english: The football supporters ran riot through the town after the defeat of their team.

hanzi: 把方向盘往右边转转, 好修正驾驶上的偏差.
pinyin: bǎ fāng xiàng pán wàng yòu biān zhuàn zhuàn,  hào xiū zhèng jià shǐ shàng de piān chā.
english: Turn the wheel to the right to correct the steering.

hanzi: 据说法国人是世界上最浪漫的民族之一。
pinyin: jù shuō fǎ guó rén shì shì jiè shàng zuì làng màn de mín zú zhī yī。
english: It is said that Frenchmen are among the most romantic people in the world.

hanzi: 你该知道做这项工作要承担额外责任。
pinyin: nǐ gāi zhī dào zuò zhè xiàng gōng zuò yào chéng dān é wài zé rèn。
english: You should know the additional responsibilities that are incidental to the job.

hanzi: 我对一直放在走廊里的那个包裹有些怀疑。
pinyin: wǒ duì yī zhí fàng zài zǒu láng lǐ de nèi gè bāo guǒ yǒu xiē huái yí。
english: I'm a bit suspicious about the package that's been left in the corridor.

hanzi: 问题不一定会发生, 但有备无患并无害处.
pinyin: wèn tí bù yī dìng kuài fā shēng,  dàn yǒu bèi wú huàn bìng wú hài chù.
english: The problem may not arise, but there's no harm in keeping our powder dry.

hanzi: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。
pinyin: nǐ huò xǔ yǒu quán yāo qiú tuì huí qu nián nǐ jiāo fù de bù fen shuì jīn。
english: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

hanzi: 手提箱裂开了，里面的东西纷纷落在地板上。
pinyin: shǒu tí xiāng liè kāi le， lǐ miàn de dōng xi fēn fēn luò zài dì bǎn shàng。
english: The suitcase burst open and its contents rained on the floor.

hanzi: 警方正在调查他卷入那桩罪行的可能性。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài diào chá tā juǎn rù nà zhuāng zuì xíng de kě néng xìng。
english: The police are investigating his possible involvement in the crime.

hanzi: 近些年来, 很多通讯卫星被送上轨道。
pinyin: jìn xiē nián lái,  hěn duō tōng xùn wèi xīng bèi sòng shàng guǐ dào。
english: In recent years a number of communications satellites have been put into orbit.

hanzi: 我们很快就抵达一片高度约九十英尺的高原。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn kuài jiù dǐ dá yī piàn gāo dù yuē jiǔ shí yīng chǐ de gāo yuán。
english: Soon we reach a plateau at an elevation of about ninety feet.

hanzi: 我的朋友比尔，将和他的女朋友一道来看我。
pinyin: wǒ de péng you Bǐ ěr， jiàng huò tā de nu:3 péng you yī dào lái kàn wǒ。
english: My friend Bill, is coming to see me in company with his girl friend.

hanzi: 她宁可辞职也不愿参与这种不正当的买卖.
pinyin: tā nìng kě cí zhí yě bù yuàn cān yù zhè zhǒng bù zhèng dāng de mǎi mài.
english: She would sooner resign than take part in such dishonest business deals.

hanzi: 仿佛一件小事引起了一连串连锁反应似的。
pinyin: fǎng fú yī jiàn xiǎo shì yǐn qǐ le yī lián chuàn lián suǒ fǎn yìng sì de。
english: It is as if a single unimportant event set up a chain of reactions.

hanzi: 那艘损坏的船只在海岛沿岸航行以寻找港口。
pinyin: nà sōu sǔn huài de chuán zhī zài hǎi dǎo yán àn háng xíng yǐ xún zhǎo gǎng kǒu。
english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.

hanzi: 大学生们积极投入开展反对核武器的运 动。
pinyin: dà xué sheng men jī jí tóu rù kāi zhǎn fǎn duì hé wǔ qì de yùn  dòng。
english: The college students are active to crusade against the nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 过了几天，洪水才退，生活恢复了正常。
pinyin: guò le jǐ tiān， hóng shuǐ cái tuì， shēng huó huī fù le zhèng cháng。
english: It was several days before the floodwater sank and life returned to normal.

hanzi: 他为自己在科研方面所取得的巨大成就而自豪。
pinyin: tā wèi zì jǐ zài kē yán fāng miàn suǒ qǔ dé de jù dà chéng jiù ér zì háo。
english: He is proud of his great success in scientific researches.

hanzi: 载有受过训练的宇航员的火箭马上就要发射了。
pinyin: zài yǒu shòu guò xùn liàn de yǔ háng yuán de huǒ jiàn mǎ shàng jiù yào fā shè le。
english: A rocket manned by trained astronauts will launch soon.

hanzi: 油轮需求量的下降使很多工作职位受到威胁。
pinyin: yóu lún xū qiú liàng de xià jiàng shǐ hěn duō gōng zuò zhí wèi shòu dào wēi xié。
english: A fall in demand for oil tankers has put jobs in jeopardy.

hanzi: 对销售额的仔细分析显示出明显的地区差别。
pinyin: duì xiāo shòu é de zǐ xì fēn xī xiǎn shì chū míng xiǎn de dì qū chā bié。
english: Close analysis of sales figures showed clear regional variations.

hanzi: 我们的秘书刚刚辞职, 下星期特别令人担心.
pinyin: wǒ men de mì shū gāng gang cí zhí,  xià xīng qī tè bié lìng rén dān xīn.
english: Next week will be particularly fraught as we've just lost our secretary.

hanzi: 这些美丽的古老宫殿是我们民族遗产的一部分。
pinyin: zhè xie měi lì de gǔ lǎo gōng diàn shì wǒ men mín zú yí chǎn de yī bù fen。
english: These beautiful old palaces are part of our national heritage.

hanzi: 彼得是我们最小的孩子, 我们另外还有三个孩子.
pinyin: Bǐ dé shì wǒ men zuì xiǎo de hái zi,  wǒ men lìng wài hái yǒu sān gè hái zi.
english: Peter is our youngest child, and we have three others besides.

hanzi: 伤残人士在治疗中, 自助自立是个重要因素.
pinyin: shāng cán rén shì zài zhì liáo zhòng,  zì zhù zì lì shì gè zhòng yào yīn sù.
english: Self-help is an important element in therapy for the handicapped.

hanzi: 你可以用热水把菜盘上凝结的油污冲洗掉。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ yòng rè shuǐ bǎ cài pán shàng níng jié de yóu wū chōng xǐ diào。
english: You may use hot water to rinse the congealed fat off the dinner plates.

hanzi: 这个分裂出去的派别受到其他宗教团体的蔑视。
pinyin: zhè gè fēn liè chū qù de pài bié shòu dào qí tā zōng jiào tuán tǐ de miè shì。
english: The break-away sect was contemned by other religious groups.

hanzi: 此诗现存最早的原稿收藏在这座博物馆里。
pinyin: cǐ shī xiàn cún zuì zǎo de yuán gǎo shōu cáng zài zhè zuò bó wù guǎn lǐ。
english: The earliest extant manuscript of this poem has been kept in the museum.

hanzi: 一所现代化的监狱取代了那所维多利亚时代的监狱.
pinyin: yī suǒ xiàn dài huà de jiān yù qǔ dài le nà suǒ wéi Duō lì yà shí dài de jiān yù.
english: A modern prison has replaced the Victorian one.

hanzi: 将军高度赞扬了他在那次战争中的英勇事迹。
pinyin: jiāng jūn gāo dù zàn yáng le tā zài nà cì zhàn zhēng zhòng dì yīng yǒng shì jī。
english: His heroism in that war was highly praised by the general.

hanzi: 体育爱好者们欣喜若狂地从体育场中蜂涌而出。
pinyin: tǐ yù ài hào zhě men xīn xǐ ruò kuáng de zòng tǐ yù chǎng zhòng fēng yǒng ér chū。
english: The fans poured out of the stadium cheering wildly.

hanzi: 经理拥有居于高职位所具备的职责和特权。
pinyin: jīng lǐ yōng yǒu jū yú gāo zhí wèi suǒ jù bèi de zhí zé huò tè quán。
english: The manager has the duties and privileges appertaining to his high office.

hanzi: 医生们进行会诊，决定是否需要动手术。
pinyin: yī shēng men jìn xíng kuài zhěn， jué dìng shì fǒu xū yào dòng shǒu zhú。
english: The doctors held a consultation to decide whether an operation was necessary.

hanzi: 那种新汽车因有机械缺陷只好撤出市场.
pinyin: nà zhòng xīn qì chē yīn yǒu jī xiè quē xiàn zhǐ hǎo chè chū shì chǎng.
english: The new car had to be withdrawn from the market because of a mechanical defect.

hanzi: 男孩子们在运动场的墙上用粉笔画上了球门柱.
pinyin: nán hái zǐ men zài yùn dòng cháng de qiáng shàng yòng fěn bǐ huà shàng le qiú mén zhù.
english: The boys chalked out goalposts on the playground wall.

hanzi: 今晚大概会有霜冻，一定要把花草都遮盖好。
pinyin: jīn wǎn dà gài kuài yǒu shuāng dòng， yī dìng yào bǎ huā cǎo dōu zhē gài hào。
english: It may freeze tonight, so make sure the plant should be covered.

hanzi: 我的一些朋友通过打网球锻炼他们胳膊的肌肉。
pinyin: wǒ de yī xiē péng you tōng guò dǎ wǎng qiú duàn liàn tā men gē bo de jī ròu。
english: Some of my friends develop their arm muscles by playing tennis.

hanzi: 我的一些朋友通过打网球锻炼他们胳膊的肌肉。
pinyin: wǒ de yī xiē péng you tōng guò dǎ wǎng qiú duàn liàn tā men gē bo de jī ròu。
english: Some of my friends develop their arm muscles by playing tennis.

hanzi: 我也认为不卫生，但是我对病菌的抵抗力很高。
pinyin: wǒ yě rèn wéi bù wèi shēng， dàn shì wǒ duì bìng jūn de dǐ kàng lì hěn gāo。
english: I don't think so, either, but my resistance to germs is high.

hanzi: 有人从背后向我猛然一击，我重重地倒了下去。
pinyin: yǒu rén zòng bèi hòu xiàng wǒ měng rán yī jī， wǒ chóng chóng de dào le xià qu。
english: Someone hit me from behind and I fell like a ton of bricks.

hanzi: 在她患病期间, 她的律师一直代理她的业务.
pinyin: zài tā huàn bìng qī jiān,  tā de lu:4 shī yī zhí dài lǐ tā de yè wù.
english: During her illness her solicitor has been acting for her in her business affairs.

hanzi: 他进去见她之前，用水将头发梳理得很光亮。
pinyin: tā jìn qù xiàn tā zhī qián， yòng shuǐ jiàng tóu fa shū lǐ de hěn guāng liàng。
english: He sleeked back his hair with water before going in to meet her.

hanzi: 医生们进行会诊，决定是否需要动手术。
pinyin: yī shēng men jìn xíng kuài zhěn， jué dìng shì fǒu xū yào dòng shǒu zhú。
english: The doctors held a consultation to decide whether an operation was necessary.

hanzi: 公司仅在雇员严重失职的情形下才予以解雇.
pinyin: gōng sī jǐn zài gù yuán yán zhòng shī zhí de qíng xing xià cái yǔ yǐ jiě gù.
english: The company only dismisses its employees in cases of gross misconduct.

hanzi: 法院已经发布了禁止他们罢工一个月的禁令。
pinyin: fǎ yuàn yǐ jīng fā bù le jìn zhǐ tā men bà gōng yī gè yuè de jìn lìng。
english: The court has issued an injunction forbidding them to strike for a month.

hanzi: 公司有一巨大财富，就是研究部主任这个人。
pinyin: gōng sī yǒu yī jù dà cái fù， jiù shì yán jiū bù zhǔ rèn zhè gè rén。
english: The firm has an important asset in the person of the director of research.

hanzi: 这一事故可以作为醉酒驾驶危害的实际教训.
pinyin: zhè yī shì gù kě yǐ zuò wéi zuì jiǔ jià shǐ wēi hài de shí jì jiào xun.
english: Let this accident be an object lesson in the dangers of drinking and driving.

hanzi: 侧面从侧面观看的物体或构造，尤指人的脑袋
pinyin: cè miàn zòng cè miàn guān kàn de wù tǐ huò gòu zào， yóu zhǐ rén de nǎo dài
english: A side view of an object or a structure, especially of the human head.

hanzi: 一位空中小姐走过来，问他是否想要些饮料。
pinyin: yī wèi kōng zhōng xiǎo jie zǒu guò lai， wèn tā shì fǒu xiǎng yào xiē yǐn liào。
english: An air stewardess came and asked him if he would like some drink.

hanzi: 他为挽救这家企业，不惜冒险投入他的全部金钱。
pinyin: tā wèi wǎn jiù zhè jiā qǐ yè， bù xī mào xiǎn tóu rù tā de quán bù jīn qián。
english: He hazarded all his money in the attempt to save the business.

hanzi: 政府声称对失业表示关注纯属做做姿态。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shēng chēng duì shī yè biǎo shì guān zhù chún shǔ zuò zuò zī tài。
english: The government's claim to be concerned about unemployment is sheer hypocrisy.

hanzi: 如果他身体这么糟，那么他的所有财富对他毫无用处。
pinyin: rú guǒ tā shēn tǐ zhè me zāo， nà me tā de suǒ yǒu cái fù duì tā háo wú yòng chu。
english: All his riches are of no good to him if he is so ill.

hanzi: 神经病神经系统的疾病或异常状态下的神经系统
pinyin: shén jīng bìng shén jīng xì tǒng de jí bìng huò yì cháng zhuàng tài xià de shén jīng xì tǒng
english: A disease or an abnormality of the nervous system.

hanzi: 哲学上的，理论上的建立在思辩或抽象的推论之上的
pinyin: zhé xué shàng de， lǐ lùn shàng de jiàn lì zài sī biàn huò chōu xiàng de tuī lùn zhī shàng de
english: Based on speculative or abstract reasoning.

hanzi: 我们藏在灌木丛后，准备向来犯者发起突然袭击。
pinyin: wǒ men zàng zài guàn mù cóng hòu， zhǔn bèi xiàng lái fàn zhě fā qǐ tū rán xí jī。
english: We hid behind the bushes, ready to pounce on the intruder.

hanzi: 即将举行的会谈给实现真正的裁军带来了希望。
pinyin: jí jiāng jǔ xíng de huì tán jǐ shí xiàn zhēn zhèng de cái jūn dài lái le xī wàng。
english: The forthcoming talk hold out the hope of real arms reduction.

hanzi: 我想他反正会以养家为理由来进行辩解。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng tā fǎn zhèng kuài yǐ yǎng jiā wèi lǐ yóu lái jìn xíng biàn jiě。
english: I suppose that, in justification, he could always claim he had a family to support.

hanzi: 警方搜索了在周围六英里以内的树林各处.
pinyin: jǐng fāng sōu suǒ le zài zhōu wéi liù yīng lǐ yǐ nèi de shù lín gè chù.
english: Police searched all the woods within a six-mile radius/within a radius of six miles.

hanzi: 受训的突击队员要参加令人筋疲力尽的突击课程.
pinyin: shòu xùn de tū jī duì yuán yào cān jiā lìng rén jīn pí lì jìn de tū jī kè chéng.
english: Trainee commandos are put through an exhausting assault course.

hanzi: 候选人须 表明他们对单方面裁军所持的立场.
pinyin: hòu xuǎn rén xū  biǎo míng tā men duì shàn fāng miàn cái jūn suǒ chí de lì chǎng.
english: The candidates had to state their position on unilateral disarmament.

hanzi: 政府的通告已视为迈向解决罢工问题的一步。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ de tōng gào yǐ shì wéi mài xiàng jiě jué bà gōng wèn tí de yí bù。
english: The government's announcement is seen as a move towards settling the strike.

hanzi: 我想他反正会以养家为理由来进行辩解。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng tā fǎn zhèng kuài yǐ yǎng jiā wèi lǐ yóu lái jìn xíng biàn jiě。
english: I suppose that, in justification, he could always claim he had a family to support.

hanzi: 虽然他竭力阻止这桩婚姻，但还是成了事实。
pinyin: suī rán tā jié lì zǔ zhǐ zhè zhuāng hūn yīn， dàn hái shì chéng le shì shí。
english: He tried to prevent the marriage but it still took place notwithstanding.

hanzi: 机动车协会劝告开车的人暂时不要使用公路。
pinyin: jī dòng chē xié huì quàn gào kāi chē de rén zàn shí bù yào shǐ yòng gōng lù。
english: Motoring organization is urging driver not to travel by road if possible.

hanzi: 那间房子是出售的，房子里有暖气设备和地下室。
pinyin: nà jiàn fáng zi shì chū shòu de， fáng zi lǐ yǒu nuǎn qì shè bèi huò dì xià shì。
english: That house is for sale. It has central heating and a base room.

hanzi: 听到收音机里传来的轻快乐曲，这个病人笑了。
pinyin: tīng dào shōu yīn jī lǐ zhuàn lái de qīng kuài yuè qǔ， zhè gè bìng rén xiào le。
english: The patient smiled when he heard the sprightly music on the radio.

hanzi: 飞机在大西洋中部飞行时, 其中一个发动机出了故障.
pinyin: fēi jī zài dà xī yáng zhōng bù fēi xíng shí,  qí zhōng yī gè fā dòng jī chū le gù zhàng.
english: One of the plane's engines gave out in mid-Atlantic.

hanzi: 该系统的主要弱点之一是消耗大量燃料。
pinyin: gāi xì tǒng de zhǔ yào ruò diǎn zhī yī shì xiāo hào dà liàng rán liào。
english: One of the main disadvantages of this system is that it uses very large amounts of fuel.

hanzi: 当他宣布竞赛的优胜者时，大家都静静地倾听。
pinyin: dàng tā xuān bù jìng sài de yōu shèng zhě shí， dà jiā dōu jìng jìng de qīng tīng。
english: Everyone was silent as he announced the winner of the competition.

hanzi: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang lǒng zhào zài shén mì qì fēn xià， jì xù shǐ yóu lǎn zhě zháo mí。
english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

hanzi: 这项协议的签订将有助于缓和国际紧张局势。
pinyin: zhè xiàng xié yì de qiān dìng jiàng yǒu zhù yú huǎn hé guó jì jǐn zhāng jú shì。
english: The signing of this agreement will help to reduce international tension.

hanzi: 我认为你说美国是世界和平的障碍是不对的。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi nǐ shuō Měi guó shì shì jiè hé píng de zhàng ài shì bù duì de。
english: I don't think it is correct of you to say that America is a balk to world peace.

hanzi: 听到收音机里传来的轻快乐曲，这个病人笑了。
pinyin: tīng dào shōu yīn jī lǐ zhuàn lái de qīng kuài yuè qǔ， zhè gè bìng rén xiào le。
english: The patient smiled when he heard the sprightly music on the radio.

hanzi: 许多富商靠极其残酷地践踏别人而爬了上去。
pinyin: xǔ duō fù shāng kào jí qí cán kù de jiàn tà bié rén ér pá le shàng qù。
english: Many a rich businessman reached the top by trampling on others in the most brutal way.

hanzi: 工会说他们将采取行动维护会员的工作权益。
pinyin: gōng huì shuō tā men jiàng cǎi qǔ xíng dòng wéi hù huì yuán de gōng zuò quán yì。
english: The union said that they would take action to defend their member's jobs.

hanzi: 她干起活来倒是相当不错, 不过有时需要加以督促.
pinyin: tā gàn qǐ huó lái dào shì xiāng dāng bù cuò,  bù guò yǒu shí xū yào jiā yǐ dū cù.
english: She is a fairly good worker, but she needs prodding occasionally.

hanzi: 游牧部落的大多人都生活在草原上并且居无定所。
pinyin: yóu mù bù luò de dà duō rén dōu shēng huó zài cǎo yuán shàng bìng qiě jū wú dìng suǒ。
english: Most of the nomads live in grassland and have no fixed home.

hanzi: 沙漠那边吹来的风把所有的东西都蒙上了一层沙子.
pinyin: shā mò nà bian chuī lái de fēng bǎ suǒ yǒu de dōng xi dōu měng shàng le yī céng shā zi.
english: The wind blew from the desert and covered everything with sand.

hanzi: 士兵们在山腰上成扇形散开，搜索那个男人。
pinyin: shì bīng men zài shān yāo shàng chéng shàn xíng sàn kāi， sōu suǒ nèi gè nán rén。
english: The soldiers fanned out across the hillside in their search for the man.

hanzi: 我们永远都不应该忘记日本侵略者犯下的暴行。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒng yuǎn dōu bù yīng gāi wàng jì Rì běn qīn lu:è zhě fàn xià de bào xíng。
english: We should never forget the outrage committed by the Japanese invaders.

hanzi: 当小男孩走到汽车前面时，汽车司机按响了喇叭。
pinyin: dàng xiǎo nán hái zǒu dào qì chē qián mian shí， qì chē sī jī àn xiǎng le lǎ ba。
english: The driver blew his horn when the child stepped in front of the car.

hanzi: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang lǒng zhào zài shén mì qì fēn xià， jì xù shǐ yóu lǎn zhě zháo mí。
english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

hanzi: 这个国家同意为了共同的安全而与邻国结盟。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā tóng yì wèi le gòng tóng de ān quán ér yù lín guó jié méng。
english: The country agreed to confederate with the neighboring country for mutual safety.

hanzi: 我们永远都不应该忘记日本侵略者犯下的暴行。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒng yuǎn dōu bù yīng gāi wàng jì Rì běn qīn lu:è zhě fàn xià de bào xíng。
english: We should never forget the outrage committed by the Japanese invaders.

hanzi: 尽管她贫穷，但她总想装出上流社会阶层的样子。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā pín qióng， dàn tā zǒng xiǎng zhuāng chū shàng liú shè huì jiē céng de yàng zi。
english: Although she was poor, she was living in genteel poverty.

hanzi: 他同时具有创造性想象力和真正的治学谨严学风。
pinyin: tā tóng shí jù yǒu chuàng zào xìng xiǎng xiàng lì huò zhēn zhèng de zhì xué jǐn yán xué fēng。
english: He combines creative imagination and true scholarship.

hanzi: 倘使你不发一言，就不会被要求重复再讲一遍了。
pinyin: tǎng shǐ nǐ bù fà yī yán， jiù bù huì bèi yāo qiú chóng fù zài jiǎng yī biàn le。
english: If you do not say anything, you will not be called on to repeat it.

hanzi: 小女孩凝视着在篮子里互相翻来滚去的小猫。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái níng shì zhuó zài lán zi lǐ hù xiāng fān lái gǔn qù de xiǎo māo。
english: The little girl stared at the little cats tumbling over each other in their basket.

hanzi: 他们将逐步积累起一批内容多样，比例适当的词汇。
pinyin: tā men jiàng zhú bù jī lěi qǐ yī pī nèi róng duō yàng， bǐ lì shì dàng de cí huì。
english: Gradually they will build up a varied, well-balanced vocabulary.

hanzi: 那位体贴的丈夫对妻子的关怀使她感觉很不高兴。
pinyin: nà wèi tǐ tiē de zhàng fu duì qī zi de guān huái shǐ tā gǎn jué hěn bù gāo xìng。
english: The solicitude of the caring husband for his wife made her feel unhappy.

hanzi: 能挣钱并不一定是衡量人生幸福的可靠标准.
pinyin: néng zhèng qián bìng bù yī dìng shì héng liang rén shēng xìng fú de kě kào biāo zhǔn.
english: Success in making money is not always a good criterion of success in life.

hanzi: 经理企图以解雇来威胁，迫使职工更卖力气。
pinyin: jīng lǐ qǐ tú yǐ jiě gù lái wēi xié， pò shǐ zhí gōng gèng mài lì qì。
english: The manager tried to bully his men into working harder by threatening them with dismissal.

hanzi: 查尔斯的新工作要求不能提早下班，他下班必须打卡。
pinyin: zhā ěr sī de xīn gōng zuò yāo qiú bù néng tí zǎo xià bān， tā xià bān bì xū dǎ qiǎ。
english: Charles can't leave early in his new job;he has to ring out.

hanzi: 这些大森林的毁坏会带来生态上的严重后果。
pinyin: zhè xie dà sēn lín de huǐ huài kuài dài lái shēng tài shàng de yán zhòng hòu guǒ。
english: The destruction of these big forests could have serious ecological consequences.

hanzi: 如果你在一个月以内偿还的话，我乐意借给你钱。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zài yī gè yuè yǐ nèi cháng huán de huà， wǒ lè yì jiè jǐ nǐ qián。
english: I do not mind lending you the money provided you pay it back within a month.

hanzi: 戴着皮护手套的摩托车手们正在等待比赛开始。
pinyin: dài zhuó pí hù shǒu tào de mó tuō chē shǒu men zhèng zài děng dài bǐ sài kāi shǐ。
english: Motorcyclists with leather gauntlets are waiting for the start of the game.

hanzi: 他目送着列车驶去，直到它成了远方的一个小黑点。
pinyin: tā mù sòng zhuó liè chē shǐ qù， zhí dào tā chéng le yuǎn fāng de yī gè xiǎo hēi diǎn。
english: He watched the train away until it was only a dot in the distance.

hanzi: 哪怕是出了再小的差错，老板也会对他横加斥责。
pinyin: nǎ pà shì chū le zài xiǎo de chā cuò， lǎo bǎn yě kuài duì tā hèng jiā chì zé。
english: His boss will jump on every little mistake he makes, no matter how trivial.

hanzi: 两国之间存在着涉及那个岛屿归属的领土争端。
pinyin: liǎng guó zhī jiān cún zài zhuó shè jí nèi gè dǎo yǔ guī shǔ de lǐng tǔ zhēng duān。
english: The two countries had a territorial dispute over which one owned the island.

hanzi: 该镇未采取适当的防洪措施, 现在吃到了苦头.
pinyin: gāi zhèn wèi cǎi qǔ shì dàng de fáng hóng cuò shī,  xiàn zài jí dào le kǔ tou.
english: The town is now counting the cost of its failure to provide adequate flood protection.

hanzi: 原始人用尖石块和兽骨为自己制作原始的工具。
pinyin: yuán shǐ rén yòng jiān shí kuài huò shòu gǔ wèi zì jǐ zhì zuò yuán shǐ de gōng jù。
english: Primitive man made himself primitive tools from sharp stones and animal bones.

hanzi: 人类，是一堆可以随意拆卸的铅管零件的巧妙装配。
pinyin: rén lèi， shì yī duī kě yǐ suí yì chāi xiè de qiān guǎn líng jiàn de qiǎo miào zhuāng pèi。
english: A human being is an ingenious assembly of portable plumbing.

hanzi: 把路上的耽搁算进去, 你要用半小时才能到车站.
pinyin: bǎ lù shang de dān ge suàn jìn qù,  nǐ yào yòng bàn xiǎo shí cái néng dào chē zhàn.
english: It will take you half an hour to get to the station, allowing for traffic delays.

hanzi: 有些职员要被解雇，不过请放心，你不在此列。
pinyin: yǒu xiē zhí yuán yào bèi jiě gù， bù guò qǐng fàng xīn， nǐ bù zài cǐ liè。
english: Some of our staff are to be dismissed, but I hasten to add you won't be among them.

hanzi: 他是个优秀的运动员，他所有的动作都非常协调。
pinyin: tā shì gè yōu xiù de yùn dòng yuán， tā suǒ yǒu de dòng zuò dōu fēi cháng xié tiáo。
english: He is an excellent athlete; all his movements are perfectly coordinated.

hanzi: 这个党竭力装出一付关心工人阶级的新形象.
pinyin: zhè gè dǎng jié lì zhuāng chū yī fù guān xīn gōng rén jiē jí de xīn xíng xiàng.
english: The party is trying to project a new image of itself as caring for the working classes.

hanzi: 有些职员要被解雇，不过请放心，你不在此列。
pinyin: yǒu xiē zhí yuán yào bèi jiě gù， bù guò qǐng fàng xīn， nǐ bù zài cǐ liè。
english: Some of our staff are to be dismissed, but I hasten to add you won't be among them.

hanzi: 这地方由原来的渔港发展成一个繁荣的旅游胜地.
pinyin: zhè dì fang yóu yuán lái de yú gǎng fā zhǎn chéng yī gè fán róng de lu:3 yóu shèng dì.
english: The place has developed from a fishing port into a thriving tourist centre.

hanzi: 这个战场被视为圣地以纪念战死在这里的战士。
pinyin: zhè gè zhàn chǎng bèi shì wéi shèng dì yǐ jì niàn zhàn sǐ zài zhè lǐ de zhàn shì。
english: This battle field is consecrated to the memory of the soldiers who died here.

hanzi: 这个党竭力装出一付关心工人阶级的新形象.
pinyin: zhè gè dǎng jié lì zhuāng chū yī fù guān xīn gōng rén jiē jí de xīn xíng xiàng.
english: The party is trying to project a new image of itself as caring for the working classes.

hanzi: 如果班上的人数多，老师就不能给予个别辅导了。
pinyin: rú guǒ bān shàng de rén shù duō， lǎo shī jiù bù néng gěi yǔ gè bié fǔ dǎo le。
english: A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.

hanzi: 出于个人利益考虑, 男子开始介入女子的工作领域。
pinyin: chū yú gè rén lì yì kǎo lu:4,  nán zǐ kāi shǐ jiè rù nu:3 zǐ de gōng zuò lǐng yù。
english: Men begin to enter female jobs out of consideration for personal interest.

hanzi: 一个见习技术员被建筑物上落下的一块石头砸着了。
pinyin: yī gè xiàn xí jì shù yuán bèi jiàn zhù wù shàng luò xià de yī kuài shí tou zá zhuó le。
english: A technician on probation was hit by a piece of falling masonry.

hanzi: 出于个人利益考虑, 男子开始介入女子的工作领域。
pinyin: chū yú gè rén lì yì kǎo lu:4,  nán zǐ kāi shǐ jiè rù nu:3 zǐ de gōng zuò lǐng yù。
english: Men begin to enter female jobs out of consideration for personal interest.

hanzi: 堤岸，小路高出的堤岸或小路，如沿着一条沟渠的堤岸或小路
pinyin: dī àn， xiǎo lù gāo chū de dī àn huò xiǎo lù， rú yán zhe yī tiáo gōu qú de dī àn huò xiǎo lù
english: A raised bank or path, such as one along a canal.

hanzi: 这场争论对我来说太深奥了，我一点都搞不明白。
pinyin: zhè chǎng zhēng lùn duì wǒ lái shuō tài shēn ào le， wǒ yī diǎn dōu gǎo bù míng bái。
english: The argument was too intellectual for me; I couldn't follow a word of it.

hanzi: 这两个反对党达成了一项关于在选举中进行合作的协议。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè fǎn duì dǎng dá chéng le yí xiàng guān yú zài xuǎn jǔ zhòng jìn xíng hé zuò de xié yì。
english: The two opposition parties made an electoral pact.

hanzi: 咱们去参观一下这个地方，譬如说明天或是后天去。
pinyin: zán men qù cān guān yī xià zhè gè dì fang， pì rú shuō míng tiān huò shì hòu tiān qù。
english: Let's go and visit the place, say tomorrow or the day after tomorrow.

hanzi: 他是个优秀的运动员，他所有的动作都非常协调。
pinyin: tā shì gè yōu xiù de yùn dòng yuán， tā suǒ yǒu de dòng zuò dōu fēi cháng xié tiáo。
english: He is an excellent athlete; all his movements are perfectly coordinated.

hanzi: 把全部家具都塞进那个小房间是很费了一番心思的。
pinyin: bǎ quán bù jiā jù dōu sè jìn nèi gè xiǎo fáng jiān shì hěn fèi le yī pān xīn si de。
english: It took some ingenuity to squeeze all the furniture into the little room.

hanzi: 通货膨胀率可能上升。如果是这样，物价就会上涨。
pinyin: tōng huò péng zhàng shuài kě néng shàng shēng。 rú guǒ shì zhè yàng， wù jià jiù kuài shàng zhǎng。
english: Inflation may be rising, if (it is) so, prices will go up.

hanzi: 船处于顶风位置的风以阻碍船只前进的方式推动
pinyin: chuán chǔ yú dǐng fēng wèi zhi de fēng yǐ zǔ ài chuán zhī qián jìn de fāng shì tuī dòng
english: In such a way that the wind pushes against the forward side of a sail or sails.

hanzi: 我动手搬那些瓷制饰物，但在移动时摔了一只花瓶。
pinyin: wǒ dòng shǒu bān nà xiē cí zhì shì wù， dàn zài yí dòng shí shuāi le yī zhǐ huā píng。
english: I started moving the china ornaments but dropped a vase in the process.

hanzi: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。
pinyin: gān hàn shào yǔ shǐ yuán běn jiù hěn yán zhòng de liáng shi duǎn quē wèn tí gèng jiā yán zhòng。
english: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

hanzi: 医生定期到这家进行拜访，检查婴儿有没有问题。
pinyin: yī shēng dìng qī dào zhè jiā jìn xíng bài fǎng， jiǎn chá yīng ér yǒu méi yǒu wèn tí。
english: The doctor made periodic visit to the house to see if the baby was all right.

hanzi: 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材。
pinyin: jié mù shè jí zòng liú xíng yīn yuè dào jīng jù zhè yàng xíng xíng shǎi shǎi de tí cái。
english: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.

hanzi: 他们拒绝同恐怖分子做交易，以免原则受到损害。
pinyin: tā men jù jué tóng kǒng bù fèn zǐ zuò jiāo yì， yǐ miǎn yuán zé shòu dào sǔn hài。
english: They refused to compromise their principles by doing a deal with the terrorists.

hanzi: 某一时期的文学可反映出该时期的价值观念和审美观念.
pinyin: mǒu yī shí qī de wén xué kě fǎn yìng chū gāi shí qī de jià zhí guān niàn huò shěn měi guān niàn.
english: The literature of a period reflects its values and tastes.

hanzi: 他们拒绝同恐怖分子做交易，以免原则受到损害。
pinyin: tā men jù jué tóng kǒng bù fèn zǐ zuò jiāo yì， yǐ miǎn yuán zé shòu dào sǔn hài。
english: They refused to compromise their principles by doing a deal with the terrorists.

hanzi: 他在办公室里老是目不转睛地盯著我，真把我气坏了。
pinyin: tā zài bàn gōng shì lǐ lǎo shi mù bù zhuàn jīng de dīng著 wǒ， zhēn bǎ wǒ qì huài le。
english: I'm extremely annoyed at the way he always stares at me in the office.

hanzi: 很难弄清楚他们那套官僚体制全部细微的层次分别。
pinyin: hěn nàn nòng qīng chǔ tā men nà tào guān liáo tǐ zhì quán bù xì wēi de céng cì fēn bié。
english: It was hard to understand all the minute gradations of their bureaucracy.

hanzi: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。
pinyin: gān hàn shào yǔ shǐ yuán běn jiù hěn yán zhòng de liáng shi duǎn quē wèn tí gèng jiā yán zhòng。
english: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

hanzi: 国民财富在很大程度上取决于一个国家的教育水准。
pinyin: guó mín cái fù zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng qǔ jué yú yī gè guó jiā de jiào yù shuǐ zhǔn。
english: National wealth depends to a high degree on a country's educational standard.

hanzi: 他是优秀的学生, 正因为这个缘故, 全班都不喜欢他.
pinyin: tā shì yōu xiù de xué sheng,  zhèng yīn wèi zhè gè yuán gù,  quán bān dōu bù xǐ huan tā.
english: He was an outstanding pupil and, ipso facto, disliked by the rest of the class.

hanzi: 协议中有一条规定, 承租人负担建筑物的修理费.
pinyin: xié yì zhòng yǒu yī tiáo guī dìng,  chéng zū rén fù dān jiàn zhù wù de xiū lǐ fèi.
english: A clause in the agreement provides that the tenant shall pay for repairs to the building.

hanzi: 男孩子大学毕业后开始赚钱时，便可独立生活了。
pinyin: nán hái zǐ dà xué bì yè hòu kāi shǐ zhuàn qián shí， pián kě dú lì shēng huó le。
english: When a boy leaves college and begins to earn money he can live a life of independence.

hanzi: 起初她威胁要解雇我们所有的人，但是后来她态度软化了。
pinyin: qǐ chū tā wēi xié yào jiě gù wǒ men suǒ yǒu de rén， dàn shì hòu lái tā tài du ruǎn huà le。
english: At first she threatened to dismiss us all, but later she relented.

hanzi: 抵抗运动开展了一场反对殖民统治者的恐怖活动。
pinyin: dǐ kàng yùn dòng kāi zhǎn le yī chǎng fǎn duì zhí mín tǒng zhì zhē de kǒng bù huó dòng。
english: The resistance movement started a campaign of terror against the colonial rulers.

hanzi: 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。
pinyin: jīng guò lián xù jǐ cì de shī bài， tā zuì hòu zhōng yú tōng guò le jià shǐ kǎo shì。
english: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

hanzi: 他坐在史密斯太太的旁边，他的视线落在她女儿的身上。
pinyin: tā zuò zài shǐ mì sī tài tai de páng biān， tā de shì xiàn luò zài tā nu:3 ér de shēn shàng。
english: He was sitting next to Mrs. Smith, his eyes resting on her daughter.

hanzi: 他们支持日本接管德国以前在山东省的所有权益。
pinyin: tā men zhī chí Rì běn jiē guǎn Dé guó yǐ qián zài shān dōng shěng de suǒ yǒu quán yì。
english: They supported Japan's take over of all the former German interests in Shandong Province.

hanzi: 当前的贸易赤字表明我们的进出口贸易严重失调.
pinyin: dāng qián de mào yì chì zì biǎo míng wǒ men de jìn chū kǒu mào yì yán zhòng shī tiáo.
english: The current trade deficit indicates a serious imbalance between our import and export trade.

hanzi: 我们的豆腐生产线是世界上最为先进的，久负盛名。
pinyin: wǒ men de dòu fu shēng chǎn xiàn shì shì jiè shàng zuì wéi xiān jìn de， jiǔ fù shèng míng。
english: Our bean curd processing line is the most advanced and well- know in the world.

hanzi: 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁。
pinyin: mǎ lù shàng lái wàng de chē liàng shēng yīn bù duàn de pò huài wǒ men jiā de ān níng。
english: The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home.

hanzi: 战争给无辜的人民带来的痛苦不是金钱可以补偿的。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng jǐ wú gū de rén mín dài lái de tòng kǔ bú shì jīn qián kě yǐ bǔ cháng de。
english: The suffering of innocent people caused by the war cannot be compensated for by money.

hanzi: 他平安的消息到达她那里之前，那段时间似乎是无限漫长的。
pinyin: tā píng ān de xiāo xi dào dá tā nà li zhī qián， nà duàn shí jiān sì hu shì wú xiàn màn cháng de。
english: It seemed an eternity before news of his safety reached her.

hanzi: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn jiè cǐ jī huì gǎn xiè měi yī wèi wèi zhè gè xiàng mù xīn qín gōng zuò de rén。
english: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

hanzi: 对于这项建议，五人投票赞成，八人反对，两人弃权。
pinyin: duì yú zhè xiàng jiàn yì， wǔ rén tóu piào zàn chéng， bā rén fǎn duì， liǎng rén qì quán。
english: Five members voted for the proposal, eight voted against, and two abstained.

hanzi: 陪审团的全体成员，你们现在必须退下去考虑应如何裁决。
pinyin: péi shěn tuán de quán tǐ chéng yuán， nǐ men xiàn zài bì xū tuì xià qu kǎo lu:4 yìng rú hé cái jué。
english: Members of the jury, you must now retire to consider your verdict.

hanzi: 我们原计划去游览，但后来汽车出了故障，没有去成。
pinyin: wǒ men yuán jì huà qù yóu lǎn， dàn hòu lái qì chē chū le gù zhàng， méi yǒu qù chéng。
english: They made plans for a visit, but subsequent difficulties with the car prevented it.

hanzi: 流行歌曲的爱好者纷纷从四面八方向音乐会的举办地点聚集.
pinyin: liú xíng gē qǔ de ài hào zhě fēn fēn zòng sì miàn bā fāng xiàng yīn yuè huì de jǔ bàn dì diǎn jù jí.
english: Pop fans are homing in on the concert site from miles around.

hanzi: 摩飞回顾他早年的奋斗，使他觉得生命特别充满生气。
pinyin: mó fēi huí gù tā zǎo nián de fèn dòu， shǐ tā jué de shēng mìng tè bié chōng mǎn shēng qì。
english: Murphy looked back on his early struggles as having made him feel especially alive.

hanzi: 他料到自己的作品总归要受到批判，所以总是以攻为守。
pinyin: tā liào dào zì jǐ de zuò pǐn zǒng guī yào shòu dào pī pàn， suǒ yǐ zǒng shì yǐ gōng wèi shǒu。
english: He's always expecting criticism of his work, so he's always on the offensive.

hanzi: 以下是他在华府所发表的那篇著名的演讲中的一些摘录。
pinyin: yǐ xià shì tā zài huá fǔ suǒ fā biǎo de nà piān著 míng de yǎn jiǎng zhòng dì yī xiē zhāi lù。
english: What follows is some excerpts of the famous speech he delivered in Washington D.C.

hanzi: 匆匆忙忙地大批量生产的自行车无法达到我们的一般标准。
pinyin: cōng cōng máng máng de dà pī liàng shēng chǎn de zì xíng chē wú fǎ dá dào wǒ men de yì bān biāo zhǔn。
english: These bicycles have been rushed out and not up to our usual standard.

hanzi: 以下是他在华府所发表的那篇著名的演讲中的一些摘录。
pinyin: yǐ xià shì tā zài huá fǔ suǒ fā biǎo de nà piān著 míng de yǎn jiǎng zhòng dì yī xiē zhāi lù。
english: What follows is some excerpts of the famous speech he delivered in Washington D.C.

hanzi: 蚊子会吸我们的血。更糟的是，它会把毒注入我们的体内。
pinyin: wén zi kuài xī wǒ men de xuè。 gèng zāo de shì， tā kuài bǎ dú zhù rù wǒ men de tǐ nèi。
english: The mosquito will suck our blood. What's even worse, it will inject poison into our bodies.

hanzi: 自从岛上蚊子被消灭后，那儿成了更加美好的居住地。
pinyin: zì cóng dǎo shàng wén zi bèi xiāo miè hòu， nà r chéng le gèng jiā měi hǎo de jū zhù de。
english: Since the mosquitoes were killed off, the island has become a far pleasanter place to live in.

hanzi: 在她被接受为固定雇员之前经过了三个月的试用期。
pinyin: zài tā bèi jiē shòu wèi gù dìng gù yuán zhī qián jīng guò le sān gè yuè de shì yòng qī。
english: He was taken on for a three-month trial period before being accepted as a permanent member of staff.

hanzi: 他仅把结婚当作达到目的的手段, 他只是想要妻子的财产.
pinyin: tā jǐn bǎ jié hūn dàng zuò dá dào mù dì de shǒu duàn,  tā zhǐ shì xiǎng yào qī zi de cái chǎn.
english: He regarded his marriage merely as a means to an end: he just wanted his wife's wealth.

hanzi: 史密斯先生不想因坚持按市价购进而失去做买卖的机会。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiān sheng bù xiǎng yīn jiān chí àn shì jià gòu jìn ér shī qù zuò mǎi mài de jī huì。
english: Mr Smith did not want to lose his market by sticking to having it at the market price.

hanzi: 短期内我们会赔钱，但从长远看，利润将会是丰厚的。
pinyin: duǎn qī nèi wǒ men kuài péi qián， dàn zòng cháng yuǎn kàn， lì rùn jiāng huì shì fēng hòu de。
english: In the short term we will lose money, but in the long term the profits will be very large.

hanzi: 生病是糟糕的，而这种情形没有一种疾病比癌症更为糟糕。
pinyin: shēng bìng shì zāo gāo de， ér zhè zhǒng qíng xing méi yǒu yī zhòng jí bìng bì ái zhèng gèng wèi zāo gāo。
english: It is bad to get ill, and with no disease is it worse than with cancer.

hanzi: 我的判断经常出错，但是我对祖国的忠诚是无可置疑的。
pinyin: wǒ de pàn duàn jīng cháng chū cuò， dàn shì wǒ duì zǔ guó de zhōng chéng shì wú kě zhì yí de。
english: My judgement was frequently faulty, but my loyalty to the nation could not be questioned.

hanzi: 他对自己那本书的手稿先进行校订，然后才把它交给出版社。
pinyin: tā duì zì jǐ nà běn shū de shǒu gǎo xiān jìn xìng jiào dìng， rán hòu cái bǎ tā jiāo gěi chū bǎn shè。
english: He revised the manuscript of his book before sending it to the publisher.

hanzi: 因为长时间的干旱，农民们对于好收成的前景是怀疑的。
pinyin: yīn wèi zhǎng shí jiān de gān hàn， nóng mín men duì yú hào shōu cheng de qián jǐng shì huái yí de。
english: Because of a long drought, the farmers are doubtful about the prospect of a good yield.

hanzi: 警察因麦克超速行驶而将他拦下，但警告了他一下就将他放了。
pinyin: jǐng chá yīn mài kè chāo sù xíng shǐ ér jiàng tā lán xià， dàn jǐng gào le tā yī xià jiù jiàng tā fàng le。
english: The police stopped Mike for speeding but let him off with a caution.

hanzi: 当太阳横过西方的海面时，对着东方留下他的最后的敬礼。
pinyin: dàng tài yáng héng guò xī fāng de hǎi miàn shí， duì zhuó dōng fāng liú xià tā de zuì hòu de jìng lǐ。
english: The sun goes to cross the Western sea, leaving its last salutation to the East.

hanzi: 当他穿着全套大礼服露面的时候，显得和整个场合很不协调。
pinyin: dàng tā chuān zhuó quán tào dà lǐ fú lòu miàn de shí hou， xiǎn de huò zhěng gè chǎng hé hěn bù xié tiáo。
english: He looked rather out of place when he turned up in full ceremonial rig.

hanzi: 许多杂志发表了由俄国航天探测器获得的有关金星的信息。
pinyin: xǔ duō zá zhì fā biǎo le yóu E2 guó háng tiān tàn cè qì huò dé de yǒu guān jīn xīng de xìn xī。
english: Information about Venus obtained by Russian probes has been published on some magazines.

hanzi: 我指出那方案的缺点, 但他申辩说各项计划尚未完成.
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ chū nà fāng àn de quē diǎn,  dàn tā shēn biàn shuō gè xiàng jì huà shàng wèi wán chéng.
english: I pointed out the shortcomings of the scheme, but he countered that the plans were not yet finished.

hanzi: 最好的队员都投奔大俱乐部去了，留给他们这些不怎么样的球员。
pinyin: zuì hǎo de duì yuán dōu tóu bēn dà jù yuè bù qù le， liú jǐ tā men zhè xie bù zěn me yàng de qiú yuán。
english: The best players have gone off to the big clubs, leaving them the dross.

hanzi: 就连你所能想到的最壮的人也不能光用手就将木头撕裂。
pinyin: jiù lián nǐ suǒ néng xiǎng dào de zuì zhuàng de rén yě bù néng guāng yòng shǒu jiù jiàng mù tou sī liè。
english: The strongest man (that) you can think of cannot tear the log apart with bare hands.

hanzi: 在音乐家的脑海里，一组稍纵即逝的音符逐渐形成一个曲调。
pinyin: zài yīn yuè jiā de nǎo hǎi lǐ， yī zǔ shāo zòng jí shì de yīn fú zhú jiàn xíng chéng yī gè qǔ tiáo。
english: In the musician's mind a fugitive set of notes began slowly to form into a tune.

hanzi: 爱护主义，对大部分人来说，只不过是害怕不公正所苦罢了。
pinyin: ài hù zhǔ yì， duì dà bù fen rén lái shuō， zhǐ bù guò shì hài pà bù gōng zhèng suǒ kǔ bà le。
english: The love of justice be, in most men, nothing more than the fear of suffering injustice.

hanzi: 我们有些人非常重视安宁与舒适，有些人重视快乐与刺激。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu xiē rén fēi cháng zhòng shì ān níng yù shū shì， yǒu xiē rén zhòng shì kuài lè yù cì jī。
english: Some of us value peace and comfort very highly. Others value pleasure and excitement.

hanzi: 马克是个不听话的孩子, 我看他们现在对他的培养方面做得不错.
pinyin: mǎ kè shì gè bù tīng huà de hái zi,  wǒ kàn tā men xiàn zài duì tā de péi yǎng fāng miàn zuò de bù cuò.
english: Mark's a difficult child and I think they're making a good job of bringing him up.

hanzi: 这些被警察抓住的犯罪分子只是些小鱼，他们的头子却跑掉了。
