pinyin: zhè xie bèi jǐng chá zhuā zhù de fàn zuì fèn zǐ zhǐ shì xiē xiǎo yú， tā men de tóu zi què pǎo diào le。
english: These criminals arrested by the police are only minnows, their leader has escaped.

hanzi: 抗毒素是抵抗有毒物质并防止其产生有害作用的物质。
pinyin: kàng dú sù shì dǐ kàng yǒu dú wù zhì bìng fáng zhǐ qí chǎn shēng yǒu hài zuò yòng de wù zhì。
english: Antitoxin is substance that acts against a poisonous substance and prevents it from having a harmful effect.

hanzi: 抗毒素是抵抗有毒物质并防止其产生有害作用的物质。
pinyin: kàng dú sù shì dǐ kàng yǒu dú wù zhì bìng fáng zhǐ qí chǎn shēng yǒu hài zuò yòng de wù zhì。
english: Antitoxin is substance that acts against a poisonous substance and prevents it from having a harmful effect.

hanzi: 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。
pinyin: tā men tán dào rén men rú hé zài zhèng zhì wèn tí shàng shǐ yòng jí làn yòng shù zì lái hùn xiáo shì tìng。
english: They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics.

hanzi: 这位推销员干得非常成功，到后来，他脱离公司自行开业。
pinyin: zhè wèi tuī xiāo yuán gàn de fēi cháng chéng gōng， dào hòu lái， tā tuō lí gōng sī zì xíng kāi yè。
english: The salesman was so successful that in the end he hived from the firm into his own business.

hanzi: 在珠宝饰物的制造中，手工与艺术的结合决定了珠宝的价值。
pinyin: zài zhū bǎo shì wù de zhì zào zhòng， shǒu gōng yù yì shù de jié hé jué dìng le zhū bǎo de jià zhí。
english: The conjunction of workmanship and artistry in making jewelry decides the value of the jewelry.

hanzi: 在珠宝饰物的制造中，手工与艺术的结合决定了珠宝的价值。
pinyin: zài zhū bǎo shì wù de zhì zào zhòng， shǒu gōng yù yì shù de jié hé jué dìng le zhū bǎo de jià zhí。
english: The conjunction of workmanship and artistry in making jewelry decides the value of the jewelry.

hanzi: 部长在公开发表言论时比他在私下批评时的调子要缓和一点儿。
pinyin: bù zhǎng zài gōng kāi fā biǎo yán lùn shí bì tā zài sī xià pī píng shí de diào zǐ yào huǎn hé yī diǎnr。
english: In his public statement the minister toned down his criticisms he had made in private.

hanzi: 那只外星来的宇宙飞船在公园上空盘旋了一会儿之后就不见了。
pinyin: nà zhǐ wài xīng lái de yǔ zhòu fēi chuán zài gōng yuán shàng kōng pán xuán le yī huìr zhī hòu jiù bù jiàn le。
english: After the alien spacecraft had hovered over the park for a short time, it vanished.

hanzi: 利用权力压服别人并非永远是上策, 运用说服方法或许更为可取.
pinyin: lì yòng quán lì yà fú bié rén bìng fēi yǒng yuǎn shì shàng cè,  yùn yòng shuō fú fāng fǎ huò xǔ gèng wèi kě qǔ.
english: Exertion of authority over others is not always wise; persuasion may be better.

hanzi: 这家商店起初只出售报纸和杂志，后来又增售青少年读物。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn qǐ chū zhǐ chū shòu bào zhǐ huò zá zhì， hòu lái yòu zēng shòu qīng shào nián dú wù。
english: At first this shop sold newspapers and magazines only, but it has since put in juvenile books.

hanzi: 一旦迈克采取了防卫态度，就很难使他相信没有什么可怕的。
pinyin: yī dàn mài kè cǎi qǔ le fáng wèi tài du， jiù hěn nàn shǐ tā xiāng xìn méi yǒu shén me kě pà de。
english: Once Mike's taken up a defensive attitude, it's difficult to persuade him that's nothing to be afraid of.

hanzi: 任何人如帮助敌人危害本国，他的生命财产便被国家没收。
pinyin: rèn hé rén rú bāng zhù dí rén wēi hài běn guó， tā de shēng mìng cái chǎn pián bèi guó jiā mò shōu。
english: If man put his country in danger by helping the enemy, his life and possessions were forfeit to the crown.

hanzi: 假如我再容忍你下去的话，我可能会一步步退化至成为老婆也未可知。
pinyin: jiǎ rú wǒ zài róng rěn nǐ xià qu de huà， wǒ kě néng kuài yí bù bù tuì huà zhì chéng wéi lǎo pó yě wèi kě zhī。
english: If I continue to endure you a little longer, I may by degrees dwindle into a wife.

hanzi: 一天的这段时间有数以百万计的职工从工厂和办公场所涌向街头.
pinyin: yī tiān de zhè duàn shí jiān yǒu shuò yǐ bǎi wàn jì de zhí gōng zòng gōng chǎng huò bàn gōng chǎng suǒ yǒng xiàng jiē tóu.
english: The shops and offices pour millions of workers into the street at this time of day.

hanzi: 我们当初若是稍微再多考虑一下, 也许就能买到我们真正想要的房子了.
pinyin: wǒ men dāng chū ruò shì shāo wēi zài duō kǎo lu:4 yī xià,  yě xǔ jiù néng mǎi dào wǒ men zhēn zhèng xiǎng yào de fáng zi le.
english: With a little more forethought we could have bought the house we really wanted.

hanzi: 勾搭上的人随便结识的陌生人，通常是在期望性关系中结识的人
pinyin: gòu dā shàng de rén suí biàn jié zhì de mò shēng rén， tōng cháng shì zài qī wàng xìng guān xi zhòng jié zhì de rén
english: A stranger with whom casual acquaintance is made, usually in anticipation of sexual relations.

hanzi: 他活动于社交甚严的社交圈内，而且属于那些最不愿吸收外人的俱乐部。
pinyin: tā huó dòng yú shè jiāo shèn yán de shè jiāo quān nèi， ér qiě shǔ yú nà xiē zuì bù yuàn xī shōu wài rén de jù yuè bù。
english: He moves in exclusive social circles and belongs to the most exclusive clubs.

hanzi: 飞船驾驶员，气球驾驶员轻于空气的航空器，例如气球的驾驶员或导航员
pinyin: fēi chuán jià shǐ yuán， qì qiú jià shǐ yuán qīng yú kōng qì de háng kōng qì， lì rú qì qiú de jià shǐ yuán huò dǎo háng yuán
english: A pilot or navigator of a lighter-than-air craft, such as a balloon.

hanzi: 我们当初若是稍微再多考虑一下, 也许就能买到我们真正想要的房子了.
pinyin: wǒ men dāng chū ruò shì shāo wēi zài duō kǎo lu:4 yī xià,  yě xǔ jiù néng mǎi dào wǒ men zhēn zhèng xiǎng yào de fáng zi le.
english: With a little more forethought we could have bought the house we really wanted.

hanzi: 那一群说三道四的常客们聚集在小酒店里，议论那对医生夫妇。
pinyin: nà yī qún shuō sān dào sì de cháng kè men jù jí zài xiǎo jiǔ diàn lǐ， yì lùn nà duì yī shēng fū fù。
english: The regulars are holding a mother's meeting down at the pub to discuss the news about the doctor and his wife.

hanzi: 销售开始下跌，公司财务不久便出现赤字，他们只得把那幢大楼卖掉。
pinyin: xiāo shòu kāi shǐ xià diē， gōng sī cái wù bù jiǔ pián chū xiàn chì zì， tā men zhǐ dé bǎ nà chuáng dà lóu mài diào。
english: Sales began to drop and the company was soon in the red. They had to sell the building.

hanzi: 他活动于社交甚严的社交圈内，而且属于那些最不愿吸收外人的俱乐部。
pinyin: tā huó dòng yú shè jiāo shèn yán de shè jiāo quān nèi， ér qiě shǔ yú nà xiē zuì bù yuàn xī shōu wài rén de jù yuè bù。
english: He moves in exclusive social circles and belongs to the most exclusive clubs.

hanzi: 我们的商行正处在十字路口，倘若此番交易不能成功，我们将会破产。
pinyin: wǒ men de shāng xìng zhèng chù zài shí zì lù kǒu， tǎng ruò cǐ pān jiāo yì bù néng chéng gōng， wǒ men jiāng huì pò chǎn。
english: Our business is at the crossing, if this deal does not succeed, we shall be bankrupt.

hanzi: 柱廊有由圆柱支撑房顶的门廊或走道，通常通往建筑物的入口处
pinyin: zhù láng yǒu yóu yuán zhù zhī chēng fáng dǐng de mén láng huò zǒu dào， tōng cháng tōng wàng jiàn zhù wù de rù kǒu chù
english: A porch or walkway with a roof supported by columns, often leading to the entrance of a building.

hanzi: 大都市外面的生活步调往往是缓慢得多，这在其他国家也是真的那样。
pinyin: dà dū shì wài mian de shēng huó bù diào wǎng wǎng shì huǎn màn de duō， zhè zài qí tā guó jiā yě shì zhēn de nà yàng。
english: Often life is much slower outside the big cities, as is true in other countries as well.

hanzi: 另外一些人认为应该开辟更多的公交路线，因为公共汽车载客多。
pinyin: lìng wài yī xiē rén rèn wéi yīng gāi kāi pì gèng duō de gōng jiāo lù xiàn， yīn wèi gōng gòng qì chē zài kè duō。
english: Others argue that more bus routes should be opened up because buses can accommodate more passengers.

hanzi: 贵市史密斯公司希望与本公司开展交易，指定贵处为信用出证人。
pinyin: guì shì shǐ mì sī gōng sī xī wàng yù běn gōng sī kāi zhǎn jiāo yì， zhǐ dìng guì chù wèi xìn yòng chū zhèng ren。
english: Mr. smith co., of your city, desire to open an account with us, and have give us your name as a reference.

hanzi: 有关方面就我的婚姻状况以及银行存款余额对我进行了详细的调查.
pinyin: yǒu guān fāng miàn jiù wǒ de hūn yīn zhuàng kuàng yǐ jí yín háng cún kuǎn yú é duì wǒ jìn xíng le xiáng xì de diào chá.
english: I was subjected to a lengthy inquisition into the state of my marriage and the size of my bank balance.

hanzi: 搭连主墙有一斜屋顶的构造，边接在建筑物侧面作为侧厅或延伸物
pinyin: dā lián zhǔ qiáng yǒu yī xié wū dǐng de gòu zào， biān jiē zài jiàn zhù wù cè miàn zuò wéi zhāi tīng huò yán shēn wù
english: A structure with a single-pitch roof that is attached to the side of a building as a wing or an extension.

hanzi: 我宁愿照顾活人的肚子，也不愿以石碑的形式来照顾死者的荣耀。
pinyin: wǒ nìng yuàn zhào gu huó rén de dù zi， yě bù yuàn yǐ shí bēi de xíng shì lái zhào gu sǐ zhě de róng yào。
english: I'd rather take care of the stomachs of the living than (take care of) the glory of the dead in the form of stone memorials.

hanzi: 坏死因创伤或疾病引起的细胞或组织的死亡，尤其指身体局部面积的坏死
pinyin: huài sǐ yīn chuāng shāng huò jí bìng yǐn qǐ de xì bāo huò zǔ zhī de sǐ wáng， yóu qí zhǐ shēn tǐ jú bù miàn ji de huài sǐ
english: Death of cells or tissues through injury or disease, especially in a localized area of the body.

hanzi: 我买了一本关于神权自使徒传至教皇及其他主教的一脉相承的书。
pinyin: wǒ mǎi le yī běn guān yú shén quán zì shǐ tú zhuàn zhì jiào huáng jí qí tā zhǔ jiào de yī mài xiàng chéng de shū。
english: I bought a book on the passing of spiritual authority from the apostles through successive popes and other bishops.

hanzi: 他们与雇主达成的协议是他们在工资方面降低要求, 但每周工时要缩短.
pinyin: tā men yù gù zhǔ dá chéng de xié yì shì tā men zài gōng zī fāng miàn jiàng dī yāo qiú,  dàn měi zhōu gōng shí yào suō duǎn.
english: The bargain they reached with their employers was to reduce their wage claim in return for a shorter working week.

hanzi: 他们与雇主达成的协议是他们在工资方面降低要求, 但每周工时要缩短.
pinyin: tā men yù gù zhǔ dá chéng de xié yì shì tā men zài gōng zī fāng miàn jiàng dī yāo qiú,  dàn měi zhōu gōng shí yào suō duǎn.
english: The bargain they reached with their employers was to reduce their wage claim in return for a shorter working week.

hanzi: 我得有经验才能找到工作, 可是没有工作我就无法获得经验--这真是个恶性循环.
pinyin: wǒ de yǒu jīng yàn cái néng zhǎo dào gōng zuò,  kě shì méi yǒu gōng zuò wǒ jiù wú fǎ huò dé jīng yàn-- zhè zhēn shì gè è xìng xún huán.
english: I need experience to get a job but without a job I can't get experience it's a vicious circle.

hanzi: 吊架一根从两根平行的绳子悬挂下来的水平的短棍，用于体育锻炼或杂技表演
pinyin: diào jià yī gēn zòng liǎng gēn píng xíng de shéng zi xuán guà xia lai de shuǐ píng de duǎn gùn， yòng yú tǐ yù duàn liàn huò zá jì biǎo yǎn
english: A short horizontal bar suspended from two parallel ropes, used for exercises or for acrobatic stunts.

hanzi: 所有权构成控制或处置财产或所有权的合法权力的所有要素同时符合的条件
pinyin: suǒ yǒu quán gòu chéng kòng zhì huò chǔ zhì cái chǎn huò suǒ yǒu quán de hé fǎ quán lì de suǒ yǒu yào sù tóng shí fú hé de tiáo jiàn
english: The coincidence of all the elements that constitute the fullest legal right to control and dispose of property or a claim.

hanzi: 其中之一就是允许地方教委在国家教学大纲的指导下选择合适自身的教材。
pinyin: qí zhōng zhī yī jiù shì yǔn xǔ dì fang jiào wěi zài guó jiā jiào xué dà gāng de zhǐ dǎo xià xuǎn zé hé shì zì shēn de jiào cái。
english: One of the reforms allows the local education department to choose their own textbooks based upon the national teaching guideline.

hanzi: 预先测试为衡量学生是否已有足够的准备去进行更高一级的学习而举行的初步考试
pinyin: yù xiān cè shì wèi héng liang xué sheng shì fǒu yǐ yǒu zú gòu de zhǔn bèi qù jìn xíng gèng gāo yī jí de xué xí ér jǔ xíng de chū bù kǎo shì
english: A preliminary test given to determine whether students are sufficiently prepared for a more advanced course of studies.

hanzi: 假使剥去了人们的衣服的话，到底彼此的阶级能够维持到什么程度，倒是一则有趣的问题。
pinyin: jiǎ shǐ bō qù le rén men de yī fu de huà， dào dǐ bǐ cǐ de jiē jí néng gòu wéi chí dào shén me chéng dù， dào shì yī zé yǒu qù de wèn tí。
english: It is an interesting question how far men will retain their relative rank if they were divest of their clothes.

hanzi: 什么也不能推动一个按钟头收费的人，对他的平静的心情来说，时间的消逝是多么甜蜜啊。
pinyin: shén me yě bù néng tuī dòng yī gè àn zhōng tóu shōu fèi de rén， duì tā de píng jìng de xīn qíng lái shuō， shí jiān de xiāo shì shì duō me tián mì a。
english: Nothing can move a man who is paid by the hour; how sweet the flight of time seem to his calm mind.

hanzi: 回针缝在先前缝的一针中间加缝的一针，以便使针脚的交错重叠为原来长度的一半
pinyin: huí zhēn fèng zài xiān qián fèng de yī zhēn zhōng jiān jiā fèng de yī zhēn， yǐ biàn shǐ zhēn jué de jiāo cuò chóng dié wèi yuán lái cháng dù de yī bàn
english: A stitch made by inserting the needle at the midpoint of a preceding stitch so that the stitches overlap by half lengths.

hanzi: 一接到敌人要来的消息，我们便纷纷将各自家里的东西打成包裹，连忙撤到附近的山里去了。
pinyin: yī jiē dào dí rén yào lái de xiāo xi， wǒ men pián fēn fēn jiàng gè zi jiā lǐ de dōng xi dǎ chéng bāo guǒ， lián máng chè dào fù jìn de shān lǐ qù le。
english: At the new that the enemy was approaching, we parceled up our belongings and hurried to the nearby mountains.

hanzi: 谁也敬爱全凭一已之力奋斗成功的人，以此法获得成功当然比完全无法成功要好得多。
pinyin: shéi yě jìng ài quán píng yī yǐ zhī lì fèn dòu chéng gōng de rén， yǐ cǐ fǎ huò dé chéng gōng dāng rán bì wán quán wú fǎ chéng gōng yào hǎo de duō。
english: Everybody like and respects self-made men; it's a great deal better to be made that that way then not to be made at all.

hanzi: 那时，这老头儿只不过是个泥瓦工罢了。他之所以发迹，我认为靠的是精明的而不是业绩。
pinyin: nà shí， zhè lǎo tóu er zhǐ bù guò shì gè nì wǎ gōng bà le。 tā zhī suǒ yǐ fā jī， wǒ rèn wéi kào de shì jīng míng de ér bú shì yè jī。
english: In his time, the old gentleman was a working mason, and had risen form the ranks more, I think, by shrewdness than by merit.

hanzi: 只要有好的服务，小型的汽车旅馆会继续吸引那些宁愿住小旅馆而不住大旅馆的人。
pinyin: zhǐ yào yǒu hǎo de fú wù， xiǎo xíng de qì chē lu:3 guǎn kuài jì xù xī yǐn nà xiē nìng yuàn zhù xiǎo lu:3 guǎn ér bú zhù dà lu:3 guǎn de rén。
english: As long as good service is provided the small motels will continue to have people who choose to stay there rather than in large motels.

hanzi: 电晕在电晕放电中在高压电极出现的一种微弱光辉，常伴随有朝向低压电极的电流
pinyin: diàn yùn zài diàn yùn fàng diàn zhòng zài gāo yā diàn jí chū xiàn de yī zhòng wēi ruò guāng huī， cháng bàn suí yǒu cháo xiàng dī yà diàn jí de diàn liú
english: A faint glow enveloping the high-field electrode in a corona discharge, often accompanied by streamers directed toward the low-field electrode.

hanzi: 组织秘书发给本党党员的通知在立法机构中传达给政党成员的一个在特定时间保证其出勤率的通知
pinyin: zǔ zhī mì shū fà jǐ běn dǎng dǎng yuán de tōng zhī zài lì fǎ jī gòu zhòng chuán dá jǐ zhèng dǎng chéng yuán de yī gè zài tè dìng shí jiān bǎo zhèng qí chū qín shuài de tōng zhī
english: A call issued to party members in a lawmaking body to ensure attendance at a particular time.

hanzi: 首先，我站在一个热闹的角落，仅仅是看着人们，试图以审视他们来理解他们生活的某些东西。
pinyin: shǒu xiān， wǒ zhàn zài yī gè rè nao de jiǎo luò， jǐn jǐn shì kàn zhuó rén men， shì tú yǐ shěn shì tā men lái lǐ jiě tā men shēng huó de mǒu xiē dōng xi。
english: First, I stand at a busy corner, merely looking at people, trying by sight of them to understand something of their live.

hanzi: 往往日本人以自创的方法改良我们的机器。就像所有其他半导体公司一样，我们也陷于困境。
pinyin: wǎng wǎng Rì běn rén yǐ zì chuàng de fāng fǎ gǎi liáng wǒ men de jī qì。 jiù xiàng suǒ yǒu qí tā bàn dǎo tǐ gōng sī yí yàng， wǒ men yě xiàn yú kùn jìng。
english: And often the Japanese have added proprietary engineering to improve our machines. Like all the other semiconductor firms, we are in a box.

hanzi: 寓言一种通常短小的故事，用来表示启发或谨慎的观点，常利用说话或有人的行为的动物为角色
pinyin: yù yán yī zhòng tōng cháng duǎn xiǎo de gù shì， yòng lái biǎo shì qǐ fā huò jǐn shèn de guān diǎn， cháng lì yòng shuō huà huò yǒu rén de xíng wéi de dòng wù wèi jué sè
english: A usually short narrative making an edifying or cautionary point and often employing as characters animals that speak and act like human beings.

hanzi: 家庭医生都迫切希望为病人提供适当的服务，但他们若为日常抄抄写写的工作所束缚，便不能给病人必需的关心。
pinyin: jiā tíng yī shēng dōu pò qiè xī wàng wèi bìng rén tí gōng shì dàng de fú wù， dàn tā men ruò wèi rì cháng chāo chāo xiě xiě de gōng zuò suǒ shù fù， pián bù néng jǐ bìng rén bì xū de guān xīn。
english: Family doctors are anxious to provide a proper service for their patients, but they can't give them the attention they need if they've shackled with paperwork.

hanzi: 把铝和其他金属混合，科学家们能够制造出各种合金，其中一些具有钢一样的强度，但其重量只是钢的三分之一。
pinyin: bǎ lu:3 huò qí tā jīn shǔ hùn hé， kē xué jiā men néng gòu zhì zào chū gè zhǒng hé jīn， qí zhōng yī xiē jù yǒu gāng yí yàng de qiáng dù， dàn qí zhòng liàng zhǐ shì gāng de sān fēn zhī yī。
english: By mixing aluminium with other metals, scientists have been able to produce a variety of alloys, some of which have the strength of steel but weigh only one third as much.

hanzi: 印象主义一种文学风格，其特征是利用对细节和感情的描述而不是通过对客观的现实的再创造，来唤起主观的或感觉的印象
pinyin: yìn xiàng zhǔ yì yī zhòng wén xué fēng gé， qí tè zhēng shì lì yòng duì xì jié huò gǎn qíng de miáo shù ér bú shì tōng guò duì kè guān de xiàn shí de zài chuàng zào， lái huàn qǐ zhǔ guān de huò gǎn jué de yìn xiàng
english: A literary style characterized by the use of details and mental associations to evoke subjective and sensory impressions rather than the re-creation of objective reality.

hanzi: 属一群拥有共同祖先和明显特征的有机体，尤指属于同一物种的一群，通过人工选择来发展，通过有控制的繁殖来维持
pinyin: zhǔ yī qún yōng yǒu gòng tóng zǔ xiān huò míng xiǎn tè zhēng de yǒu jī tǐ， yóu zhǐ shǔ yú tóng yī wù zhǒng de yī qún， tōng guò rén gōng xuǎn zé lái fā zhǎn， tōng guò yǒu kòng zhì de fán zhí lái wéi chí
english: A group of organisms having common ancestors and certain distinguishable characteristics, especially a group within a species developed by artificial selection and maintained by controlled propagation.

hanzi: 有些工程师认为，既然为这一系统起作用已付出如此巨大的努力，明智的做法是短期内将这项工作继续下去，而不是从头再来。
pinyin: yǒu xiē gōng chéng shī rèn wéi， jì rán wèi zhè yī xì tǒng qǐ zuò yòng yǐ fù chū rú cǐ jù dà de nǔ lì， míng zhì de zuò fǎ shì duǎn qī nèi jiàng zhè xiàng gōng zuò jì xù xià qu， ér bú shì cóng tóu zài lái。
english: Some engineers take the view that since so much effort has been put into making this system work it would be sensible in the short term to continue the same line rather than start afresh.

hanzi: 我鼻子痒痒.

hanzi: 冬天时湖面上覆盖着冰。

pinyin: zhēn jié duì yī gè nu:3 rén lái shuō shì zhòng yào de。

pinyin: qiǎo miào de guǎng gào yòu shǐ rén huā qián.

pinyin: tā mó le mó zhè kuài chóu liào kàn zhì liàng rú hé.

pinyin: zài gōng gòng chǎng hé suí biàn tù tán shì bù lǐ mào de。

pinyin: nèi gé gé yuán shì yóu shǒu xiàng tiāo xuǎn de.

pinyin: tā yù xuě bēng bèi mán zhù le， de bǎ tā wā chū lai。

hanzi: 他把花茎折断，汁液就流了出来。

english: The sap flowed out when he broke the stem of the flower.

english: She painted a rosy picture of the firm's future.

hanzi: 我女儿请求我给她买一个羽绒枕头。
pinyin: wǒ nu:3 ér qǐng qiú wǒ jǐ tā mǎi yī gè yǔ róng zhěn tou。
english: My daughter asked me to buy her a pillow stuffed with feathers.

hanzi: 那场战争中很多士兵死于那片沼泽地。
pinyin: nà chǎng zhàn zhēng zhòng hěn duō shì bīng sǐ yú nà piàn zhǎo zé dì。
english: In that war, many soldiers died in that fen area.

hanzi: 并非所有的人生来都像你这样有天赋。
pinyin: bìng fēi suǒ yǒu de rén shēng lái dōu xiàng nǐ zhè yàng yǒu tiān fù。
english: Not everyone was born with such endowments as you.

hanzi: 这个铁匠给铁棒加热，直到烧红为止。
pinyin: zhè gè tiě jiang jǐ tiě bàng jiā rè， zhí dào shāo hóng wéi zhǐ。
english: The blacksmith heated the iron bar until it glowed.

hanzi: 原料费用昂贵使得产品价格居高不下。
pinyin: yuán liào fèi yòng áng guì shǐ de chǎn pǐn jià gé jū gāo bù xià。
english: The high cost of raw materials is keeping prices up.

hanzi: 驶经山区的公共汽车遭到匪徒袭击.
pinyin: shǐ jīng shān qū de gōng gòng qì chē zāo dào fěi tú xí jī.
english: Buses driving through the mountains have been attacked by bandits.

hanzi: 毫无疑问的他是称霸日本的高尔夫球手。
pinyin: háo wú yí wèn de tā shì chèng bà Rì běn de gāo ěr fū qiú shǒu。
english: He is, without doubt, the greatest golfer in Japan.

hanzi: 毫无疑问的他是称霸日本的高尔夫球手。
pinyin: háo wú yí wèn de tā shì chèng bà Rì běn de gāo ěr fū qiú shǒu。
english: He is, without doubt, the greatest golfer in Japan.

hanzi: 导弹有极微小的偏斜也可能酿出大祸.
pinyin: dǎo dàn yǒu jí wēi xiǎo de piān xié yě kě néng niàng chū dà huò.
english: The smallest deflection of the missile could bring disaster.

hanzi: 她平时懒惰从她的考试成绩可以看得出来。
pinyin: tā píng shí lǎn duò zòng tā de kǎo shì chéng jī kě yǐ kàn dé chū lái。
english: Her laziness showed in her exam results.

hanzi: 如果战争爆发, 我们将立即被征召服役。
pinyin: rú guǒ zhàn zhēng bào fā,  wǒ men jiàng lì jí bèi zhēng zhào fú yì。
english: If war breaks out, we shall be called up right away.

hanzi: 那场战争中很多士兵死于那片沼泽地。
pinyin: nà chǎng zhàn zhēng zhòng hěn duō shì bīng sǐ yú nà piàn zhǎo zé dì。
english: In that war, many soldiers died in that fen area.

hanzi: 美国和前苏联都是条约的签署国.
pinyin: Měi guó huò qián sū lián dōu shì tiáo yuē de qiān shǔ guó.
english: The US and the former Soviet Union were co-signatories of/to the treaty.

hanzi: 财政不在我们这个部门的管辖范围之内。
pinyin: cái zhèng bù zài wǒ men zhè gè bù mén de guǎn xiá fàn wéi zhī nèi。
english: Finance is not within the compass of our department.

hanzi: 如果你作弊，考试及格也没什么价值。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zuò bì， kǎo shì jí gé yě mò shén me jià zhí。
english: There is little merit in passing the examination if you cheated.

hanzi: 那女孩玫瑰色的脸颊使她显得非常可爱。
pinyin: nà nu:3 hái méi guī shǎi de liǎn jiá shǐ tā xiǎn de fēi cháng kě ài。
english: The girl's rosy cheeks made her look very lovely.

hanzi: 墓碑上的文字已严重磨损难以辨认.
pinyin: mù bēi shàng de wén zì yǐ yán zhòng mò sǔn nán yǐ biàn rèn.
english: The lettering on the gravestone was badly worn and almost illegible.

hanzi: 我可以毫无疑问地得出结论他在说谎。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ háo wú yí wèn de dé chū jié lùn tā zài shuō huǎng。
english: I can draw the conclusion without question that he is lying.

hanzi: 这只巨大的军舰被一枚自动寻的导弹击中。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ jù dà de jūn jiàn bèi yī méi zì dòng xún dì dǎo dàn jī zhòng。
english: The huge ship was sunk by a homing missile.

hanzi: 魔术师用他的魔术技艺使观众们激动。
pinyin: mó shù shī yòng tā de mó shù jì yì shǐ guān zhòng men jī dòng。
english: The magician thrilled his audience with his feats of magic.

hanzi: 这个房间把她绘画的优点充分显示出来。
pinyin: zhè gè fáng jiān bǎ tā huì huà de yōu diǎn chōng fèn xiǎn shì chū lai。
english: The room shows off her paintings to good effect.

hanzi: 这个芭蕾舞女演员的每一个动作都很优美。
pinyin: zhè gè bā lěi wǔ nu:3 yǎn yuán de měi yī gè dòng zuò dōu hěn yōu měi。
english: All the moves of the ballerina were graceful.

hanzi: 哪怕是个有经验的登山者也会馅入困境。
pinyin: nǎ pà shì gè yǒu jīng yàn de dēng shān zhě yě kuài xiàn rù kùn jìng。
english: Even an experienced cumber will get into trouble.

hanzi: 这次地震把这堵墙震得下陷并开始崩塌.
pinyin: zhè cì dì zhèn bǎ zhè dǔ qiáng zhèn de xià xiàn bìng kāi shǐ bēng tā.
english: The earthquake made the wall sink and start to crumble.

hanzi: 我对这些官员的普遍受贿感到震惊。
pinyin: wǒ duì zhè xie guān yuán de pǔ biàn shòu huì gǎn dào zhèn jīng。
english: I'm shocked at the prevalence of bribery among these officials.

hanzi: 在交响乐曲的创作上，他堪称技艺大师。
pinyin: zài jiāo xiǎng yuè qǔ de chuàng zuò shàng， tā kān chèng jì yì dà shī。
english: In symphonic writing he is the master craftsman.

hanzi: 噪声很大, 她用棉花团把耳朵堵上了.
pinyin: zào shēng hěn dà,  tā yòng mián hua tuán bǎ ěr duo dǔ shàng le.
english: The noise was so loud that she put wads of cotton wool in her ears.

hanzi: 别看这辆汽车小, 里面还比较宽敞.
pinyin: biè kàn zhè liàng qì chē xiǎo,  lǐ miàn huán bǐ jiào kuān chang.
english: Considering the smallness of the car, it is relatively roomy inside.

hanzi: 我们享受着湖面上吹来的凉爽微风。
pinyin: wǒ men xiǎng shòu zhuó hú miàn shàng chuī lái de liáng shuǎng wēi fēng。
english: We are enjoying the cool breeze that comes from the lake.

hanzi: 猎人拿出了非常美味的鹿肉招待我们。
pinyin: liè rén ná chū le fēi cháng měi wèi de lù ròu zhāo dài wǒ men。
english: The hunter entertained us with venison which was very delicious.

hanzi: 中国孩子会在春节前买很多鞭炮。
pinyin: Zhōng guó hái zi kuài zài chūn jié qián mǎi hěn duō biān pào。
english: Chinese children like to buy many firecrackers before the Spring Festival.

hanzi: 汤姆长胡子了, 我们上次见到他时还没长呢.
pinyin: tāng mǔ zhǎng hú zi le,  wǒ men shàng cì xiàn dào tā shí huán mò zhǎng ne.
english: Tom has sprouted a beard since we saw him last.

hanzi: 我们必须加倍努力来澄清这一神秘的事件。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū jiā bèi nǔ lì lái dèng qīng zhè yī shén mì de shì jiàn。
english: We must multiply our efforts to clear up the mystery.

hanzi: 安以为我是苏格兰人，但我马上纠正了她。
pinyin: ān yǐ wéi wǒ shì sū gé lán rén， dàn wǒ mǎ shàng jiū zhèng le tā。
english: Ann thought I was Scottish but I soon put her right.

hanzi: 妇女被排斥于寺院之外使得她们很难过。
pinyin: fù nu:3 bèi pái chì yú sì yuàn zhī wài shǐ de tā men hěn nán guò。
english: The exclusion of women from the temple made them feel sad.

hanzi: 他那许多妒嫉的言行妨害了他们的婚姻生活。
pinyin: tā nà xǔ duō dù jí de yán xìng fáng hài le tā men de hūn yīn shēng huó。
english: His many little jealousies harmed their marriage.

hanzi: 护士在他的伤口上敷了一块干净的纱布垫。
pinyin: hù shi zài tā de shāng kǒu shàng fū le yī kuài gān jìng de shā bù diàn。
english: The nurse put a clean pad of cotton over his wound.

hanzi: 他的计划的要点在这个报告中酌此概括。
pinyin: tā de jì huà de yào diǎn zài zhè gè bào gào zhòng zhuó cǐ gài kuò。
english: The salient point of his plan is summed up in this report.

hanzi: 他住在街道弯弯曲曲的狭窄拥塞的老街区。
pinyin: tā zhù zài jiē dào wān wān qǔ qǔ de xiá zhǎi yōng sāi de lǎo jiē qū。
english: He lives in a warren of narrow twisting old streets.

hanzi: 德国西面与法国接壤, 南与瑞士为邻.
pinyin: Dé guó xī miàn yù fǎ guó jiē rǎng,  nán yù ruì shì wèi lín.
english: Germany is bounded on the west by France and on the south by Switzerland.

hanzi: 很多富户都因那次金融危机而家道中落。
pinyin: hěn duō fù hù dōu yīn nà cì jīn róng wēi jī ér jiā dào zhòng luò。
english: Many rich families are brought low by the financial crisis.

hanzi: 这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì de gōng yuán yǐ qí huá lì de pēn quán ér著 míng。
english: The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.

hanzi: 他能感觉到他们对他拙劣作品的讽刺语调。
pinyin: tā néng gǎn jué dào tā men duì tā zhuó liè zuò pǐn de fèng cì yǔ diào。
english: He could feel their sarcastic tone about his poor work.

hanzi: 我们在整个冬季战役中始终不如对手.
pinyin: wǒ men zài zhěng gè dōng jì zhàn yì zhòng shǐ zhōng bù rú duì shǒu.
english: We were outmanoeuvred and outfought throughout the winter campaign.

hanzi: 董事会决定大规模生产这种汽车。
pinyin: dǒng shì huì jué dìng dà guī mó shēng chǎn zhè zhǒng qì chē。
english: The board of directors made the decision to produce the car on a large scale.

hanzi: 阳光穿过棱镜时将分解成各种颜色。
pinyin: yáng guāng chuān guò léng jìng shí jiàng fēn jiě chéng gè zhǒng yán sè。
english: The sunlight will break into different colors through a prism.

hanzi: 他对这个事件毫不知情，真让人感到诧异。
pinyin: tā duì zhè gè shì jiàn háo bú zhī qíng， zhēn ràng rén gǎn dào chà yì。
english: It was amazing that he knew nothing about the event.

hanzi: 孔子被认为是中国古代最伟大的圣贤。
pinyin: kǒng zi bèi rèn wéi shì Zhōng guó gǔ dài zuì wěi dà de shèng xián。
english: Confucius is considered the greatest of the ancient Chinese sages.

hanzi: 在这次事故中，工人受到大剂量的辐射。
pinyin: zài zhè cì shì gù zhòng， gōng rén shòu dào dà jì liáng de fú shè。
english: In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation.

hanzi: 他的爱好从下国际象棋到划独木舟, 范围很广.
pinyin: tā de ài hào zòng xià guó jì xiàng qí dào huà dú mù zhōu,  fàn wéi hěn guǎng.
english: His interests ranged from chess to canoeing.

hanzi: 她需要把阿拉伯语学好才能到开罗工作.
pinyin: tā xū yào bǎ ē lā bó yù xué hào cái néng dào Kāi luó gōng zuò.
english: She needs to perfect her Arabic before going to work in Cairo.

hanzi: 我是唯一明了老师真正在说什么的人。
pinyin: wǒ shì wéi yī míng le lǎo shī zhēn zhèng zài shuō shén me de rén。
english: I am the only one to pick up on what the teacher is really saying.

hanzi: 他们步行穿过森林，呼吸着松树的芳香。
pinyin: tā men bù xíng chuān guò sēn lín， hū xī zhuó sōng shù de fāng xiāng。
english: They walked through the forest breathing the scent of pines.

hanzi: 这个瘦小软弱的孩子成为全班嘲笑的对象。
pinyin: zhè gè shòu xiǎo ruǎn ruò de hái zi chéng wéi quán bān cháo xiào de duì xiàng。
english: The small weak child became the scorn of the class.

hanzi: 她想起忘记带入场券，顿时惊慌起来。
pinyin: tā xiǎng qǐ wàng jì dài rù chǎng quàn， dùn shí jīng huāng qǐ lai。
english: She got into a panic when she thought she'd forgotten the tickets.

hanzi: 他能感觉到他们对他拙劣作品的讽刺语调。
pinyin: tā néng gǎn jué dào tā men duì tā zhuó liè zuò pǐn de fèng cì yǔ diào。
english: He could feel their sarcastic tone about his poor work.

hanzi: 他对模型飞机感兴趣之后就全力以赴了。
pinyin: tā duì mó xíng fēi jī gǎn xìng qu zhī hòu jiù quán lì yǐ fù le。
english: When he became interested in model airplanes he went the whole hog.

hanzi: 这种疫苗用以为全体居民预防传染病.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yì miáo yòng yǐ wèi quán tǐ jū mín yù fáng chuán rǎn bìng.
english: The vaccine was used to protect the whole population against infection.

hanzi: 到国外旅行允许携带的款额有所限制。
pinyin: dào guó wài lu:3 xíng yǔn xǔ xié dài de kuǎn é yǒu suǒ xiàn zhì。
english: There are currency restrictions on the sums allowed for foreign travel.

hanzi: 她关于那个司机已经喝醉的证词无可辩驳。
pinyin: tā guān yú nèi gè sī jī yǐ jīng hè zuì de zhèng cí wú kě biàn bó。
english: Nothing could refute her testimony that the driver was drunk.

hanzi: 岁月和风雨早已磨掉纪念碑上的铭文。
pinyin: suì yuè hé fēng yǔ zǎo yǐ mò diào jì niàn bēi shàng de míng wén。
english: Time and weather had long ago effaced the inscription on the monument.

hanzi: 我从这个可以引以为戒的经历中学到了很多。
pinyin: wǒ zòng zhè gè kě yǐ yǐn yǐ wéi jiè de jīng lì zhōng xué dào le hěn duō。
english: I have learned a lot from the chastening experience.

hanzi: 他那有趣的表演引起了观众的哄堂大笑。
pinyin: tā nà yǒu qù de biǎo yǎn yǐn qǐ le guān zhòng de hòng táng dà xiào。
english: His amusing performance caused a roar of laughter in the audience.

hanzi: 在桌上的银相框里有张她丈夫的照片。
pinyin: zài zhuō shàng de yín xiàng kuàng lǐ yǒu zhāng tā zhàng fu de zhào piàn。
english: In a silver frame on the table there is a photograph of her husband.

hanzi: 那些吵吵闹闹的邻居成了我生活中的一大忧患.
pinyin: nà xiē chǎo chǎo nào nào de lín jū chéng le wǒ shēng huó zhòng dì yī dà yōu huàn.
english: Those noisy neighbours are the bane of my life.

hanzi: 没有良好的经营管理，事业就不会兴旺发达。
pinyin: méi yǒu liáng hǎo de jīng yíng guǎn lǐ， shì yè jiù bù huì xīng wàng fā dá。
english: A business cannot thrive without good management.

hanzi: 我可以用用你们的厕所吗--我实在憋不住了.
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ yòng yòng nǐ men de cè suǒ ma-- wǒ shí zài biē bú zhù le.
english: May I use your lavatory I'm bursting! ie I need to urinate urgently.

hanzi: 这张古董桌子卖给那位戴粉红色帽子的女士了.
pinyin: zhè zhāng gǔ dǒng zhuō zi mài jǐ nà wèi dài fěn hóng sè mào zi de nu:3 shì le.
english: The antique table went to the lady in the pink hat.

hanzi: 医生不得不用石膏绷带来固定他断了的胳膊。
pinyin: yī shēng bù dé bù yòng shí gāo bēng dài lái gù dìng tā duàn le de gē bo。
english: The doctor had to hold his broken arm with a plaster cast.

hanzi: 唯有在南台湾我才见过像这样的风景。
pinyin: wěi yǒu zài nán Tái wān wǒ cái xiàn guò xiàng zhè yàng de fēng jǐng。
english: Only in the southern part of Taiwan have I seen such scenery as this.

hanzi: 这个乡下姑娘不习惯他们奢侈的生活方式。
pinyin: zhè gè xiāng xià gū niang bù xí guàn tā men shē chǐ de shēng huó fāng shì。
english: The country girl was not used to their lavish mode of living.

hanzi: 该政策旨在防止一些人压制另一些人.
pinyin: gāi zhèng cè zhǐ zài fáng zhǐ yī xiē rén yā zhì lìng yī xiē rén.
english: The policy is designed to prevent the predominance of one group over another.

hanzi: 我没料到他会堕落到对我进行人身攻击的地步。
pinyin: wǒ mò liào dào tā kuài duò luò dào duì wǒ jìn xíng rén shēn gōng jī de dì bù。
english: I didn't expect him to descend to personal abuse.

hanzi: 她用力咽了一下唾液, 转身面对那个控告她的人.
pinyin: tā yòng lì yè le yī xià tuò yè,  zhuǎn shēn miàn duì nèi gè kòng gào tā de rén.
english: She swallowed hard, and turned to face her accuser.

hanzi: 医生不得不用石膏绷带来固定他断了的胳膊。
pinyin: yī shēng bù dé bù yòng shí gāo bēng dài lái gù dìng tā duàn le de gē bo。
english: The doctor had to hold his broken arm with a plaster cast.

hanzi: 小女孩把贝壳穿成一串，戴在脖子上。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái bǎ bèi ké chuān chéng yī chuàn， dài zài bó zi shàng。
english: The little girl threaded the shells together and wore them round her neck.

hanzi: 在我们的菜园里，我们种了茄子，黄瓜和土豆。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de cài yuán lǐ， wǒ men zhòng le qié zi， huáng guā huò tǔ dòu。
english: In our garden we have egg-plants, cucumber and potato.

hanzi: 蚕茧是由昆虫制造的一种由丝组成的外包层。
pinyin: cán jiǎn shì yóu kūn chóng zhì zào de yī zhòng yóu sī zǔ chéng de wài bāo céng。
english: A cocoon is a kind of silk covering made by an insect.

hanzi: 批评家是必然的邪恶，而批评是邪恶的必然。
pinyin: pī píng jiā shì bì rán de xié è， ér pī píng shì xié è de bì rán。
english: A critic is a necessary evil, and criticism is an evil necessity.

hanzi: 那年轻的女高音歌手受到一著名指挥家的提携.
pinyin: nà nián qīng de nu:3 gāo yīn gē shǒu shòu dào yī著 míng zhǐ huī jiā de tí xié.
english: The young soprano was taken up by a famous conductor.

hanzi: 他的妻子在那个群体中成为颇有地位的女子。
pinyin: tā de qī zi zài nèi gè qún tǐ zhòng chéng wéi pō yǒu dì wèi de nu:3 zǐ。
english: His wife has become a woman of some standing in the community.

hanzi: 作出决策乃当务之急，此事必然地落在他身上。
pinyin: zuò chū jué cè nǎi dàng wù zhī jí， cǐ shì bì rán de luò zài tā shēn shàng。
english: The necessity for making decisions devolves on him.

hanzi: 他用树枝在泥里探寻，想找回丢失的戒指。
pinyin: tā yòng shù zhī zài nì lǐ tàn xún， xiǎng zhǎo huí diū shī de jiè zhi。
english: He probed the mud with a stick, looking for the ring he had dropped.

hanzi: 这枚戒指是他们爱情的象征，对她是重要的。
pinyin: zhè méi jiè zhi shì tā men ài qíng de xiàng zhēng， duì tā shì zhòng yào de。
english: The ring was important to her as an emblem of their love.

hanzi: 战士们唱起了歌颂他们英勇战斗的凯歌。
pinyin: zhàn shì men chàng qǐ le gē sòng tā men yīng yǒng zhàn dòu de kǎi gē。
english: The soldiers sang a song of victory, describing their prowess in battle.

hanzi: 总统答应会迅速有效地惩罚恐怖分子。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng dā ying kuài xùn sù yǒu xiào de chéng fá kǒng bù fèn zǐ。
english: The president promised swift and effective retribution against the terrorists.

hanzi: 那个小男孩在他母亲身边跳跳蹦蹦地往前走。
pinyin: nèi gè xiǎo nán hái zài tā mǔ qīn shēn biān tiào tiào bèng bèng de wàng qián zǒu。
english: The little boy skipped along at his mother's side.

hanzi: 总统答应会迅速有效地惩罚恐怖分子。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng dā ying kuài xùn sù yǒu xiào de chéng fá kǒng bù fèn zǐ。
english: The president promised swift and effective retribution against the terrorists.

hanzi: 根据你的合同，你每年有十五天的带薪假期。
pinyin: gēn jù nǐ de hé tong， nǐ měi nián yǒu shí wǔ tiān de dài xīn jià qī。
english: According to your contract, you get 15 days' paid holiday a year.

hanzi: 他一走了之，而让他的母亲为他的赌债发愁。
pinyin: tā yī zǒu le zhī， ér ràng tā de mǔ qīn wèi tā de dǔ zhài fā chóu。
english: He took a powder and left his mother to worry about his gambling debts.

hanzi: 这一产品非常成功, 其名称已经家喻户晓.
pinyin: zhè yī chǎn pǐn fēi cháng chéng gōng,  qí míng chēng yǐ jīng jiā yù hù xiǎo.
english: The product was so successful that its name became a household word.

hanzi: 他的崇高行动使他得到极大的荣誉和光荣。
pinyin: tā de chóng gāo xíng dòng shǐ tā dé dào jí dà de róng yù huò guāng róng。
english: His noble action reflected the greatest credit and glory upon him.

hanzi: 一滴奶在水中扩散开来, 使水变得混浊不清了.
pinyin: yī dī nǎi zài shuǐ zhòng kuò sàn kāi lái,  shǐ shuǐ biàn de hùn zhuó bù qīng le.
english: A drop of milk diffused in the water, and it became cloudy.

hanzi: 他是个经过改造的罪犯，然而仍有可能故态复萌。
pinyin: tā shì gè jīng guò gǎi zào de zuì fàn， rán ér réng yǒu kě néng gù tài fù méng。
english: He's a reformed criminal who may yet backslide.

hanzi: 杰克不仅是个好学生，而且还是名篮球队员。
pinyin: jié kè bù jǐn shì gè hào xué sheng， ér qiě hái shì míng lán qiú duì yuán。
english: Jack is not only a good student but also a basketball player.

hanzi: 他们不仅抢夺你的财物，还要把每样东西都捣毁。
pinyin: tā men bù jǐn qiǎng duó nǐ de cái wù， huán yào bǎ měi yàng dōng xi dōu dǎo huǐ。
english: Not only do they rob you, they smash everything too.

hanzi: 发挥运用的行为或事例，尤指全力以赴的努力
pinyin: fā huī yùn yòng de xíng wéi huò shì lì， yóu zhǐ quán lì yǐ fù de nǔ lì
english: The act or an instance of exerting, especially a strenuous effort.

hanzi: 解放后这个地区的畜牧业得到了巨大的发展。
pinyin: jiě fàng hòu zhè gè dì qū de xù mù yè dé dào le jù dà de fā zhǎn。
english: The animal husbandry in this area has developed greatly after liberation.

hanzi: 证券交易所的运作情况大多数人都不了解。
pinyin: zhèng quàn jiāo yì suǒ de yùn zuò qíng kuàng dà duō shù rén dōu bù liǎo xiè。
english: The working of the stock exchange is beyond most people's ken.

hanzi: 由于投资少，我们的工业生产一直停滞不前。
pinyin: yóu yú tóu zī shào， wǒ men de gōng yè shēng chǎn yī zhí tíng zhì bù qián。
english: Due to low investment, our industrial output has remained stagnant.

hanzi: 一个厨房里的小火炉就会把整个房子都熏黑。
pinyin: yī gè chú fáng lǐ de xiǎo huǒ lú jiù kuài bǎ zhěng gè fáng zi dōu xūn hēi。
english: One small fire in the kitchen will cover the whole house in soot.

hanzi: 他宣布脱离他原来的宗教而成为了一名穆斯林教徒。
pinyin: tā xuān bù tuō lí tā yuán lái de zōng jiào ér chéng wéi le yī míng mù sī lín jiào tú。
english: He renounced his religion and became a Muslim.

hanzi: 分支机构的经理在其管辖范围内有充分的自主权.
pinyin: fēn zhī jī gòu de jīng lǐ zài qí guǎn xiá fàn wéi nèi yǒu chōng fèn de zì zhǔ quán.
english: Branch managers have full autonomy in their own areas.

hanzi: 分支机构的经理在其管辖范围内有充分的自主权.
pinyin: fēn zhī jī gòu de jīng lǐ zài qí guǎn xiá fàn wéi nèi yǒu chōng fèn de zì zhǔ quán.
english: Branch managers have full autonomy in their own areas.

hanzi: 反对吸烟的宣传很多, 许多人因而戒了烟.
pinyin: fǎn duì xī yān de xuān chuán hěn duō,  xǔ duō rén yīn ér jiè le yān.
english: There has been so much propaganda against smoking that many people have given it up.

hanzi: 反对吸烟的宣传很多, 许多人因而戒了烟.
pinyin: fǎn duì xī yān de xuān chuán hěn duō,  xǔ duō rén yīn ér jiè le yān.
english: There has been so much propaganda against smoking that many people have given it up.

hanzi: 木匠量了一下棚屋的尺寸, 立刻估计出它的大小。
pinyin: mù jiàng liàng le yī xià péng wū de chǐ cun,  lì kè gū jì chū tā de dà xiǎo。
english: The carpenter ran his ruler over the shed and sized it up at once.

hanzi: 遵照指示, 警察在展览会期间警戒小偷。
pinyin: zūn zhào zhǐ shì,  jǐng chá zài zhǎn lǎn huì qī jiān jǐng jiè xiǎo tōu。
english: The police have been instructed to keep an eye out for pickpockets at the fair.

hanzi: 投入供人跳水或潜水的地方或地区，如游泳池
pinyin: tóu rù gòng rén tiào shuǐ huò qián shuǐ de dì fang huò dì qū， rú yóu yǒng chí
english: A place or an area, such as a swimming pool, for diving or plunging.

hanzi: 军人在未获上级军官允许的情况下擅离职守。
pinyin: jūn rén zài wèi huò shàng jí jūn guān yǔn xǔ de qíng kuàng xià shàn lí zhí shǒu。
english: Be away from duties without the permission of a superior officer.

hanzi: 英联邦在第一次世界大战前曾是一个强大的帝国。
pinyin: yīng lián bāng zài dì yī cì shì jiè dà zhàn qián zēng shì yī gè qiáng dà de dì guó。
english: The United Kingdom was a mighty empire before World War I.

hanzi: 在戒酒问题上，怀特先生是主张完全戒掉。
pinyin: zài jiè jiǔ wèn tí shàng， huái tè xiān sheng shì zhǔ zhāng wán quán jiè diào。
english: In the temperance question, Mr White takes his stand on total abstinence.

hanzi: 回信免费邮寄至牛津牛津大学出版社宣传部.
pinyin: huí xìn miǎn fèi yóu jì zhì niú jīn niú jīn dà xué chū bǎn shè xuān chuán bù.
english: Reply to Publicity Department, FREEPOST, Oxford University Press, Oxford.

hanzi: 新经理的工作是让这家公司能恢复盈利状况。
pinyin: xīn jīng lǐ de gōng zuò shì ràng zhè jiā gōng sī néng huī fù yíng lì zhuàng kuàng。
english: The new manager's job is to restore the company to profitability.

hanzi: 他有眨眼睛的习惯, 但渐渐地他不再患此毛病。
pinyin: tā yǒu zhǎ yǎn jīng de xí guàn,  dàn jiàn jiàn de tā bù zài huàn cǐ máo bìng。
english: He had a habit of blinking his eyes, but gradually he grew out of it.

hanzi: 他从初级职员做起，最终成了这家公司的董事。
pinyin: tā zòng chū jí zhí yuán zuò qǐ， zuì zhōng chéng le zhè jiā gōng sī de dǒng shì。
english: He joined the firm as a junior clerk, and finished up a director.

hanzi: 在这土地平坦的乡间，人们种植水稻，饲养牲畜。
pinyin: zài zhè tǔ dì píng tǎn de xiāng jiàn， rén men zhòng zhí shuǐ dào， sì yǎng shēng chù。
english: In this flat country people grow rice and raise cattle.

hanzi: 英联邦在第一次世界大战前曾是一个强大的帝国。
pinyin: yīng lián bāng zài dì yī cì shì jiè dà zhàn qián zēng shì yī gè qiáng dà de dì guó。
english: The United Kingdom was a mighty empire before World War I.

hanzi: 小船一种小划艇，尤指从船到岸渡运供应品
pinyin: xiǎo chuán yī zhòng xiǎo huà tǐng， yóu zhǐ zòng chuán dào àn dù yùn gōng yìng pǐn
english: A small rowboat, especially one used to ferry supplies from ship to shore.

hanzi: 她未请示上级擅自把所有这些请柬都发了出去.
pinyin: tā wèi qǐng shì shàng jí shàn zì bǎ suǒ yǒu zhè xie qǐng jiǎn dōu fà le chū qù.
english: She issued all these invitations without any reference to her superiors.

hanzi: 做试验前，老师给我们每个人发了一张滤纸。
pinyin: zuò shì yàn qián， lǎo shī jǐ wǒ men měi gè rén fà le yī zhāng lu:4 zhǐ。
english: The teacher gave each of us a piece of filter paper before doing the experiment.

hanzi: 士兵们仍然固守城堡，但他们已陷于险境。
pinyin: shì bīng men réng rán gù shǒu chéng bǎo， dàn tā men yǐ xiàn yú xiǎn jìng。
english: The soldiers are still holding the fort, but they're hanging on by their eyelids.

hanzi: 他们的主要出口货物是纺织品，特别是丝绸和棉布。
pinyin: tā men de zhǔ yào chū kǒu huò wù shì fǎng zhī pǐn， tè bié shì sī chóu huò mián bù。
english: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.

hanzi: 沿着屏幕的底部排列所有最小化的应用程序。
pinyin: yán zhe píng mù de dǐ bù pái liè suǒ yǒu zuì xiǎo huà de yìng yòng chéng xù。
english: Arrange the icon of all minimize application across the bottom of the screen.

hanzi: 他的儿子是一个三岁就能弹奏钢琴的早慧儿童。
pinyin: tā de ér zi shì yī gè sān suì jiù néng tán zòu gāng qín de zǎo huì ér tóng。
english: His son is a precocious child who could play the piano at the age of three.

hanzi: 我觉得你嘲笑他说英语的方式刺伤了他的自尊心。
pinyin: wǒ jué de nǐ cháo xiào tā shuō Yīng yǔ de fāng shì cì shāng le tā de zì zūn xīn。
english: I think you hurt his pride by laughing at the way he speaks English.

hanzi: 在许多国家，童贞已经不像过去那样受重视了。
pinyin: zài xǔ duō guó jiā， tóng zhēn yǐ jīng bù xiàng guò qu nà yàng shòu zhòng shì le。
english: In some countries virginity is not as highly valued as it used to be.

hanzi: 他的确有一副严肃的脸孔，但内心却是很富幽默感。
pinyin: tā dí què yǒu yī fù yán sù de liǎn kǒng， dàn nèi xīn què shì hěn fù yōu mò gǎn。
english: Indeed he has a solemn face, but he is very humorous at heart.

hanzi: 一直向前走过了教堂，约莫半英里就是体育场。
pinyin: yī zhí xiàng qián zǒu guò le jiào táng， yuē mo bàn yīng lǐ jiù shì tǐ yù chǎng。
english: Keep on past the church; the stadium is about half a mile further on.

hanzi: 这栋房子对我们来说不够大，而且离城太远了。
pinyin: zhè dòng fáng zi duì wǒ men lái shuō bù gòu dà， ér qiě lí chéng tài yuǎn le。
english: This house is not large enough for us, and further, it is too far from the town.

hanzi: 姑娘又活泼又富幽默感, 未婚夫家人十分喜欢她.
pinyin: gū niang yòu huó po yòu fù yōu mò gǎn,  wèi hūn fū jiā rén shí fēn xǐ huan tā.
english: The girl impressed her fiance's family with her liveliness and sense of humour.

hanzi: 这是一幅由草地，河流，树木组成的五光十色的镶嵌画。
pinyin: zhè shì yī fú yóu cǎo dì， hé liú， shù mù zǔ chéng de wǔ guāng shí shǎi de xiāng qiàn huà。
english: It's a rich mosaic of meadows, rivers and woods.

hanzi: 这种雄鸟在与雌鸟交尾以前要跳一种交欢舞.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xióng niǎo zài yù cí niǎo jiāo wěi yǐ qián yào tiào yī zhòng jiāo huān wǔ.
english: The male bird performs a sort of mating dance before copulating with the female.

hanzi: 将某人的收入分至四年从而使税赋降至最小程度
pinyin: jiàng mǒu rén de shōu rù fèn zhì sì nián cóng ér shǐ shuì fù xiáng zhì zuì xiǎo chéng dù
english: Average one's income over four years so as to minimize the tax rate.

hanzi: 对一个这样漂亮的女孩来说，化妆有些画蛇添足。
pinyin: duì yī gè zhè yàng piào liang de nu:3 hái lái shuō， huà zhuāng yǒu xiē huà shé tiān zú。
english: For such a beautiful girl, to use make-up would be to gild the lily.

hanzi: 孩子喂饱后不哭不闹的满足状使疲惫的母亲很满意。
pinyin: hái zi wèi bǎo hòu bù kū bù nào de mǎn zú zhuàng shǐ pí bèi de mǔ qīn hěn mǎn yì。
english: The quiet contentment of a well-fed child satisfied the tired mother.

hanzi: 父亲想到乡下去，可是孩子们吵着要去海滨。
pinyin: fù qīn xiǎng dào xiāng xià qù， kě shì hái zi men chǎo zhuó yào qù hǎi bīn。
english: Father wanted to go to the country, but the children were whooping it up for the beach.

hanzi: 他们在他床的四周放上屏风，以便医生给他检查。
pinyin: tā men zài tā chuáng de sì zhōu fàng shàng píng fēng， yǐ biàn yī shēng jǐ tā jiǎn chá。
english: They put a screen around his bed so that the doctor could examine him.

hanzi: 反动派越是横行霸道，就越发激起更强烈的反抗。
pinyin: fǎn dòng pài yuè shì héng xíng bà dào， jiù yuè fà jī qǐ gèng qiáng liè de fǎn kàng。
english: The more the reactionaries lash out, the more resistance they provoke.

hanzi: 一个军官作出如此胆怯的行为使整个团都蒙受羞辱。
pinyin: yī gè jūn guān zuò chū rú cǐ dǎn qiè de xíng wéi shǐ zhěng gè tuán dōu méng shòu xiū rù。
english: Such an act of cowardice by an officer shames his whole regiment.

hanzi: 那个聚会落得一场空, 因为请帖上的日期弄错了.
pinyin: nèi gè jù huì luò de yī chǎng kòng,  yīn wèi qǐng tiě shàng de rì qī nòng cuò le.
english: The party was a total fiasco because the wrong date was given on the invitations.

hanzi: 它至少能把沉重的仪器携带到大部分大气团之上。
pinyin: tā zhì shǎo néng bǎ chén zhòng de yí qì xié dài dào dà bù fen dà qì tuán zhī shàng。
english: It can at least carry heavy equipment above most of the atmospheric mass.

hanzi: 俄罗斯是被包藏在一个闷胡芦里面的神秘物体之中的谜。
pinyin: é Luó sī shì bèi bāo cáng zài yī gè mèn hú lú lǐ miàn de shén mì wù tǐ zhī zhōng de mí。
english: Russia is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma.

hanzi: 首相任命一些新大臣以增强她现届政府的活力。
pinyin: shǒu xiàng rèn mìng yī xiē xīn dà chén yǐ zēng qiáng tā xiàn jiè zhèng fǔ de huó lì。
english: The Prime Minister appointed some new ministers to ginger up her administration.

hanzi: 两个氢原子和一个氧原子结合而成一个水分子。
pinyin: liǎng gè qīng yuán zǐ huò yī gè yǎng yuán zǐ jié hé ér chéng yī gè shuǐ fèn zi。
english: Two atoms of hydrogen combine with one atom of oxygen to form a molecule of water.

hanzi: 机场附近的战斗持续了一个星期，敌军才被击溃。
pinyin: jī chǎng fù jìn de zhàn dòu chí xù le yī gè xīng qī， dí jūn cái bèi jī kuì。
english: The fighting around the airport continued for a week before the enemy was defeated.

hanzi: 很遗憾你的饼烘坏了，但不要紧，下次烘得好些。
pinyin: hěn yí hàn nǐ de bǐng hōng huài le， dàn bù yào jǐn， xià cì hōng de hǎo xiē。
english: I'm sorry the cake you baked turned out a flop; never mind, better luck next time.

hanzi: 人们对于虚构的地狱中的鬼神仍具有一种普遍的恐惧。
pinyin: rén men duì yú xū gòu de dì yù zhòng dì guǐ shén réng jù yǒu yī zhòng pǔ biàn de kǒng jù。
english: People still have a general fear for the imaginary infernal powers.

hanzi: 这位人道主义科学家呼吁改善穷人的生活条件。
pinyin: zhè wèi rén dào zhǔ yì kē xué jiā hū yù gǎi shàn qióng rén de shēng huó tiáo jiàn。
english: The humanitarian scientist called on the improvement of the poor's living condition.

hanzi: 在英国，用刀把食物送进嘴里被认为是粗鲁的行为。
pinyin: zài Yīng guó， yòng dāo bǎ shí wù sòng jìn zuǐ lǐ bèi rèn wéi shì cū lǔ de xíng wéi。
english: Putting food into one's mouth with a knife is considered vulgar in England.

hanzi: 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上。
pinyin: kāi chū xiān yàn huā duǒ de pá téng zhí wù pù bù bān xuán guà zài huā yuán qiáng shàng。
english: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall.

hanzi: 美国的公共教育史起源于早期拓荒者的社会。
pinyin: Měi guó de gōng gòng jiào yù shǐ qǐ yuán yú zǎo qī tuò huāng zhě de shè huì。
english: The history of public education in the United States dates from the society of the early pioneers.

hanzi: 工会运动旨在争取更高的工资和更好的工作条件。
pinyin: gōng huì yùn dòng zhǐ zài zhēng qǔ gèng gāo de gōng zī huò gèng hǎo de gōng zuò tiáo jiàn。
english: The Trade Union Movement works to obtain higher wages and better conditions.

hanzi: 我们用了一下午的时间逛商店, 疲惫不堪地逛了一家又一家.
pinyin: wǒ men yòng le yī xià wǔ de shí jiān guàng shāng diàn,  pí bèi bù kān de guàng le yī jiā yòu yī jiā.
english: We spent the afternoon traipsing from one shop to another.

hanzi: 营养品，滋养物营养的来源，尤指食物中的营养成分
pinyin: yíng yǎng pǐn， zī yǎng wù yíng yǎng de lái yuán， yóu zhǐ shí wù zhòng dì yíng yǎng chéng fèn
english: A source of nourishment, especially a nourishing ingredient in a food.

hanzi: 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上。
pinyin: kāi chū xiān yàn huā duǒ de pá téng zhí wù pù bù bān xuán guà zài huā yuán qiáng shàng。
english: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall.

hanzi: 从我们的窗户里可以看到海湾里平静海水的迷人景色。
pinyin: zòng wǒ men de chuāng hu lǐ kě yǐ kàn dào hǎi wān lǐ píng jìng hǎi shuǐ de mí rén jǐng sè。
english: We can see a magical view over the calm water of the bay from our window.

hanzi: 大吉岭茶一种上等的红茶，尤其生长在印度北部地区
pinyin: dà jí lǐng chá yī zhòng shàng děng de hóng chá， yóu qí shēng zhǎng zài Yìn dù běi bù dì qū
english: A fine variety of black tea grown especially in the northern part of India.

hanzi: 他们是在他们因宗教信仰而受到迫害之后来到美洲的。
pinyin: tā men shì zài tā men yīn zōng jiào xìn yǎng ér shòu dào pò hài zhī hòu lái dào měi zhōu de。
english: They came to America after being persecuted for their religious beliefs.

hanzi: 他虽然啃着苹果，但却很留神地监视着她的每一个动作。
pinyin: tā suī rán kěn zhuó píng guǒ， dàn què hěn liú shén de jiān shì zhuó tā de měi yī gè dòng zuò。
english: Munching the apple as he was, he had an eye for all her movements.

hanzi: 那些初期的反叛活动只不过是大规模革命行动的演习。
pinyin: nà xiē chū qī de fǎn pàn huó dòng zhǐ bù guò shì dà guī mó gé mìng xíng dòng de yǎn xí。
english: The earlier revolts had just been dress rehearsals for full-scale revolution.

hanzi: 士兵们养精畜锐，节约粮草，以期反击敌人的进攻。
pinyin: shì bīng men yǎng jīng xù ruì， jié yuē liáng cǎo， yǐ qī fǎn jī dí rén de jìn gōng。
english: The soldiers husband their strength and their food, waiting for the enemy to attack.

hanzi: 服务费获得某种服务必须缴纳的费用，例如长途电话服务费
pinyin: fú wù fèi huò dé mǒu zhǒng fú wù bì xū jiǎo nà de fèi yòng， lì rú cháng tú diàn huà fú wù fèi
english: A charge for a service, such as a long-distance telephone call.

hanzi: 今日的许多电影明星最初都是由人才发掘者发现的。
pinyin: jīn rì de xǔ duō diàn yǐng míng xīng zuì chū dōu shì yóu rén cái fā jué zhě fā xiàn de。
english: Many of the great movie stars of today were originally discovered by talent scouts.

hanzi: 他企图败坏对手名声反而自食其果, 被控以诽谤罪.
pinyin: tā qǐ tú bài huài duì shǒu míng shēng fǎn ér zì sì qí guǒ,  bèi kòng yǐ fěi bàng zuì.
english: His attempt to discredit his opponent boomeranged (on him) when he was charged with libel.

hanzi: 图形记录便显示了在短的间隙内先后到达的三种波。
pinyin: tú xíng jì lù pián xiǎn shì le zài duǎn de jiàn xì nèi xiān hòu dào dá de sān zhòng bō。
english: The graphic record shows three waves arriving one after the other at short intervals.

hanzi: 麦克插手阻止两个小伙子打架，结果他俩都迁怒于他。
pinyin: mài kè chā shǒu zǔ zhǐ liǎng gè xiǎo huǒ zi dǎ jià， jié guǒ tā liǎng dōu qiān nù yú tā。
english: Mike stepped in to stop a fight between two lads and they both turned on him.

hanzi: 我们需要从消费者那里多得到些反馈信息以提高产品质量.
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào zòng xiāo fèi zhě nà li duō dé dào xiē fǎn kuì xìn xī yǐ tí gāo chǎn pǐn zhì liàng.
english: We need more feedback from the consumer in order to improve our goods.

hanzi: 她由于向党代表大会做了有力的演说而挽回了自己的声誉。
pinyin: tā yóu yú xiàng dǎng dài biǎo dà huì zuò le yǒu lì de yǎn shuō ér wǎn huí le zì jǐ de shēng yú。
english: She redeemed her reputation with a powerful speech to the party convention.

hanzi: 法国和英国争夺北美洲的战争以英国的胜利而告终。
pinyin: fǎ guó huò Yīng guó zhēng duó běi měi zhōu de zhàn zhēng yǐ Yīng guó de shèng lì ér gào zhōng。
english: The contest between France and England for North America ended in victory for England.

hanzi: 财务董事派人带话说，她因不能出席会议而向大家道歉。
pinyin: cái wù dǒng shì pài rén dài huà shuō， tā yīn bù néng chū xí huì yì ér xiàng dà jiā dào qiàn。
english: The Finance Director sends her apology and is unable to attend the meeting.

hanzi: 财务董事派人带话说，她因不能出席会议而向大家道歉。
pinyin: cái wù dǒng shì pài rén dài huà shuō， tā yīn bù néng chū xí huì yì ér xiàng dà jiā dào qiàn。
english: The Finance Director sends her apology and is unable to attend the meeting.

hanzi: 她由于向党代表大会做了有力的演说而挽回了自己的声誉。
pinyin: tā yóu yú xiàng dǎng dài biǎo dà huì zuò le yǒu lì de yǎn shuō ér wǎn huí le zì jǐ de shēng yú。
english: She redeemed her reputation with a powerful speech to the party convention.

hanzi: 敌人的狂轰滥炸在这个国家造成了空前的死亡和破坏。
pinyin: dí rén de kuáng hōng làn zhà zài zhè gè guó jiā zào chéng le kōng qián de sǐ wáng huò pò huài。
english: The enemy mad bombardment caused unprecedented death and destruction in the country.

hanzi: 一般认为像木工和烹饪之类的实用课程不如数学重要.
pinyin: yì bān rèn wéi xiàng mù gōng huò pēng rèn zhī lèi de shí yòng kè chéng bù rú shù xué zhòng yào.
english: Practical lessons, like woodwork and cookery, are not considered as important as maths.

hanzi: 本星期买胡萝卜和洋白菜最合算，因货源充足，价格低廉。
pinyin: běn xīng qī mǎi hú luó bo huò yáng bái cài zuì hé suàn， yīn huò yuán chōng zú， jià gé dī lián。
english: Best buy of the week are carrot and cabbage, which are plentiful and cheap.

hanzi: 本星期买胡萝卜和洋白菜最合算，因货源充足，价格低廉。
pinyin: běn xīng qī mǎi hú luó bo huò yáng bái cài zuì hé suàn， yīn huò yuán chōng zú， jià gé dī lián。
english: Best buy of the week are carrot and cabbage, which are plentiful and cheap.

hanzi: 在某些亚洲的国家，进屋子之前脱下鞋子才是有礼貌的。
pinyin: zài mǒu xiē Yà zhōu de guó jiā， jìn wū zi zhī qián tuō xià xié zi cái shì yǒu lǐ mào de。
english: Before entering a house in some Asian countries, it is good manners to take off your shoes.

hanzi: 他有了新创作的剧本, 巩固了他在国内的杰出剧作家的地位.
pinyin: tā yǒu le xīn chuàng zuò de jù běn,  gǒng gù le tā zài guó nèi de jié chū jù zuò jiā de dì wèi.
english: With his new play he has consolidated his position as the country's leading dramatist.

hanzi: 一名匪徒在街上制造事端引人注目，其余匪徒则抢劫银行。
pinyin: yī míng fěi tú zài jiē shàng zhì zào shì duān yǐn rén zhù mù， qí yú fěi tú zé qiāng jié yín háng。
english: One of the gang create a diversion in the street while the others rob the bank.

hanzi: 推土机一种可用来挖掘或推动泥土机器，如推土机或挖土机
pinyin: tuī tǔ jī yī zhòng kě yòng lái wá jué huò tuī dòng ní tǔ jī qì， rú tuī tǔ jī huò wā tǔ jī
english: A machine, such as a bulldozer or backhoe, that is used for digging or pushing earth.

hanzi: 他用光明正大的方法得不到的东西, 就采取卑鄙的欺诈手段.
pinyin: tā yòng guāng míng zhèng dà de fāng fǎ de bù dào de dōng xi,  jiù cǎi qǔ bēi bǐ de qī zhà shǒu duàn.
english: When he couldn't get what he wanted openly and honestly, he resorted to low cunning.

hanzi: 这种炎热的天气在夜晚尚能忍受，但白天就令人感到呼吸困难。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yán rè de tiān qì zài yè wǎn shàng néng rěn shòu， dàn bái tiān jiù lìng rén gǎn dào hū xī kùn nan。
english: The heat was tolerable at night but suffocating during the day.

hanzi: 在我还没工夫往掌上吐一口唾沫之前，他已经把那件工作做完了。
pinyin: zài wǒ huán mò gōng fu wàng zhǎng shàng tù yī kǒu tuò mo zhī qián， tā yǐ jīng bǎ nà jiàn gōng zuò zuò wán le。
english: Before I had time to spit in my hands, he finished the work.

hanzi: 录音磁带一种相对狭长的磁带，用于录下声音以便日后重放
pinyin: lù yīn cí dài yī zhòng xiāng duì xiá zhǎng de cí dài， yòng yú lù xià shēng yīn yǐ biàn rì hòu zhòng fàng
english: A relatively narrow magnetic tape used to record sound for subsequent playback.

hanzi: 我用力把螺丝往木头上拧，可是拧不进去，又掉出来了。
pinyin: wǒ yòng lì bǎ luó sī wàng mù tou shàng nìng， kě shì nìng bù jìn qù， yòu diào chū lai le。
english: I've put the screw in the wood as tightly as I can, but it won't stay in, it keeps slipping out.

hanzi: 她试图用清洁剂来除他短上衣上面的污痕，但搓洗不掉。
pinyin: tā shì tú yòng qīng jié jì lái chú tā duǎn shàng yī shàng mian de wū hén， dàn cuō xǐ bù diào。
english: The tried to remove the mark from his jacket with a cleaning fluid, but it wouldn't rub out.

hanzi: 我们作了一次战略性退却，以便我们能积蓄力量再次进攻。
pinyin: wǒ men zuò le yī cì zhàn lu:è xìng tuì què， yǐ biàn wǒ men néng jī xù lì liang zài cì jìn gōng。
english: We made a strategic withdrawal, so that we could build up our forces for a renewed attack.

hanzi: 他从海滨回来的时候给我们买了一些华而不实的工艺品做礼物。
pinyin: tā zòng hǎi bīn huí lai de shí hou jǐ wǒ men mǎi le yī xiē huà ér bù shí de gōng yì pǐn zuò lǐ wù。
english: He bought us some gingerbread works as present when he returned from the beach.

hanzi: 君主，领主根据封建法律，应对之效忠和服役的长官或君主
pinyin: jūn zhǔ， lǐng zhǔ gēn jù fēng jiàn fǎ lu:4， yìng duì zhī xiào zhōng hé fú yì de zhǎng guān huò jūn zhǔ
english: A lord or sovereign to whom allegiance and service are due according to feudal law.

hanzi: 管弦乐队新来的指挥一上任就先把较差的演奏人员清除出去了。
pinyin: guǎn xián yuè duì xīn lái de zhǐ huī yī shàng rèn jiù xiān bǎ jiào cī de yǎn zòu rén yuán qīng chú chū qù le。
english: The new conductor start by weed out the weaker player in the orchestra.

hanzi: 分析这些政治形势时, 应考虑到东西方关系正日趋紧张.
pinyin: fēn xī zhè xie zhèng zhì xíng shì shí,  yìng kǎo lu:4 dào dōng xī fāng guān xi zhèng rì qū jǐn zhāng.
english: These political developments should be seen against a background of increasing East-West tension.

hanzi: 在美国，华盛顿是政府所在地，纽约是主要的商业中心。
pinyin: zài Měi guó， huà shèng dùn shì zhèng fǔ suǒ zài dì， Niǔ Yuē shì zhǔ yào de shāng yè zhōng xīn。
english: In the US, Washington is the seat of government and New York City is the chief seat of commerce.

hanzi: 赶时髦的，新潮的对于流行的和时新的东西很敏感的并且积极响应的
pinyin: gǎn shí máo de， xīn cháo de duì yú liú xíng de huò shí xīn de dōng xi hěn mǐn gǎn de bìng qiě jī jí xiǎng yìng de
english: Highly aware of and responsive to what is fashionable and up-to-date.

hanzi: 我从来没有在一个地方长住过，一定是我性格中有吉普赛人的特性。
pinyin: wǒ cóng lái méi yǒu zài yī gè dì fang zhǎng zhù guò， yī dìng shì wǒ xìng gé zhòng yǒu Jí pǔ sài rén de tè xìng。
english: I've never lived in one place too long, it must be the Gypsy in me.

hanzi: 他们两人并不知道这回事, 因此一定是另外有人泄露了秘密.
pinyin: tā men liǎng rén bìng bù zhī dào zhè huí shì,  yīn cǐ yī dìng shì lìng wài yǒu rén xiè lòu le mì mì.
english: Neither of them knew about it, and the corollary of that is that someone else revealed the secret.

hanzi: 当时有关新市政大厅的计画还仅仅是那建筑师酝酿中的意念。
pinyin: dāng shí yǒu guān xīn shì zhèng dà tīng de jì huà huán jǐn jǐn shì nà jiàn zhú shī yùn niàng zhòng dì yì niàn。
english: The plans for the new town hall were then still only a gleam in the architect's eye.

hanzi: 那个冒失的新秘书兴冲冲地蹦跳到我跟前，问我是否在这里工作。
pinyin: nèi gè mào shī de xīn mì shū xìng chòng chòng de bèng tiào dào wǒ gēn qián， wèn wǒ shì fǒu zài zhè lǐ gōng zuò。
english: That cheeky new secretary just pranced up to me and asked if I worked here!

hanzi: 由于南部某些州于十九世纪六十年代脱离美国而导致了南北战争。
pinyin: yóu yú nán bù mǒu xiē zhōu yú shí jiǔ shì jì liù shí nián dài tuō lí Měi guó ér dǎo zhì le nán běi zhàn zhēng。
english: The secession of some southern states from the USA in the 1860s led to the civil war.

hanzi: 由于她发表了关于公司安全记录的言论，该公司正以诽谤罪起诉她。
pinyin: yóu yú tā fā biǎo le guān yú gōng sī ān quán jì lù de yán lùn， gāi gōng sī zhèng yǐ fěi bàng zuì qǐ sù tā。
english: Her company is suing her for slander because of her remarks about their safety record.

hanzi: 由于她发表了关于公司安全记录的言论，该公司正以诽谤罪起诉她。
pinyin: yóu yú tā fā biǎo le guān yú gōng sī ān quán jì lù de yán lùn， gāi gōng sī zhèng yǐ fěi bàng zuì qǐ sù tā。
english: Her company is suing her for slander because of her remarks about their safety record.

hanzi: 她用欺骗手法取得了理科教员的职位，她谎称曾在大学读过书。
pinyin: tā yòng qī piàn shǒu fǎ qǔ dé le lǐ kē jiào yuán de zhí wèi， tā huǎng chèng zēng zài dà xué dú guò shū。
english: She got the job of science teacher by fraudulent means; she pretended she'd studied at university.

hanzi: 她仅超过年龄限制一天，因此组织者通融了一下，接受她入会。
pinyin: tā jǐn chāo guò nián líng xiàn zhì yī tiān， yīn cǐ zǔ zhī zhě tōng róng le yī xià， jiē shòu tā rù kuài。
english: She was only one day over the age limit so the organizers bent the rules and accepted her entry.

hanzi: 夏季季风夏季从西南或南方吹来的并能给亚洲南部带来大量降雨的风
pinyin: xià jì jì fēng xià jì zòng xī nán huò nán fāng chuī lái de bìng néng jǐ Yà zhōu nán bù dài lái dà liàng jiàng yǔ de fēng
english: A wind from the southwest or south that brings heavy rainfall to southern Asia in the summer.

hanzi: 夏季季风夏季从西南或南方吹来的并能给亚洲南部带来大量降雨的风
pinyin: xià jì jì fēng xià jì zòng xī nán huò nán fāng chuī lái de bìng néng jǐ Yà zhōu nán bù dài lái dà liàng jiàng yǔ de fēng
english: A wind from the southwest or south that brings heavy rainfall to southern Asia in the summer.

hanzi: 他们的谈判简直就是一场荒唐的笑剧，因为他们的领导们早就作出决定了。
pinyin: tā men de tán pàn jiǎn zhí jiù shì yī chǎng huāng táng de xiào jù， yīn wèi tā men de lǐng dǎo men zǎo jiù zuò chū jué dìng le。
english: Their negotiations were a farce since their leaders had already made the decision.

hanzi: 为了能与这庄严的气氛相一致，如果你能熄灭香烟的话，我将很高兴。
pinyin: wèi le néng yù zhè zhuāng yán de qì fēn xiàng yī zhì， rú guǒ nǐ néng xī miè xiāng yān de huà， wǒ jiàng hěn gāo xìng。
english: I would appreciate it if you would extinguish your cigarettes in keeping with the solemnity of the occasion.

hanzi: 他是一个多面手，既是修理工，也是木匠，既是一个理发师，也是一个好裁缝。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè duō miàn shǒu， jì shì xiū lǐ gōng， yě shì mù jiàng， jì shì yī gè lǐ fà shī， yě shì yī gè hào cái féng。
english: He is a man of parts; he is either a repairman, or a carpenter, either a barber or a good tailor.

hanzi: 封臣，臣属从封建地主手中获得土地并接受保护的人，以敬意和忠诚回报
pinyin: fēng chén， chén zhǔ zòng fēng jiàn dì zhǔ shǒu zhòng huò dé tǔ dì bìng jiē shòu bǎo hù de rén， yǐ jìng yì huò zhōng chéng huí bào
english: A person who held land from a feudal lord and received protection in return for homage and allegiance.

hanzi: 董事会注意到维持有效通讯的需要，因此决定建立一个新的通信网。
pinyin: dǒng shì huì zhù yì dào wéi chí yǒu xiào tōng xùn de xū yào， yīn cǐ jué dìng jiàn lì yī gè xīn de tōng xìn wǎng。
english: Mindful of the need to maintain efficient communication, the board of directors decided to construct a new communication network.

hanzi: 不一会儿，她把话题岔开了，不过全凭她施展出深通人情世故的女人的全部本事。
pinyin: bù yī kuài er， tā bǎ huà tí chà kāi le， bù guò quán píng tā shī zhǎn chū shēn tōng rén qíng shì gù de nu:3 rén de quán bù běn shì。
english: Presently, thought with all the skill of a woman of the world, she shuffled away the subject.

hanzi: 雌雄异株的在一个个体上产生雄性器官，而在另一同种的个体上产生雌性器官的

english: Having the male and female reproductive organs borne on separate individuals of the same species.

hanzi: 布道一次讲道，尤其是旨在于实际问题上启发会众，而不在于成为神学讲演
pinyin: bù dào yī cì jiǎng dào， yóu qí shì zhǐ zài yú shí jì wèn tí shàng qǐ fā kuài zhòng， ér bù zài yú chéng wéi shén xué jiǎng yǎn

hanzi: 酗酒令人如此糊涂。而人本来就是糊涂，所以酗酒无非就等于是以罚款免人重罪罢了。
pinyin: xù jiǔ lìng rén rú cǐ hú tu。 ér rén běn lái jiù shì hú tu， suǒ yǐ xù jiǔ wú fēi jiù děng yú shì yǐ fá kuǎn miǎn rén zhòng zuì bà le。

pinyin: rú guǒ nà me nǐ men néng shēng chǎn pǐn zhì zhè me yōu liáng kuǎn shì yǒu xīn yǐng de xié zi， tā men zài wǒ men shì chǎng shàng jiàng kuài dà shòu huān yíng。
english: If you can produce fashionable styles of such fine quality, your shoes will win great popularity in our market.

hanzi: 最后，我想借此机会请汤姆逊教授转达我们深厚的友谊，并表示对他的同胞良好的祝愿。
pinyin: zuì hòu， wǒ xiǎng jiè cǐ jī huì qǐng tāng mǔ xùn jiào shòu zhuǎn dá wǒ men shēn hòu de yǒu yì， bìng biǎo shì duì tā de tóng bāo liáng hǎo de zhù yuàn。
english: Finally, we want to take this opportunity to beg him to convey our profound friendship and best regards to his people.

hanzi: 抛杆赛苏格兰高原上的一种竞赛，将一根又长又重的木杆一端接一端地抛掷，从而表现出力量
pinyin: pāo gǎn sài sū gé lán gāo yuán shàng de yī zhòng jìng sài， jiàng yī gēn yòu zhǎng yòu zhòng de mù gǎn yī duān jiē yī duān de pāo zhì， cóng ér biǎo xiàn chū lì liang

hanzi: 在漫长的世界历史中，只有少数几代人在自由处于最危急的时刻被赋予保卫自由的责任。
pinyin: zài màn cháng de shì jiè lì shǐ zhòng， zhǐ yǒu shǎo shù jǐ dài rén zài zì yóu chǔ yú zuì wēi jí de shí kè bèi fù yǔ bǎo wèi zì yóu de zé rèn。
english: In the long history of the world, only a few generations have been granted the role of defending freedom in its hour of maximum danger.

hanzi: 我要把原有的油漆全部铲去，并要涂上新的内涂层和上光剂。我要彻底地干一下，决不马马虎虎。

english: I want all the existing paint stripped off and new undercoat and gloss applied. I want a thorough job, with no half measures.

pinyin: huǎn xíng duì yǐ bèi rèn dìng fàn yǒu mǒu zuì de rén shí xíng zàn huǎn zhí xíng qí xíng fá， bìng zài qí bǎo zhèng liáng hǎo xíng wéi de jī chǔ shàng gěi yǔ zàn shí de zì yóu
english: The act of suspending the sentence of a person convicted of a criminal offense and granting that person provisional freedom on the promise of good behavior.

hanzi: 现象学研究人的经历中所有可能出现情况的学问，在此期间，并不考虑客观现实和纯粹的主观反应
pinyin: xiàn xiàng xué yán jiū rén de jīng lì zhòng suǒ yǒu kě néng chū xiàn qíng kuàng de xué wèn， zài cǐ qī jiān， bìng bù kǎo lu:4 kè guān xiàn shí huò chún cuì de zhǔ guān fǎn yìng
english: The study of all possible appearances in human experience, during which considerations of objective reality and of purely subjective response are left out of account.

hanzi: 伊卡罗斯代达罗斯的儿子，他乘着他父亲做的人工翅膀逃离克里特时，由于离太阳太近以致粘翅膀用的蜡溶化了，而掉进了爱琴海
pinyin: yī qiǎ Luó sī dài dá Luó sī de ér zi， tā chéng zhuó tā fù qīn zuò de rén gōng chì bǎng táo lí kè lǐ tè shí， yóu yú lí tài yáng tài jìn yǐ zhì zhān chì bǎng yòng de là róng huà le， ér diào jìn le ài qín hǎi

english: Fishing boats were anchored all along the coast.
