english: Can you cover for me on Friday?

hanzi: 被配偶遗弃是离婚的理由吗？
pinyin: bèi pèi ǒu yí qì shì lí hūn de lǐ yóu ma？
english: Does desertion ground for divorce?

hanzi: 被配偶遗弃是离婚的理由吗？
pinyin: bèi pèi ǒu yí qì shì lí hūn de lǐ yóu ma？
english: Does desertion ground for divorce?

hanzi: 被虫蛀的被虫钻透或咬啮的
pinyin: bèi chóng zhù de bèi chóng zuàn tòu huò yǎo niè de
english: Bored through or gnawed by worms.

hanzi: 把饼乾放到上面的架子上.
pinyin: bǎ bǐng qián fàng dào shàng mian de jià zi shàng.
english: Put the biscuits on the shelf above.

hanzi: 她已住院去切除阑尾.
pinyin: tā yǐ zhù yuàn qù qiè chú lán wěi.
english: She's gone into hospital to have her appendix taken out.

hanzi: 国家元首被军队废黜了。
pinyin: guó jiā yuán shǒu bèi jūn duì fèi chù le。
english: The head of state was deposed by the army.

hanzi: 目前的市场相当萧条。
pinyin: mù qián de shì chǎng xiāng dāng xiāo tiáo。
english: The market is rather depressed at the moment.

hanzi: 【谚】涓滴之水汇成洋。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 juān dī zhī shuǐ huì chéng yáng。
english: Little drops of water make the mighty ocean.

hanzi: 你能闻到玫瑰花的香味吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng wén dào méi guī huā de xiāng wèi ma？
english: Can you smell the perfume of the roses?

hanzi: 你手术後疼得很难受吗?
pinyin: nǐ shǒu shù後 téng de hěn nán shòu ma?
english: Does the pain from your operation bother you much?

hanzi: 我们向着陡峭山顶攀登。
pinyin: wǒ men xiàng zhuó dǒu qiào shān dǐng pān dēng。
english: We have a precipitous climb to the peak.

hanzi: 我被带到後台去会见演员.
pinyin: wǒ bèi dài dào後 tái qù huì jiàn yǎn yuán.
english: I was taken backstage to meet the actors.

hanzi: 头大是不是表示智慧高？
pinyin: tou dà shì bú shì biǎo shì zhì huì gāo？
english: Is a large head indicative of high intelligence?

hanzi: 贫富的鸿沟始终存在。
pinyin: pín fù de hóng gōu shǐ zhōng cún zài。
english: There is always a vast chasm between rich and poor.

hanzi: 她年纪那麽大活跃得不得了.
pinyin: tā nián jì nà mó dà huó yuè de bù dé liǎo.
english: She is wonderfully active for her age.

hanzi: 这次网球赛的优胜者是谁？
pinyin: zhè cì wǎng qiú sài de yōu shèng zhě shì shéi？
english: Who's the winner of the tennis match?

hanzi: 多吃油腻食物对身体有害。
pinyin: duō jí yóu nì shí wù duì shēn tǐ yǒu hài。
english: A surfeit of rich food is bad for you.

hanzi: 已请他来加强後卫力量.
pinyin: yǐ qǐng tā lái jiā qiáng後 wèi lì liang.
english: He has been brought in to strengthen the defence.

hanzi: 突然的微笑使她容光焕发。
pinyin: tū rán de wēi xiào shǐ tā róng guāng huàn fā。
english: A sudden smile illuminated her face.

hanzi: 云杉和松树都是常绿树木。
pinyin: yún shān huò sōng shù dōu shì cháng lu:4 shù mù。
english: Spruce and pine are evergreen trees.

hanzi: 鹦鹉螺是种小型海洋动物。
pinyin: yīng wǔ luó shì zhòng xiǎo xíng hǎi yáng dòng wù。
english: Nautilus is a small sea animal.

hanzi: 这些玉米秧正茁壮生长。
pinyin: zhè xie yù mǐ yāng zhèng zhuó zhuàng shēng zhǎng。
english: These corn plants are very vigorous.

hanzi: 这种行为是雄性特有的吗?
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xíng wéi shì xióng xìng tè yǒu de ma?
english: Is this behaviour typical of the male sex?

hanzi: 当时他不必来。（但却来了）
pinyin: dāng shí tā bù bì lái。（ dàn què lái le）
english: He need not have come. (But he came.)

hanzi: 日本在菲律宾群岛的北面。
pinyin: Rì běn zài fēi lu:4 bīn qún dǎo de běi miàn。
english: Japan lies to the north of Philippines.

hanzi: 你能回忆起多久以前的事情？
pinyin: nǐ néng huí yì qǐ duō jiǔ yǐ qián de shì qing？
english: How far does your memory go back?

hanzi: 布里斯托尔位於英格兰的西部.
pinyin: bù lǐ sī tuō ěr wèi yū yīng gé lán de xī bù.
english: Bristol is in the west of England.

hanzi: 跨着以便跨过或横过；横跨
pinyin: kuà zhuó yǐ biàn kuà guò huò héng guò； héng kuà
english: So as to straddle or bridge; astride.

hanzi: 你闻到发霉烟草的臭味了吗？
pinyin: nǐ wén dào fà méi yān cǎo de chòu wèi le ma？
english: Do you smell the reek of stale tobacco?

hanzi: 他们的会谈产生了什么结果?
pinyin: tā men de huì tán chǎn shēng le shén me jié guǒ?
english: What results emerged from their talks?

hanzi: 有司令部的任何命令吗？
pinyin: yǒu sī lìng bù de rèn hé mìng lìng ma？
english: Are their any orders coming from the headquarters?

hanzi: 你能辨别这两个品种吗?
pinyin: nǐ néng biàn bié zhè liǎng gè pǐn zhǒng ma?
english: Can you differentiate between the two varieties?

hanzi: 哎呀！没想到价格这么高！
pinyin: āi yā！ mò xiǎng dào jià gé zhè me gāo！
english: Dear me, I didn't know the price is so high!

hanzi: 水汨汨地从塞孔中流下去.
pinyin: shuǐ mì mì de zòng sè kǒng zhòng liú xià qu.
english: The water gurgled as it ran down the plug-hole.

hanzi: 这本参考书对我有用处吗？
pinyin: zhè běn cān kǎo shū duì wǒ yǒu yòng chù ma？
english: Is this reference book of any use to me?

hanzi: 硼砂常被用来做玻璃制品。
pinyin: péng shā cháng bèi yòng lái zuò bō li zhì pǐn。
english: Borax is always used in making glass.

hanzi: 你什么时候完成大学课程？
pinyin: nǐ shén me shí hou wán chéng dà xué kè chéng？
english: When do you finish your college course?

hanzi: 一步行走时跨出的一步；一大步
pinyin: yí bù xíng zǒu shí kuà chū de yí bù； yī dà bù
english: A step made in walking; a stride.

hanzi: 这条路上铺满了冷杉针叶。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù shang pù mǎn le lěng shān zhēn yè。
english: The road was covered with fir needles.

hanzi: 松木是软木，柚木是硬木。
pinyin: sōng mù shì ruǎn mù， yòu mù shì yìng mù。
english: Pine is a soft wood and teak is a hard wood.

hanzi: 对上级负责的；应负责任的
pinyin: duì shàng jí fù zé de； yìng fù zé rèn de
english: Responsible to higher authority; accountable.

hanzi: 这辆倒霉汽车就是发动不起来!
pinyin: zhè liàng dǎo méi qì chē jiù shì fā dòng bù qǐ lai!
english: The wretched car won't start!

hanzi: 拉斯洛·拜罗发明了圆珠笔.
pinyin: lā sī luò· bài luó fā míng le yuán zhū bǐ.
english: Laszlo Biro invented the ball-point pen.

hanzi: 请你把这封信复印一份好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ zhè fēng xìn fù yìn yī fèn hào ma？
english: Could you Xerox this letter please?

hanzi: 别向后看，不然你会摔跤的。
pinyin: biè xiàng hòu kàn， bù rán nǐ kuài shuāi jiāo de。
english: Don't look behind or you may fall.

hanzi: 我的外籍教师来自澳大利亚。
pinyin: wǒ de wài jí jiào shī lái zì ào dà lì yà。
english: My foreign teacher came from Australia.

hanzi: 想去毛毛雨里散会儿步吗？
pinyin: xiǎng qù máo máo yǔ lǐ sàn kuài er bù ma？
english: Would you like to go for a walk in the drizzle?

hanzi: 别忘了把牙刷放到箱子里去!
pinyin: biè wàng le bǎ yá shuā fàng dào xiāng zǐ lǐ qù!
english: Don't forget to pack your toothbrush!

hanzi: 这些花因缺水而渐渐枯萎。
pinyin: zhè xie huā yīn quē shuǐ ér jiàn jiàn kū wěi。
english: The flowers are wilting for lack of water.

hanzi: 我对计算机硬件一窍不通。
pinyin: wǒ duì jì suàn jī yìng jiàn yī qiào bù tōng。
english: I know nothing about computer hardware.

hanzi: 那镇位於伦敦南面.
pinyin: nà zhèn wèi yū lún dūn nán miàn.
english: The town is to the south of (ie situated further south than) London.

hanzi: 我浏览了一遍书架上的书。
pinyin: wǒ liú lǎn le yī biàn shū jià shàng de shū。
english: I had a browse through the books on the shelf.

hanzi: 谁那麽讨厌把我的毛巾拿走了.
pinyin: shéi nà mó tǎo yàn bǎ wǒ de máo jīn ná zǒu le.
english: Some so-and-so has pinched my towel.

hanzi: 他的眼泪引起在场人的怜悯。
pinyin: tā de yǎn lèi yǐn qǐ zài chǎng rén de lián mǐn。
english: His tears were pathetic to witness.

hanzi: 请你往右边移一点好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ wàng yòu biān yí yī diǎn hào ma？
english: Would you be good enough to move a bit to the right?

hanzi: 他们在公园里种了许多紫杉。
pinyin: tā men zài gōng yuán lǐ zhòng le xǔ duō zǐ shān。
english: They planted many yews in the park.

hanzi: 把那刀子放下，以免伤人！
pinyin: bǎ nà dāo zi fàng xia， yǐ miǎn shāng rén！
english: Put down that knife before you hurt somebody!

hanzi: 我　水时脚趾让螃蟹给夹了.
pinyin: wǒ　 shuǐ shí jiǎo zhǐ ràng páng xiè jǐ jiá le.
english: A crab nipped my toe while I was paddling.

hanzi: 她对自己的恐惧直言不讳。
pinyin: tā duì zì jǐ de kǒng jù zhí yán bù huì。
english: She spoke about her fears with complete frankness.

hanzi: 你肯出多少钱买我那辆旧车?
pinyin: nǐ kěn chū duō shao qián mǎi wǒ nà liàng jiù jū?
english: How much will you give me for my old car?

hanzi: 违反一项合同；侵犯专利权
pinyin: wéi fǎn yí xiàng hé tong； qīn fàn zhuān lì quán
english: Infringe a contract; infringe a patent.

hanzi: 我可决不至於下贱到骗人的地步
pinyin: wǒ kě jué bù zhì yū xià jiàn dào piàn rén de dì bù
english: I would never stoop to cheating.

hanzi: 你丈夫什么时候下班回家？
pinyin: nǐ zhàng fu shén me shí hou xià bān huí jiā？
english: What time does your husband return from work?

hanzi: 【谚】井干方知水可贵。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 jǐng gàn fāng zhī shuǐ kě guì。
english: We never know the value of water till the well is dry.

hanzi: 你对北京的最初印象如何？
pinyin: nǐ duì Běi jīng de zuì chū yìn xiàng rú hé？
english: What were your first impressions of Beijing?

hanzi: 你尝得出炖肉里有大蒜味儿吗?
pinyin: nǐ cháng dé chū dùn ròu lǐ yǒu dà suàn wèi er ma?
english: Can you taste the garlic in this stew?

hanzi: 她去世後全家人极为悲痛.
pinyin: tā qù shì後 quán jiā rén jí wéi bēi tòng.
english: Her death was a great distress to all the family.

hanzi: 你知道今年的经济政策吗？
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào jīn nián de jīng jì zhèng cè ma？
english: Do you know the economic policy of this year?

hanzi: 他们盖著毯子（在一起）搂著.
pinyin: tā men gě著 tǎn zi（ zài yī qǐ） lǒu著.
english: They cuddled up (together) under the blanket.

hanzi: 我喜欢在闲暇时打羽毛球。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan zài xián xiá shí dǎ yǔ máo qiú。
english: I like to play badminton in my spare time.

hanzi: 他走出法庭时耷拉著脑袋.
pinyin: tā zǒu chū fǎ tíng shí dā lā著 nǎo dài.
english: He had his head down as he walked out of the court.

hanzi: 那个欠你一百块的人住在哪里？
pinyin: nèi gè qiàn nǐ yī bǎi kuài de rén zhù zài nǎ li？
english: Where is the man that owes you $100?

hanzi: 水泥袋砰的一声落在地上.
pinyin: shuǐ ní dài pēng de yī shēng luò zài dì shang.
english: The sack of cement hit the ground with a thump.

hanzi: 这个节目在哪家电视台播放?
pinyin: zhè gè jié mù zài něi jiā diàn shì tái bō fàng?
english: Which TV station is the programme on?

hanzi: 一到周末纪律往往松弛下来.
pinyin: yī dào zhōu mò jì lu:4 wǎng wǎng sōng chí xia lai.
english: Discipline is often relaxed at weekends.

hanzi: 这件羊毛衫洗后会缩水吗？
pinyin: zhè jiàn yáng máo shān xǐ hòu kuài suō shuǐ ma？
english: Will this woolen sweater shrink when washed?

hanzi: 在他们的成绩中他有何贡献?
pinyin: zài tā men de chéng jī zhòng tā yǒu hé gòng xiàn?
english: What share did he have in their success?

hanzi: 这些都是在这个车间制造的吗？
pinyin: zhè xie dōu shì zài zhè gè chē jiān zhì zào de ma？
english: Are these made in this workshop?

hanzi: 你难道不想夸夸我的新帽子吗?
pinyin: nǐ nán dào bù xiǎng kuā kuā wǒ de xīn mào zi ma?
english: Aren't you going to admire my new hat?

hanzi: 感觉好像春节已经到了似的！
pinyin: gǎn jué hǎo xiàng chūn jié yǐ jīng dào le sì de！
english: It feels like spring festival already!

hanzi: 这个工人用一个铁箍修桶。
pinyin: zhè gè gōng rén yòng yī gè tiě gū xiū tǒng。
english: The worker repaired the barrel with a hoop iron.

hanzi: 澳大利亚比英国更民主吗?
pinyin: ào dà lì yà bì Yīng guó gèng mín zhǔ ma?
english: Is there more democracy in Australia than in Britain?

hanzi: 小羊羔在田野里跳跃嬉戏。
pinyin: xiǎo yáng gāo zài tián yě lǐ tiào yuè xī xì。
english: The lambs were capering about in the fields.

hanzi: 热的金属一冷（下来）就收缩.
pinyin: rè de jīn shǔ yī lěng（ xia lai） jiù shōu suō.
english: The hot metal contracts as it cools (down).

hanzi: 他们蜷著身子蹲在桌子底下.
pinyin: tā men quán著 shēn zi dūn zài zhuō zi dǐ xia.
english: They (were) bent double crouching under the table.

hanzi: 敌人从四面八方（向我们）逼近.
pinyin: dí rén zòng sì miàn bā fāng（ xiàng wǒ men） bī jìn.
english: The enemy is closing in (on us).

hanzi: 这所别墅以古旧的风格而著名。
pinyin: zhè suǒ bié shù yǐ gǔ jiù de fēng gé ér著 míng。
english: The villa is famous for its old style.

hanzi: 我（的现金和支票簿）被抢了.
pinyin: wǒ（ de xiàn jīn huò zhī piào bù） bèi qiǎng le.
english: I was robbed (of my cash and cheque-book).

hanzi: 落叶嗒塔地打在玻璃窗上。
pinyin: luò yè tà tǎ de dǎ zài bō li chuāng shàng。
english: The falling leaves pattered against the windowpanes.

hanzi: 黑檀树是一种黑色而坚硬的树木。
pinyin: hēi tán shù shì yī zhòng hēi sè ér jiān yìng de shù mù。
english: Ebony is a hard black wood.

hanzi: 他走到我跟前问我什麽时间了.
pinyin: tā zǒu dào wǒ gēn qián wèn wǒ shí mó shí jiān le.
english: He came up (to me) and asked the time.

hanzi: 你有进入加拿大必备的签证吗?
pinyin: nǐ yǒu jìn rù jiā ná dà bì bèi de qiān zhèng ma?
english: Have you the requisite visa to enter Canada?

hanzi: 我喜欢收集秋天赤褐色的叶子。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan shōu jí qiū tiān chì hè sè de yè zi。
english: I like to collect russet autumn leaves.

hanzi: 请说明姓名、年龄和职业。
pinyin: qǐng shuō míng xìng míng、 nián líng huò zhí yè。
english: Please state your name, age and occupation.

hanzi: 她言简意赅地总结了情况.
pinyin: tā yán jiǎn yì gāi de zǒng jié le qíng kuàng.
english: She summed up the situation in a few choice phrases.

hanzi: 她的长发披在後背直垂到腰间.
pinyin: tā de zhǎng fà pī zài後 bèi zhí chuí dào yāo jiàn.
english: Her hair hung down her back to her waist.

hanzi: 别了！希望很快我们能再见面。
pinyin: biè le！ xī wàng hěn kuài wǒ men néng zài jiàn miàn。
english: Farewell! I hope we meet again soon.

hanzi: 光线暗淡有助於人们松弛精神.
pinyin: guāng xiàn àn dàn yǒu zhù yū rén men sōng chí jīng shén.
english: Subtle lighting helps people relax.

hanzi: 别把澳大利亚和奥地利混淆了。
pinyin: biè bǎ ào dà lì yà huò ào de lì hùn xiáo le。
english: Please don't confuse Australia with Austria.

hanzi: 我不同意，布莱顿城更为热闹。
pinyin: wǒ bù tóng yì， bù lái dùn chéng gèng wèi rè nao。
english: I disagree, brighton's more lively.

hanzi: 西洋樱草生长于热带国家吗？
pinyin: xī yáng yīng cǎo shēng zhǎng yú rè dài guó jiā ma？
english: Does cowslip grow in tropic countries?

hanzi: 没有汽车你究竟是怎样来的呢?
pinyin: méi yǒu qì chē nǐ jiū jìng shì zěn yàng lái de ne?
english: However did you get here without a car?

hanzi: 他们因资源短缺处境窘迫.
pinyin: tā men yīn zī yuán duǎn quē chǔ jìng jiǒng pò.
english: They were handicapped by (a) poverty of resources.

hanzi: 我们是不是可以另试试别的路线?
pinyin: wǒ men shì bú shì kě yǐ lìng shì shì bié de lù xiàn?
english: Can we perhaps try another route?

hanzi: 他被提升为陆军中尉/海军上尉。
pinyin: tā bèi tí shēng wèi lù jūn zhōng wèi/ hǎi jūn shàng wèi。
english: He was promoted to lieutenant.

hanzi: 你能告诉我是谁发明了电话？
pinyin: nǐ néng gào su wǒ shì shéi fā míng le diàn huà？
english: Can you tell me who invented the telephone?

hanzi: 【谚】蠢羊才向狼忏悔。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 chǔn yáng cái xiàng láng chàn huǐ。
english: It is a foolish sheep that makes the wolf his confessor.

hanzi: 静止的目标是最容易瞄准的。
pinyin: jìng zhǐ de mù biāo shì zuì róng yì miáo zhǔn de。
english: A stationary target is easiest to aim at.

hanzi: 他最後厌倦了这种艰苦的尝试.
pinyin: tā zuì後 yàn juàn le zhè zhǒng jiān kù de cháng shì.
english: Eventually he tired of trying so hard.

hanzi: 他的诗作有很多晦涩难解的地方。
pinyin: tā de shī zuò yǒu hěn duō huì sè nàn xiè de dì fang。
english: His poems are full of obscurities.

hanzi: 处决囚犯过去都是公开执行的。
pinyin: chǔ jué qiú fàn guò qu dōu shì gōng kāi zhí xíng de。
english: There used to be public executions.

hanzi: 该房子／公路正在施工中。
pinyin: gāi fáng zi／ gōng lù zhèng zài shī gōng zhòng。
english: The house/highway is in course of construction.

hanzi: 熨斗太热了, 你会把衣服烫焦的.
pinyin: yùn dǒu tài rè le,  nǐ kuài bǎ yī fu tàng jiāo de.
english: The iron's too hot, you'll singe the dress.

hanzi: 乡村的田野里阡陌纵横。
pinyin: xiāng cūn de tián yě lǐ qiān mò zòng héng。
english: The paths crisscrossed in the fields in the countryside.

hanzi: 他对那些事情的说法前後矛盾.
pinyin: tā duì nà xiē shì qing de shuō fa qián後 máo dùn.
english: His account of the events was inconsistent.

hanzi: 吃上中餐是多么令人愉快啊！
pinyin: jí shàng Zhōng cān shì duō me lìng rén yú kuài a！
english: How pleasant it is to dine on Chinese food!

hanzi: 这些警察戴着头盔保护自己。
pinyin: zhè xie jǐng chá dài zhuó tou kuī bǎo hù zì jǐ。
english: These policemen wear helmets to protect them.

hanzi: 半夜三更的，你起来干什么？
pinyin: bàn yè sān gèng de， nǐ qǐ lai gàn shén me？
english: Why are you getting up in the middle of the night?

hanzi: 我们该怎样来改善自己的形象呢？
pinyin: wǒ men gāi zěn yàng lái gǎi shàn zì jǐ de xíng xiàng ne？
english: How can we improve our image?

hanzi: 他跳下去的时候扭伤了足踝。
pinyin: tā tiào xià qu de shí hou niǔ shāng le zú huái。
english: He gave a wrench to his ankle when he jumped down.

hanzi: 我们该怎样来改善自己的形象呢？
pinyin: wǒ men gāi zěn yàng lái gǎi shàn zì jǐ de xíng xiàng ne？
english: How can we improve our image?

hanzi: 他毫不隐讳自己极左的观点.
pinyin: tā háo bú yǐn huì zì jǐ jí zuǒ de guān diǎn.
english: He made no bones about his extreme left-wing views.

hanzi: 你到美国是坐船还是坐飞机？
pinyin: nǐ dào Měi guó shì zuò chuán hái shì zuò fēi jī？
english: Are you going to America by boat or by plane?

hanzi: 你愿意当你弟弟的保证人吗？
pinyin: nǐ yuàn yì dàng nǐ dì di de bǎo zhèng rén ma？
english: Are you willing to stand surety for your brother?

hanzi: 我最喜欢吃桔子，其次才是香蕉。
pinyin: wǒ zuì xǐ huan jí jú zi， qí cì cái shì xiāng jiāo。
english: Next to orange I like banana best.

hanzi: 这是加仑与升的换算公式。
pinyin: zhè shì jiā lún yù shēng de huàn suàn gōng shì。
english: It's the formula for converting gallons into liters.

hanzi: 这间屋子粗大的椽子可以看得见。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wū zi cū dà de chuán zi kě yǐ kàn de xiàn。
english: The big rafter is visible in this room.

hanzi: 他瞄准羚羊射击, 把它打倒了.
pinyin: tā miáo zhǔn líng yáng shè jī,  bǎ tā dǎ dǎo le.
english: He aimed, fired and brought down the antelope.

hanzi: 【谚】良好的开端，是成功的一半。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 liáng hǎo de kāi duān， shì chéng gōng de yī bàn。
english: Well begun is half done.

hanzi: 他们以抓阄来决定谁先去。
pinyin: tā men yǐ zhuā jiū lái jué dìng shéi xiān qù。
english: They drew lots to decide which of them should go first.

hanzi: 你们公司有固定的办公时间吗?
pinyin: nǐ men gōng sī yǒu gù dìng de bàn gōng shí jiān ma?
english: Are there set hours of work in your company?

hanzi: 他是个笨手笨脚的[古里古怪的]家伙.
pinyin: tā shì gè bèn shǒu bèn jué de[ gǔ lǐ gǔ guài de] jiā huo.
english: He's an awkward/queer old cuss.

hanzi: 蟾蜍外表丑陋，但很有用。
pinyin: chán chú wài biǎo chǒu lòu， dàn hěn yǒu yòng。
english: Toads have an ugly appearance but they are useful.

hanzi: 你喜欢草地球场还是硬地球场？
pinyin: nǐ xǐ huan cǎo dì qiú chǎng hái shì yìng dì qiú chǎng？
english: Do you prefer grass or hard courts?

hanzi: 他是否给出了令人满意的解释？
pinyin: tā shì fǒu jǐ chū le lìng rén mǎn yì de jiě shì？
english: Did he provide a satisfactory explanation?

hanzi: 将这两首诗（的风格）加以比较.
pinyin: jiàng zhè liǎng shǒu shī（ de fēng gé） jiā yǐ bǐ jiào.
english: Compare (the style of) the two poems.

hanzi: 一阵喧闹声转移了我们的注意力。
pinyin: yī zhèn xuān nào shēng zhuǎn yí le wǒ men de zhù yì lì。
english: A loud noise diverted my attention.

hanzi: 哪一条河流是它们之中最短的？
pinyin: něi yī tiáo hé liú shì tā men zhī zhōng zuì duǎn de？
english: Which river is the shortest among them?

hanzi: 出院时，我已经完全痊愈了。
pinyin: chū yuàn shí， wǒ yǐ jīng wán quán quán yù le。
english: When I left the hospital I was completely cured.

hanzi: 这些箭的箭头上都蘸上了毒药。
pinyin: zhè xie jiàn de jiàn tóu shàng dōu zhàn shàng le dú yào。
english: The arrows had been tipped with poison.

hanzi: 先把黄油融化, 然後加入面粉.
pinyin: xiān bǎ huáng yóu róng huà,  rán後 jiā rù miàn fěn.
english: Melt the butter and then blend in the flour.

hanzi: 他的音乐据说是"好"或"了不起"。
pinyin: tā de yīn yuè jù shuō shì" hào" huò" le bù qǐ"。
english: His music is said to be "good" or "great".

hanzi: 爱丁堡在伦敦北面很远的地方。
pinyin: ài dīng pù zài lún dūn běi miàn hěn yuǎn de dì fang。
english: Edinburgh is a long way north of London.

hanzi: 他翻阅地址簿，寻找号码。
pinyin: tā fān yuè dì zhǐ bù， xún zhǎo hào mǎ。
english: He thumbed through the address book looking for the number.

hanzi: 他翻阅地址簿，寻找号码。
pinyin: tā fān yuè dì zhǐ bù， xún zhǎo hào mǎ。
english: He thumbed through the address book looking for the number.

hanzi: 他翻阅地址簿，寻找号码。
pinyin: tā fān yuè dì zhǐ bù， xún zhǎo hào mǎ。
english: He thumbed through the address book looking for the number.

hanzi: 太阳、月亮和星星都是天体。
pinyin: tài yáng、 yuè liàng huò xīng xing dōu shì tiān tǐ。
english: The sun, moon and stars are heavenly bodies.

hanzi: 骨粉和硝酸盐是普通的肥料。
pinyin: gǔ fěn huò xiāo suān yán shì pǔ tōng de féi liào。
english: Bone-meal and nitrates are common fertilizers.

hanzi: 跟他在一起的那个女人究竟是谁?
pinyin: gēn tā zài yī qǐ de nèi gè nu:3 rén jiū jìng shì shéi?
english: Who on earth is that female he's with?

hanzi: 他把裤子往上拉起，然後坐下。
pinyin: tā bǎ kù zi wàng shàng lā qǐ， rán後 zuò xia。
english: He hitched up his trousers before sitting down.

hanzi: 她落选後其影响力大为降低.
pinyin: tā luò xuǎn後 qí yǐng xiǎng lì dà wèi jiàng dī.
english: Her influence declined after she lost the election.

hanzi: 【谚】井底之蛙，所见不广。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 jǐng dǐ zhī wā， suǒ xiàn bù guǎng。
english: The frog in the well knows nothing of the great ocean.

hanzi: 今天阳光明媚，天气宜人，是吗？
pinyin: jīn tiān yáng guāng míng mèi， tiān qì yí rén， shì ma？
english: Nice and bright today, is not it?

hanzi: 这种金属框受压後容易变形。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jīn shǔ kuàng shòu yà後 róng yì biàn xíng。
english: The metal frame tends to twist under pressure.

hanzi: 你能为我觅到那本罕见的古书吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng wèi wǒ mì dào nà běn hǎn jiàn de gǔ shū ma？
english: Can you procure the rare old book for me?

hanzi: 她吓唬孩子说要狠狠打他们一顿.
pinyin: tā xià hǔ hái zi shuō yào hěn hěn dǎ tā men yī dùn.
english: She threatened the children with a walloping.

hanzi: 我好久没有收到约翰的来信了。
pinyin: wǒ hǎo jiǔ méi yǒu shōu dào Yuē hàn de lái xìn le。
english: I have not heard from John for a long time.

pinyin: háng zhōu shì yī zuò yǒu yōu jiǔ lì shǐ de chéng shì。
english: Hangzhou is a city with a long history.

pinyin: zhè zhǒng suǒ wèi de dà jiǎn jià bù guò shì gè piàn jú!
english: This so-called bargain is just a con!

hanzi: 我能把这些秘密计划委托给你吗？
pinyin: wǒ néng bǎ zhè xie mì mì jì huà wěi tuō jǐ nǐ ma？
english: Can I entrust you with the secret plans?

hanzi: 崎岖不平的道路使车颠簸得很厉害。
pinyin: qī qū bù píng de dào lù shǐ jū diān bǒ de hěn lì hai。
english: The rough road made the car vibrate.

pinyin: yuè dú zhàn qù le wǒ dà bù fen de xián xiá shí jiān。
english: Reading occupies most of my free time.

hanzi: 难道你还不明白－－那都是诬陷。
pinyin: nán dào nǐ huán bù míng bái－－ nà dōu shì wū xiàn。
english: Don't you see it was all a frame-up!

hanzi: 她付了维修费以减轻内疚感。
pinyin: tā fù le wéi xiū fèi yǐ jiǎn qīng nèi jiù gǎn。
english: She paid the repair bill as a salve to her conscience.

hanzi: 熨斗压在湿布上时发出嘶嘶声。
pinyin: yùn dǒu yà zài shī bù shàng shí fā chū sī sī shēng。
english: The iron hissed as it pressed the wet cloth.

hanzi: 代我向琼斯夫妇及其子女问好.
pinyin: dài wǒ xiàng qióng sī fū fù jí qí zǐ nu:3 wèn hǎo.
english: Give my regards to Mr and Mrs Jones and family.

hanzi: 他们放了录像片《乱世佳人》。
pinyin: tā men fàng le lù xiàng piàn《 luàn shì jiā rén》。
english: They showed a video of "Gone with the Wind".

hanzi: 古埃及人曾经拥有高度文明。
pinyin: gǔ Aī jí rén céng jīng yōng yǒu gāo dù wén míng。
english: The ancient Egyptians had advanced civilization.

hanzi: 他非常擅长於模仿朋友的言行.
pinyin: tā fēi cháng shàn cháng yū mó fǎng péng you de yán xìng.
english: He's very clever at imitating his friends.

pinyin: zhè wèi lǎo rén zài shā fā shàng dǎ qǐ kē shuì lái。
english: The old man is dropping away in the sofa.

hanzi: 我游览伦敦时喜欢坐公共汽车.
pinyin: wǒ yóu lǎn lún dūn shí xǐ huan zuò gōng gòng qì chē.
english: When visiting London I like to travel by bus.

hanzi: 柜台上蜷伏着一只硕大的猫。
pinyin: guì tái shàng quán fú zhuó yī zhǐ shuò dà de māo。
english: There was an enormous cat crouching on the counter.

hanzi: 很多种类的松鼠都很容易驯养。
pinyin: hěn duō zhǒng lèi de sōng shǔ dōu hěn róng yì xún yǎng。
english: Many kinds of squirrels are easy to tame.

hanzi: 吸烟与肺部疾病之间有关系吗？
pinyin: xī yān yù fèi bù jí bìng zhī jiān yǒu guān xi ma？
english: Is there a link between smoking and lung disease?

hanzi: 他的双臂和双腿严重受伤。
pinyin: tā de shuāng bì huò shuāng tuǐ yán zhòng shòu shāng。
english: He suffered serious injuries to the arms and legs.

hanzi: 他们有没有投标争取承包合同？
pinyin: tā men yǒu méi yǒu tóu biāo zhēng qǔ chéng bāo hé tong？
english: Have they put in a bid for the contract?

hanzi: 他猜疑管道里什麽地方漏了.
pinyin: tā cāi yí guǎn dào lǐ shí mó dì fang lòu le.
english: He suspected that a leak was present somewhere along the pipe.

hanzi: 灼热的阳光炙烤着光秃秃的大地。
pinyin: zhuó rè de yáng guāng zhì kǎo zhuó guāng tū tū de dà dì。
english: The fierce sun parched the bare earth.

hanzi: 那个理论的精髓是为人民服务。
pinyin: nèi gè lǐ lùn de jīng suǐ shì wèi rén mín fú wù。
english: The pith of that theory is serving for people.

hanzi: 畏缩不前的或落后的；迟误拖拉的
pinyin: wèi suō bù qián de huò luò hòu de； chí wù tuō lā de
english: Hanging back or falling behind; dilatory.

hanzi: 革命者计划推翻傀儡政府。
pinyin: gé mìng zhě jì huà tuī fān kuǐ lěi zhèng fǔ。
english: The revolutionist planned to overturn this puppet regime.

hanzi: 麝香是一种有强烈气味的物质。
pinyin: shè xiāng shì yī zhòng yǒu qiáng liè qì wèi de wù zhì。
english: Musk is a kind of strong-smelling substance.

hanzi: 政府的现行方针後患无穷.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ de xiàn xíng fāng zhēn後 huàn wú qióng.
english: The Government's present course will only lead to disaster.

hanzi: 麝香是一种有强烈气味的物质。
pinyin: shè xiāng shì yī zhòng yǒu qiáng liè qì wèi de wù zhì。
english: Musk is a kind of strong-smelling substance.

hanzi: 你的[这种]耳环是夹上去的吗?
pinyin: nǐ de[ zhè zhǒng] ěr huán shì jiá shàng qù de ma?
english: Do you clip those ear-rings on/Do those ear-rings clip on?

hanzi: 别那麽使劲扯书页，那会撕破的。
pinyin: biè nà mó shǐ jìn chě shū yè， nà kuài sī pò de。
english: Don't pull the pages so hard or they will tear.

hanzi: 人类与大自然进行不懈的斗争.
pinyin: rén lèi yù dà zì rán jìn xíng bù xiè de dòu zhēng.
english: Man is engaged in a constant struggle with Nature.

hanzi: 这份报告我只来得及浏览了一遍.
pinyin: zhè fèn bào gào wǒ zhǐ lái de jí liú lǎn le yī biàn.
english: I've only had time to dip into the report.

hanzi: 你的[这种]耳环是夹上去的吗?
pinyin: nǐ de[ zhè zhǒng] ěr huán shì jiá shàng qù de ma?
english: Do you clip those ear-rings on/Do those ear-rings clip on?

hanzi: 这麽紧张, 我的神经快吃不消了.
pinyin: zhè mó jǐn zhāng,  wǒ de shén jīng kuài jí bù xiāo le.
english: My nerves won't stand the strain much longer.

hanzi: 总统正在对欧洲做私人访问。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng zhèng zài duì ōu zhōu zuò sī rén fǎng wèn。
english: The president is paying a private visit to Europe.

hanzi: 是谁泄漏了部门重组的细节?
pinyin: shì shéi xiè lòu le bù mén chóng zǔ de xì jié?
english: Who let out the details of the reshuffle in the department?

hanzi: 关于这个问题，你能指点我一下吗？
pinyin: guān yú zhè gè wèn tí， nǐ néng zhǐ diǎn wǒ yī xià ma？
english: Can you enlighten me on this subject?

hanzi: 我们从山上俯瞰下面的山谷。
pinyin: wǒ men zòng shān shàng fǔ kàn xià mian de shān gǔ。
english: We looked down from the mountain to the valley below.

hanzi: 这个公司做买卖赚钱[赔钱].
pinyin: zhè gè gōng sī zuò mǎi mài zhuàn qián[ péi qián].
english: The firm is trading (ie doing business) at a profit/loss.

hanzi: 《茶馆》正在首都剧场上演。
pinyin: 《 chá guǎn》 zhèng zài shǒu dū jù chǎng shàng yǎn。
english: "The Teahouse" is playing at the Capital Theater.

hanzi: 那个男孩正在游泳池里游泳吗？
pinyin: nèi gè nán hái zhèng zài yóu yǒng chí lǐ yóu yǒng ma？
english: Be the boy swimming in the swimming-pool?

hanzi: 能工巧匠的特点是一丝不苟.
pinyin: néng gōng qiǎo jiàng de tè diǎn shì yī sī bù gǒu.
english: Attention to detail is the hallmark of a fine craftsman.

hanzi: 向女神祭献了一头牺牲小牛.
pinyin: xiàng nu:3 shén zhài xiàn le yī tóu xī shēng xiǎo niú.
english: A calf was offered up as a sacrifice to the goddess.

hanzi: 广袤的平原被厚厚的雪覆盖着。
pinyin: guǎng mào de píng yuán bèi hòu hòu de xuě fù gài zhuó。
english: The vast champaign was covered with thick snow.

hanzi: 政府会拨款资助美术事业吗？
pinyin: zhèng fǔ kuài bō kuǎn zī zhù měi shù shì yè ma？
english: Will the government provide money to support the arts?

hanzi: 旅客须知要服用预防疟疾药.
pinyin: lu:3 kè xū zhī yào fú yòng yù fáng nu:è jí yào.
english: Travellers are reminded that malaria tablets are advisable.

hanzi: 熨衬衫领要先喷些粉浆再熨.
pinyin: yùn chèn shān lǐng yào xiān pèn xiē fěn jiàng zài yùn.
english: Spray starch on the shirt collars before ironing them.

hanzi: 一盎司糖可以供给多少卡热量？
pinyin: yī àng sī táng kě yǐ gōng gěi duō shao qiǎ rè liàng？
english: How many calories can an ounce of sugar supply?

hanzi: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。
pinyin: wǒ zǒng fèn bù qīng tā huò tā de luán shēng xiōng dì。
english: I always confounded him with his twin brother.

hanzi: 我们做些什么才能减轻她的烦恼呢？
pinyin: wǒ men zuò xiē shén me cái néng jiǎn qīng tā de fán nǎo ne？
english: What can we do to lessen her vexation?

hanzi: 遇见大人使这个害羞的孩子很困窘
pinyin: yù jiàn dà ren shǐ zhè gè hài xiū de hái zi hěn kùn jiǒng
english: Meeting adults embarrassed the shy child.

hanzi: 这木筏依靠空汽油桶的浮力漂浮。
pinyin: zhè mù fá yī kào kòng qì yóu tǒng de fú lì piāo fú。
english: The raft was buoyed up by empty petrol cans.

hanzi: 这冰的厚度能禁得住在上边滑冰吗?
pinyin: zhè bīng de hòu dù néng jìn de zhù zài shàng bian huá bīng ma?
english: Is the ice thick enough for skating?

hanzi: 我脑子一下子记不住这麽多信息.
pinyin: wǒ nǎo zi yí xià zi jì bú zhù zhè mó duō xìn xī.
english: My brain can't hold so much information at one time.

hanzi: 那架飞机的残骸散布范围很大.
pinyin: nà jià fēi jī de cán hái sàn bù fàn wéi hěn dà.
english: Wreckage of the aircraft was scattered over a wide area.

hanzi: 要是把眼睛闭上就什麽也看不见了。
pinyin: yào shì bǎ yǎn jīng bì shàng jiù shí mó yě kàn bù jiàn le。
english: If you shut your eyes you can't see.

hanzi: 我体谅你可能事先已另有承诺.
pinyin: wǒ tǐ liàng nǐ kě néng shì xiān yǐ lìng yǒu chéng nuò.
english: I appreciate that you may have prior commitments.

hanzi: 你能将这两个品种区别开来吗?
pinyin: nǐ néng jiàng zhè liǎng gè pǐn zhǒng qū bié kāi lái ma?
english: Can you differentiate one variety from the other?

hanzi: 那个著名的化学家赢得了诺贝尔奖。
pinyin: nèi gè著 míng de huà xué jiā yíng dé le nuò Bèi ěr jiǎng。
english: The famous chemist won the Nobel Prize.

hanzi: 他的偏袒态度招致了不少批评。
pinyin: tā de piān tǎn tài du zhāo zhì le bù shǎo pī píng。
english: His partial attitude called forth a lot of criticism.

hanzi: 你体重减轻了这么多，真了不起！
pinyin: nǐ tǐ zhòng jiǎn qīng le zhè me duō， zhēn le bù qǐ！
english: It's miraculous how much weight you've lost!

hanzi: 产量的大小在於我们努力的程度.
pinyin: chǎn liàng de dà xiǎo zài yū wǒ men nǔ lì de chéng dù.
english: How much is produced depends on how hard we work.

hanzi: 一切均将取决於这些会谈的结果.
pinyin: yī qiè jūn jiàng qǔ jué yū zhè xie huì tán de jié guǒ.
english: Everything hinges on the outcome of these talks.

hanzi: 物理学研究作用於物体上的力.
pinyin: wù lǐ xué yán jiū zuò yòng yū wù tǐ shàng de lì.
english: Physics deals with the forces acting on concrete objects.

hanzi: 她以巧妙的手腕处理了这个问题。
pinyin: tā yǐ qiǎo miào de shǒu wàn chǔ lǐ le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: She dealt with the problem with consummate skill.

hanzi: 她以巧妙的手腕处理了这个问题。
pinyin: tā yǐ qiǎo miào de shǒu wàn chǔ lǐ le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: She dealt with the problem with consummate skill.

hanzi: 他引用《圣经》来支持他的信仰。
pinyin: tā yǐn yòng《 shèng jīng》 lái zhī chí tā de xìn yǎng。
english: He quotes the Bible to support his beliefs.

hanzi: 他立正敬礼，鞋后跟发出咔嗒一声。
pinyin: tā lì zhèng jìng lǐ， xié hòu gēn fā chū咔 tà yī shēng。
english: He saluted with a click of his heels.

hanzi: 我肯定是在这里的什麽地方--没错!
pinyin: wǒ kěn dìng shì zài zhè lǐ de shí mó dì fang-- méi cuò!
english: I know (that) it's here somewhere it must be!

hanzi: 我不太明白，你能再解释一下吗？
pinyin: wǒ bù tài míng bai， nǐ néng zài jiě shì yī xià ma？
english: I didn't quite follow; could you explain it again?

hanzi: 琼斯夫人丈夫的死讯把她吓蒙了。
pinyin: qióng sī fū ren zhàng fu de sǐ xùn bǎ tā xià měng le。
english: Her husband's death knocked Mrs.Jones off her feet.

hanzi: 他们在崎岖不平的乡村小路上走着。
pinyin: tā men zài qī qū bù píng de xiāng cūn xiǎo lù shàng zǒu zhuó。
english: They walk on the rugged country road.

hanzi: 不善交际的缺乏社会风度的；不圆滑的
pinyin: bù shàn jiāo jì de quē fá shè huì fēng dù de； bù yuán huá de
english: Lacking social polish; tactless.

hanzi: 综合各种因素之後她决定辞职。
pinyin: zōng hé gè zhǒng yīn sù zhī後 tā jué dìng cí zhí。
english: A combination of factors led to her decision to resign.

hanzi: 经济正在萎缩而不是在增长中。
pinyin: jīng jì zhèng zài wěi suō ér bú shì zài zēng zhǎng zhòng。
english: The economy is shrinking instead of growing.

hanzi: 边陲山区的风光美丽如画。
pinyin: biān chuí shān qū de fēng guāng měi lì rú huà。
english: The mountains in the border area are as beautiful as a painting.

hanzi: 我丢了一块带蓝色花边的白手绢。
pinyin: wǒ diū le yī kuài dài lán sè huā biān de bái shǒu juàn。
english: I lost a white handkerchief with a blue border.

hanzi: 你有没有绳子来把这些箱子捆好？
pinyin: nǐ yǒu méi yǒu shéng zi lái bǎ zhè xie xiāng zǐ kǔn hào？
english: Have you got some twine to tie this box up?

hanzi: 双方随後不可避免地争吵起来。
pinyin: shuāng fāng suí後 bù kě bì miǎn de zhēng chǎo qǐ lai。
english: Inevitably, a quarrel followed between the two sides.

hanzi: 部队从沦陷的城市安全撤出。
pinyin: bù duì zòng lún xiàn de chéng shì ān quán chè chū。
english: The troop made good their retreat from the occupied city.

hanzi: 马克。吐温写的作品你知道多少？
pinyin: mǎ kè。 tù wēn xiě de zuò pǐn nǐ zhī dào duō shao？
english: How much do you know about the works of Mark Twin.

hanzi: 这腰带是在前面打结还是在後面？
pinyin: zhè yāo dài shì zài qián miàn dǎ jié hái shì zài後 miàn？
english: Does this sash tie in front or at the back?

hanzi: 到处都是灰尘, 他不停地打著喷嚏.
pinyin: dào chù dōu shì huī chén,  tā bù tíng de dǎ著 pēn tì.
english: With all that dust about, he couldn't stop sneezing.

hanzi: 她获得奖学金後受到极大的鼓舞.
pinyin: tā huò dé jiǎng xué jīn後 shòu dào jí dà de gǔ wǔ.
english: Winning the scholarship gave her a tremendous lift.

hanzi: 她以巧妙的手腕处理了这个问题。
pinyin: tā yǐ qiǎo miào de shǒu wàn chǔ lǐ le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: She dealt with the problem with consummate skill.

hanzi: 她失踪一事引起了各种流言蜚语.
pinyin: tā shī zōng yī shì yǐn qǐ le gè zhǒng liú yán fěi yù.
english: Her disappearance gave rise to the wildest rumours.

hanzi: 一杯橙汁饮料没有什么营养。
pinyin: yī bēi chéng zhī yǐn liào méi yǒu shén me yíng yǎng。
english: There's not much sustenance in a glass of orange squash.

hanzi: 我今天在城里遇到了一位老朋友呢！
pinyin: wǒ jīn tiān zài chéng lǐ yù dào le yī wèi lǎo péng you ne！
english: I met with an old friend in the town today!

hanzi: 照片放大後细微之处都很清楚.
pinyin: zhào piàn fàng dà後 xì wēi zhī chù dōu hěn qīng chu.
english: The enlargement brings out the details in the photograph.

hanzi: [谚]外表不可靠；不可专看表面现象。
pinyin: [ yàn] wài biǎo bù kě kào； bù kě zhuān kàn biǎo miàn xiàn xiàng。
english: Never judge from appearances.

hanzi: 玛丽留下几块布准备做一床被子。
pinyin: Mǎ lì liú xià jǐ kuài bù zhǔn bèi zuò yī chuáng bèi zi。
english: Mary saved up pieces of cloth to make a quilt.

hanzi: 我好想明年暑假去一趟欧洲。
pinyin: wǒ hào xiǎng míng nián shǔ jià qù yī tàng ōu zhōu。
english: I feel like going to Europe for a visit next summer vacation.

hanzi: 送小孩上学的重担又推给了我！
pinyin: sòng xiǎo hái shàng xué de zhòng dàn yòu tuī jǐ le wǒ！
english: I got saddled with taking the children to school again!

hanzi: 第一次测量声速是在什么时候？
pinyin: dì yī cì cè liàng shēng sù shì zài shén me shí hou？
english: When did the first measurement of the speed of sound take?

hanzi: 她打算毕业後从事社会福利工作.
pinyin: tā dǎ suàn bì yè後 cóng shì shè huì fú lì gōng zuò.
english: She wants to do social work when she finishes college.

hanzi: 这个年轻军官被提升为上尉。
pinyin: zhè gè nián qīng jūn guān bèi tí shēng wèi shàng wèi。
english: The young army officer was promoted to the rank of captain.

hanzi: 叫你怎麽做就怎麽做, 否则有麻烦.
pinyin: jiào nǐ zěn mó zuò jiù zěn mó zuò,  fǒu zé yǒu má fan.
english: Do as you're told, otherwise you'll be in trouble.

hanzi: 那女间谍伪装成顾问工程师.
pinyin: nà nu:3 jiàn dié wěi zhuāng chéng gù wèn gōng chéng shī.
english: The spy's cover was that she was a consultant engineer.

hanzi: 你通常是怎样度过你的空闲时间？
pinyin: nǐ tōng cháng shì zěn yàng dù guò nǐ de kòng xián shí jiān？
english: How do you usually spend your leisure time?

hanzi: 眼泪由上眼睑下面的器官分泌。
pinyin: yǎn lèi yóu shàng yǎn jiǎn xià mian de qì guān fēn mì。
english: Tears are secreted by an organ under the upper eyelid.

hanzi: 前年圣诞节过後我一直没见过他.
pinyin: qián nián Shèng dàn jié guò後 wǒ yī zhí mò xiàn guò tā.
english: I haven't seen him since the Christmas before last.

hanzi: 藉助卫星可观察到部队的调动.
pinyin: jiè zhù wèi xīng kě guān chá dào bù duì de diào dòng.
english: Troop movements can be observed from space by a satellite.

hanzi: 请你在这件衬衫上钉一颗钮扣好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ zài zhè jiàn chèn shān shàng dīng yī kē niǔ kòu hào ma？
english: Will you stitch a button on this shirt?

hanzi: 别躲躲闪闪的: 给我们一个明确的答覆.
pinyin: biè duǒ duǒ shǎn shǎn de:  jǐ wǒ men yī gè míng què de dá fù.
english: Don't shuffle: give us a clear answer.

hanzi: 她一定很难过, 但毫不形之於色.
pinyin: tā yī dìng hěn nán guò,  dàn háo bú xíng zhī yū shǎi.
english: She gives no outward sign of the sadness she must feel.

hanzi: "他会没事儿的，他有成功的条件。"
pinyin: " tā kuài mò shìr de， tā yǒu chéng gōng de tiáo jiàn。"
english: "He'll be all right, he's got what it takes."

hanzi: 我宁愿约翰打网球而不玩扑克牌。
pinyin: wǒ nìng yuàn Yuē hàn dǎ wǎng qiú ér bù wàn pū kè pái。
english: I prefer John's playing tennis to his playing cards.

hanzi: 你吃了这片药神经就不那麽紧张了。
pinyin: nǐ jí le zhè piàn yào shén jīng jiù bù nà mó jǐn zhāng le。
english: This pill will help to settle your nerves.

hanzi: 你听见没听见昨晚隔壁闹翻天了?
pinyin: nǐ tīng jiàn mò tīng jiàn zuó wǎn gé bì nào fān tiān le?
english: Did you hear the carryings-on next door last night?

hanzi: 这种橙汁饮品不含人工调味料.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng chéng zhī yǐn pǐn bù hán rén gōng tiáo wèi liào.
english: This orange drink contains no artificial flavourings.

hanzi: 月球对地球的吸引力造成潮汐。
pinyin: yuè qiú duì dì qiú de xī yǐn lì zào chéng cháo xì。
english: The attraction of the moon for the earth causes the tides.

hanzi: 她的小说描写的是伦敦现代的生活。
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō miáo xiě de shì lún dūn xiàn dài de shēng huó。
english: Her novel depicts life in modern London.

hanzi: 她的小说描写的是伦敦现代的生活。
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō miáo xiě de shì lún dūn xiàn dài de shēng huó。
english: Her novel depicts life in modern London.

hanzi: 经常吮吸拇指能使牙齿向外突出.
pinyin: jīng cháng shǔn xī mǔ zhǐ néng shǐ yá chǐ xiàng wài tū chū.
english: Thumb-sucking can cause protrusion of the teeth.

hanzi: 她受伤後获得保险公司的赔偿.
pinyin: tā shòu shāng後 huò dé bǎo xiǎn gōng sī de péi cháng.
english: She was compensated by the insurance company for her injuries.

hanzi: 赶快！会议已开始了，我们迟到了。
pinyin: gǎn kuài！ huì yì yǐ kāi shǐ le， wǒ men chí dào le。
english: Get a move on! We're already late for the meeting.

hanzi: 屡次侵占我的闲暇时间, 我很反感.
pinyin: lu:3 cì qīn zhàn wǒ de xián xiá shí jiān,  wǒ hěn fǎn gǎn.
english: I resent these incursions into/upon my leisure time.

hanzi: 你还记得我们解剖青蛙的那堂课吗？
pinyin: nǐ huán jì de wǒ men jiě pōu qīng wā de nà táng kè ma？
english: Do you remember the lesson on the anatomy of a frog?

hanzi: 关于这件事，你能给我一些建议吗？
pinyin: guān yú zhè jiàn shì， nǐ néng jǐ wǒ yī xiē jiàn yì ma？
english: Can you give me any suggestion on this matter?

hanzi: 你们公司的海关注册号码是多少？
pinyin: nǐ men gōng sī de hǎi guān zhù cè hào mǎ shì duō shao？
english: What's your company's registration number in customs?

hanzi: 这些树林里经常栖息着各种鸟类。
pinyin: zhè xie shù lín lǐ jīng cháng qī xī zhuó gè zhǒng niǎo lèi。
english: These woods are frequented by all kinds of birds.

hanzi: 这些树林里经常栖息着各种鸟类。
pinyin: zhè xie shù lín lǐ jīng cháng qī xī zhuó gè zhǒng niǎo lèi。
english: These woods are frequented by all kinds of birds.

hanzi: 我在想像中彷佛听到她在呼唤我.
pinyin: wǒ zài xiǎng xiàng zhòng páng fú tīng dào tā zài hū huàn wǒ.
english: In my imagination, I thought I heard her calling me.

hanzi: 你能给我形容一下那个窃贼的模样吗?
pinyin: nǐ néng jǐ wǒ xíng róng yī xià nèi gè qiè zéi de mú yàng ma?
english: Can you give me a description of the thief?

hanzi: 进入黑暗的房间时, 瞳孔就扩大.
pinyin: jìn rù hēi àn de fáng jiān shí,  tóng kǒng jiù kuò dà.
english: The pupils of your eyes dilate when you enter a dark room.

hanzi: 我再也不做那种事了, 我已有了教训!
pinyin: wǒ zài yě bù zuò nà zhòng shì le,  wǒ yǐ yǒu le jiào xun!
english: I'll never do that again; I've learned my lesson!

hanzi: 我们开出约五十英里汽车就抛锚了.
pinyin: wǒ men kāi chū yuē wǔ shí yīng lǐ qì chē jiù pāo máo le.
english: We had gone about fifty miles when the car broke down.

hanzi: 她总是抱怨伦敦缺少体育设施.
pinyin: tā zǒng shì bào yuàn lún dūn quē shǎo tǐ yù shè shī.
english: She's always lamenting the lack of sports facilities in town.

hanzi: 女王为表彰他的贡献封他为爵士.
pinyin: nu:3 wáng wèi biǎo zhāng tā de gòng xiàn fēng tā wèi jué shì.
english: The Queen requited his services with a knighthood.

hanzi: 运动会持续多少天，你知道吗？
pinyin: yùn dòng huì chí xù duō shao tiān， nǐ zhī dào ma？
english: How many days, can you guess, did the sports meeting last?

hanzi: 群众（为他[演出]）鼓掌五分钟.
pinyin: qún zhòng（ wèi tā[ yǎn chū]） gǔ zhǎng wǔ fēn zhōng.
english: The crowd applauded (him/the perfomance) for five minutes.

hanzi: 仔细检查了废墟後发现了新的证据.
pinyin: zǐ xì jiǎn chá le fèi xū後 fā xiàn le xīn de zhèng jù.
english: Careful examination of the ruins revealed new evidence.

hanzi: 大部分湖泊都在北部中心地区吗？
pinyin: dà bù fen hú pō dōu zài běi bù zhōng xīn dì qū ma？
english: Are most of the lakes Located in the north central region?

hanzi: 我一直在（多方）打听这件事.
pinyin: wǒ yī zhí zài（ duō fāng） dǎ ting zhè jiàn shì.
english: I've been making (some) inquiries (ie trying to find out) about it.

hanzi: 抢救人员冲向飞机坠毁的现场。
pinyin: qiǎng jiù rén yuán chòng xiàng fēi jī zhuì huǐ de xiàn chǎng。
english: Rescue workers rushed to the site of the plane crash.

hanzi: 蜡烛发出轻轻的毕剥声後就熄灭了.
pinyin: là zhú fā chū qīng qīng de bì bō shēng後 jiù xī miè le.
english: The candle gave a few faint splutters and then went out.

hanzi: 摩西率领以色列的子民离开了埃及。
pinyin: Mó xī shuài lǐng yǐ shǎi liè de zi mín lí kāi le Aī jí。
english: Moses led the children of Israel out of the Egypt.

hanzi: 【谚】智者热爱真理，愚者回避真理。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhì zhě rè ài zhēn lǐ， yú zhě huí bì zhēn lǐ。
english: Wise men love truth, whereas fools shun it.

hanzi: 把你自己身上掸掸--上面都是粉笔末.
pinyin: bǎ nǐ zì jǐ shēn shàng dǎn dǎn-- shàng mian dōu shì fěn bǐ mò.
english: Dust yourself down you're covered in chalk.

hanzi: 听到他逃之夭夭的消息，我感到惊讶。
pinyin: tīng dào tā táo zhī yāo yāo de xiāo xi， wǒ gǎn dào jīng yà。
english: I was astonished at the news of his escape.

hanzi: 所罗门国王的宫廷以其华丽著称。
pinyin: suǒ luó mén guó wáng de gōng tíng yǐ qí huá lì著 chèng。
english: The court of King Solomon was noted for its splendor.

hanzi: 那老汉拄著拐杖一瘸一拐地走著.
pinyin: nà lǎo hàn zhǔ著 guǎi zhàng yī qué yī guǎi de zǒu著.
english: The old man hobbled along (the road) with the aid of his stick.

hanzi: 关于此事，你能给我提供什么消息吗？
pinyin: guān yú cǐ shì， nǐ néng jǐ wǒ tí gōng shén me xiāo xi ma？
english: Can you give me any information on this matter?

hanzi: 你肯定你想要他作你的终身伴侣吗？
pinyin: nǐ kěn dìng nǐ xiǎng yào tā zuò nǐ de zhōng shēn bàn lu:3 ma？
english: Are you sure you want him to be your partner?

hanzi: 【谚】与其补救于已然，不如防止于未然。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yǔ qí bǔ jiù yú yǐ rán， bù rú fáng zhǐ yú wèi rán。
english: Prevention is better than cure.

hanzi: 我的力气、 兴趣、 热情等正在减退.
pinyin: wǒ de lì qi、  xìng qu、  rè qíng děng zhèng zài jiǎn tuì.
english: My strength, interest, enthusiasm, etc is flagging.

hanzi: ｀你累了吗?＇｀是的, 我有点儿（累）.＇
pinyin: ｀ nǐ lèi le ma?＇｀ shì de,  wǒ yǒu diǎn er（ lèi）.＇
english: `Are you tired?' `Yes, I am a bit (tired).'

hanzi: 我瞄准了目标射击，但却打在了墙上。
pinyin: wǒ miáo zhǔn le mù biāo shè jī， dàn què dǎ zài le qiáng shàng。
english: I aimed at the target but hit the wall.

hanzi: 他至少也该来道个别（然而却没来）。
pinyin: tā zhì shǎo yě gāi lái dào gè bié（ rán ér què mò lái）。
english: He should at least have come to say good-by.

hanzi: 他们的谈话中充满了渎犯神灵的言词。
pinyin: tā men de tán huà zhòng chōng mǎn le dú fàn shén líng de yán cí。
english: Their conversation was full of blasphemy.

hanzi: 你下了这麽大工夫, 一定能考及格.
pinyin: nǐ xià le zhè mó dà gōng fu,  yī dìng néng kǎo jí gé.
english: You've done so much work that you're bound to pass the exam.

hanzi: 宽阔，广阔宽阔的状态、特点或事实
pinyin: kuān kuò， guǎng kuò kuān kuò de zhuàng tài、 tè diǎn huò shì shí
english: The state, quality, or fact of being wide.

hanzi: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家。
pinyin: kè lǐ sī tuō fú· gē lún bù shì wěi dà de tàn xiǎn jiā。
english: Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers.

hanzi: 喂，我要订一个（份）大的乳酪比萨。
pinyin: wèi， wǒ yào dìng yī gè（ fèn） dà de rǔ lào bǐ sà。
english: Hello, I'd like to order a large cheese pizza, please.

hanzi: 风把雪吹积成长埂, 堵塞了道路.
pinyin: fēng bǎ xuě chuī jī chéng zhǎng gěng,  dǔ sè le dào lù.
english: The wind drifted the snow into a high bank, blocking the road.

hanzi: 【谚】一根筷子易折断，十根筷子硬如铁。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 yī gēn kuài zi yì zhé duàn， shí gēn kuài zi yìng rú tiě。
english: Weak things united become strong.

hanzi: 他们正在考虑把办事处搬出伦敦。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài kǎo lu:4 bǎ bàn shì chù bān chū lún dūn。
english: They are pondering moving their offices outside London.

hanzi: 请你把这颗纽扣缝到我的衬衫上好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ zhè kē niǔ kòu fèng dào wǒ de chèn shān shàng hào ma？
english: Would you sew this button onto my shirt?

hanzi: 别对著那面镜子摆样子了, 听我的吧!
pinyin: biè duì著 nà miàn jìng zi bǎi yàng zi le,  tìng wǒ de ba!
english: Stop posturing in front of that mirror and listen to me!

hanzi: 现今生活分成工作和闲暇两部分.
pinyin: xiàn jīn shēng huó fèn chéng gōng zuò huò xián xiá liǎng bù fen.
english: Life today is compartmentalized into work and leisure.

hanzi: 【谚】知识使人谦虚，无知使人骄傲。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhī shi shǐ rén qiān xū， wú zhī shǐ rén jiāo ào。
english: Knowledge makes humble; ignorance make proud.

hanzi: 这所房子并不能防暴风雨--屋顶漏了!
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi bìng bù néng fáng bào fēng yǔ-- wū dǐng lòu le!
english: This house isn't exactly stormproof the roof leaks!

hanzi: 正方形有四个角儿; 立方体有八个角儿.
pinyin: zhèng fāng xíng yǒu sì gè jué er;  lì fāng tǐ yǒu bā gè jué er.
english: A square has four corners; a cube has eight.

hanzi: 主席敦促党的工作人员采取行动。
pinyin: zhǔ xí dūn cù dǎng de gōng zuò rén yuán cǎi qǔ xíng dòng。
english: The chairman exhorted the party workers to take action.

hanzi: 像这样与你在此相逢真好比一场梦!
pinyin: xiàng zhè yàng yù nǐ zài cǐ xiàng féng zhēn hǎo bǐ yī chǎng mèng!
english: Meeting you here like this is positively surreal!

hanzi: 上星期你在动物园里看到大象了吗？
pinyin: shàng xīng qī nǐ zài dòng wù yuán lǐ kàn dào dà xiàng le ma？
english: Did you see any elephants in the zoo last week?

hanzi: 我们何不开瓶香槟酒庆祝一下呢？
pinyin: wǒ men hé bù kāi píng xiāng bīn jiǔ qìng zhù yī xià ne？
english: Why don't we crack open a bottle of champagne to celebrate?

hanzi: 她的祈祷应验了，儿子平安地回到了家。
pinyin: tā de qí dǎo yìng yàn le， ér zi píng ān de huí dào le jiā。
english: Her prayer answered and her son came home safely.

hanzi: 酒石形成于酒的发酵桶的内侧。
pinyin: jiǔ shí xíng chéng yú jiǔ de fā jiào tǒng de nèi zhāi。
english: Tartar forms on the inside of a cask in which wine is fermented.

hanzi: 我喜欢夏天吃莴苣，我的兔子也喜欢。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan xià tiān jí wō jù， wǒ de tù zi yě xǐ huan。
english: I like to eat lettuce in summer, and so does my rabbit.

hanzi: 这地区的警察都“关照”好了没有？
pinyin: zhè dì qū de jǐng chá dōu“ guān zhào” hào le méi yǒu？
english: Have the police in this district been taken care of yet?

hanzi: 企业家要具备什麽素质才能出人头地?
pinyin: qǐ yè jiā yào jù bèi shí mó sù zhì cái néng chū rén tóu de?
english: What qualities go to make a successful businessman?

hanzi: 你的大衣需要刷乾净, 上面满是灰尘.
pinyin: nǐ de dà yī xū yào shuà qián jìng,  shàng mian mǎn shì huī chén.
english: Your coat needs brushing down. It's covered in dust.

hanzi: 一年有几个季节？ 一年有四季。
pinyin: yī nián yǒu jǐ ge jì jié？  yī nián yǒu sì jì。
english: How many seasons are there in a year? There are four seasons in a year.

hanzi: 他要求总理（同意）接见（他－次）。
pinyin: tā yāo qiú zǒng lǐ（ tóng yì） jiē jiàn（ tā－ cì）。
english: He requested that the Premier grant him an interview.

hanzi: 他企图欺骗我们, 但没有得逞.
pinyin: tā qǐ tú qī piàn wǒ men,  dàn méi yǒu dé chěng.
english: He was foiled in his attempt to deceive us/His attempt to deceive us was foiled.

hanzi: 除工作以外，你有其它的特别爱好吗？
pinyin: chú gōng zuò yǐ wài， nǐ yǒu qí tā de tè bié ài hào ma？
english: Do you have any special interest other than your job?

hanzi: 煤、 石油和矿产品都是工业原料.
pinyin: méi、  shí yóu huò kuàng chǎn pǐn dōu shì gōng yè yuán liào.
english: Coal, oil and minerals are the raw materials of industry.

hanzi: 我们从这场灾难中仍不断汲取教训.
pinyin: wǒ men zòng zhè chǎng zāi nàn zhòng réng bù duàn jí qǔ jiào xun.
english: We are still absorbing the lessons of this disaster.

hanzi: 在去夏威夷的旅途中, 我们都很开心。
pinyin: zài qù xià wēi yí de lu:3 tú zhòng,  wǒ men dōu hěn kāi xīn。
english: On the trip to Hawaii, we were all in high spirits.

hanzi: 好好收拾一下的确会使房子焕然一新.
pinyin: hǎo hǎo shōu shi yī xià dí què kuài shǐ fáng zi huàn rán yī xīn.
english: A good clean will really freshen (up) the house.

hanzi: 我刚煮好咖啡--你能抽空儿喝点儿吗?
pinyin: wǒ gāng zhǔ hào kā fēi-- nǐ néng chōu kòng er hè diǎn er ma?
english: I've just made some coffee have you time for a quickie?

hanzi: 使用两个镜子能看见自己的头的後部.
pinyin: shǐ yòng liǎng gè jìng zi néng kàn jiàn zì jǐ de tou de後 bù.
english: If you use mirrors you can see the back of your head.

hanzi: 作物的产量取决於土地的肥沃程度.
pinyin: zuò wù de chǎn liàng qǔ jué yū tǔ dì de féi wò chéng dù.
english: The size of the crop depends on the productivity of the soil.

hanzi: 琼在从事争取妇女平等权力的活动。
pinyin: qióng zài cóng shì zhēng qǔ fù nu:3 píng děng quán lì de huó dòng。
english: Joan is campaigning for equal rights for women.

hanzi: 这种新型设计能提高速度、 节约燃料.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn xíng shè jì néng tí gāo sù dù、  jié yuē rán liào.
english: The new model delivers speed and fuel economy.

hanzi: 他企图欺骗我们, 但没有得逞.
pinyin: tā qǐ tú qī piàn wǒ men,  dàn méi yǒu dé chěng.
english: He was foiled in his attempt to deceive us/His attempt to deceive us was foiled.

hanzi: 爱国者热爱、支持和保卫自己国家的人
pinyin: ài guó zhě rè ài、 zhī chí huò bǎo wèi zì jǐ guó jiā de rén
english: One who loves, supports, and defends one's country.

hanzi: 农民们在收割完庄稼后常烧茬子。
pinyin: nóng mín men zài shōu gē wán zhuāng jia hòu cháng shāo chá zi。
english: Farmers often burn the stubble after they have cut the corn.

hanzi: 要想外出度假时, 宠物会成为牵累.
pinyin: yào xiǎng wài chū dù jià shí,  chǒng wù kuài chéng wéi qiān lèi.
english: Pets can be a tie when you want to go away on holiday.

hanzi: 他企图欺骗我们, 但没有得逞.
pinyin: tā qǐ tú qī piàn wǒ men,  dàn méi yǒu dé chěng.
english: He was foiled in his attempt to deceive us/His attempt to deceive us was foiled.

hanzi: 她不但参加了竞赛--而且居然获胜了!
pinyin: tā bù dàn cān jiā le jìng sài-- ér qiě jū rán huò shèng le!
english: She not only entered the competition she actually won it!

hanzi: 长期的乾旱之后有雨是一大慰藉。
pinyin: cháng qī de qián hàn zhī hòu yǒu yǔ shì yī dà wèi jiè。
english: It is a great relief to have rain after a long time of drought.

hanzi: 人类是否会受到完全灭绝的威胁呢？
pinyin: rén lèi shì fǒu kuài shòu dào wán quán miè jué de wēi xié ne？
english: Is the human race threatened with complete extinction?

hanzi: 小孩跑进街道时，司机猛然煞车。
pinyin: xiǎo hái pǎo jìn jiē dào shí， sī jī měng rán shā chē。
english: The driver stopped short when the children ran into the street.

hanzi: 坚定的毫不犹豫的或毫不迟疑的；坚决的
pinyin: jiān dìng de háo bú yóu yù de huò háo bú chí yí de； jiān jué de
english: Free from hesitation or vacillation; resolute.

hanzi: 树（在草地上）投下长长的影子.
pinyin: shù（ zài cǎo dì shàng） tóu xià zhǎng zhǎng de yǐng zi.
english: The tree cast (ie caused there to be) a long shadow (on the grass).

hanzi: 运动服用於正式婚礼中是不适当的.
pinyin: yùn dòng fú yòng yū zhèng shì hūn lǐ zhòng shì bù shì dàng de.
english: Sports clothes are not appropriate for a formal wedding.

hanzi: 我们讨论的题目是｀八十年代的欧洲＇.
pinyin: wǒ men tǎo lùn de tí mù shì｀ bā shí nián dài de ōu zhōu＇.
english: The theme of our discussionwas Europe in the 1980's'.

hanzi: 流星在空中画出了一道长长的弧线。
pinyin: liú xīng zài kōng zhōng huà chū le yī dào zhǎng zhǎng de hú xiàn。
english: The falling star described a long curve in the sky.

hanzi: 一想到要会见总统就足以令人心悸.
pinyin: yī xiǎng dào yào huì jiàn zǒng tǒng jiù zú yǐ lìng rén xīn jì.
english: The prospect of meeting the President is quite daunting.

hanzi: 你能否（给我）举个例子, 以说明你的意思?
pinyin: nǐ néng pǐ（ jǐ wǒ） jǔ gè lì zi,  yǐ shuō míng nǐ de yì si?
english: Can you quote (me) an example of what you mean?

hanzi: 玛丽写信时，孩子们在外面玩耍。
pinyin: Mǎ lì xiě xìn shí， hái zi men zài wài miàn wàn shuǎ。
english: While Mary was writing a letter, the children were playing outside.

hanzi: 把这种软膏搽在皮肤上，让它渗进去。
pinyin: bǎ zhè zhǒng ruǎn gāo chá zài pí fū shàng， ràng tā shèn jìn qù。
english: Rub the cream on your skin and let it sink in.

hanzi: 不知您是否愿意下星期来我们家做客？
pinyin: bù zhī nín shì fǒu yuàn yì xià xīng qī lái wǒ men jiā zuò kè？
english: I am wondering if you'd care to visit us next week?

hanzi: 朱丽亚的宁静端庄给人印象很深。
pinyin: zhū lì yà de níng jìng duān zhuāng jǐ rén yìn xiàng hěn shēn。
english: There was something impressive about Julia's quiet dignity.

hanzi: 所谓的叛徒均已（从队伍中）清洗出去.
pinyin: suǒ wèi de pàn tú jūn yǐ（ zòng duì wǔ zhòng） qīng xǐ chū qù.
english: So-called traitors were purged (from their ranks).

hanzi: 她用阿谀奉承的手段骗取他的信任.
pinyin: tā yòng ē yú fèng chéng de shǒu duàn piàn qǔ tā de xìn rèn.
english: She used flattery to worm her way/herself into his confidence.

hanzi: 天热的时候人就容易神经紧张[脾气急躁].
pinyin: tiān rè de shí hou rén jiù róng yì shén jīng jǐn zhāng[ pí qì jí zào].
english: Nerves/Tempers began to fray in the heat.

hanzi: 她熨衬衣时样子呆板, 不动脑筋.
pinyin: tā yùn chèn yī shí yàng zi dāi bǎn,  bù dòng nǎo jīn.
english: She was quite mechanical and unthinking in the way she ironed the shirts.

hanzi: 孩子们让小丑的滑稽动作逗得哈哈大笑.
pinyin: hái zi men ràng xiǎo chǒu de huá ji dòng zuò dòu de hā hā dà xiào.
english: The children laughed with glee at the clown's antics.

hanzi: 为了防止牟取暴利而 实行了租金管制.
pinyin: wèi le fáng zhǐ móu qǔ bào lì ér  shí xíng le zū jīn guǎn zhì.
english: Rent controls were introduced to prevent profiteering.

hanzi: 她与原来的丈夫离婚十年後又复婚了.
pinyin: tā yù yuán lái de zhàng fu lí hūn shí nián後 yòu fù hūn le.
english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.

hanzi: 赢不了也不要紧－－只要你尽力而为。
pinyin: yíng bù liǎo yě bù yào jǐn－－ zhǐ yào nǐ jìn lì ér wèi。
english: It doesn't matter if you don't win just do your best.

hanzi: 报纸在印刷机上印出来後他拿了一份。
pinyin: bào zhǐ zài yìn shuà jī shàng yìn chū lai後 tā ná le yī fèn。
english: He took a copy of the newspaper as it come off the press.

hanzi: 芳廷承袭了芭蕾舞艺术的最优秀的传统
pinyin: fāng tíng chéng xí le bā lěi wǔ yì shù de zuì yōu xiù de chuán tǒng
english: Fonteyn represents the best traditions of ballet.

hanzi: 昨天发生的事故应该归咎于他的愚笨。
pinyin: zuó tiān fā shēng de shì gù yīng gāi guī jiù yú tā de yú bèn。
english: The accident happened yesterday owed to his foolishness.

hanzi: 你衬衫的後摆已经抻到裤子外边来了。
pinyin: nǐ chèn shān de後 bǎi yǐ jīng chēn dào kù zi wài bian lái le。
english: The back of your shirt has worked out of your trousers.

hanzi: 想到还需重新考试，我就感到沮丧。
pinyin: xiǎng dào huán xū chóng xīn kǎo shì， wǒ jiù gǎn dào jǔ sàng。
english: The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.

hanzi: 《每日回声报》拥有读者逾一千万人。
pinyin: 《 měi rì huí shēng bào》 yōng yǒu dú zhě yú yī qiān wàn rén。
english: The Daily Echo has a readership of over ten million.

hanzi: 哪些人在总统竞选中最有可能获胜?
pinyin: nǎ xiē rén zài zǒng tǒng jìng xuǎn zhòng zuì yǒu kě néng huò shèng?
english: Who are the front runners in the Presidential contest?

hanzi: 你可以尝尝这道咖喱菜，看看够不够辣。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ cháng cháng zhè dào gā lí cài， kàn kan gòu bù gòu là。
english: You can taste the curry to see if it's hot enough.

hanzi: 图书馆的书是按照[根据]科目分类的.
pinyin: tú shū guǎn de shū shì àn zhào[ gēn jù] kē mù fēn lèi de.
english: The books in the library are classified by/according to subject.

hanzi: 我的手指接触那软膏之後就疼起来了.
pinyin: wǒ de shǒu zhǐ jiē chù nà ruǎn gāo zhī後 jiù téng qǐ lai le.
english: My fingers are beginning to prick after touching that paste.

hanzi: 在伦敦遭空袭时, 有很多老百姓遇难.
pinyin: zài lún dūn zāo kōng xí shí,  yǒu hěn duō lǎo bǎi xìng yù nàn.
english: Many civilians were killed in the air raids on London.

hanzi: 赶快！要是你不赶紧，我们就要迟到了。
pinyin: gǎn kuài！ yào shì nǐ bù gǎn jǐn， wǒ men jiù yào chí dào le。
english: Buck up! We'll be late if you don't get a move on.

hanzi: 学校的修缮将由教育部门出资。
pinyin: xué xiào de xiū shàn jiàng yóu jiào yù bù mén chū zī。
english: The repairs to the school will be financed by the educational department.

hanzi: 这只鸟的头顶上有一小簇红色的羽毛。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ niǎo de tou dǐng shàng yǒu yī xiǎo cù hóng sè de yǔ máo。
english: The bird has a tuft of red feathers on top of its head.

hanzi: 这种酸乳酪不含人造香料或著色剂.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng suān rǔ lào bù hán rén zào xiāng liào huò著 shǎi jì.
english: This yoghurt contains no artificial flavouring or colouring.

hanzi: 公园对大城市的居民是大有裨益的设施。
pinyin: gōng yuán duì dà chéng shì de jū mín shì dà yǒu bì yì de shè shī。
english: Parks are a great boon to people in big cities.

hanzi: 我无法找出迷宫中扑朔迷离的路线。
pinyin: wǒ wú fǎ zhǎo chū mí gōng zhòng pū shuò mí lí de lù xiàn。
english: I was unable to find out the intricate windings of the labyrinth.

hanzi: 代我向玛丽、约翰，尤其向爷爷问好。
pinyin: dài wǒ xiàng Mǎ lì、 Yuē hàn， yóu qí xiàng yé ye wèn hǎo。
english: Give my regards to Mary, John and by especial to Grandpa.

hanzi: 瓶装柠檬汁可不行－－你得用真货。
pinyin: píng zhuāng níng méng zhī kě bù xíng－－ nǐ de yòng zhēn huò。
english: Bottled lemon juice is no good you must use the real thing.

hanzi: 我们的党是一个伟大、光荣、正确的党。
pinyin: wǒ men de dǎng shì yī gè wěi dà、 guāng róng、 zhèng què de dǎng。
english: Our Party is a great, glorious and correct Party.

hanzi: 处理这种困难你有什么具体的想法？
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè zhǒng kùn nan nǐ yǒu shén me jù tǐ de xiǎng fǎ？
english: Have you any concrete thoughts on how to deal with this difficulty?

hanzi: 斯特兰德大街是伦敦最热闹的要道之一。
pinyin: sī tè lán dé dà jiē shì lún dūn zuì rè nao de yào dào zhī yī。
english: The Strand is one of London's busiest thoroughfares.

hanzi: 她那滑稽的服装引得客人哄堂大笑。
pinyin: tā nà huá ji de fú zhuāng yǐn de kè ren hòng táng dà xiào。
english: Her funny costume caused much mirthful laughter among the guests.

hanzi: 音响效果经预录後已加入对话中.
pinyin: yīn xiǎng xiào guǒ jīng yù lù後 yǐ jiā rù duì huà zhòng.
english: The sound effects had been pre-recorded and were added to the dialogue.

hanzi: 我设法悄悄地行走，俾使他们听不见。
pinyin: wǒ shè fǎ qiāo qiāo de xíng zǒu， bǐ shǐ tā men tìng bù jiàn。
english: I tried to walk quietly, so that they would not hear me.

hanzi: 我们应该竭尽全力挽救濒于灭绝的生物。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi jié jìn quán lì wǎn jiù bīn yú miè jué de shēng wù。
english: We should do our best to save endangered species.

hanzi: 我稍微整理了一下思路, 然後回答说....
pinyin: wǒ shāo wēi zhěng lǐ le yī xià sī lù,  rán後 huí dá shuō....
english: After a few seconds to unscramble my thoughts, I replied...

hanzi: 那个东西掉在潮湿的沙子上, 然後沉了下去.
pinyin: nèi gè dōng xi diào zài cháo shī de shā zi shàng,  rán後 chén le xià qu.
english: It fell onto the wet sand, then sank (in).

hanzi: 计算机程序设计人员的一般工资是多少？
pinyin: jì suàn jī chéng xù shè jì rén yuán de yì bān gōng zī shì duō shao？
english: What's the going rate of computer programmers?

hanzi: 用一把这么钝的刀子切菠萝是不可能的。
pinyin: yòng yī bǎ zhè me dùn de dāo zi qiè bō luó shì bù kě néng de。
english: It's impossible to cut a pineapple with such a dull knife.

hanzi: 医生叫我吸气然後（再）慢慢地呼出.
pinyin: yī shēng jiào wǒ xī qì rán後（ zài） màn màn de hū chū.
english: The doctor told me to breathe in and then breathe out (again) slowly.

hanzi: 你把议事日程表给（我）复印二十份好吗?
pinyin: nǐ bǎ yì shì rì chéng biǎo jǐ（ wǒ） fù yìn èr shí fèn hào ma?
english: Could you run (me) off twenty copies of the agenda?

hanzi: 你是怎样使那些酒都通过海关检查的?
pinyin: nǐ shì zěn yàng shǐ nà xiē jiǔ dōu tōng guò hǎi guān jiǎn chá de?
english: How did you manage to get all that wine through Customs?

hanzi: 小偷被逮住了，但他的同伙却逃之夭夭。
pinyin: xiǎo tōu bèi dài zhù le， dàn tā de tóng huǒ què táo zhī yāo yāo。
english: The thief was arrested, but his confederate escaped.

hanzi: 她经过住院治疗後, 前往海滨养病.
pinyin: tā jīng guò zhù yuàn zhì liáo後,  qián wǎng hǎi bīn yǎng bìng.
english: She went to the seaside to convalesce after her stay in hospital.

hanzi: 他终於起来反抗那种严厉管教他的方式.
pinyin: tā zhōng yū qǐ lai fǎn kàng nà zhòng yán lì guǎn jiào tā de fāng shì.
english: He finally rebelled against his strict upbringing.

hanzi: 玛丽对男人和女人充满了迷人的想法。
pinyin: Mǎ lì duì nán rén huò nu:3 rén chōng mǎn le mí rén de xiǎng fǎ。
english: Mary is full of fascinating theories about men and women.

hanzi: 今天早晨报上有什么有趣的新闻吗？
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo chén bào shàng yǒu shén me yǒu qù de xīn wén ma？
english: Are there any interesting news items in the paper this morning?

hanzi: 没有那种不粘锅底的铛就烙不好饼.
pinyin: méi yǒu nà zhòng bù zhān guō dǐ de dāng jiù lào bù hǎo bǐng.
english: It's very difficult to make pancakes without a ,non-stick frying-pan.

hanzi: 您有关于处理这桩索赔案的具体意见吗？
pinyin: nín yǒu guān yú chǔ lǐ zhè zhuāng suǒ péi àn de jù tǐ yì jiàn ma？
english: Do you have any specific idea to settled the claim?

hanzi: 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ tóng yì wǒ de yì jiàn， jiù míng bai de huí dá“ shì”。
english: Answer with a plain "yes" if you agree with me.

hanzi: 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ tóng yì wǒ de yì jiàn， jiù míng bai de huí dá“ shì”。
english: Answer with a plain "yes" if you agree with me.

hanzi: 政府已经履行了他的全部选举诺言了吗？
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ jīng lu:3 xíng le tā de quán bù xuǎn jǔ nuò yán le ma？
english: Has the government redeemed all its election promise?

hanzi: 我们要对文件仔细审阅後再作决定.
pinyin: wǒ men yào duì wén jiàn zǐ xì shěn yuè後 zài zuò jué dìng.
english: The document will need a careful going-over before we make a decision.

hanzi: 男孩子们突然迸发出刺耳的兴奋的欢呼声。
pinyin: nán hái zǐ men tū rán bèng fā chū cì ěr de xīng fèn de huān hū shēng。
english: The boys broke into shrill, excited cheering.

hanzi: 有多少颗人造卫星已送入绕地球轨道?
pinyin: yǒu duō shao kē rén zào wèi xīng yǐ sòng rù rào dì qiú guǐ dào?
english: How many satellites have been put into orbit round the earth?

hanzi: 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn zǒng shì duì wǒ zuò shì de fāng shì bǎi bān tiāo ti。
english: My father is always finding fault with the way I do things.

hanzi: 直到很晚之后，欧洲才知道棉花布料。
pinyin: zhí dào hěn wǎn zhī hòu， ōu zhōu cái zhī dào mián hua bù liào。
english: Cotton material was not known in Europe until much later.

hanzi: ｀你喝茶有什麽喜好?＇｀我喜欢淡一些的.＇
pinyin: ｀ nǐ hè chá yǒu shí mó xǐ hào?＇｀ wǒ xǐ huan dàn yī xiē de.＇
english: `How do you like your tea?' `I like it rather weak.'

hanzi: 他知识渊博给听众留下了深刻的印象.
pinyin: tā zhī shi yuān bó jǐ tīng zhòng liú xià le shēn kè de yìn xiàng.
english: He impressed his audience by the profundity of his knowledge.

hanzi: 我们吵架以後, 他一直如避蛇蝎似的躲著我.
pinyin: wǒ men chǎo jià yǐ後,  tā yī zhí rú bì shé xiē sì de duǒ著 wǒ.
english: He's been avoiding me like the plague since our quarrel.

hanzi: 他们设法欺骗弗雷德放弃在董事会的职位.
pinyin: tā men shè fǎ qī piàn Fú léi dé fàng qì zài dǒng shì huì de zhí wèi.
english: They jockeyed Fred out of his position on the board.

hanzi: 什麽事都不要依靠他－－他光会说空话。
pinyin: shí mó shì dōu bù yào yī kào tā－－ tā guāng kuài shuō kōng huà。
english: Don't rely on him to do anything he's just a talker.

hanzi: 蝎子的长尾巴上长着一个有毒的蛰针。
pinyin: xiē zi de cháng wěi bā shàng zhǎng zhuó yī gè yǒu dú de zhí zhēn。
english: A scorpion has a poisonous sting in its long jointed tail.

hanzi: 我们需要有人自愿帮忙把布景搭起、 画好.
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào yǒu rén zì yuàn bāng máng bǎ bù jǐng dā qǐ、  huà hào.
english: We need volunteers to help build and paint the set.

hanzi: 校长决定开除该生以儆效尤.
pinyin: xiào zhǎng jué dìng kāi chú gāi shēng yǐ jǐng xiào yóu.
english: The headmaster decided to make an example of the pupil and expel him from the school.

hanzi: 演员背台词的时候经常自己嘀嘀咕咕。
pinyin: yǎn yuán bèi tái cí de shí hou jīng cháng zì jǐ dí dí gū gū。
english: Actors often mutter to themselves when rehearsing their lines.

hanzi: 再来一轴线我就可以完成这幅刺绣了。
pinyin: zài lái yī zhú xiàn wǒ jiù kě yǐ wán chéng zhè fú cì xiù le。
english: I need one more spool of thread before finishing the embroidery.

hanzi: 他赶回办公室，给王书记打了－个电话。
pinyin: tā gǎn huí bàn gōng shì， jǐ wáng shū ji dǎ le－ gè diàn huà。
english: He hastened back to the office and rang up Secretary Wang.

hanzi: 没有人能想像出全面核子战争的後果.
pinyin: méi yǒu rén néng xiǎng xiàng chū quán miàn hé zi zhàn zhēng de後 guǒ.
english: Nobody can envisage the consequences of total nuclear war.

hanzi: ｀那麽你是怎麽知道那件事的呢?＇他插嘴问道.
pinyin: ｀ nà mó nǐ shì zěn mó zhī dào nà jiàn shì de ne?＇ tā chā zuǐ wèn dào.
english: `But how do you know that?' he interposed.

hanzi: 他买了一个鳕鱼罐头和一个三明治作晚饭。
pinyin: tā mǎi le yī gè xuě yú guàn tou huò yī gè sān míng zhì zuò wǎn fàn。
english: He bought a canned cod and a sandwich as supper.

hanzi: 他因有额外的工作, （很晚）仍留在办公室里.
pinyin: tā yīn yǒu é wài de gōng zuò, （ hěn wǎn） réng liú zài bàn gōng shì lǐ.
english: Extra work kept him (late) at the office.

hanzi: 船员夺船未遂, 均以叛乱罪被枪决.
pinyin: chuán yuán duó chuán wèi suí,  jūn yǐ pàn luàn zuì bèi qiāng jué.
english: The crew tried to seize control of the ship, and were shot for mutiny.

hanzi: 古希腊人为爱神阿弗罗狄特造了许多神庙。
pinyin: gǔ xī là rén wéi ài shén ē fú luó dí tè zào le xǔ duō shén miào。
english: The ancient Greek dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.

hanzi: 对不起打扰一下, 请问去车站怎麽走?
pinyin: duì bù qǐ dǎ rǎo yī xià,  qǐng wèn qù chē zhàn zěn mó zǒu?
english: I'm sorry to bother you, but could you tell me the way to the station?

hanzi: 约翰去南方跑了一趟，打算在那儿开业。
pinyin: Yuē hàn qù nán fāng pǎo le yī tàng， dǎ suàn zài nà r kāi yè。
english: John made a trip to the South and considered setting up there.

hanzi: 古希腊人为爱神阿弗罗狄特造了许多神庙。
pinyin: gǔ xī là rén wéi ài shén ē fú luó dí tè zào le xǔ duō shén miào。
english: The ancient Greek dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.

hanzi: 我那套狄更斯小说只差一卷就能配齐了.
pinyin: wǒ nà tào dí gèng sī xiǎo shuō zhǐ cī yī juàn jiù néng pèi qí le.
english: I only need one volume to complete my set of Dickens's novels.

hanzi: 她自己负责膳宿，她叔叔供给她学费。
pinyin: tā zì jǐ fù zé shàn xiù， tā shū shu gōng gěi tā xué fèi。
english: She pays for her board and lodging, her uncle finds her in tuition.

hanzi: ｀有解释责任＇是当前政治上的流行词.
pinyin: ｀ yǒu jiě shì zé rèn＇ shì dāng qián zhèng zhì shàng de liú xíng cí.
english: `Accountability' is the current vogue-word in politics.

hanzi: 看，你这是往哪里走？差点儿把我撞倒了
pinyin: kàn， nǐ zhè shì wàng nǎ li zǒu？ cī diǎn er bǎ wǒ zhuàng dào le
english: Can't you look where you're going? You nearly knocked me over!

hanzi: 这部科幻电影有些特殊效果美妙绝伦.
pinyin: zhè bù kē huàn diàn yǐng yǒu xiē tè shū xiào guǒ měi miào jué lún.
english: The science fiction film had some marvellous special effects.

hanzi: 独立自主的意识及判断上独立的；自我指引的
pinyin: dú lì zì zhǔ de yì shí jí pàn duàn shàng dú lì de； zì wǒ zhǐ yǐn de
english: Independent in mind or judgment; self-directed.

hanzi: 这件事从头到尾都散发著（贪污腐化的）臭味!
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì cóng tóu dào wěi dōu sàn fā著（ tān wū fǔ huà de） chòu wèi!
english: The whole business stinks (of corruption)!

hanzi: 汽车在宾馆外面[旅馆前面]停了下来。
pinyin: qì chē zài bīn guǎn wài mian[ lu:3 guǎn qián mian] tíng le xia lai。
english: The car pulled up outside the guesthouse [in front of the hotel].

hanzi: 他受过担任工程师的[工程学方面的]培训.
pinyin: tā shòu guò dān rèn gōng chéng shī de[ gōng chéng xué fāng miàn de] péi xùn.
english: He was trained as an engineer/in engineering.

hanzi: 他死後, 他妹妹整理了他的（私人）财物.
pinyin: tā sǐ後,  tā mèi mei zhěng lǐ le tā de（ sī rén） cái wù.
english: After his death his sister sorted through his (personal) belongings.

hanzi: 她花言巧语也未能打动他们卖掉别墅。
pinyin: tā huā yán qiǎo yù yě wèi néng dǎ dòng tā men mài diào bié shù。
english: All her wiles were not enough to persuade them to sell the villa.

hanzi: 不管侵略者什麽时候来，都必被消灭。
pinyin: bù guǎn qīn lu:è zhě shí mó shí hou lái， dōu bì bèi xiāo miè。
english: No matter when the invader comes, they will be wiped out clean.

hanzi: 我的靴子上要是有泥, 一进屋爸爸就骂（我）.
pinyin: wǒ de xuē zi shàng yào shì yǒu nì,  yī jìn wū bà ba jiù mà（ wǒ）.
english: If I walk in with muddy boots, Dad always scolds (me).

hanzi: 请把那本地图册从书架上取下来（递给我）.
pinyin: qǐng bǎ nà běn dì tú cè zòng shū jià shàng qǔ xia lai（ dì jǐ wǒ）.
english: Please reach (me) the atlas down from the bookshelf.

hanzi: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。
pinyin: yǒu mìng lìng yào wǒ men bì xū zài yī xiǎo shí nèi wā hào zhàn háo。
english: Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.

hanzi: 他们对犯人的残酷虐待激起了极大的愤怒。
pinyin: tā men duì fàn rén de cán kù nu:è dài jī qǐ le jí dà de fèn nù。
english: Their barbarous treatment of prisoners aroused great rage.

hanzi: 他急忙伸出手臂把她扶住，她才没有跌倒。
pinyin: tā jí máng shēn chū shǒu bei bǎ tā fú zhù， tā cái méi yǒu diē dào。
english: He flung his arm out just in time to stop her falling.

hanzi: （你）抵达旅馆後, 请听候进一步指示.
pinyin: （ nǐ） dǐ dá lu:3 guǎn後,  qǐng tìng hòu jìn yí bù zhǐ shì.
english: On (your) arrival at the hotel please wait for further instructions.

hanzi: 我们车间的机床有他们车间的一般多吗？
pinyin: wǒ men chē jiān de jī chuáng yǒu tā men chē jiān de yì bān duō ma？
english: Be there as many machine tools in our workshop as in theirs?

hanzi: 葡萄状的由成串的部分构成的，用于腺体
pinyin: pú tao zhuàng de yóu chéng chuàn de bù fen gòu chéng de， yòng yú xiàn tǐ
english: Having a structure of clustered parts. Used of glands.

hanzi: 该函已退给（我方）要求对某问题加以解释.
pinyin: gāi hán yǐ tuì jǐ（ wǒ fāng） yāo qiú duì mǒu wèn tí jiā yǐ jiě shì.
english: The letter was referred back (to us) with a query.

hanzi: 反复听到同样的抱怨，你难道不烦吗？
pinyin: fǎn fù tīng dào tóng yàng de bào yuàn， nǐ nán dào bù fán ma？
english: Don't you weary of hearing the same complaints over and over again?

hanzi: 摩托车手必须戴头盔保护自己免受伤害。
pinyin: mó tuō chē shǒu bì xū dài tou kuī bǎo hù zì jǐ miǎn shòu shāng hài。
english: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them from injury.

hanzi: 这个问题是否从纳税人的立场上考虑过?
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí shì fǒu zòng nà shuì rén de lì chǎng shàng kǎo lu:4 guò?
english: Has the matter been viewed from the taxpayers' standpoint?

hanzi: 政府想把更多的资源用於教育方面.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ xiǎng bǎ gèng duō de zī yuán yòng yū jiào yù fāng miàn.
english: The government intends to free more resources for educational purposes.

hanzi: 吴阿姨要我们静一些，随后拧开了电视。
pinyin: wú ā yí yào wǒ men jìng yī xiē， suí hòu nìng kāi le diàn shì。
english: Auntie Wu asked us to be quiet, then turned the television on.

hanzi: 我们的口号是: ｀要循序渐进, 不要剧烈变革.＇
pinyin: wǒ men de kǒu hào shì: ｀ yào xún xù jiàn jìn,  bù yào jù liè biàn gé.＇
english: Our watchword is: Evolution, not revolution'.

hanzi: 扭转，扭曲扭动的动作或实例；压挤或扭曲
pinyin: niǔ zhuǎn， niǔ qū niǔ dòng de dòng zuò huò shí lì； yà jǐ huò niǔ qū
english: The act or an instance of wringing; a squeeze or twist.

hanzi: 把这个字抄写十遍就能记住怎麽拼写了.
pinyin: bǎ zhè gè zì chāo xiě shí biàn jiù néng jì zhu zěn mó pīn xiě le.
english: Write out this word ten times so that you learn how to spell it.

hanzi: 我喜欢吃水果，比如苹果、梨子、香蕉等等。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan jí shuǐ guǒ， bǐ rú píng guǒ、 lí zǐ、 xiāng jiāo děng děng。
english: I like fruits, such as apples, pears, bananas...

hanzi: 他把晚年用在教书和编纂以前的著作。
pinyin: tā bǎ wǎn nián yòng zài jiào shū huò biān zuǎn yǐ qián de著 zuò。
english: He spent his last years (in) teaching and editing earlier writings.

hanzi: 万一太阳消失了，地球会变成什么样子？
pinyin: wàn yī tài yáng xiāo shī le， dì qiú huì biàn chéng shén me yàng zi？
english: If the sun were to disappear, what would the earth be like?

hanzi: 那种新的发式的确使她好看一些[好看多了].
pinyin: nà zhòng xīn de fà shì dí què shǐ tā hǎo kàn yī xiē[ hǎo kàn duō le].
english: That new hairstyle really does something/a lot for her.

hanzi: 你想瞧瞧这画吗？－－是的！很想！
pinyin: nǐ xiǎng qiáo qiáo zhè huà ma？－－ shì de！ hěn xiǎng！
english: Would you like to have a look at the picture? --- Yes, I should very much like to.

hanzi: 他们重逢时, 昔日之明争暗斗旋即死灰复燃.
pinyin: tā men zhòng féng shí,  xī rì zhī míng zhēng àn dòu xuàn jí sǐ huī fù rán.
english: Their old rivalry soon surfaced when they met again.

hanzi: 住在那个村子里的人们的头发全是赤褐色的。
pinyin: zhù zài nèi gè cūn zi lǐ de rén men de tóu fa quán shì chì hè sè de。
english: All the people living in that country have auburn hair.

hanzi: 据说第一批到达这个国家的移民是囚犯。
pinyin: jù shuō dì yī pī dào dá zhè gè guó jiā de yí mín shì qiú fàn。
english: It is said that the first settlers of this country are prisoners.

hanzi: 她把旅行的事大大地渲染（夸张）了一番.
pinyin: tā bǎ lu:3 xíng de shì dà dà de xuàn rǎn（ kuā zhāng） le yī pān.
english: She gave a highly coloured (ie exaggerated) account of her travels.

hanzi: 这个镇子引以为荣的是有个闻名於世的美术馆.
pinyin: zhè gè zhèn zi yǐn yǐ wéi róng de shì yǒu gè wén míng yū shì de měi shù guǎn.
english: The town boasts a world-famous art gallery.

hanzi: 你认为她的小说属于文学类，还是其它类?
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi tā de xiǎo shuō shǔ yú wén xué lèi， hái shì qí tā lèi?
english: Would you classify her novels as serious literature or other?

hanzi: 你们参加高级程度英语考试要读哪些必修课本?
pinyin: nǐ men cān jiā gāo jí chéng dù Yīng yǔ kǎo shì yào dú nǎ xiē bì xiū kè běn?
english: What are your set books for English A Level?

hanzi: 我得同委托人商量後才能接受你的建议.
pinyin: wǒ de tóng wěi tuō rén shāng liàng後 cái néng jiē shòu nǐ de jiàn yì.
english: I must consult my prinicipals before agreeing to your proposal.

hanzi: 他昏迷了几天, 但现在又（完全）清醒了.
pinyin: tā hūn mí le jǐ tiān,  dàn xiàn zài yòu（ wán quán） qīng xǐng le.
english: He was in a coma for days, but now he's (fully) conscious again.

hanzi: 我喜欢吃水果，比如苹果、梨子、香蕉等等。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan jí shuǐ guǒ， bǐ rú píng guǒ、 lí zǐ、 xiāng jiāo děng děng。
english: I like fruits, such as apples, pears, bananas...

hanzi: 把这件事当作你的教训, 再也不要玩火柴了!
pinyin: bǎ zhè jiàn shì dàng zuò nǐ de jiào xun,  zài yě bù yào wàn huǒ chái le!
english: Let this be a lesson to you never to play with matches!

hanzi: 摩西率领以色列人脱离在埃及的奴隶生涯。
pinyin: Mó xī shuài lǐng yǐ shǎi liè rén tuō lí zài Aī jí de nú lì shēng yá。
english: Moses led the Israelites out of their bondage in Egypt.

hanzi: 那件大衣很合身、 不合身、 很瘦、 很宽松等.
pinyin: nà jiàn dà yī hěn hé shēn、  bù hé shēn、  hěn shòu、  hěn kuān sōng děng.
english: The coat was a good, bad, tight, loose, etc fit.

hanzi: 那辆卡车超越我的车後, 突然插入我前方的位置.
pinyin: nà liàng kǎ chē chāo yuè wǒ de jū後,  tū rán chā rù wǒ qián fāng de wèi zhi.
english: The lorry overtook me and then cut in (on me).

hanzi: 我从未答应过把汽车借给你: 你是在做梦吧!
pinyin: wǒ zòng wèi dā ying guò bǎ qì chē jiè jǐ nǐ:  nǐ shì zài zuò mèng ba!
english: I never promised to lend you my car: you must be dreaming!

hanzi: 这份色拉是由苹果、梨、土豆和芹菜做成的。
pinyin: zhè fèn sè lā shì yóu píng guǒ、 lí、 tǔ dòu huò qín cài zuò chéng de。
english: This salad is made of apple, pear, potato and celery.

hanzi: 他的几个朋友来了, 比如本、 卡罗尔、 麦克.
pinyin: tā de jǐ ge péng you lái le,  bǐ rú běn、  qiǎ luó ěr、  mài kè.
english: Several of his friends came: Ben, Carol and Mike, for instance.

hanzi: 他与一名英国女子结婚并且定居在伦敦。
pinyin: tā yù yī míng Yīng guó nu:3 zǐ jié hūn bìng qiě dìng jū zài lún dūn。
english: He married an English woman and took up his residence in London.

hanzi: 那个总理只不过是该国总统的马前卒.
pinyin: nèi gè zǒng lǐ zhǐ bù guò shì gāi guó zǒng tǒng de mǎ qián zú.
english: The prime minister was a mere tool in the hands of the country's president.

hanzi: 老人对著那条要咬他的狗挥舞手杖吓它走。
pinyin: lǎo rén duì著 nà tiáo yào yǎo tā de gǒu huī wǔ shǒu zhàng xià tā zǒu。
english: The old man brandishes his walking stick at the menace dog.

hanzi: 老师走进教室时，男孩子们停止喧哗。
pinyin: lǎo shī zǒu jìn jiào shì shí， nán hái zǐ men tíng zhǐ xuān huá。
english: The boys stopped their clatter when the teacher came into the classroom.

hanzi: 让我把一切都得解释得那麽详细, 可真烦人.
pinyin: ràng wǒ bǎ yī qiè dōu de jiě shì de nà mó xiáng xì,  kě zhēn fán rén.
english: It wearies me to have to explain everything in such detail.

hanzi: 夏天那条小河的水量减少，成了涓涓溪流。
pinyin: xià tiān nà tiáo xiǎo hé de shuǐ liàng jiǎn shǎo， chéng le juān juān xī liú。
english: The stream is reduced to a mere trickle in summer.

hanzi: 这个证据证实了我认为他是间谍的这一看法。
pinyin: zhè gè zhèng jù zhèng shí le wǒ rèn wéi tā shì jiàn dié de zhè yī kàn fǎ。
english: This evidence reinforces my view that he is a spy.

hanzi: 这个项目由於缺少资金而推迟了许多年.
pinyin: zhè gè xiàng mù yóu yū quē shǎo zī jīn ér tuī chí le xǔ duō nián.
english: The project had hung fire for several years because of lack of funds.

hanzi: ｀怎样申请许可证?＇｀你得到问讯处打听.＇
pinyin: ｀ zěn yàng shēn qǐng xǔ kě zhèng?＇｀ nǐ dé dào wèn xùn chù dǎ ting.＇
english: `How do I apply for this licence?' `You want inquiries.'

hanzi: 关於日期[什么时候见面], 我们未能取得一致意见.
pinyin: guān yū rì qī[ shén me shí hou jiàn miàn],  wǒ men wèi néng qǔ dé yī zhì yì jiàn.
english: We couldn't agree on a date/when to meet.

hanzi: 她热爱自己的家庭, 但家庭却是她事业的累赘.
pinyin: tā rè ài zì jǐ de jiā tíng,  dàn jiā tíng què shì tā shì yè de lèi zhuì.
english: She loves her family, but they're a drag on her career.

hanzi: 他与一名英国女子结婚并且定居在伦敦。
pinyin: tā yù yī míng Yīng guó nu:3 zǐ jié hūn bìng qiě dìng jū zài lún dūn。
english: He married an English woman and took up his residence in London.

hanzi: 还好。顺便问一下，你母亲怎么样？她好吗？
pinyin: hái hǎo。 shùn biàn wèn yī xià， nǐ mǔ qīn zěn me yàng？ tā hào ma？
english: Not bad. By the way, how is your mother? Is she all right?

hanzi: 齐平地使其均匀、在一个平面上或留边排版
pinyin: qí píng dì shǐ qí jūn yún、 zài yī gè píng miàn shàng huò liú biān pái bǎn
english: So as to be even, in one plane, or aligned with a margin.

hanzi: 那强盗厉声叫道: ｀不许动, 不然就打死你.＇
pinyin: nà qiáng dào lì shēng jiào dào: ｀ bù xǔ dòng,  bù rán jiù dǎ sǐ nǐ.＇
english: One false move and you're a dead man,' snarled the robber.

hanzi: 他逃之夭夭，留下他妻子为他的赌债发愁。
pinyin: tā táo zhī yāo yāo， liú xià tā qī zi wèi tā de dǔ zhài fā chóu。
english: He took a powder and left his wife to worry about his gambling debts.

hanzi: 我看你的新助手不错－－她看样子很能干。
pinyin: wǒ kàn nǐ de xīn zhù shǒu bù cuò－－ tā kàn yàng zi hěn néng gàn。
english: I like the look of your new assistant she should do very well.

hanzi: 你是把水果装在罐里保存呢，还是冷冻起来保存？
pinyin: nǐ shì bǎ shuǐ guǒ zhuāng zài guàn lǐ bǎo cún ne， hái shì lěng dòng qǐ lai bǎo cún？
english: Do you bottle your fruit or freeze it?

hanzi: 女人就该在家里干活儿, 这是上天的旨意吗?
pinyin: nu:3 rén jiù gāi zài jiā lǐ gàn huó r,  zhè shì shàng tiān de zhǐ yì ma?
english: Is it ordained in heaven that women should work in the home?

hanzi: 存资料区域专用来贮存积累资料的储存区域
pinyin: cún zī liào qū yù zhuān yòng lái zhù cún jī lěi zī liào de chǔ cún qū yù
english: A section of storage reserved for storing accumulated data.

hanzi: 生活在没有树木的大草原上的人们怎样谋生呢？
pinyin: shēng huó zài méi yǒu shù mù de dà cǎo yuán shàng de rén men zěn yàng móu shēng ne？
english: How do people make a living in the steppe?

hanzi: 溺水的男孩大声喊叫，大家一齐赶去救他。
pinyin: niào shuǐ de nán hái dà shēng hǎn jiào， dà jiā yī qí gǎn qù jiù tā。
english: The drowning boy called out and everybody rushed to his rescue.

hanzi: 自从我们看望你母亲以来到现在有多长时间了？
pinyin: zì cóng wǒ men kàn wàng nǐ mǔ qīn yǐ lái dào xiàn zài yǒu duō zhǎng shí jiān le？
english: How long is it since we visited your mother?

hanzi: 据《圣经》所叙, 上帝按自己的形象创造了人.
pinyin: jù《 shèng jīng》 suǒ xù,  shàng dì àn zì jǐ de xíng xiàng chuàng zào le rén.
english: According to the Bible, God created man in his image.

hanzi: 偏狭的视野上不开阔的；狭隘和以自我为中心的
pinyin: piān xiá de shì yě shàng bù kāi kuò de； xiá ài huò yǐ zì wǒ wèi zhōng xīn de
english: Limited in perspective; narrow and self-centered.

hanzi: 这小孩子要表明对大人的憎恨就难免受罚。
pinyin: zhè xiǎo hái zi yào biǎo míng duì dà ren de zēng hèn jiù nán miǎn shòu fá。
english: The child cannot express his hatred of adults with impunity.

hanzi: 神迹，启示上帝的权力、能力、显现或面貌
pinyin: shén jī， qǐ shì shàng dì de quán lì、 néng lì、 xiǎn xiàn huò miàn mào
english: The force, effect, or a manifestation or aspect of this being.

hanzi: 我看到的不可能是鬼－－一定是幻想的东西吧。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào de bù kě néng shì guǐ－－ yī dìng shì huàn xiǎng de dōng xi ba。
english: I can't have seen a ghost it must have been imagination.

hanzi: 忏悔之后他觉得好过一点，并且能安眠了。
pinyin: chàn huǐ zhī hòu tā jué de hào guò yī diǎn， bìng qiě néng ān mián le。
english: After confession he feels a little better and can sleep at ease.

hanzi: 好极了！／好极了！／了不起！／妙极了！／好极了！
pinyin: hào jí le！／ hào jí le！／ le bù qǐ！／ miào jí le！／ hào jí le！
english: Great!/Terrific!/Yippee!/Magnificent!/Excellent!

hanzi: 人家不看使用说明书, 我又有什麽办法呢?
pinyin: rén jiā bù kàn shǐ yòng shuō míng shū,  wǒ yòu yǒu shí mó bàn fǎ ne?
english: Can I help it (ie Is it my fault) if people don't read the instructions?

hanzi: 圣句朗读《圣经》，是教堂礼拜的组成部分
pinyin: shèng jù lǎng dú《 shèng jīng》， shì jiào táng lǐ bài de zǔ chéng bù fen
english: A reading from Scripture that forms a part of a church service.

hanzi: 我不能去。第一，天太冷；此外，我没有钱。
pinyin: wǒ bù néng qù。 dì yī， tiān tài lěng； cǐ wài， wǒ méi yǒu qián。
english: I can't go. To begin with, it's too cold. Beside, I've no money.

hanzi: “早上好。”我说，但他并没有回答我的问候。
pinyin: “ zǎo shang hǎo。” wǒ shuō， dàn tā bìng méi yǒu huí dá wǒ de wèn hòu。
english: "Good morning," I said, but he didn't return the greeting.

hanzi: 她将其全部积蓄都花在了去埃及有这趟旅行上了。
pinyin: tā jiàng qí quán bù jī xù dōu huā zài le qù Aī jí yǒu zhè tàng lu:3 xíng shàng le。
english: She spend all her savings on a trip to Egypt.

hanzi: 该国南部大雨滂沱而北部却滴雨未落.
pinyin: gāi guó nán bù dà yǔ pāng tuó ér běi bù què dī yǔ wèi luò.
english: The heavy rain missed the north of the country altogether, and the south copped the lot.

hanzi: 该国南部大雨滂沱而北部却滴雨未落.
pinyin: gāi guó nán bù dà yǔ pāng tuó ér běi bù què dī yǔ wèi luò.
english: The heavy rain missed the north of the country altogether, and the south copped the lot.

hanzi: 瘤动物或植物体内组织的异常新生物；肿瘤
pinyin: liú dòng wù huò zhí wù tǐ nèi zǔ zhī de yì cháng xīn shēng wù； zhǒng liú
english: An abnormal new growth of tissue in animals or plants; a tumor.

hanzi: 他因得宠而获此地位, 并非有何特长或本事.
pinyin: tā yīn de chǒng ér huò cǐ dì wèi,  bìng fēi yǒu hé tè zhǎng huò běn shì.
english: He obtained his position more by favour than by merit or ability.

hanzi: 警察告诫围观者, 不要靠近燃烧　的建筑物.
pinyin: jǐng chá gào jiè wéi guàn zhě,  bù yào kào jìn rán shāo　 de jiàn zhù wù.
english: Police warned bystanders to keep away from the blazing building.

hanzi: 我可以听见他在隔壁屋子里（不停地）锤打东西.
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ tīng jiàn tā zài gé bì wū zi lǐ（ bù tíng de） chuí dǎ dōng xi.
english: I could hear him hammering (away) in the house next door.

hanzi: 野禽，猎鸟一种野生的猎鸟，如野鸭、野鹅或鹌鹑
pinyin: yě qín， liè niǎo yī zhòng yě shēng de liè niǎo， rú yě yā、 yě é huò ān chún
english: A wild game bird, such as a duck, goose, or quail.

hanzi: 罗马帝国在全盛时期几乎占据了整个欧洲。
pinyin: Luó mǎ dì guó zài quán shèng shí qī jī hū zhàn jù le zhěng gè ōu zhōu。
english: At its zenith the Roman Empire covered almost the whole of Europe.

hanzi: 她生在伦敦, 但现在把巴黎看成是她的家乡.
pinyin: tā shēng zài lún dūn,  dàn xiàn zài bǎ Bā lí kàn chéng shì tā de jiā xiāng.
english: She was born in London, but she now looks on Paris as her home.

hanzi: 奶油的与奶油相关的、含奶油的或从奶油中提取的
pinyin: nǎi yóu de yù nǎi yóu xiāng guān de、 hán nǎi yóu de huò zòng nǎi yóu zhòng tí qǔ de
english: Relating to, containing, or derived from butter.

hanzi: 条件（从句）表示条件的语气、时态、从句或词
pinyin: tiáo jiàn（ zòng jù） biǎo shì tiáo jiàn de yǔ qì、 shí tài、 zòng jù huò cí
english: A mood, tense, clause, or word expressing a condition.

hanzi: 我目前的这一切额外工作用去了我的闲暇时间.
